1b1(mdo): rma kar swA / ma hA su / tsit+ta de / pu rnga pa 'i pra sa/ na ma ma sa yan su
1b2(mdo): bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha'i bu/ rab thal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 
1b3(mdo): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpal thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// / 'od skad bdag gis thos
1b4(mdo): pa'i dus cig na// bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na// / rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'gon
1b5(mdo): myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong khri'i/ dge slo/ nga gi dge 'dun
1b6(mdo): chen po dang / jig rten gi khams gzhan dag nas 'dus pa'i// // byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag
1b7(mdo): mang po dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i/ sA'i bu rnams dang / de las gzhan pa
1b8(mdo): lhal bu rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho las sotshogs pa/ klu'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / ge nod sbyin
2a1(mdo): gyi rgyal po sus ngan las yotshogs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gyirgyal po stobs chen las mtshogs pa nam mkhal
2a2(mdo): ldang gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan las sa tshogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa las satshogs pa myi 'am ci'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / lto 'phye
2a3(mdo): chen po 'i dbang po lag bzangs las mtshogs pa lto 'phye chen po 'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lnga'i bu stong phrag mang po 'khor dang bcas
2a4(mdo): pa dang / myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bus phrag du ma'i 'khom dang bcas pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyas 'khor stong phrag dum dang bcas pa dang / khyim bdag 'gron
2a5(mdo): byed zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / thabs cig tu bcu gas te/ de dag las gatshogs pa 'khor bzhi mang po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ chos stenang to// 
2a6(mdo): de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa/ 
2a7(mdo): rab chal sems kyang 'dus par gyur da te 'dug ko/ de nas lha'i bu rab chal sems kyis 'khor phal po de 'dus par rig nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bum mo g.yas
2a8(mdo): pa 'i lba bas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbya sa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ang skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
2b1(mdo): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bajams pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar/ 
2b2(mdo): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'bakas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags pa ma mchis
2b3(mdo): par gyod pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnaMs
2b4(mdo): kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas ngon la rton pa rna mas lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
2b5(mdo): chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos stond pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du
2b6(mdo): smra ba lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba lags ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis
2b7(mdo): mngon par 'phags pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul dpar dka' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zlos
2b8(mdo): gting dpag dka' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis kyi gos pa ljags ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpan
3a1(mdo): dka' zhing zab mo la gyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos stond pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na
3a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma/ 'dres pas rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal
3a3(mdo): tshar gcad pa'i slad du spel zhing sgrub pa sal ni lags/ ldar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bgyi ba thams cad kyi rgyal mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub
3a4(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams/ lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3a5(mdo): chen po sems can yongs su smyind par bgyi ba dag la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su dag pas/ brtul shugs grub pa rnams lags
3a6(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'dras pa'i sems ma mchis shing / bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
3a7(mdo): kyis rom tu phyind pa thams cad kyi pha rol pa ma dad pa rnams lags/ ji skar dbyang che ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'chog rnams lags/ jis par byang chubases
3a8(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams lags
3b1(mdo): jis par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur pa rnams lags/ ji skam sa bya chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i gyod pa
3b2(mdo): thams cad la sbas pa nga lags/ rdzis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la rgya mtshos bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas/ 
3b3(mdo): dbang phyag tu gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyi ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal sems dpal
3b4(mdo): chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba ma mchis shing / yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams lags/ de skad ce/ sa gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu rab cha lang
3b5(mdo): sems la 'di skad ces bka' sa yang to// rab 'as sems legs so// legs so// lha'i bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad las yoyang/ 
3b6(mdo): par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren pa/ skal pa grangs myed pa nas ko a bgos pa/ brtson 'grus shind tu brtand pa/ de dpon chen po sems can dpag tu byed pa la don byed pa// sems
3b7(mdo): can dpag tu byed pa zang bde ba la rab tu 'god pa la mkhas pa/ yon tan dpag tu myed pa dang ldan pa la rnams kyi don tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu ba ni yang khyod legs so// pA'i bu de'i phyir
3b8(mdo): legs par rab tu nyon la yi la zung shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yan tan gyi khyad par de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// 
4a1(mdo): lha'i bu rab thal sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar slar nyand pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'
4a2(mdo): sa yang to// lnga'i bu brang chub sems dpa' sems dam med mcham pazhi dang ldan na/ theg pa chen pos gzhan gyi rjo myi 'jog pa rnabs yin te/ bzhi gang med/ thabs yangs pas mngon par
4a3(mdo): bsgrubs pa'i shes rab dang / snying rje chen pos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang / don dang chos su mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mngon
4a4(mdo): bar shes pa'i lnga po dag ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi rnying myi 'jog pa rnams yin no// de la 'di skad
4a5(mdo): ces bya ste/ thabs ya mkham pa mngon par bsgrub byed pa'imangon gsum shes rab rtogs par 'ong du chud gyur da cing / thams cad skyabs phyib snying rje chen po yangs pa la/ gnas/ 
4a6(mdo): pa'i byams pa mngon par bsgrub pa byed gyur da la// don dang chos la shi nad tu mkhas par gyurd pa'i// so so yang dag rig la spobs pa thob gyur la// byang chub la la mngon shes dag gis rnam chen
4a7(mdo): des ni gzhan gyi dripa la 'jog par myi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ brtsams pa thams cad la bcon 'grus brtan pa rnams yin te/ 
4a8(mdo): bzhi ka ba zhen/ phyir gyi rdzogs pa'i 'artson 'grus dang / bsam pa dag pa'i rdul pa dang / byang chub la 'dun pa'i drag po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa la yid yongs
4b1(mdo): su kyi skyo ba dang ldan pa ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ brtsams pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya/ 
4b2(mdo): ste/ brtson 'grus brtan zhing rab tu gnas pa myed gyu rad cing / bsam pa rnyog pa myed cing yongs su dag gyur da la/ sangs rgyas ye shes don phyir 'dun pa drag ldan zhing / sangs rgyas moso rnams
4b3(mdo): 'dod cing rtag tu yongs myi skyo// gang la chos bzhi rgya chen khyab par de yod pa/ de ni byang chub lam du mngon 'byung brtan 'gyur zhing / byang chub lag 'thil bzhag pa bzhin 'gyur la/ 
4b4(mdo): ring po myi thogs papa 'jig rten gsum gyi chos rgyal 'gyur/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'pha/ 
4b5(mdo): ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa rnams pas can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'don sa par byed pa dang / sems can gang dag bya chub tu sa sa
4b6(mdo): ma brnyed pa de dag kya chub kyisems paskyed du 'jun pa dang / sas pas bur dus gsum du yongs su bsngo ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dpa 'a thal bas/ dge ba'i chab thams cad bskyed pa/ mngon pa
4b7(mdo): 'du byed pa zhe/ chos bzhi pa de dag dang / ldan pa'o// des 'di skad ces bya ste// mkhas pa gang dag zhes rab la ros dbyend 'dosas zhing / byang bachub zhugs pas byang chub sems ladzind 'jug byed la
4b8(mdo): gang dag bya chub sems kyis tsum gsum yi rang zhing / yi ma ma bral la ma sprul 'dra byang chub 'dod byed la/ dge ba gang yin cung zad byed pa thams cad ni/ thams cad mkhyen nyid sems la nye nang / 
5a1(mdo): par byed pa yin/ lha'i bu bya chupa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ye shes kyi chags pa myed par yod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ shes pas byas pa'i/ 
5a2(mdo): bya ba rnams byed cing rgyal gyis byas pa rnams kyi byed pa dang / chos na da byen sa rag las shing byin gyis rlob pa byed pa gang zag dang bral bar shes pa dang / stong pa nyid khyong yul du gyu rad cing sems can thams can
5a3(mdo): myi rton pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing / skye mched drug yongs su shes pa srung ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste// / shes pas
5a4(mdo): las byed pa de dag nga rgyal yid sbyin zhing // rten la mkhas pa yin/ zhing de dag lha myed la// stong nyid spyod yul de dag sems can myi rtong zhing // chags pa kun las 'das shing phyi nas gnas pa myed
5a5(mdo): chos mchog bzhi po de la shi nang tu rab gnas shing // shes rab rol phyidad cing chags myed rtsod pa yin// lha'i bu bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 
5a6(mdo): shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pas ngoms pa myed cing tshul bzhin yid la rab tu sbyor ba dang / zang zing myed pa'i sems kyis chos stond pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer myed pa
5a7(mdo): shes par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang / tshul gcig la 'jug pas tshul thams cad kyi 'jug pa la 'jug pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 
5a8(mdo): de dag zos tshol ngoms byed tshul bzhin rtog byed cing // de mnyan stond cing klog 'jimang rnyed pa tshol gyi byed/ nyon mongs smin 'dra smras rmyi lam lta bur lta/ chos nyid tha dad kyi byed de dag tshul cig 'jug/ 
5b1(mdo): mnam cani de shed du kya pa tho 'gyur zhing/ shes rab smon 'das spyan pas sa rnam pa 'dzig nyid rgyu// sa'i bu bya chu'i sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa sa 'dodas nang / 'khor rnams kyi na 'i/ 
5b2(mdo): pa dang bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa thams cad 'dzind pa'i gzungs thob pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa'i spobs pa thob pa dang / sems can thams cad la bdag myed
5b3(mdo): bgrodad pa'i ting rje chen po dang / bdud dang nyo mongs pa thams cadadang bral ba mngon par shes pa'i leshes kyi gom bgos pa ste/ chos bzhi pa de dag ngangango // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos kun chung kyi zanga'i
5b4(mdo): 'gyur ba'i gzungs mob cing // de dag spobs ldan sems cam sam nyi gcod par byed/ snying rjes chos 'di thams cad bdag byed sum byed cing mngon shes shes pa'i go bgos nyam
5b5(mdo): yongs bdud bri nyams / byangachub sems dpa' chos pa ni gagis 'jug sa// 'khor kun dang du song yang des 'jigs babyed// spu'i bu bya bachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chos
5b6(mdo): po chos bzhi dang ldanam thos pa 'o ma la rtom pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhen/ thos pa thams cad kyi 'dzidad pas thozos pa dang gyi ldan bri sgrub pa nyams pa'i byis pa thams cad yongs su spong ba dang / yi ge
5b7(mdo): dang / sgra dang / skad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad mngon du rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir brag cha dang mtshul pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / dom 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir thos pa yongs su tshol zhing dag la mgur bya ba'i phyir
5b8(mdo): ma yin pa dang / brjod du byed pa'i don la 'jug cing/ brjod pa'i do la ma yin pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dngango / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ci tsam mang du thos kyang ngoms kyi rtog pas/ byim pa thos dang / 
6a1(mdo): na rtag tu thub sa ma// srid gsus na zang kya sa rang gas sa yo nga// brag sa 'a shes de las dod ldan thos nas/ don nyid rtog ci dgal la
6a2(mdo): kun phyir gyi 'jug/ chos nyid 'di ni don mchog yin te brjod du byed// 'di mngon dang sgra skad zos par gyur da pa las/ 'gro ba rnams su 'gro bar byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub seMs
6a3(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten tshul gyis chos la rtond pa rnams yin to// bzhi gang zhe na/ bre mo rtam byed pa rnams la chos stond pa dang / skye bo phal po che 'dus pa dag la
6a4(mdo): 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba chen po dag la rjes su yibazhing byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / 'du 'dzi thams cad la sa dben par gzhol ba ste/ ches bzhi po de dag dang // 
6a5(mdo): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang tshe skye bo mang po'i dbus su son 'gyur ba// der ni mkhas pas chos kyi gtam la 'jugapar bya// skye bo mang po 'dus par gyur da pa'i tshogs
6a6(mdo): rnams ya/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom par bya// des mi bka yod gzhan gyi gtong ba rnam lnga'i gtong la yid rang byas nas byang chub bsngo bya zhing / kang mo 'du 'dzi dag dang phrad par gyu rad pa
6a7(mdo): 'itshe// deng ni dben par gzhol pa rab tu 'dod par bya// sA'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan ma/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du swA/ 
6a8(mdo): ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems kyi gtong ba dang / thos pa bsgrub pa snying por byed pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag myed pa la 'jug pa ste// chos
6b1(mdo): sa// dgas can pa'i zhes 'amams pani byed kya gyis sa yu pas byed ma da/ #
6b2(mdo): pal ne sa phyogs ra thams kya das// des chos da ngan rdzas kyigs pas 'phags// kwa'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpam chen mtshas ma'i dang ldanas// sems cad mas
6b3(mdo): macom ldam rnamam yin te// bzhi gang zhes/ bdag nyid sgrub pa la gnas zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa/ dang / bdag nyid dul ba dang / bsrungs pa dang / 'grob
6b4(mdo): dang / brtul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing / sem sa can gzham dag dul bar bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / dgrol ba dang / gdul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ 
6b5(mdo): chos ston par byed pa dang / bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ byang chub tu bsam pa nges par gyur cing / sems can rnams kyang theg pa chen po la rab tu dgod par byed pa dang / bdag nyid chos
6b6(mdo): 'dod cing chos 'dod pas gzhan dag la chos stond par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sgrub pa'i snying por byed cing 'gro la chos stond pa/ dul bsrungs legs
6b7(mdo): pratul shin tu mya ngan 'das// gang dag ma dul ma bsrungs ma btul mya ngan 'das/ ma 'das de dag chos kyi dkom mchog 'byord par 'dzud/ de dag byang chub sems la bsam pa nges
7a1(mdo): gyurd cing / theg pa de la 'gro ba rnams kyang 'god par byed/ rtag tu chos 'dod don ldan bla ma gus byed cing / sems can rnams la 'ang de dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams stonang // lnga'i/ 
7a2(mdo): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yang dang yang du tshangs pa'i gnas bzhis
7a3(mdo): gnas pa dang / rtag par rgyu nad tu rab tu dben par gnas pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa dang / lus dang sems mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang po/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste
7a4(mdo): tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag la rtag tu rab gnas shing // bden pa/ ra gnas la yang dag skyed byed la// shes pas zab mo'i// bzod la nges par thob gyurd cing / mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
7a5(mdo): sems dang ldan par gyu rad pa ste/ de ltar mngon par brtson li 'jigs pa myed pa rnams/ mngon par shes pa lnga po ga gyis mngon par 'phags gyur cing // de dag sangs rgyas
7a6(mdo): rnams kyi spyan sngar 'dug 'dul/ sems can mang po rnams kyang yongs su sbyin byed 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bdud thams cad kyis
7a7(mdo): bul dpa dga' ba rnams pan te/ bzhi gang zhen/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa ma mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan pa'i dang / sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba'i snying rjechen po dang / dan tshan
7a8(mdo): gsum kyi gdung kyi gcod pa'i 'artson 'grus dang / thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i pha rolapa tu phyin pa drug ze/ chos pani po de dag dngango // de la 'di sad ces bya ste/ tshan byed pa
7b1(mdo): pas nges pa'i bsam gtan bzhi sgom zhing / sems can yongs su bskyab phyir rtag tu snying rje ldan / dkon mchog gsum rgyun myi chad brtson 'grus thob gyur cing // kun tu thabs ldan pha rol
7b2(mdo): phyind pa drug la 'jug/ de ltar gyod mkhas blo ldan che bdag yid gzhungs pa// de dag bdud bzhi dag la sa yang dag 'das gyurd cing // bdud kyi lcags kyus zind pa'i 'gro ba 'gon byed rnams
7b3(mdo): mya ngan 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam la 'god par byed// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bros gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos zal
7b4(mdo): mo'i tshul la 'jug pa dang / rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyend par dka' ba dang / rtag tu yid byung zhing chos sems par byed pa/ dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrib pa myed pa la sems kyis
7b5(mdo): nges par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang po/ de la 'di ska da ces bya ste/ zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs bA gyur dpa da / nga/ rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnye nad par dka' gyur pa la/ 
7b6(mdo): rtag tu yid bya ba chos la bsam pa zhugs gyur da cing // sems nges par rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa yi/ mkhas pa theg pa che la brtan par rab gnas pa/ blo rnam/ dag gis gting dpag dka' bar rab
7b7(mdo): 'gyur zhing // chags pa byed pa 'i ye shes yang dag bsgrub byed pa/ de'i phyir bro rnams dag gis gting dpag dkal ba yin/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan ma/ 'jig
7b8(mdo): rten gyi chos brgyad kyis kyi gos pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang / snyand pa dang / bstod pa dang / bde bas khengs pa byed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / byi stand pa dang / spang ba dang / sdug
8a1(mdo): bsngal gyis zhum pa myed pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir phung po rnams la yongs su spyod par byed pa dang / phung po yongs su shes pa srung zhing dben pa lta bu ste/ chos
8a2(mdo): bzhi po de dag dang po// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyed dang / snyan dang stong dang / bde ba kun thob kyang // de dag la ni nams kyang khengs par 'gyur ba myed// ma rnyed myi snyan spad dang sdug bsngal thob
8a3(mdo): gyur kyang / de dag pad ma bzhin du chags byed 'jig rten gyod/ sems can sbyind par bya phyir phung po yongs gyod cing // phung b+h+yo ga sog 'jaya ma rnar shes pa/ sems can phan pa de'i don tu 'jig
8a4(mdo): rten dgyod byed kyang / 'jig rten chos kyis myi gos tshul khrims spos dang ldan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpan chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la
8a5(mdo): gyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag la bdag skye da pa dang / sems can la sems can myed pa dang / chos dben ba dang / shes pa chags pa myed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang / 
8a6(mdo): nga// de la 'di skad ces bya nye// bdag la bdag myed cig nyid du yongs su zhes gyur dacing / sems can sems can byed par rjes su rtogs gyur pa la/ chos rnams dben pa nyid du yongs su zhes
8a7(mdo): gyurd cing // mkha' la lag bzhin shes pa chags pa yod sbyin pa'i// dpa' rnams thab mo dag la yongs su gyod byed la// gyod pa myed la rtag tu gyod par byed gyurd cing / 'dzin dang kun
8a8(mdo): 'dzin dkun dang nas bral bas/ sems can dag pa de dag de'i phyi gtipa dpag dkal khA'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chas pan dang ldan na/ chos ston dpas dbang / 
8b1(mdo): po mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par zhes la thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa zhes pa dang / shes rab no ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam rnam par dag pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang / 
8b2(mdo): de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mngon par shes pa rnams ni rab tu thob gyur da cing // shes pas so so yang dag rig pa myi zad gyur/ rtag tu shes rab rnon por gyur da cing sngon yang ni// yang dag pa chags pa yod/ 
8b3(mdo): su dag pa thob gyur pa// sems can rnams kyi dbang po yongs su shes byas nas// de dnga'adra ba'i chos rnams yongs su stond par byed// de dag bstand pa 'bras bu myed pa ma yin te// de'i phyir mya ngan las
8b4(mdo): 'das nas mya ngan 'da' bar byed// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan dza/ 'dus ma byas dngas 'dres pas rnam par ma dad par byed pa'i sgor zhugs
8b5(mdo): ba rnams yin te// bzhig pazhen/ stong pa nyid khyod yul du d+ha da cing / lta ba'i bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can rnams 'ang bar byed pa dang / mtsham ma byed pa la gnas shing rnam par rtog lnga
8b6(mdo): gyong pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang // spod pa myed pa la gnas shing / sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba le nad pa dang / thabs la mkhas zhing shes rab kyis nges/ 
8b7(mdo): par byung ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stong nyid gyod yul de dag ltar bcings grol byed cing / mtshan myed gnas shing sems can 'di dag yongs smin byed// smond pa myed la
8b8(mdo): gnas shing / sems can yongs su sbyind bya'i phyir// bsams bzhin skye zhing gang du 'dod pa der skye 'gyur/ shes rab thabs kyis nges 'byang rnam tha dadang skor gnas kyang / 'dus ma byas pa'i
9a1(mdo): dbyings de dus kyi byed// kwa'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mamam bzhi dang ldanan/ lhag pa'i brgyal can mgacad pa'i phyir snrel gzhi bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ 
9a2(mdo): bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgo yang dag par shes pa dang / chos thams cad sgrib pa myed par mos pa dang / kun tu rtog pa 'iH pa las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'dra/ 
9a3(mdo): ba'i rang bzhin can gyis chos thams cad la nem nur byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems mnyam chos kyi dbyings su nges par 'byung 'gyur cing // de dag nams kyis sgrib pa 'aka' yang
9a4(mdo): mthong gyi 'gyur// nyon mongs kun tu rtog pa'i pha las rab tu byung bar shes nas/ de las snrel zhing kun tu ston kyi byed/ chos 'di thams cad rang bzhim mya ngan 'das pa dang / 
9a5(mdo): ma skyes la 'gags yob nyid kyis dag pa yin// de dag kum ma khyen yongs btsal mya ngan 'das gyu rang nas/ phrag pa'i dargya can dag tshar gcod byed pa yin// 'i bu byang tul sems dpan
9a6(mdo): sems dpa' chen macas bzhi dang ldanan// las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu las mkhas pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ yar myong chen ma ma rgyu sbyin pa phyi spong ba dang // mtho sa su skye ba'i rgyu rgyal khrims kyi spong na
9a7(mdo): pa dang/ na mis kyi sate/ ma can pa de dag pa/ 'as sa na/ sa spyod rna na pa kyi 'a / 
9a8(mdo): rgyargyal nams napa nyid de gras te// zhes rab turloms rnams pa de 'thas te// nam gro ba deg rgyan pa par byed ci de 'thas te// rgya bamede la rtag brtsor mangs pa de dag ni// byang chub sung bas kyi
9b1(mdo): bskur rang 'bras phyir nyin mtshan myod/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ lha'i bu mtha' dang bral zhing rte nad cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
9b2(mdo): tshad par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa byung na rga shi'i bar du 'byung bar lta zhing bdag tu lta bar yang myi byed pa dang / ma rig pa 'gags na rga shi'i bar du 'gags par lta zhing srid pa 'gog par
9b3(mdo): yang myi byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam yang rtag par myi lta chad par lhung myi byed// des nichos rnams rkyed 'byung byed pa pon/ tshor ba po myed rang bzhin rnam par dag par shes
9b4(mdo): ma rig tshal las rga shi'i bar du 'byung 'gyur ba// rgyal ba kun gyi sa gsungs te de 'gags rgyu dang ni/ rkyen zad de phyir phyin chad skye myi 'gyur/ zhes gsungs/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' seMs
9b5(mdo): dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhig bzhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' thams cad rag las
9b6(mdo): bar lta ba dang / dge ba'i ba yang dag par bsags pas skyo ba byed pa dang / 'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su tshol ba dang / sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta bu de lta bu'i mos pa thabs kyis nyes/ 
9b7(mdo): su myong bar byed cing // nyon mongs pa rnams kyis ma yin pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni sems cad rnams la rten// dge ba mtshogs shing 'dod pas/ 
9b8(mdo): yongs su skyo babyed// 'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan 'das pa yongs tshol zhing // sems can ji bzhin mos pa thabs kyis yongs su shes// yA'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po chos bzhi dang
10a1(mdo): ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ long gyod mya zad pa dang / chos stond pa myi zad pa dang / mngon par shes pa kyi zod pa dang / sems sa dang mnyam pa ste/ 
10a2(mdo): chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag rnams kyi longs gyod rtag tu myi zad cing // rtag tu chos kyis myi zad rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin// de dag mngon shes lnga po myi zad rtag
10a3(mdo): myi g.yo// rtag tu rngam ldan bsam pa sa dang 'dra ba yin/ mnyam myed byang chub phyir ni yang dag zhugs gyurd cing // mya ngan ma 'das gang la chos rnams de yod pa// de dag 'gro ba kun gyi nye bar
10a4(mdo): 'tsho myang zhing / byang chub mchog phyir myur tu nges par 'a byung bar 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos pa'i dang ldan na// 'jig rten thams cad mngon
10a5(mdo): par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis gnas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po zhis sdud pa dang / bden pa bzhi shes pa dang / so so ya
10a6(mdo): dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dag gis gnas byed cing // bsdu ba'i dngos po dag la rtag tu dga' byed pa// bden
10a7(mdo): ba bzhi po dag la 'jig byed dpa' bo rnams// 'gro bas ri mo byas shing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// so so yang dag rig pa'i pha rol som 'gyur cing // 'chad dang klog dag ya rtag tu bapon gyur nga la/ 
10a8(mdo): pha rol bde bar gyur da pa'i bde bar mgu byed na// de'i phyir de dag yid du 'ong zhing sdug par 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ srog chags thas cad
10b1(mdo): kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba'i rnams yin te/ bzhi ga zhen/ thos pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan zhing tshul 'chos pa myed pa dang // des shing 'grogs na bde ba dang / dben pa la dga' zhi ba dbang po bsrungs pa/ 
10b2(mdo): dang // bdag nyid bde ba la lhag par chags pa myed cing rtag tu kha na ma tho ba la lta ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// thos pa'i yon tan thob cing / tshul khrims pa
10b3(mdo): rold son// tshul 'chos myed cing rtag tu des la' rtul shugs bzang // nags dang nags rab gnas shing dbang po sdom byed la// rnam ldan bdag bde myi ltos kha na ma tho lta// gang la rtag tu dge ba'i
10b4(mdo): yon tan de yod pa// de dag rtag tu sems can phan phyir brtson 'gyur zhing // de dag sems camangon yang rtag tu byed 'gyur la/ de dag rtag tu byang chub phyir yang yid gzhol 'gyur// lha'i du
10b5(mdo): byabachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dge pa'i gyod pa thams cad la sbas pa byed pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / brtsom 'grus phur
10b6(mdo): sum tshogs pa dang / snying rje chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang // theg pa chen por yongs su sngo la la mkhas pa rnams te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag dang dang ldan pa rtul ba/ 
10b7(mdo): brtan ldan zhong // de dag 'tshon 'grus mthu dang stobs dang ldan pa yin// 'gro ba kun la byams dang snying rje me ldan zhing // byang chub ched du yongs su sngo la mkhas pa ste// de phyir dge ba kun la
10b8(mdo): smras pa yod phyin zhing // zla ba nya ba'i zla ba mkhal la skang sa'i/ tshogs kyi dbus ma gnas pa rnam par mdzes pa ltar/ yang dang yang du dge bkun la rnam 'phel 'gyur/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpal ses
11a1(mdo): 'a chen po lnga ni dang ldan na// shes rab dag la rgya mtsho lnga bu rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ji skad smras pa/ de bzhin du byed pa dang / sgrub pa'i snying por byed pa dang / blo rab tu gnas pa/ 
11a2(mdo): dang / lhag pa'i bsam 'ardo rje ltar brtand pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mkhas pa de dag ji skad smral pa de bzhin byed// de dag sgrub pa snying por byed cing blo rab gnas
11a3(mdo): gang dag 'phon lade dag rdo rje lta bu yi// lhag pa'i bsam pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur/ mkhas pa gang dag chos bzhi de dag stond byed pa// de dag rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyem sten byed cing // dam
11a4(mdo): bcas rnams la snying por byed par 'gyur ba dang // rtag tu sa sa rgyas gsung yang 'dzind par byed pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 
11a5(mdo): chos la dbang sgyur ba'i dbang phyug tu gyurd pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ye shes kyi stobs can rnams yin zhing / nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams ma yin pa dang / sems la
11a6(mdo): dbang sgyur ba rnams yin zhing // bdud kyi dbang sgyur ba ma yin pa dang / gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams ma yin pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos stond pa rnams yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag pa
11a7(mdo): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag ye shes stobs ldan nyon mongs dbang myi 'gro/ shes rab stobs kyis spun spangs lha rnams kun dang bral// sems la dbang sgyur byed cing bdud bzhi spangs
11a8(mdo): gyur la// spobs pa brtand par gyur cing gzungs kyis 'khrugs pa myed/ de dag stong pa 'bras bu myed par myi 'gyur te// de phyir myur du dbang phyug nyid dang ldan par 'gyur/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
11b1(mdo): dra pa ste/ chos ba'i bo de dag dngango // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// btul byed cing bras gus pas gnas 'gyur la/ kun nas bag yod bya chub mchog la 'du ma dzag cing/ bsam
11b2(mdo): pa lag pas blon cing / rtag tu ba 'byuras/ slob dpo dpel 'thud byed pa rtag tu blo' dpor 'gyur// mangs pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i don mkhas shing // tshul dang tshul ma yin la mkhas pa'i
11b3(mdo): brtan pa rnams// 'jig rten kun mdza' thams cad rtogs par zhung du chud// de'i phyir 'gro bas spyi bor thal sbyar/ de la btud/ lnga'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
11b4(mdo): chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba byed cing / yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na// mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par che ba/ 
11b5(mdo): dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa'i spobs pa dang / dge ba thams cad dang myi 'bral zhing / bag chags dang bral ba dang // dge ba thams cad dang ldan zhing dbang bskur ba thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po
11b6(mdo): de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can de dag rgya chen mngon shes shes pas pa rtse// bde ba gshegs kun gyi mkha' 'dra spobs dang ldan/ brtson 'grus thogs myed myi dge bag chags
11b7(mdo): kun spangs shing // dge dang ldan zhing dbang bskur thob par gyur pa ste/ chos rnams de dag la ni rab tu gnas gyur da ba/ de dag kha na ma tho myed pa'i yon tan ldan bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub pa
12a1(mdo): 'di bstan pa na/ lha dang myi rnams las srog chags sa ya nyi 'bum gyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gyis/ 
12a2(mdo): ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha dang myi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// stong gsum gyi stong
12a3(mdo): chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing / 'jig rten thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par yang gyur to// lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog gi char rab tu phab cing / lha'i
12a4(mdo): sil snyan dag gi sgra yang phyung bar gyur da to// kru rnams kyi sa mu tig mar po dang / klu'i me tog gi char rab tu phab po/ lha ma yin dang / nam mazha' lding dang / myi 'am tsi dang / 
12a5(mdo): lho 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mchod pa dag gis mchod pa byas so// thams na dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang a la la chos a la la chos
12a6(mdo): a la la chos zhes lam gsum ched du brjod nas/ mchod pa chen po dag kyang byas so// de nas lha'i bu rab tshal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bcoM
12a7(mdo): ldan 'das kyis chos sum bcu pa gnyis po de dag gi don dang / tshig rnam par gtam la dbab pa bstand pa de bkal sa \u0f7fsad kyis/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang sum bcu ma gnyis po de dag gi don dang / tshig rnam par
12a8(mdo): gtam la dbab pa la stan dal dacig 'gyong med kyas/ 'jas dpal khyad kyang sum bcu ma gnyis pa/ de la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen
12b1(mdo): tham sand kyi bya 'don pa rnamam yin// 'ja ma dpas kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ga pa gi sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gzhan gyi rkyen rgyas gyi 'gro la de lams/ khwa'i bu bya bachub sems dpas
12b2(mdo): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi ring gyi 'jog pa rnams yin no// yA'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po bsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus
12b3(mdo): brtan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub
12b4(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin no// lnga'i bus spras pa/ 2ma dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
12b5(mdo): po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dang pa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings myi g.yo ba rjes
12b6(mdo): su rtog pa de ltar na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
12b7(mdo): chen po ye shes kyis chags pa myed par gyod pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yul thams cad la chags par myi byed pa/ de lta na lha'i bu
12b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags pa myed pa gyod pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mun pa
13a1(mdo): dang bral ba rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par shes pa byed pa
13a2(mdo): de na/ bu'i bu byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi thun pangadang bral byung yin no// lha'i zhus smras pa/ 'jas dpas dri skar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khom rnams
13a3(mdo): kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin te// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po rnams chos thams cad rnam par bye ma/ myi rnyed par byed pa de lta na
13a4(mdo): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jin rten gyi 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
13a5(mdo): dpal sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rtond pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad brjod
13a6(mdo): du myed par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
13a7(mdo): dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rtond pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings zhi ba nyid du shes par byed pa de
13a8(mdo): lha na lha'i bu byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams yino// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas
13b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgra thams cad la rtend par myi byed pa de ltar/ 
13b2(mdo): na/ lnga'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin smra ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
13b3(mdo): sems dpa' chen po sems cad rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sA'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rnams smra ba thams cad las ldog par byed pa de ltan
13b4(mdo): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po sems can rnam sa la chos smrab rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po
13b5(mdo): mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chu gsems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad las
13b6(mdo): g.yo bar myi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no// sna'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
13b7(mdo): sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs par bya'i
13b8(mdo): byir nyon mongs pa nyid byang chubag sems dpal sa yin par yongs su tshol bar byed pa de ldan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul par dka' ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus/ 
14a1(mdo): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bros gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
14a2(mdo): chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gting rtogs par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal
14a3(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis myi gos pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten ma
14a4(mdo): gyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis gos par myi 'gyur ba de lha na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis myi gos pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smra
14a5(mdo): 'arjod pa pa ji lta nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gti dpag dka' zhing zab mo la myong ba rnams yin// 'jam dang la gyis smras la/ lnga'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpal
14a6(mdo): sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la bdag myed pas/ spyid lug par gyi 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpaka dka' zhing zab mo la gyod pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus spras / 
14a7(mdo): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos stond pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dbang po drug
14a8(mdo): gi dbang po thams cad la lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos stond pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
14b1(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas dang / ma 'dres pas rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo gnas pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshaM/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen mo/ 
14b2(mdo): rnams sgo thams cad nas tha dad pa stond par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par tha dad pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa
14b3(mdo): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i phyir snrel zhing sgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
14b4(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das pa tshol zhing lta bar byed la/ mya ngan las 'das pa las kyang 'khor ba' tshol zhing lta bar byed pa/ de ltar na lha'i/ 
14b5(mdo): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i phyir snrel zhing bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams/ yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na
14b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rmyi la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos
14b7(mdo): thams cad kyi 'pho bar lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa/ rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na
14b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing/ rten cing 'breld par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
15a1(mdo): dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad bdag por myed par shes par byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la/ 
15a2(mdo): mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can la yongs su smyind par bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal/ 
15a3(mdo): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi tshul la smod par myi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba
15a4(mdo): dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'tsho dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul shugs grub pa rnams yin
15a5(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po rnams rtogs pa nyid byang chub yin par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
15a6(mdo): chen po bsam pa yong su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'dras pa'i sems myed ci pa/ bzod pa'i stobs
15a7(mdo): dang ldan pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu
15a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems myed cing / bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po
15b1(mdo): pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyind sa son pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad pha rol da las mthong bar
15b2(mdo): byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad kyi pha ral tu phyi nad pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu so nad pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar
15b3(mdo): na byang chub sems dpala' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings kyi
15b4(mdo): zad pa rab tu rtogs par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnam/ sa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar
15b5(mdo): ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin// 'jam dang la gyis smras pa/ lA'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpal
15b6(mdo): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sdang ba'i bral gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sdang ba de stan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no// 
15b7(mdo): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lnga'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
15b8(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos 'gal yang lend par myi byed/ spong bar myi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mo thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ 
16a1(mdo): no// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i gyod pa thams cad la sbas pa myed pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lU'i
16a2(mdo): bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing sa gzhi 'dra bar shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i pyod pa
16a3(mdo): thams cad la sbas pa myed pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por gyur da pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal byis
16a4(mdo): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'byed pa myi byed pa delha na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
16a5(mdo): rab dag la snying por gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po chos la dbang skur bas dbang phyug tu gyu dad pa
16a6(mdo): rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam du myed pa ses pas sems thams cad shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub
16a7(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang bsgyur bas/ dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yino// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems/ dpa' chen po bya ba
16a8(mdo): thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lA'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshul gcig gyis tshul thams cad shes par byed cing
16b1(mdo): tshul thams cad kyis kyang tshul gcig zhes pa byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slol dpon du gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 
16b2(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du Sha na ma tho ba byed cing / yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
16b3(mdo): dpa' sems dpal chen po rnams chos thams cad gnyed po byed par gtogs nas chos 'gal yang 'grub par gyi byed/ chos 'gal yang sel par gyi byed pa de ltan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
16b4(mdo): chen po thams cad du kha ma ma tho ba myed ci yom tam rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstand pa 'di bshad pa da / byang chub sems dang / 
16b5(mdo): lnga khri brgyad stong gyis myi skye ba'i chos su bstand pa bzod pa thob par gyurd to// lha dang myi rnams kyi skye dgu bdum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba
16b6(mdo): rnam par dag go// srog chags 'bum lhag tsam gyis ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i phyir lha rnams kyis kyang steng
16b7(mdo): gi bar snang las lha'i me tog gi char dag mngon par rag tu phab po// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bstand pa 'di thos nas yid rangs pa dang / dga' ba
16b8(mdo): dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gyis kyang chos de dag thos par gyur da cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs pa'i ji lta ba de lta bu'i spobs pa myi chod pa yang thob par gyurd cig/ 
17a1(mdo): ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu ra pa sa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos rnam par gtan la dpa' la bstan pa 'di legs par smras te/ legs so// 
17a2(mdo): de nas lnga'i bu rab tshal sems kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ni khyod kho bo las chos kyi dgab pa 'dod dam/ 'jam dpal
17a3(mdo): gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu 'di skad du/ khyod chos kyi dgapa pa 'dod dam/ zhes zer ba ni lhali bu legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'al ba 'di la chos kyi dgab pa zhes bya ba ni srid pa dang / 'dod pa
17a4(mdo): spangs pa yin te/ chos 'di ni so so rtog pa byed pa'i phyir 'dod pa byed pa yin no// chos 'di ni myig la mkhas yang dag par 'ad sa pa'i phyir bltar gyi sdang ba yin no// chos 'di ni mngon
17a5(mdo): par grub pa byed pa'i phyir ma byas pa yin no// chos 'di ni yul drug dang ma 'dres pa'i phyim mthong ba yin no// chos 'di ni sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir bdag gi babyed pa yin
17a6(mdo): no// chos 'di ni gtan yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir gzungs pa myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni yul myed pa'i phyir yul du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhi myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir
17a7(mdo): zag pa myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni sngon gyi mthal rnas par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba byed pa yin no// chos 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba myed pa yin no// chos 'di mi ltar byung ba rnam par dag
17b1(mdo): pa'i phyir gnas pa byed pa yin no// chos 'di ni brtag cing se lad pa dang bral ba'i phyir rtsol ba myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam pa myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni gnyen po myed pa'i
17b2(mdo): phyir myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no// chos 'di ni gnyen pa myed pa'i phyir bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir g.yo ba myed pa dang / rlom sems myed pa dang / ma brtags pa dang / rnam par ma brtags
17b3(mdo): pa dang / rnam par ma bsgrubs pa dang / kun tu myi brtan pa yin no// chos 'di ni skye ba dang / 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir blang ba myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir
17b4(mdo): gnas myed pa gnas no// chos 'di ni yang dag par ma byung / 'i phyir dper myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu gyod pa myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin
17b5(mdo): gyis nye bar zhi ba'i phyir spros pa dang bral ba yin no// chos 'di ni/ rnam par rtogs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba yin// chos 'di ni phas kyi dgol ba thams cad nges par bcom pa'i phyir rna
17b6(mdo): par rtog pa myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral ba'i phyir shi nad tu 'phags pa yin no// chos 'di ni stong pa nyid phyir stong pa myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni nges par ma brtags pa'i phyir mtshan
17b7(mdo): ma myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni rnam par shes pa myi gnas pa'i phyir smonod pa byed pa yin no// chos 'di ni che ba yongs su chad pa'i phyir myi gnas pa yin no// chos 'di ni grogs myed pa'i phyir myi rte nad pa yin no/ 
17b8(mdo): chos 'di ni myi rtenang pa'i phyir myi g.yo ba yin no// chos 'di ni bzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni gtan mngon par 'grub pa myed pa'i phyir sems can myed pa yin no// 
18a1(mdo): rnamatshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir mchad ning byed pa yin no// chos 'di ni gzongs nas yang dag par rgyu mchad pa'i phyir zhi ba yin no// chos 'din gzongs nas nye ba zhi ba'i phyir yang dag par rgyun chang
18a2(mdo): babyed pa mnan// chos thams cad 'di mi bu byed pa dang / gyi snang ba'i phyim ma mkha'i mtshan nyid yin no// lnga'i bu chos de la bu la chos kyi dag pa ji lta bu zhig song // lA'i bus smras so// 
18a3(mdo): 'jam dpal chos 'di'i dgab pa ni kun tu 'gro ba myed pa yin mo// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu legs so// legs so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos 'dim
18a4(mdo): dgab pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyis rtul pa myed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di mi gsal la rnyog pamyed pa yin pas del ni sems rnyog pa can gyis mchod par myi
18a5(mdo): nus pa'i phyir ro// sA'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na sems rnyog pa can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lA'i bu gzugs kyi/ mtshan rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par
18a6(mdo): byed pa ni/ sems rnyog pa can yin no// sgra dang / skad dang / dbyangs dang / tshig kyi lam gyis chos rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 'bras bu thob pa mngon du byed pas/ 
18a7(mdo): dge 'dun rjes su dram par byed pa mi sems rnyog pa can yin no// nyon mongs pa gtan spong ba rjes su rnam par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// skye ba la brten pas lha rjes su dran par byed pa
18b1(mdo): ni sems rtog pa can yin no// ma dul ba'i sbyin pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ ma zhi ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sems cam la rtend pa'i bzod pa mi
18b2(mdo): sems ni sems rnyog pa cad yin no// / spros pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi sems ni sems rtog pa cam yin no// bdag tu 'dzind pa la gnas pa'i byams pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sems
18b3(mdo): la nges par ma bsams pa'i bsam gtam gyi sems ni sems rtog pa can yin no// thetsom can gyi snying rje'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ mya ngan las 'das pa yi lam dang bral ba'i dga' ba'i sems
18b4(mdo): ni sems rnyog pa tsam yin no// gnyis la gnas pa// 'i btang snyoms kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lus su 'du shes pa'i tshor ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin// 
18b5(mdo): no// chos su 'du shes pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// skye ba dang 'jig par 'du shes pa'i yang dag par spong ba'i sems ni sems rtog
18b6(mdo): yin no// lus dang sems ni rtend pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po'i sems ni sems rtog pa can yin no// dbang po drug la rtend pa'i dbang po lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lta ba'i sos dang
18b7(mdo): ldan pa'i stobs lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// chos su 'du shes pa la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 'du byed yid la byed pa la brtson
18b8(mdo): ba'i lam bsgom pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sdug bsngal la yongs su rtog pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems ca ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// kun 'byung ba la bsgom pa'i 'du shes can gyi seMs
19a1(mdo): ni sems rtog pa can yin no// 'gog pa la zad pa'i 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa cam yin no// lam la bsgom par 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 
19a2(mdo): lha'i bu ji tsam du rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nyid la sgro 'dogs par byed pa de tsam du sems rnyog pa can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems rnyog pa myed pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
19a3(mdo): spram pa/ lha'i bu gang dag sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dag go// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha' la sems cung zad kyang yod do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu ji ltar
19a4(mdo): nanam mkha' la sems myed pa bzhin du sems de yang de dang 'ang ste/ gang gi sems de ba'adra ba de ni de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/ yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnas
19a5(mdo): de la su zhig mos par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lhag par byed pa la brtson pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba yin no// lA'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag pA
19a6(mdo): byed pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ga sems nam ma'a' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir lhag par byed pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci zhig lhag par/ 
19a7(mdo): byed pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rtag par byed pa ni/ lhag par byed pa yin no// myi rtag par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du bde ba dang / sdug bsngal
19a8(mdo): ba dang / sdug pa dang / myi sdug pa dang / bdag dang bdag myed par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no// stong pa zhes bya ba dang / gang zag ces bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// mtshan ma
19b1(mdo): bye pa zhes bya ba dang / sngond pa byed pa zhes bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa mdza// sku dang / khrel pa dang/ phyig yong dang / gzugs parnyam dang / brag sa dang / sramra dang / sdig rgya dang / smras dpa'i/ 
19b2(mdo): dpel nye bar 'god pa dag gi chos rnam par 'jom par byed/ mtshon par byed/ 'jug par byed/ stodad par byed pa de'i lhag par byed pa dang / rtsi nam du chos rnam par 'jom par byed pa de tsam su lhag par
19b3(mdo): mangs tha mas pas byod tu byed padang / rtsas cad byed par byed 'ang sun pa 'a// ma'angs sasto nus par byed padang / 
19b4(mdo): ni bdes pashes shi / ma thams das gnyis dang bra dang / zang ba byed pa dang / rang ba byed pazas pa ma ma'i bul gisa'i rgyas byed pa 'i // 'ang sadas gnom tha nga ba
20a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen pa nyi khri nyis spyod gyis ni gyi skye ba la choms bzod pa thog par gyur pa / srog chags stong phrags las rab tu ma pa po dag gis mi bla ma byed pa yang/ 
20a2(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge bsnyen stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba las bud myed nyi stob
20a3(mdo): yang chos rnams la chos kyi myi rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// de nas lha'i bu rab du mi sems kyis/ nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag
20a4(mdo): khyed cag kyang the tsom ni yod pa dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur dpa la dris shig/ de nas gnas rta na 'od srungs chen/ pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pa la 'di skad ces smras
20a5(mdo): so/ 'jam dpal dge slong rnam par thard pa brgyad la sam gtan byed pa/ ji zhig la bsam gtan byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen
20a6(mdo): dge slong rnam par thar da pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni yab myed pa dang / mtha' byed pa dang / gnas myed pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / myi 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / yang dag
20a7(mdo): pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin no// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal mi las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po che ba ni rang gi lus yin
20a8(mdo): mtha' ni rang 'dzin pa yin/ gnas mi khams gsum yin/ 'khrugs pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams yin/ myi mnyam pa ni gnyis yin te/ de la des lus ni ma pa myed par shes/ ngang 'dzind pa ni
20b1(mdo): ma' 'byed par shes/ khams gsum ni gnas byed par shes/ nyon mongs pa rnams sa kyi 'khrugs par zhes bsam gtan nams ni gnyis su byed par shes ldan ra/ btsum pa 'od srung chem po mas/ 
20b2(mdo): de la bsams nas/ dge slong rnam par tha dad pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni rtsa ba myed pa dang / mtha' myed pa dang gnas myed pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / myi 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / 
20b3(mdo): yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin no// zhes smras so// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chem pa chags pa myed pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin
20b4(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pazha dwa ti'i bu byang chub sem sa dpa' gang chags pa thams cad la gyod par byed kyang/ sa pa thams cad kyis gos par myi 'gyur zhing / nyom mongs
20b5(mdo): pa thams cad la mngon sum du byed kyang / sems can yongs su du na par bya ba'i phyir nyom mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang yin pa mi nyon mongs pa de dag kyang so par gyi byed ma/ de tsam
20b6(mdo): gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa myed pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin no// mo 'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba yin/ 'jam dpal
20b7(mdo): gyis smras pa/ btsun pa mu lu 'gal gyi bu chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpalag pa 'dus byas kyang ma thob/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma thob la/ slob pa dang / myi slob pa rnams kyang dul bar byed na
20b8(mdo): de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no// rab 'byod kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ldar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa myed par gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras/ 
21a1(mdo): btsun pa rab 'byor dkang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad sgrib pa myed par shes par byed la/ pha rol dang tshu ro la dang bral zhing / byang chub kyi sgrib pa yang myi spong zhing / ting de
21a2(mdo): 'dzind las kyang gyi ldang zhing / bya ba thams cad kyang stond par byed ma/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal can pa nyon mongs pa myed par gnas pa yin no// byams pa'i bu gang pos smras pa/ 
21a3(mdo): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yayin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po kang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dbang po thams cad kyis spobs par byed cing 'du byed thams cad
21a4(mdo): myi rtag go zhes 'bras bu yod par chos stond par byed la// bskal pa stong phrag rnams su don dang tshig dang yi ge stond pa rnams kyis/ de rgyas par stond par byed kyang / mthar thug par byed par gyi
21a5(mdo): 'gyur na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chos stond pa yin no// nam grus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
21a6(mdo): pa btsun pa nam gru gang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag pa'i nyid yin par yang shes par byed la/ seMs rna ma pA g.yengs pa rnams la snying rje chen po skyed de/ phyi ma'i mtha'i
21a7(mdo): mur thug pa'i bar du gyod par byed kyang / bsam gtam la gnas pa las g.yo bar myi 'gyur ma/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtamapa yin no// nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpa'
21a8(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa nye bar 'khor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams 'dul ba nyid du yang shes par byed cing ltung ba dang / nyon mongs
21b1(mdo): pa dang bral la/ ltung ba dang nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i phyir chos stond par byed cing / de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams rtog par byed la/ byang chub kyang tshol bar byed ma/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba'i 'dzin/ 
21b2(mdo): ba yin no// ma 'gags pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' lha'i myig dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ma 'gags pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpal phyogs
21b3(mdo): bcu'i gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang mthong bar byed la/ gzugs dben par mthong bas chos thams cad dben par mthong ba rjes su rtogs par byed ma/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpal lha'i phyig dang ldan pa
21b4(mdo): yin no// ba ku las smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po bsrungs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yul thams cad
21b5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi yul yin par lta zhing / sangs rgyas kyi yul yang yu la myed par lta na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpal dbang po/ 'thul pa yin no// sor mo 'phreng las smras pa/ 'jam dpal
21b6(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal dbang po rno ba yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpal byang chub rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/ mtshams byed pa dang / mnyam par lta bar byed ma/ de ci/ 
21b7(mdo): gyis na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin no// ka ta'i bu chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ 'jam dpal
21b8(mdo): gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ka ta'i bu chen po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa myid zad pa bzhi thob cing / tshig gcig gis kyang skal pa 'bum gyi bar du rgya cher rnam par 'byed cing // stond
22a1(mdo): ca nas ca mas cad padang / rnam par byang ba ban pa kyi byed pa de ga sul ga dang par byed pa dang / rnam nyid ga @ kya / gnas tha
22a2(mdo): ma da pa byed na/ ral gyisas kyang rgyab sems dpa' ba dzirnam par byed pa la marnamapa bad// gsum ma chen la pa smram pa/ 'jam sa sa par byang chub
22a3(mdo): dmamam pa yang dag par rig sa thob sa yis// rang sa dpas kyis smras pa// gang gi sa byang chub sems dpa' brjod du myed pa'i dad rgyas darnams pa yang dag por rig la ston dpa dang / chos kyi dbyings gnas
22a4(mdo): nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / mying dang mam nam myed pa nyid kyis nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ston po dang / ca dam nya nyid rmopar yo dag da byed su kyim bya mapas da sa
22a5(mdo): da/ ma gas las 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ btsun pa sma ga can zim gang gitshe/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs
22a6(mdo): yang dag par blangs shing sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims 'tshal da pa'i 'gro ba gang yin par 'gro bar byed ma/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no// 
22a7(mdo): kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas zas
22a8(mdo): kyis gsungs pa nyan pa nyan par byed cing / zos pa thams cad kyi don kyang rtogs par byed la/ ji ltar zos par yang 'dzinang par byed cing / ji ltar na bzung ba bzhin ston dpar byed ma/ de tsam gyis
22b1(mdo): na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu rab chal sems kyis nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur rad pas 'di
22b2(mdo): 'di skad bstand pa de lta bu'i chos 'ga' dang ldan no// de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i bu bdag lnga ni chos de dag las 'ga' tsam yang myed do// lha'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de lta na khyed cag nyan thos
22b3(mdo): chen po mchog tu gyur ba ma yin par myi 'gyur ram// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na klang rjes la brten na rdzing bu mchog yin pa de bzhin du/ nyan thos gzham dag las rten na kho bo cag kyang
22b4(mdo): mchog yin no// 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po la rten ma 'og gi chu'i phung po mchog yin pa de bzhin du/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las brten ma/ byang chub
22b5(mdo): sems dpa' mchog yin mo// yA'i bus smras pa/ btsun sngar 'jas pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni nyan thos mngon pa'i nga rgyal skye ra ba rnams kyis bstand pa yin te// legs so legs so
22b6(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ nyan thos ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal myed pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i ngargyal can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rmi las
22b7(mdo): bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar nyan thos rnams ni rang sangs rgyas la brten na ngargyal spangs pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i ngargyal can yin la/ nga rgyal
22b8(mdo): des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub par byed pas na// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ni bdag la
23a1(mdo): spong bar byed cing / gzhan la smod par byed pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang de lta bur myi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal kyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu de bzhin te/ byang chul
23a2(mdo): thams dpal ni bdag sa spyod par byed cing / gzhan la smod par byed pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gyis 'asmram pa/ khrims bsams te de skad sA/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
23a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' ni rnam grangs du mar theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par byed pa dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub tu/ 
23a4(mdo): sems bskyed par 'gyur snyam na/ bdag nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos brjod par byed ni pa 'di la dga' ba'i sems bskyed par myi 'gyur bar byas nas/ theg pa dman pa la rnam par
23a5(mdo): ldang bar byed pa yin pas/ lha'i bu de lta na byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa chen po la stod par byed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la spod par byed pa yin no// yA'i bus smras pa/ 
23a6(mdo): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba dang bcas par myi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nor bu 'ching bu'i bsngags pa ma yin par brjod tsa'i nor bu rim po che bye ru
23a7(mdo): rgya'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur dam/ de yang ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ram/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lA'i bu de bzhin du byang chub seMs
23a8(mdo): dpa' theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing nyan thos kyi theg bI bsngags pa ma yin par brjod par byed pa yang ltung ba dang bcas par myi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu shi nad tu
23b1(mdo): stobs dang ldan pa gang zhig gyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsngags pa brjod cingapa/ khams kyi rgyal po la de lta ma yin ma/ de smad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin snyam 'am/ lA'i bus smras pa/ 'jam/ 
23b2(mdo): dpas de ga ma yin no// 'jas dpas kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal theg pa chen po la bstod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la mun par byed pa yang spang ba mangs su
23b3(mdo): myi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gnon dur gyur da pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lang sa dpal legs so migs so// khyod kyi tshig re mi legs pa ma smras te/ 
23b4(mdo): 'jam dpal theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod pas ni theg thams cad kyis bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na// 'jam dpal theg pa thams cad mi de las nges par
23b5(mdo): 'byung ba'i phyir ro// gzhan yang lha'i bu rab phal sems// kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smrasaso// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpal ga pa las brtend
23b6(mdo): nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed// 'jam dpal gyis spros pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi nyen mongs pa la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' bskyed par byed do// 
23b7(mdo): 'jam dpal ma ma byar ni byang chug sems dpal sems can thams cad kyi nyan mongs pa las brten nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed do// yA'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir na byang chub sems/ 
23b8(mdo): dpa' sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa las brtend nas sems bskyed par byed// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag byang chub kyi theg pa ma yin
24a1(mdo): thiman mi byang chub sems dpal yang bya bachub tu ya ba sems bskyed nas sha cha gyon par gyi 'gyur ro// sA'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems mi nigs rten 'jam dpal
24a2(mdo): phyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams la rten to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ya pa las brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba'i
24a3(mdo): phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad cil rten/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni phra ba myed pa'i gnas la rtend pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu
24a4(mdo): chos thams cad mtha' yas pa'i phyir za ba myed pa dang / mngon ra skabs yod pa dang / nam mkhalal rten dpal yin pa'i phyiralA'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi ngos
24a5(mdo): rnams ji snyed yod// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i/ bu chos thams cad ji snyed pa de snyed yod do// de ci'i phyi/ ra zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad sangs
24a6(mdo): rgyas pas na/ lnga'i bu de'i phyir chos thams cad ji snyed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang de snyed do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'dzem dpal 'on mi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams
24a7(mdo): kya sangs rgyas kyi chos yin nas/ 'jam dbas kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ 'dad chags dang / me sda ba dang / gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chom yin do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs
24a8(mdo): pa de dag gi dge ba'i sa la yig nas rjes su rtogs lani sangs rgyas yin na zhes ston mam phyir ro// zhwa'i zhus smras pa/ 'jam dpas gang gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur 'a'i
24b1(mdo): byed pa'i rnam pa dang / rkang pa nyid kyirna thams so/ kwa'i bus smras pa/ 'angs dpas stong sa nyid khyim ca ni gtogs pa pa byed/ 'angs dpas kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ga sa te sung bad rjes su rtag
24b2(mdo): par byed pada'i spong bar gyi mya // de ci'i phyir zhe/ snga'i bu stong pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa myed pa dang / thos pa byed pa'i phyir // lnga'i bus smram pa/ 'ang ladas na
24b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pas stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pas ni bya ba yin no// zhes ma gsungs sam// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid byang chub
24b4(mdo): yin pas ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa kho na byang chub yin no zhes gsungs so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas paci zhig la gnas pa yin/ 
24b5(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa la gnas pa ma yin/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/ sus dang
24b6(mdo): sems la gnas pa ma yin no// demam byar zhe na/ lnga'i bu de gnas pa gang gis gnas pas 'gyur ba'i gnas pa de la bsgob pas ma/ stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la kyi gnas pa'i phyir po// khwa'i dus
25a1(mdo): smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi gnas pas gnas par myi mdzad dam// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid stong pa nyid
25a2(mdo): yin la/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su myed pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni gnyis su myed pa'i gnas pa gnas par mdzad do// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyis su myed pa'igam
25a3(mdo): pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gnyis su myed pa'i gnas pa ni gnyis su myed pa yin gyi/ de la gnas pa myed pa gzhan myed de/ de ni gnas pa gnyis su myed pa las gzhan myed pa de nyid
25a4(mdo): kyang gnyis su myed pa yin no// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 2jam dpal gnyis zhes bya ba ni kang / gnyis su myed pa zhes/ bya ba ni gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sna'i bu
25a5(mdo): 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba byed pa de ni gnyis so// 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis su byed dam/ zhe sdang dnga'i sdang byed par byed pa de gnyis so// / zhe sdang
25a6(mdo): gyi rang bzhin gnyis su byed pa'o// gti mug dang / gti mug byed par byed pa de mi gnyis so// gti mug gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su myed pa'o// nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa myed par byed pa
25a7(mdo): de ni gnyis so// nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin mi gnyis su myed pa'o// bdag dang 'dag myed par byed pa de ni gnyis so// bdag gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su byed pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 6
25a8(mdo): dpal bdag gi rang bzhin gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bdag gi rang bzhin ni gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir bdag nyi pa bzhad myed pa nyid yin no// bdag gi rang bzhin ni gzod ma mas
25b1(mdo): dag pa'i phyir gzod ma nas dben pa nyid dang / gzod pa nas ma skyes pa nyid dang / gzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir rang bzhin rang bzhin zhes byal/ 'jam
25b2(mdo): dpal gyis smras pa/ sna'i bu de ni 'gyur ba myed pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni gzod ma nyid nas gsal zhing nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni nam mkha' dang
25b3(mdo): mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam zhing tshad myed pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni spros pa dang bral ba dang / de ni rgyu ba dang bral ba dang / de ni 'od gsal bas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni blang ba myed pa dang / dor
25b4(mdo): ba myed pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rang bzhin myi shes pa dag kar yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu gang dag chos rnams kyi rang bzhin
25b5(mdo): myi shes pa dag go// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ra/ nga bzhin shes pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag de dag gi rang bzhin shes pa dag go// lha'i bus
25b6(mdo): smras pa/ 'jam dpal dad pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ lha'i bu dad pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ni chags pa thams cad las yang dag par
25b7(mdo): 'das pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong dang la da gyi ldan pa 'i ltar dad pas byin pa la dad par byed/ 'jas dpal gyis smras pa/ lA'i 'u dang pa dang gyi ldan zhes bya ba ni/ gang mngon
25b8(mdo): sum du gyur pa'i chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog cing / gzhan gyi dad pas yab dang yang du myi 'gro ba yin pas/ de'i phyir dad pa dang myi ldan pa zhes bya ste/ de ni dad pas byis pa sbyong bar myi byed do// 
26a1(mdo): 6de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir ro// lnga'i bu'o smras pa/ yang yangs la dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan cig myi gnas pa de sa ci skad // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
26a2(mdo): dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan cig myi gnas pa de ni/ des na 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dge 'dum mi 'dus ma byas pa yi ma ya/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'dus ma
26a3(mdo): byas dang lhan cig myi gnas pas/ de'i phyir de'i mi 'jig rtend kyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ga lang te byang chub sems dpal 'dus ma byas dang ldan gyi/ 
26a4(mdo): gnas par gyur mnyes pa cir 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyi// sa smras pa/ lha'i bu 'dus ma byas thob na sems can rnams// skyob par myi byed cing / nyan thos su 'gyur bas de'i nyes pa ni
26a5(mdo): der 'gyur ro// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa la 'dus byas na so sa'i skye bo'i la la gnas pa 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu byang
26a6(mdo): chub sems dpa' ni 'dus byas la yang gyi gnas/ 'dus ma byas la yang myi gnas pas/ de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhes/ lha'i'u byang chub sems dpa' mi 'du rje
26a7(mdo): las yid bskyed pa dang / 'dus ma byas la myi gnas pa yin pas 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral ba dang 'dus ma byas zhes pa rtogs pa yin te// de 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral bas ni/ 'dus byas la mya
26a8(mdo): garas las/ 'dul byas la phyi gnas la 'dus ma byas zhes pa rtogs pas mi/ 'dus pa byas su myi sgrub pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chen po che chen pos ste zhi bar snga nga la yang
26b1(mdo): 'phangs par gyur da la/ de nas mad 'de nam ma lalas myi gnas par 'acug cing / ma la yang gyi klung na/ wAli bu de la dka' ba cung zad kyang mdzang// wA'i zhus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dag mo// 'ja
26b2(mdo): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dus byas kyang myi spong zhing 'dus ma byas kyang thob par byed la/ 'dus ma byas su yang gyi ltung zhing / 'dus byas
26b3(mdo): thob pa rnams kyang yongs su sbyi nad par byed la de ni dka' ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa 'dus byas/ 'on te 'dus ma byas sam/ gang las 'byung bar
26b4(mdo): 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu byang chub se/ mas dpa'i 'jigs pa ni 'dus byas las kyang 'byung bar gyur/ 'dus ma byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de mig
26b5(mdo): byang zhes/ shA'i bu 'dus byas las ni nya mangs pa'i 'dzin nyes pa 'byung sa/ 'dus ma byas las mnyon mongs pabyed pa tha 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i phyir // lha'i bus smras pa/ 
26b6(mdo): 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa myed pas 'jigs pa mi yod// 'ja ma dpal kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khams gsum na ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa yod la/ byang chub sems dpal gang khams
26b7(mdo): gsum du nyon mongs pas kyi byed na/ de ni nyan thos su 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'ja' dpal ji ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa myed pa yin/ 'jam dpal kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub
26b8(mdo): sems dpa' gang shes rab kyis shes pas 'dus byas la gyod pa byed cing / thabs kyi zhes pas 'dus byas su myi ltung ba de ltar/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpal 'jigs pa byed pa yin no// lha'i bu ga
27a1(mdo): yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta bas 'dus byas spong bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos la lta bas 'dus ma byas su myi ltung ba de ltaran/ byang chub sems dpal 'jigs pa'
