27a2(mdo): byed pa yin no// lnga'i bu gzhan lnga gang gi ye byang chub sems dpal bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir 'dus byas la sbyor bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi tshogs nye bar bsag pa'i phyir 'dus
27a3(mdo): ma byas su myi ltung ba de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa myed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan ya ba kang gi tshe byang chub sems dpal 'dus ma byas la gnas te/ bsam gtan rnams skyed par byed cing / 
27a4(mdo): thabs la gnas te bsam gtan rnams las ldog par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa myed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
27a5(mdo): kyi sems la gnas te/ dge ba'i rtsa pa nye bar sortogs par byed cing / snying rje chen po la gnas te/ sems can rnams yod sa su smyind par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig
27a6(mdo): pa myed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dben pa la gnas te/ bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par byed cing zhabs la gnas te/ bdud kyi las rjes spro bar byed pa de lta na/ 
27a7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa myed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gangagi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po la gnas te/ chos stond par byed cing stong rje chen po la gnas te/ zang zing
27a8(mdo): gyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpal 'jigs pa myed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang kang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpal 'khor ba la gnas te/ mya ngan las 'das pa
27b1(mdo): yongs su srung ba'i las byed cing/ mya rnam pa 'das pa la gnas te/ 'tshang mi yongs su myang ba'i las byed yid tsam gyis ma/ byang chub sems dpal 'jigs pa myed pa yin no// 'i
27b2(mdo): gzhan yang gang shis/ bya chub sems dpa' skye ba byed pas skye bar byed kyipa 'pho ba myed pas 'byung ba byed pa dang / chos la lta bas snga bar byed cing / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyis rab tu
27b3(mdo): bye ba ma yin pa dang / thabs dang rjes su 'brel ci bzhi pa dang / nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / 'bar bar byed cing 'bar bas tshig par byed pa dang / nyon mongs thams cad la yongs su myod par byed cing / nyon mongs
27b4(mdo): ba'i skyon rnams kyis myi gos pa dang / slob pa dang myi slob pa rnams 'dul bar byed cing nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i la reg pa myi byed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug cing / chos
27b5(mdo): kyi bsam pa spong bar myi byed pa dang / bdud kyi lugs kyu shes pabyed cing / chos kyi lcags kyu spong bar myi byed pa dang / shes par 'jug par byed cing thabs kyis ldog par byed pa dang / 'phags
27b6(mdo): pa'i rnam par stond par byed cingapa/ 'phags pa ma yin pa yongs su smyind par byed pa la spro bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba la mngom par dga' bar byed cing / chos mthong ba la kun tu 'dod par byed pa de
27b7(mdo): tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa myed pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa sa/ lA'i bu lnga khri chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing rdzim dang bral
27b8(mdo): ba rnam par dag go// lha'i bu nyi khri lnga ste pa de yi rang pa myed par zag pa las sems rnam par grol to// byang chub sems dpal sngon byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i ya pa la bskyed pa
28a1(mdo): lnga khrin gyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur da// byang chub sems dpal nyi nimi spobs pa thogs pa myed pa skyes so// lha dang kyi rnams kyi skye dku las srog chags stong phrag rab tu mnga'o// 
28a2(mdo): dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dnga'ajam dpal gzhon nu da gyur pa la lha'i mchod pa dag byas so// gzhan yang lha'i bu rab tshal sems kyis 'jam gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
28a3(mdo): ces sbas so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na bya bachub sems dpal lam la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpal 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la
28a4(mdo): 'dod chags dang bral ba mngon du yang myi byed pa dang / zhe sda pas/ ra ba'i phyir yang chos stond par byed la/ zhe sdang spong ba yang mngon du yang myi byed pa dang / gti mug spang ba'i phyir yang chos
28a5(mdo): stond par byed la/ gti mug spo ba mngon du yang myi byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir yang chos stond par byed la/ nyon mong sa pa spong ba mngon du yang myi byed pa de tsam gyis na/ lha'i bu byang
28a6(mdo): chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lnga'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpal sems cad rnams la stong pa nyid stonod par byed la/ stong pa nyid mngon du yang myi byed pa dang / sems can rnams
28a7(mdo): la mtshan ma myed pa stond par yang byed la/ mtshan ma myed pa mngon du yang myi byed pa dang / sems can rnams la smond pa myed pa stond par byed la/ smond pa myed pa mngon du yang myi byed pa dang / de bzhin du seMs
28a8(mdo): marnams la mngon par 'du bye ba byed pa dang / skye ba byed pa dang / 'byung ba byed pa dang / dngos po byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / myi ldan pa dang / 'gog pa mchos stond par yang byed la/ 'gog pa ma/ 
28b1(mdo): chos stond par byed ye/ 'gog pa mngon du yang kyi byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpal la ma la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan ya pa gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su myi gtong
28b2(mdo): bas/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa sgrub par byed pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag pa ma 'dal bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa sgrub par byed pa dang / gnod sems kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgrub par
28b3(mdo): byed pa dang / le los brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgrub par byed pa dang / brjed ngas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgrub par byed pa dang // bems po dang / lug ltar lkugs pas shes rab kyi
28b4(mdo): pha rol tu phyind pa bsgrub par byed pa de tsam gyis ma/ byang chub se mas dpa' sa ma la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis
28b5(mdo): smras pa/ lha'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su myi gtong la yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can yongs su gtong ba dang / chos yongs su myi gtong
28b6(mdo): ba dang / byang chub kyi sems yongs su myi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su myi gtong ba ste// byang chub sems dpal ni chos ba'i po de dag yoyongs su gyi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
28b7(mdo): phyind pa bsgrub par byed do// lha'i bu tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni/ de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas yin te/ tshul khrims las yang dag par 'das pas ting nge 'dzin dang // 
28b8(mdo): ting nge 'dzin las yang dag par 'da' bas shes rab dang / shes rab las yang dag papa 'dal bas// rnam par grol ba shes pa bsgrub par byed do// lA'i bu khyod kyis rnam grangs des gang / tshul khrims las yang
29a1(mdo): dag par 'dal ba de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgrub par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpal gang gnod sems la zhugs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa las
29a2(mdo): log par zhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las log par zhugs pa yin pas/ de ni theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa yin te/ gang theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa de ni bzod
29a3(mdo): pa'i pha rold tu phyi nad pa ba sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpal lus kyis rtul bar myi byed cing / ngag dang sems kyi brtul da pa myi byed pa de ni le lo can yin la gang de ltar
29a4(mdo): chos la mngon par 'tshon pa de ni// brtson 'grus kyi pha rom da tu phyind pa bsgrub par byed pa yin no// sA'i bu ka zha na yang byang chub sems dpa' ni rmyi lam na yang sa
29a5(mdo): gnyis po dag la dgal ba 'i sems skyed par myi byed/ bson/ brjed ngas pa yin la gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la brjed ngas pa de ni theg pa chen po la mnyam par
29a6(mdo): bzhag pa yin// / de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgrub par byed pa yin no// lta bu chos thams cad ni bems po ste/ pha dang / shing dang / cig pa dang / lam dang / myig yor dang / 
29a7(mdo): phyag ltar lkugs pa dang / 'drab pa rang bzhin gyis nus pa myed pa yin pas/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang / ye shes kyis de ltar chos thams cad bems po dang / lug lngar lkugs pa/ 
29a8(mdo): lta bus byang chub bsgrub par byed pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgrub par byed pa yin no// de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lam bsgrub par byed pa yin no/ lha'i bu gzham yang
29b1(mdo): gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i lam yang myi spob la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yang tshol bar byed pa dang / lam gyi las kyi rgyun yang myi gcod cing/ lam gyi bya ba yang bsgrub par byed pa dang / lam ngan
29b2(mdo): par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam la 'god pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lnga'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang / chos
29b3(mdo): thams cad patsal na myi rnyed pa dang / byang chub kyi lam spong bar myi byed pa dang / 'bras bu yod par bsam gtan byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi lam thob la yin no// lha'i bu gzhan ya pa
29b4(mdo): gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi la ma yang rab tu/ shes la/ nyan thos kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung ba yang kyi byed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang rab tu shes la/ ra
29b5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi sas kyis nges par 'bru bam par byed pa dang / bya chub sems dpa'i lam yang thob par byed pa las des kyang dbang po yongs su rdzogs par ngas par 'byung ba kyi byed pa de ba
29b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpal lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang kang ki tshe/ byang chub sems dpal dge ba'i rnam pa thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa dang / mngon par 'du byaba'i 'bras bu don tu phyi gnyed
29b7(mdo): ba dang / mang da par 'acu byed pa thun byas phyogos pa dang / dge ba'im sa mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir 'bres pa yang dag par rjes su gyi mang ba dang / 
29b8(mdo): 'bri ba yang dag par rjes su kyi mthong ba de las/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang kang gi sa byang chub sems dpalal sa ran lalas lam yongs su tshol par byed pa dang / sarba/ 
30a1(mdo): yongs su btsal nas kyang nges pa 'byung bar gyi byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
30a2(mdo): lam ngan pa las yongs su tshol bar byed nar/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lam ngan pa zhes bya ba mi 'khor ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de la gnas nas sems can nges par 'byung ba'i phyir lam yongs su
30a3(mdo): tshol bar byed kyi/ bdag nyid nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i gyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang / byi mthun pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
30a4(mdo): lha'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis kyi gos pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pamyed pa ston pa byed kyang / nyon mongs pa myed pa nyid du myi ltung ba
30a5(mdo): dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba/ stond par byed kyang / chos thams cad skye ba byed pa dang / 'byung ba myed par shes pa zhing / skyon myed/ par mngon du myi byed pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
30a6(mdo): la yongs su gyod par shes kyang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched don du myi gnyer ba dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos stond kyang yongs su zhes pa de dag
30a7(mdo): yongs su shes pa gyi byed pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par ma dad pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngom par bsgrub par byed cing / sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams nye bar 'jog par byed kyang // nye bar 'jog pa las
30a8(mdo): 'byung bar gyi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yul nye bar smod par byed kyang / bcud kyi las rnams kyis myi 'phrogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul song bar gyi byed pa dang / brgyad kyi yul rjes su myi 'jug pa dang / ras kyi dbyings
30b1(mdo): kyi yul las ldog par myi byed pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul nye bar le nad par byed pasas/ de'i phyir sems can chen po de dag gi gyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang myi mthun pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 
30b2(mdo): khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pyod pa la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bsam pa yongs su dag cing / rang dang phyi rol dben pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la dpyod pa dang / rab tu gyod pa
30b3(mdo): myed pa nyid kyis sbyor ba la gyod pa dang / sems kyi brjed pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi sems myi brjed pa la spyod pa dang / sems dul ba nyid kyis sbyin pa la myong ba dang / sems zhi ba nyid kyis tshul khrims la myod pa dang / smras pa
30b4(mdo): myed pa nyid kyis bzod pa'i la spyod pa dang / lus dben pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus la spyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par g.yeng ba myed pa nyid kyis bsam gtan la gyod pa dang / spros pa myed pa nyid kyis
30b5(mdo): shes rab la gyod pa dang / sems can la bdag myed pa nyidakyi/ sa byams pa la spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa yod pa yin pas rab tu zhi ba nyid kyis snying rje la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i
30b6(mdo): phyir dga' ba la spyod pa dang / mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir btang snyoms la gyod pa dang / gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir rtog pa yang po sor rtog pa la dgyod pa dang / yongs su rtog pa sdug bsngal ba'i phyir sdug bsngal
30b7(mdo): la gyod pa dang / phyin mi log rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir bdag byed pa mas sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / 'du shes yongs su shes pa'i phyir zhi ba la so sor rtog pa la gyod pa dang / phung po sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa 'i
30b8(mdo): phyir/ sdug bsngal yongs su zhes pa la gyod pa dang / ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir kun 'byung ba la shes pa la byed pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa'i phyir 'gog pa shes pa la gyong pa dang / 'dus byas
31a1(mdo): la mngon par zhend pa myed pa'i phyir lam shes pa la spyod pa dang / 'bras bu yongasasu shes pa nyid kyis rgyu shes pa la spyod pa dang / rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir rkye nad shes pa la spyod pa dang / du ma'i/ 
31a2(mdo): phyir tshogs pa la gyod pa dang / brjod du myed pa'i phyir don so so yang dag par rig pa la gyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dper myed pa'i phyir chos so so yang dag par rig pa la gyod pa dang / mying dang gzugs 'byung
31a3(mdo): pa myed pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa la gyod pa dang / drag tshe dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / tshig 'bru gsal ba nyid kyis don la rton pa la gyod pa dang / 
31a4(mdo): rnam par shes pa'i gyod yul ma spangs pa nyid kyis ye shes la rton pa la gyod pa dang / las kyi rnam par smyind pa stong pa nyid kyis de sa pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa la gyod pa dang / gang zag yongs
31a5(mdo): su skyidad par bya ba nyid kyis rlom pa rnod pa la gyod pa dang / las rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i phyogs spyod pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir lnga'i rnapal gyod pa dang / ting nge
31a6(mdo): 'dzind rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol gyi sems shes pa la gyod pa dang / rus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa la gyod pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon lnga
31a7(mdo): sgrub pa la spyod pa dang / myi byed pa'i phyir pyod pa brtan pa la gyod pa dang / mya lhod pa'i phyir gyod pa sra ba la myod pa dang / bskyed du myed pa'i phyir gnas myed pa la gyod pa dang / tha dad pa myed pa nyid kyis
31a8(mdo): gyid pa mnyam pa sa spyod pa dang / thams cad tu rnaMs sum brtags pa'i byims dang rgya dang / me dang / rlub dang / nas ya' lan bu pyod pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sbrum sa spyod pa dang / 
31b1(mdo): yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rmi lam lta bu la gyod pa dang / rnam par rmongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smyig rgyu lta bu la gyod pa dang / bdag myi srid pa'i phyi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / sems rang
31b2(mdo): bzhin myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma myed pa la spyod pa dang / khams gsum rang bzhin myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smond pa myed pa la gyod pa dang / 'dus byas rang bzhin myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mngon pas 'gyu
31b3(mdo): bye ba myed pa la spyod pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud tshar gcad pa la spyod pa dang / spyod pa thams cad rnam par ma bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dkon
31b4(mdo): mchog gi gdung myi gcad pa la spyod pa ste/ lha'i bu de ltar myod/ pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i gyod pa gyod/ pa yin no// 
31b5(mdo): bam po gsu pa ste/ tha ma'o// / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems
31b6(mdo): dpa'i gyod pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bus de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i
31b7(mdo): gang dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / gang brgyad pa dang ma yin pa dang / rgyu nang tu zhugs pa ma yin pa dang / la nad cig phyer 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / phyir mya
31b8(mdo): 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin pa dang / gang nyam thos ma yin pa dang / rab sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma yin pa dang / de bzhi ma gshegs pa ma yin pa/ 
32a1(mdo): dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / stond pa ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpal yin par myi smra'o// lnga'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpal ga so sa 'i skye bo'i chos
32a2(mdo): can ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi chos can ma yin pa dang / zhe sdang gi chos can ma yin pa dang / pa yin pa dang / gti mug gi chos can ma yin pa dang / gang 'khor ba'i chos can ma yin pa
32a3(mdo): dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin par myi smra'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad sA/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang
32a4(mdo): chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyis rjes/ su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / rgyun / tu zhugs pa dang / la nad cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang
32a5(mdo): dgra bcom pa dang / nyam thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / stonang pa dang / so so
32a6(mdo): skye bo'i chos can dang / 'dod chags kyi chos can dang / zhe sdang gi chos can dang / gti mug gi chos can dang / 'khor ba'i chos can dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yin// 'jam dpal
32a7(mdo): gyis smram pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'al sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dad pa byed pa dang / chags pa thams cad la dad par byed kyang / de chags par 'gyur ba byed pa dang / ka'ang gi rang bas
32a8(mdo): myi 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyi nad pa drug gi la ma la dad pa skyed cing / 'dzi nad par byed pa dang / chags pas chags par 'gyur ba'i rnam par tha dad par byed pa dang / chags pa myed pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol bA rnas
32b1(mdo): byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par myi ltung ba de tsam gyis na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpal dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yin no// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi/ 
32b2(mdo): rjes su 'brang ba yim/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu kang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i 'dzind pa byed pa dang / kun 'dzind par byed pa dang / chos kyi zas dang
32b3(mdo): ldan zhing / zang zi gyi zas byed pa dang / chos la gnas shing nyon mongs pa la gyi gnas pa dang / chos kyi stobs can yin gyi/ brgyal gyi stobs can ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi/ 'jig rten brgyad pan pa'i gta/ 
32b4(mdo): smra ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa'i dbang phyug ma yin pa dang / chos la rtond pa yin gyi gang zag la rtond pa ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi chos
32b5(mdo): ma yin pa myi smra ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos// la rtond pa yin gyi/ brtson pa btang ba'i chos la myi ga na/ sa pa dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid chos thams cad shes par
32b6(mdo): byed pa dang / gzungs kyi rmugs pa myed pa dang ldan pa dang / nor bdun dang ldan pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pa' byed pa dang / chos kyi khyad par la gnas pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang
32b7(mdo): chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brkyang pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ga gi
32b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpal ldog pa nyid brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / yang dag pa nyid brgyad la rab tu gnas pa dang / pha ma yan lag brgyad pa rnam par spang ba la mkhas pa dang / sbyor ba yongs
33a1(mdo): rdzogs par lam des nges par 'byung ba myi byed pa dang / myi khom pa brgyad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dag la dgod par byed pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rnam// 
33a2(mdo): par rtog pa brgyad la gnas pa dang / rnam par tha dad pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i gas ba myi spong ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin no/ 
33a3(mdo): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyu nad tu zhugs pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rgyu na phyogs su dad pa
33a4(mdo): rnams rgyun las zlog par byed pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgyun tham sa cad kyang gcod par byed la/ 'khor ba myi gcod pa dang / ngan song thams cad gcod par byed pa dang / sems can rnaMs
33a5(mdo): de 'gro dang / mya ngan pas 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i lam la 'god par byed pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / lha dang myi la gzhol ba dang / bden pa stond par byed pa dang / rlom seMs
33a6(mdo): su myi ltung ba dang / the tsom dang bral ba dang / nges pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhol ba dang / so so la skye bo la lam las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi lam la gnas pa dang
33a7(mdo): 'khor ba'i gting rnyed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ya mngon du phyogs par gyu rad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sbyin ka nas su gyurd pa dang / 'dus byas la snang ba dang / 'ud+ha sa ma byas pas rab tu phye ba dang / 
33a8(mdo): phyir/ ldog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rgyu nad tu zhugs pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub seMs dang // 
33b1(mdo): san cig kyi ma 'o zag yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad 'ong ba byed pa dang / 'gro ba byed par shes nas/ sems can yongs su sbyin par byed pa'i phyir bsan
33b2(mdo): bzhin du 'ong ba dang / sems cas rnams yongs su smind par byed pa dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba byed par stod pa byed pa dang / chos nyid la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba byed pas mthong ba dang / rang yang nyon mongs pa myed
33b3(mdo): pas 'ong ba dang / rang gi las yongs su dag pas 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba mnyam pa nyid kyi spong ba dang / bcud kyi dbang gyis myi 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar rtond pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / nye bar blangs pa'i seMs
33b4(mdo): sems can bsgral ba'i phyir 'ong ba dang / bya chub kyi lhag pa'i kham sra zhing kyi phyed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' la nad cig phyir 'ong ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
33b5(mdo): ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyir myi 'ong ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lta ba rnams dang / phyi nang ni log rnams dang / sgrib pa rnams
33b6(mdo): su yang myi 'o ba dang / bdun pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti mug gis yang 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar myi 'gyur ba dang / byams pa nges par ma gyur da cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos
33b7(mdo): rnams ma rdzogs par gyi'o ba ba dang / 'ong ba myed pa dang / 'pho ba myed pa la mkhas pa dang / rga shi myed pa la thob pa dang / mthar gnas pa dang / byas pa nges pa dang / lung bstan pa thob pa dang / dbyigs su/ 
33b8(mdo): myed pa dang / rnam pa myed pa thob pa dang / shes pas gzhan la rag ma khas pa de sta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpal phyir gyi 'ong ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems/ dpa
34a1(mdo): dgra bcom pa yin/ 'jam dpal kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chags pa byed pa yin no/ 'dod chags gtul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos stonang pa dang / sngar
34a2(mdo): ba byed cing zhe sdang gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos stond pa dang / mongs pa byed cing gti mug gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos stond pa dang / chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa byed par gnas pa dang / sems
34a3(mdo): can thams cad la sems ma btang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bcon 'grus pa phams pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba myed pas dka' ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / pad ma bzhin du nyon
34a4(mdo): mongs pa thams cad kyis ma gos pa dang / shes pas 'phags pa/ dang / mnyam pa dang / thabs kyis 'phags pa ma yin par gan sa pa dang / dgra ba rnam pa dang / pad ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa
34a5(mdo): thams cad kyis myi ges pa dang / nye bar le nad pa thams cad la ba ngag gi myed cing yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa dang / sangs rgyasakyi chos thams cad la bdag gir byed cing yongs su 'dzind pa dang / 
34a6(mdo): rang gi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa skyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dag blag pa myed pa gnas par byed pa dang / sngon char bcas pa dag la brtag sa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshu rosang dang
34a7(mdo): pha rol la gnas kyi pha rol tu sond pa dang / tsu rol kyi gnas ma spangs pa dang / gzhan gyis sems can gzhan tha dad par byed pa de lta na/ pA'i bu byang chub sems dpal dgra bcom pa yin no/ lnga'i bus smras
34a8(mdo): pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la ma thos pa'i chos sgrogs par byed cing
34b1(mdo): yul rnams la gyod par gyi byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / skye ba myed pa dang / 'gog pa byed pa'i chos sgrogs par byed pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen dang / bdag byed pa dang / sems can myed pa dang / 
34b2(mdo): rang bzhin kyis g.yo ba myed pa bsgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad byed pa dang / nam mkhal dang / mnyam pa'i chos rnams sgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / ye shes chen po la chos thos
34b3(mdo): le rgyus nye bar 'gro bar rngom shig/ ces sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgrogs pa yang gzhan gyi dring byi 'jog pa dang / zos pas kyang rlom sems kyi gle ba dang / sgrags pa thams cad kyi sngon dang phyi ma'i mthal myi 'chad pa yod/ 
34b4(mdo): su shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa myi zad pa thob pa dang / don dang tshig dang / yig 'bru myi zad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi// sems dang / gyod pa dang / shes pa stond par byed pa dang / 
34b5(mdo): so so tsa rigs par chos stond par byed pa dang / zhi ba'i sa la gnas pa dang / spros pa myed pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyis/ gyod pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nye thos yin no// 
34b6(mdo): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rkyen la rag las pa dang / sems can
34b7(mdo): myed pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gang zag myed pa dang / bdag po myed pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs pa nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / des rkye nad rnams legs par mthong ba'i phyir byang chub 'dren par byed pa'i
34b8(mdo): rkyend 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang / byang chub kyi phyogs rnams kyi chos rnams kyi phyogs dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i phyogs dang / tshad myed pa bzhi'i phyogs dang / mngon par shes pa
35a1(mdo): phyogs yang dag par bsgrub par byed pa dang / de rkyen nye bar bsgrub par byed cing / gzhan gyorlopa kyi 'jog pas byang chub par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar byed pa dang / sa ngan pa dag las sems skyo bar byed/ 
35a2(mdo): pa dang / nyi che ba'i shes pa 'dul la la mkhas pa dang / theg pa chen po la legs pa rab tu gnas pa dang / ros thams cad la mngon du bya rang pa de lta tsan byang chub sems dpalang ba sangs rgyas yinan/ lham dum
35a3(mdo): smras la/ 'jam dpal ji ltungs bya brgyab sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin// 'jam dpal kyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' cham thams cad gzod ma nas dben pa nyid du rtog par byed pa dang / sems/ 
35a4(mdo): can thams cad gzod pa nas bdag myed pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / bying mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gyod pa dman pa dang / man+ta ga dab par ma thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang / rang gi nyon mongs
35a5(mdo): pa thams capa stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad rtogs par bye/ pa dang / skad cig gcig la rjes su rtogs pa'i rim gyis dang / myong ba sna tshogs stond par byed pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po
35a6(mdo): dang mos pas chos stond par byed pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos stond par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpal sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
35a7(mdo): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin nyid myi brjed pa dang / de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas pa
35a8(mdo): pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sbyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul khrims dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bzod pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ba rtson 'grus dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bsam gtan dang / de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab dang / de bzhin nyid kyi/ 
35b1(mdo): thabs dang / de bzhin nyid kyi// smon lam dang / de bzhin nyid kyi stobs dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems can myed pa dang / sems can yongs su tha rad par byed pa dang / sems can gyi gnas/ 
35b2(mdo): dang / 'khor pa ma ya gyod pa kyang pa thams cad las kyang yang dag par 'das pa dang / gyod pa las sgrol bar byed pa dang / de na yang yin la/ de na yang ma yin pa dang / 'di ma yang yin la// 'di na yang ma yin pa dang
35b3(mdo): gnyi ga las dag pa dang / mun ya dang bral ba dang / rtag tu gsal ba dang / mun pa myed pa dang / mun pa'i ling tog dang / bral ba dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rjes su song ba de
35b4(mdo): lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa zhes/ bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chupa sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shes bya// 'jam dpal gyis
35b5(mdo): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa brtsa ma pa dang / chu bo las rgal ba dang / srid pa mthong ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi khur dang / srid pa 'joms pa dang / srid
35b6(mdo): pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang / bdud bcom pa dang / phur bor ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro bar 'chi 'pho bal dang / skye ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / srid pa'i 'dod chags gas lang pa dang / lus dang sems pa rnam
35b7(mdo): pa dang / tshul khrims dang / shes rab bsgoms pa dang / srid pa'i skyon legs par mthong ba dang / srid pa'i sred pa dang bral ba dang / sems can la bsam pa ma btab ba dang / srid pa yi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba
35b8(mdo): chu lon dang zam pa legs par byas pa dang / myi gnas pas legs par gnas pa dang// rtag tu bsgom pa yid kyis ba thon pa dang / sems can gyi srid pa zad par byed pa dang / srid pa thams cad las rnam
36a1(mdo): par log pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar klog par byed pa dang / srid pas rnam par che ba dang / la mkhas pa dang / srid pa gsum na yod pal rnams kyis/ 
36a2(mdo): mchod pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o// lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ 
36a3(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mtshams myed pa gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de yang mnyam pas/ mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / 
36a4(mdo): lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / phyin ci log rnams dang / sgrib pa rnams dang / chod pa rnams dang / kun nas ldang ba na mas gang dang mnyam pa/ byang chub kyang bde dang mnyam pas mnyam
36a5(mdo): ba nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / 'ja dachags dang zhe sdang dpagati mug dang mnyam pa dang / nyom mo sa pa thams cad gapa dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas
36a6(mdo): mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang / slob pa'i chos rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub
36a7(mdo): sems dpa'i chos rnams gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang / de dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byed chub par byed pa dang / mnyam pa nyid du rnam par 'khrug par myi byed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo
36a8(mdo): gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rkyen la rag las pa dang / yod pa yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang gA nam mkha' dang mnye
36b1(mdo): pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa der lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal/ 
36b2(mdo): stond pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' gang la stond pa dang / rab tu stond pa dang / rjes su stond par byed pa de dag thams cad myi g.yo ba'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang
36b3(mdo): bstand pa yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su stond pa dang / rab tu stond pa dang / stond par gcig pur 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dam
36b4(mdo): kring dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma/ thams cad zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhib pa 'gyur/ ga dang / the tsom dang bral ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi the
36b5(mdo): tsom gcod pas mkhas pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyod kyis phyag byas pa dang / yang dag par smra dang / khams gsum las phyag byas pa dang / sems nam many+dza
36b6(mdo): dang mnyam zhing / khengs pa myed pa dang / yang dag pa'i mthal legs par mthong ba'i phyir smad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / dgod pa dang / bshung ba dang / 'khro ba dang / skyog dang / bsdigs pa thams cad dang / 
36b7(mdo): rlom sems thams cad kyis zhum par myi 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi rang bzhin legs pa mthong ba'i phyim sems can thams cad la yan zhing snying brtse ba dang / 'jig rten la ston pa grags pa
36b8(mdo): 'gyur 'delda na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ldad pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jas dpal ji ltang sa byang chub sems dpa' ma sa'i skye ba'i chos can yin/ 'jas dpas kyis
37a1(mdo): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thabs kyis so so'i skye bo la gyid pa thams cad kyang stond par byed la/ shes pas so so mi skye bo 'i myod pa thams cad la chags pa pa yang gyi 'gyur ba/ 
37a2(mdo): de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo'i chos can yin no// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
37a3(mdo): lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi sku la kun tu chags par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzind dang
37a4(mdo): snyoms par 'jug pa la bsgrub pa'i phyir rtag tu dgon par gnas pa la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / de sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdu ba la rtag tu rjes su chags par
37a5(mdo): 'gyur ba dang / de sems can thams cad lazhe 'bras pa'i/ sems myed par 'gyur ba de lta ma/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpal 'dod chags kyi chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 
37a6(mdo): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdab gyi chos can yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpal 'dus byas rnams la gcig tu nges pa'i skyon chags
37a7(mdo): par lta bar byed pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sdang bar byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'du byed thams cad la skyon du yang 'du shes la dang / nyon mongs pa rnams dang / 
37a8(mdo): 'du byed rnams spong bar yang myi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rgyu nad myi gcod par byed pa dang / snying rje chen pos yang dag par zind pa'i yod kyis snying che ba rgya chen po
37b1(mdo): yang dag par skyed par byed paH// sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i 'dab rdzab la 'byind par byed pa dang / sems can zhe sdang can rnams la bzod pa nye bar bsgrub
37b2(mdo): par byed cing / nyon mongs pa rnams la nyes pa sbyin par byed pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba'i thabs thams cad dpa'akhor ba sum 'byind par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdar gyi chos can yin/ 
37b3(mdo): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal gti mug gi chos can yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lnga lig ti mug zhes bya ba ni gang cung zad kyang myi shes pa yin pas/ de la
37b4(mdo): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi ngo bo nyid la snyoms/ par zhug pa de shes par myi byed/ rnam par shes par myi byedakun tu shes par myi byed/ le nad par myi byed/ spong bar myi
37b5(mdo): byed/ 'byung bar myi byed/ 'jig par myi byed/ g.yo ra gyi byed/ rlom sems su myi byed/ skyed par myi byed ning / chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta
37b6(mdo): nalha'i bu byang chub sems dpal gti mug gi chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal 'khor ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
37b7(mdo): pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba las kyang myi g.yol/ de nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams tshol bar byed pa dang / bdud thams cad dang thun mong ma yin zhing spyod pa dman pa
37b8(mdo): rnams dang / ma 'dres pa dang / sems can rnams pyod pa dman pa las bral zhing myong ba rgya chen po la 'god par byed pa dang / ngom mthun par byed pa dang / myi dge ba thams cad la gyi bsngags pa brjod/ 
38a1(mdo): par byed ci / 'du dad bzlog pa dang / phyir zlog par byed pa dang / byang chub 'khor ba la gzhol bar shes par byed pa dang / 'khor ba mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid
38a2(mdo): lta bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba las myi g.yo zhing gnas par yang myi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpal 'khor ba'i chos can yin no// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji
38a3(mdo): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' pa'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs
38a4(mdo): su mya ngan las 'das pa lte bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar shes par byed pa dang / sem sa can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang nye bar
38a5(mdo): zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos stond par byed pa dang / sems can dpag tu myed pa me gsum gyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba rnams nye bar zhi bar byed cing / yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
38a6(mdo): bar byed pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang gyod par byed la/ gtan tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'di la bar byed pa de lta na/ lnga'i bu byang chub ses
38a7(mdo): dpal yongs su mya ngan las 'dal ba'i chos can yon te/ thabs la mkhas pa dang / thabs shes pa la nges par skyes pa dang / sems can thams cad la pham pa dang / rjes su snying pa me la dang
38a8(mdo): ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas bsta nad pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags 'bum phrag lhag tsam chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed ci pa dwi ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ 
38b1(mdo): srog chags drug khri na le nad pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// sngon dge ba'i apa bskyed cing sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bku ba byas pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni myi skye ba'i chos
38b2(mdo): la bzod pa thob par gyurd to// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong kyis myi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i gzungs so sor thob par gyu rad to// srog chags sa ya 'phrag gnyis dang lnga 'bum gyis ni bla na/ 
38b3(mdo): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// steng gi bar snga las kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char dag mngon par rab
38b4(mdo): tu zab bo// de nas lha'i bu rab rgyal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skabs dang shes rab
38b5(mdo): kyis nges par 'byung ba yin/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas/ lha'i bu rab cha la sems la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang tshe sems ni chags myed pa// bla myed byang chub
38b6(mdo): sems yin te// sems ni rang bzhin mngon gsum la// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// sems rnams bskyed pa thams cad ni/ byang chub tu ni yongs sngo zhi // byang chub sems la rab gtas pa
38b7(mdo): de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// sems can thams cad bdag myed cing // myi bden ya ma rlar gsog tu// kang chi shes pas shes byed la// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// gang phyir sems can thos
38b8(mdo): cad dag/ byang chub phyir ni sbyin byed cing // bsam pa zag pas sdud byed pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// gang tshe bdag dang byang chub dag/ gtan tu mthong bar myi byed cing // 'khor gsum
39a1(mdo): yongs su dag gyur pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// nang dang yang na phyi rol dag/ thams cad yongs su gtong byed cing // sems can kun la yongs bsngo ba/ de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid
39a2(mdo): ngo// zhi zhing rabazhi gtsang dag cing // tshul khrims rlom sems kyi byed la// lus dang ngag yid 'i gyur da pa/ de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// tshul khrims la ni zhugs gyurd cing / gzhan yang tshul khris
39a3(mdo): sbyor byed la/ sangs rgyas tshul khrims sngo byed la// de'i phyir thabs shes bya ba yin/ chos rnams thams cad rab stond cing // bdag myed bzod pa sgom byed la// lus rang sems kyis pa smras pa/ 
39a4(mdo): de ni shes rab pha rol phyind// lus kyi sbyor bar gyi byed cing // / ngag dang sems kyis ma yin la// chos rnams kun la sems gyur ba// de ni shes rab pha rol du phyin// sems
39a5(mdo): can kun gyi khro ba dang // gsod dpa'achi ba bzod byed cing / sems can de dag myi spong ba// de ni thabs kyi pha rol daphyin/ sems can yongs su smyin bya'i phyir/ bsam gtan bden
39a6(mdo): pa rab spangs nas// krong dang yul 'khor snang byed pa// de ni thabs kyi pha rol daphyind/ tshu rol dra ma yin pa ro ba byin// mthun pa'i pha rol pa rab gnas shing / spros pa'i lta ba rgyan bcad
39a7(mdo): shes rab pa rol byin rtogs yin// gang gas gong nyid rtogs gyur nas/ de btang snyoms kyi byed cing // sems can stong nyid byor byed pa// de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no// sangs rgyas
39a8(mdo): gzung myed mkha' 'dra hA// chos kyi sgo nas lnga byed cing// de tshe gzugs la zhen myed pa/ de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// sangs rgyas mtshan nyid mchod 'dod cing // sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed la// 'dren
39b1(mdo): kun mchod du 'jug byed pa// de'i phyir thabs zhes bya ba yin/ chos rnams rdul myed rdul bral zhing // mkha' dang mnyam pas mnyam gyur nga la/ chos 'ga' yang 'dzind par myi byed pa// de ni shes rab pha rol
39b2(mdo): phyin// chos ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// lus dang srog ni 'dor byed kyi// 'jig rten kun gyis dben gyur pa// de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no// chos dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir/ yang dag mtha' la rab gnas shing / 
39b3(mdo): de bzhin nyid las myi g.yo ba// de ni shes rab sgo yin no// gang gi chos nyid ci 'ang ba// sems can de 'drar shes byed pa// de ltar rtogs par byed pa'i mthal// de ni shes rab pha rol byind/ chos kun 'chi 'pho yod myin zhing
39b4(mdo): skye ba byed par shes byed la// myi 'gro rgyug par gyi byed pa// de ni shes rab pha rol da byin // sems can yongs su sbyis bya'i phyir// ya sa pas 'dod dang gzugs rnams su/ bsams bzhin du mi skye byed
39b5(mdo): pa/ de dag thabs kyi yon tan yin// dgon pa gnas rab kan// sa byed cing / nyon mongs myed la rab gnas pa// bsam gtan rnam thar da sten byed pa// de dag shes rab mtshan nyid yin/ grong dang
39b6(mdo): yul 'khor rnams su mi// song nas stan rtam byed cing // myi zad bum pa yod myin pa'i// mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa yin// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las// skrag cing 'du 'ji sten myed la// bdag nyid
39b7(mdo): dul zhing zhi gyur da pa/ de ni shes rab pha rol da nyi nad// 'gro ba dag ni 'dus chen dang // tshogs dang 'gyu 'ji ji snyed pa// kun na sdang ba de dag ni// thabs kyis spras pa myed pa yin// brtan pa chags myed gyod byed
39b8(mdo): yi ge rlon gnyer gyi byed la// brjod myed nges don don gnyer ba// de ni shes rab pha rol phyind// mkhas pa chags pa thams cad ma// sdang zhing chos rnams stond byed la// dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags brjod pa/ 
40a1(mdo): de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyinang/ mngon shes shes la mkhas gyurd cing / zhi zhing dul la zag pa myed// gdeg myed gzhag pa yod byin pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyind// mngon shes dag la rnam
40a2(mdo): 'phrul zhing // 'di rnams bye bar 'gro byed la// sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid yin// phung po sgyu ma 'drar shes shi / nyon mongs dngos myed shes byas nas// de dag bdud
40a3(mdo): kun zhi 'gyur da pa// de ni shes rab pha rol du phyi nad// bcud rnams thams cad ston byed cing // bstand nas rgyal bar byed gyur da la// de las sems can zar byed pa// de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no// 
40a4(mdo): stong nyid mtshan ma myed pa dang // smanod par byed pa'i yod myin pa li// rnam thar skol stond byed pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyi// da yin// chags myed sdang ba yod myin zhing / rmongs myed shes
40a5(mdo): ba'i gyod yul dang / brang byed dor bayod sbyin pa la// de mi shes ra ba mtshan nyid yin// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing / stong nyid bar chu bstend gyur da la// kun gyi pha rol da so nad gyu da ba/ 
40a6(mdo): mnyam myed 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ zag myed btul ba ma yin pa// de dag shes rab ldan 'gyur zhing // 'khor ba'i gyod yul de dag ni// sems can kun gyi grogs su 'gyur// bsod nams
40a7(mdo): tshogs kyis myi ngoms pa'i/ a pa thabs la mkhas pa yin// shes rab thabs la mkhas pa yi/ yan lag gnyis ldan lam de ni// shes ldan byang chub sems dpa' ste// des ni 'drem rnyes par 'byung / 
40a8(mdo): thabs dang myi ldan shes rab kyis// ma byu ba 'byung ba 'gyur ba myed// shes rab thabs kyis ni// mkhas par rab tu zhi myi 'gyur// shes rab dang ni thabs shes pa// de gnyis kun tu 'dres gyurd cing // gnyi ga
40b1(mdo): zung du 'jug gyur na// des ni dam pa rtogs par 'gyur// gang dag bgrod pa 'dir 'gro ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsngags shing // ye shes pha rol phyi nad gyur te// de ni chos rnams chos nyid do// 
40b2(mdo): de dag sangs rgyas khyod yul gyi// chos dbyings dper byed dga' byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub bu myed pa// rdul myed byang chub rtogs par gyur// lha'i bu rab tshal sems kyis// 'jam dpal gzhon nupa
40b3(mdo): gyur da pa la/ gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub kyi yul gang yin// 'jam dpal kyis spras pa// lha'i bu byang chub kyi yul rna ni rang gi yul dper ba nyid yin no// lha'i bus/ 
40b4(mdo): smras la/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gang yin// 'angs// dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu byang chub min ma ya la'i mtshan te/ da // lha'i bus sbas pa/ yangs dpal byang chub kyi mtha'
40b5(mdo): gang yin/ lha'i bus smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi mtha' ni stong nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chubakyi gnas gang yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang
40b6(mdo): chub kyi gnas na chos thams cad kyi gnas yin no// zhwa'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpas byang chub kyi zho gang yin/ 'jam dpas kyis sbas pa/ byang chub kyi sgoni kun nas sgo yin no// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 
40b7(mdo): 'jam dpal byang chub kyi chom pa gang yin// 'jam dpal gyis spras la/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi chom pa ni sems can thams cad la bdag myed pa'o// pA li bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub mi dang
40b8(mdo): mnyam/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lnga'i bu byang chub ni chos thams cad kyi skye ba dang mnyam mo// / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi bgrod pa gang yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
41a1(mdo): pA'i bu byang chub kyi bgrod pa ma sems can thams cad kyi sems dang gyod pa yin no// byang chub kyi mod pa ni 'gro ba byed pa/ 'gro ba dang / rgyub byed par 'gro ba yin no// lha'i bus smras la/ 
41a2(mdo): 'jam dpal byang chub gang gi rgyu mthun pa yin/ 'jam dpal kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni snying rje chen po'i rgyu mthun pa yin no// sags ma
41a3(mdo): sa kya rgya na // mag sa la sa kyi4/ lha'i bu byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rjes su rtogs par las yatsal bar bya'o// lha'i lus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
41a4(mdo): nyon mongs pa rnams g.yas btsal bar bya/ 'jas dpal gyis swA sa pa/ lha'i bu nyon mongs pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i lam yan la ka brgyad pa las btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 
41a5(mdo): 'jam dpal mi 'phags pa'i lam nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas sam// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu// gal te phrags pa'i lam gnyis su gyur pa zhig yin na ni// 
41a6(mdo): 'phags pa'i lam nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig ka lnga yang 'gyur ba zhog ma/ lha'i bu 'phags pa'i lam ni gnyis su gyur pa myed la ste/ nyon mongs pa chol la gang yin pa de nyid 'phags pa'i lam yin no/ 
41a7(mdo): kwa'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltam na lam gyis lam gyi bya ba byas pa yin// lha'i Ta sa smas pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
41a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu gnyis dang / byin ci log bzhi dang / sgrib pa lda pa/ myi dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos thams cad do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bas
41b1(mdo): te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can la sbyor ba yin pas// sems can rnams dang lta ba'i rnam pa dang / phyin ci log dang/ sgrib pa dang / myi dge ba'i chos
41b2(mdo): rnams ma rtogs pa gzhan las btsal bar myi bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni gang gis/ sems can rnams rab tu phye ba'i rnam pa dang / phyin ci log pa dang / sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa de dag nyid
41b3(mdo): tshol bar byed de/ de tshol bar byed pa nang / sems can yang myi rnyed/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyang myi rnyed do/ ma rnyed na sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba la skyo bar myi 'gyur te// lha'i bu rnam grangs des na
41b4(mdo): nyon mongs pa tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin la/ se mas can tshol ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / nyon mongs pa la tshol
41b5(mdo): ba yar byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum po dag byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin nam// 'jam dpal gyis smras
41b6(mdo): pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni btsal bar myi nus la/ mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang btsal bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu de la ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa
41b7(mdo): 'jug par myi 'gyur ba de ni btsal bar myi nus pa'i phyir ro// pA'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lam ji ltar mngon par rtogs par bya// / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yang dag pa'i lta ba kang / 
41b8(mdo): dang mnyam pa ga pa ga pa yang de ngang mnyam pa de sa ma ngad par rtags pa ga yin pa de'i las mangs par rtogs pa lamang // yang dga' rtag pa ga pad sa nyam pa sa ga' 'artog pa'as de dang nyam pa ngas
42a1(mdo): yang dag 'a 'ing ga gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i ngag dpe de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i las kyi mthu yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho
42a2(mdo): ba ga dang mnyam pa log pa'i 'tsho ba yang de dang / nyaM ba dang / yang dag pa'i tshol ba kang dang mnyam pa loka pa'i tshol ba yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i dran pa yang
42a3(mdo): de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dgang dang mnyam pa log pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa yang de dang mnyam pa de ltar mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni lam mngon par rtogs pa yin no// / lha'i bus
42a4(mdo): smras pa/ 'jam dpal yang dag pa'i lta ba ga pa dang mnyam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / log pa'i lta ba ni stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid dang / 
42a5(mdo): mnyam pa yin no// khwa'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu mkha' dang nim
42a6(mdo): la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang myed do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la yang
42a7(mdo): tha dad du bya cung zad kyang myed do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal za dad du bya ba gang las rab tu bye ba yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sna'i bu tha dad du bya ba ni mtshan ma da
42a8(mdo): dmyigs pa dang / 'du shes dang / smos pa mas rab tu phye ba yin te/ mtshad 'dang / dang / 'du'o tu rgyas yin/ mtshan ma dang / dmyigs pa dang / 
42b1(mdo): shes dang / spros pa gang yin pa de'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de'i ni tha dad du bya ba myed do// lnga'i bu 'di lta ste dper ma/ rgya mtsho chen por ma zhugs pa'i tshul mi tha dad / 
42b2(mdo): du bya ba yod kyi// rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa'i chung la ni tha dad du bya ba myed pa de bzhin du lha'i bu chos kyi dbyinges yongs su ma shes pa la ni/ chos la tha dad du bya ba yod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings yongs
42b3(mdo): su shes pa la ni chos tha dad du bya ba myed do// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes par nus sam// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings
42b4(mdo): ni yongs su shes par phyi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin la/ chos kyi dbyings kyis ni chos kyi dbyings yongs su
42b5(mdo): myi shes pa'i phyir ro// chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du/ ba'i chos de dag la gnyis su myed par shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yongs su shes pa// zhes bya ste/ sems gcig nas
42b6(mdo): gcig tu brgyud pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir de ni yongs su shes po shes bya'o// gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la gnas pa'i phyir de ni yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na nam
42b7(mdo): mkha' gzugs myed pa'i snang ba la gzugs thams cad sdang yang gzugs de dag ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de bzhin du lnga'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rang gis spras pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo nas chos thams/ 
42b8(mdo): cad mthong yang tsam dadag mchos de dag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngob nyid kho ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpas jis pan byang chub sems dpa' chen bu ma kham go 'a ma yin/ 'jas dpa' gyis
43a1(mdo): smras pa/ lha'i bu 'go smos pas go ba'i rang gi lta bas/ sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos stond par byed na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam
43a2(mdo): par spros pas go ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dben pa'i phyir bdag kyang gzhan du myi byed la/ bdag myed pa yang gzhan du myi byed na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
43a3(mdo): sems dpa' myi kri ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos 'aka' yang khrid par myi byed/ myi khrid par myi byed na'o// lha'i bus spras pade/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub seMs
43a4(mdo): dpal gnas lhur le nad pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma mye da pa'i gnas las g.yo bar myi byed na'o// lha'i bus smras
43a5(mdo): 'jam dpal gang gis byang chub sems dpa' tshogs gsum po nges pa nyid dang / ma nges pa nyid dang / log pa nyid byanges pa'i tshogs dag la snang bar 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam
43a6(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yod do// pA'i bus spras pa// 'jam dpal ci lta bu yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nges pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la'o// 
43a7(mdo): ma nges pa la ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'o// log pa nyid du nges pa ni de las sems can bsgral bar bya ba lalo// lA'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis byang chub sems dpa' myi
43a8(mdo): khom pa thob cing / 'om pa ma thob pa'i rnam grangs yod dam// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yod do// lhal bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'on ji'i phyir byang chub sems dpal myi 'om pa thos pa
43b1(mdo): rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed par byed cing / sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'om pa thob pa de dag kyang yal bar 'jog par byed// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang rnams par grol ba'i
43b2(mdo): tshogs de dag ni khom pa thob pa yin pas/ de la ni byang chub sems dpal myi snang ngo // lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod myi khom pa thob pa yin nam/ 'on te khom pa thob pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
43b3(mdo): lnga'i bu kho bo mi khom pa thob pa yang ma yin// myi khom pa thob pa yang ma yi no// lnga'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji'i phyir 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni thob pa yang ma yin/ yang dag par thob pa yang
43b4(mdo): ma yin/ 'om pa yang ma yin/ myi khom pa yang ma yin no// 'om pa dang / myi gom pa la chags par yang myi byed pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis mi/ 
43b5(mdo): bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar gcod do// 'jam dang / la gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ni/ phung po yongs su shes pa yang myed// nyon mongs pa sel ba yang
43b6(mdo): myed/ bcud las yang dag par 'das pa yang myed pa'i phyir ro// sA'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal skye bar sbyar ba sa gzhan mu stegs can rnams pham par byas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar/ 
43b7(mdo): 'di la mu stegs can thams cad kyi gyod pa myed pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rtog btsugs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ pA'i bu snang ba byed pa dang / mun pa myed pa'i phyir ra/ 
43b8(mdo): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dis ni chos kyi 'khor lo// rab tu bsko rang to// 'jam dpal kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lta ba'i mtha' thams cad yongs su bcad pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
44a1(mdo): chos bstand pa 'dis chos kyi snang ba ji snyed cig byas// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kA dag la snang ba yang myed la/ mun pa yang myed pa de dag chos kyi snang ba byas so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 
44a2(mdo): 'jam dpal sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni dkon mo// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin no// swa'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la su dag mos par 'gyur
44a3(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag 'ching bas rnam par 'khrug par myi 'gyur ba rnams so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'ching bas rnam par 'khrug par myi 'gyur ba dag gang yin/ 'jal dpal gyis smras
44a4(mdo): pa/ b+ha'i bu gang dag 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i sgo nas thar dpar gyi byed pa dang / gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs
44a5(mdo): pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par grol ba mnyam par gyur dpa dag ste/ de dag gis ni 'ching ba ma dmyigs pas rnam par 'khrug par yang myi myur ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas
44a6(mdo): bstand pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags lnga 'bum tsam gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis kyang ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
44a7(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos 'di dag brnyes pa de bzhin du thob par gyur da cig ces kyang smras so// lha dang byi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum lhag tsam ni chos rnams la/ chos kyi
44a8(mdo): byig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// gnas chang ma'i ris kyi lnga'i bu drug khri mi lend pa myed par zag pa lngas sems rnam par grol lo// 'dod pa lan gyod pa'i lnga'i bu brgyad khri yang
44b1(mdo): le nad pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// srog chags dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma nyi khri yang ye nad pa myed par zag pa rnams las sem/ 
44b2(mdo): rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpal sngon dge ba'i khya ba bskyed pa bdun khri nyis stod kyis ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang dgal ba dang mgu'
44b3(mdo): ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dgal ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o kun nas yongs grol ba'i// dmyigs myed chos ni legs par bsha
44b4(mdo): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa yis// shi ni tu legs pa bshad pa byas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / skad klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam
44b5(mdo): mkha' lding dang / phyi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rab kyi ma yin pa de dag gis lnga dang myi'i mchod pa dag byas ste/ steng gi bar snga pa las kyang lha'i me tog kyi char dag kyang phab rin po// 
44b6(mdo): che'i char dag kyang pa ba kle T+Tan+ta bdud spos kyi char dag dang / spos kyi tshar dag dang / phye ma'i char dag kyang phab bo// lha rnams kyis steng gi khor snang las lha'i sim snyan brgya stong dag kyang rab tu bsild to// 
44b7(mdo): dge bsnyend dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / rgyal po gsapa rgyal gyis kyang dbang bgi 'byor dpa ci bdog pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpas gzhon nung gyur da pa la mchod pa byas so// 
44b8(mdo): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang thal mo sbyar te tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad par myi bgyid pa de dag la ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis lags
45a1(mdo): gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar bgyi ba de dag la ni rab tu 'byung ba ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsgrubs te gnas par myi bgyi ba de dag la ni bsnyend par
45a2(mdo): rdzogs par yang ma mchis lags so// de dag la ni 'phags pa'i bsnyend pa rdzogs pa yang ma mchis pa lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bgrod par myi mchi ba de dag ni dge sbyong gyi tshul
45a3(mdo): ma mchis lags so// de dag la ni bram ze'i tshul yang ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skrag par 'gyur gad dag la ni thob las ngam mchis/ mngon pa rtogs
45a4(mdo): pa yang ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par bgyi ba dang / zos nas kyang mos par bgyi ba dang / lend par bgyid pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin
45a5(mdo): bar bgyid pa dang / klog par bgyid pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar/ bgyi ba dang / sdod 'tshal par bgyis nas/ gzhan dag la yang ston par bgyid pa dang / skyo ba ma mchis pa'i yid kyis
45a6(mdo): 'doms par bgyid pa dang / rjes su stond par bgyid pa dang / 'di la nan tan gyis bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / gzhan dag kyang nan tan gyis sgrub tu gsol pa dang / nyams par gyi bgyid pa de dag ni seMs
45a7(mdo): can dam pa dang / sems can chen po dang / dge ba'i lab bsrungs pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bkyis pa dang / gting rnyed pa dang / log par srung ba'i rgyun bkum pa dang / ngan song dang
45a8(mdo): ngad 'gro'i sgo bsum pa dang / dge ba'i bzhes gnyen gyis yongs su mi nad pa dang / dge ba'i bzhes gnyen rnams bzhin tu gus pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bgyis pa gso 'ang/ babyim pa
45b1(mdo): tshor ba lags shing / de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du/ zhugs pa lags te// skyes bu dam pa/ 
45b2(mdo): de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang ma mchis lags so// de dag la ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang ma mchis lags so// de dag ni 'bras bu mchis pa dang / khom pa dang ldan pa lags so// 
45b3(mdo): zhes kyang bcol ngo to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bkal saHlad pa/ byams pa chos
45b4(mdo): kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad ma/ lnga dang kyi rnams kyi spyang dus so/ / mnyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi byig rdul myed cing dri ma/ dang bral ba rnam par dag go// lha dang myi rnams kyi skye
45b5(mdo): rmu las srog chags 'bum phrag brgyad mi le nad pa byed par zag pa las sems rngam par grol lo// lA dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha
45b6(mdo): lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma sa ya brag gnyis kyis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'di na gnas pa dang / 
45b7(mdo): bdang/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams gzhad dag nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpal lnga 'bus rgyas sa kyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa tha dang gnyis thong / 
45b8(mdo): tsam gyis ni gzungs sna tshogs ma mar thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpal 'bum gyis ni gzungs dris byed pa so sor thob par gyur pa togs/ byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag bya
46a1(mdo): sems dpa' byams pa khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i pa la dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur zhing / mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu dag nod pa dang / stond pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / 
46a2(mdo): klog pa ya 'gyur te/ de dag mi byams pa nyid kyis byang chub tu lu pa bstond par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpal byams pas 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom
46a3(mdo): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mdo sde 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / stond pa dang / yi ke ma 'dri ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ glegs lam du bgyis te
46a4(mdo): 'chab pa dang / zan lan 'ga' zhig nyand par bgyid pa dang / malam bu grags par bgyid pa de dag bsod nams mi tsam skyed par 'gyur/ lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcoM
46a5(mdo): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di ska/ da ces bkalas \u0f7fyad to// byams pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so// legs
46a6(mdo): so// byams pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungapa shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// byams pa nam tan gyis dper na/ lha dang myi rnams kyi skye dgu las lha 'am gyi gang zhig kyis
46a7(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gang ga'i klung gi bye sa ged dang bcas pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed cigs/ bzhal da pa gang ga'i phyis sted du bde ba'i mo byang thams cad kyis bsnyen bku byas pa
46a8(mdo): byung da pa de bas ni/ gang gis mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di yi ge bris te 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / de bzhin su bsgrub par byed pa dang / gzham dag la ston par byed pa de ches bsod nas/ 
46b1(mdo): mapa du bskyed par 'gyur te// byang chub sems dpa ma mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bI g+ni ring po mya thogs par byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro// byams pa nga ni gang dag gis mdo sde
46b2(mdo): zas nas spong bar gyi byed cing / mos par byed pa dang / ban glegs pam bu 'dri bar byed pa de dag kyang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyir myi ldog pa nyid su lu bston datang // byams pa ni gang dag kyis mdo sde zab mo// 
46b3(mdo): 'di lta bu 'di'i phying tsam du thos pa de dag kyang 'bras bu yod par lung stond par byed la/ gang dag mos pa dang / yi ge 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la sang stan par rje ded/ wA la rlos kyang kyi
46b4(mdo): dgos// gang dag ma sde 'di yi ger 'di ba dang / sum/ nod pa dang / ma ton byed pa dang / klog pa dang / de bzhin nyid su sgrub par byed pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
46b5(mdo): dang / lhan cig tu gtam 'dri bar byed pa dang / bebs parasmra bar byed par 'gyur te/ de dag ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldana'adas rnams dang myi bral bar 'gyur zhing / 'jig rten gyi kham
46b6(mdo): mas nam da / bya ma sems dpa' da // zadakyi da pa
46b7(mdo): tham sa cad kyi kyi pa zas 'di / da dang / kum ma gas rna pa las ma
47a1(mdo): 'di jig gzung bar bgyi/ de phyir ji skad bstand par bgyi ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sam la pa/ kun dgal ma chos kyi rnam grangs 'di// kwa'i bu rab 'ams sems
47a2(mdo): kyis zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gyis bstand pa chos thams cad rnam par gtams dbab pa bstand pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de nas 'khor de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mying thos nas
47a3(mdo): thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas chos bstan pa rab tu thos lags na/ ji ltar chos kyi rnam
47a4(mdo): grangs 'di rab tu rnam par phye ste/ rgya cher bstand pa dang // de ltal bu'i chos ni nam yang ma byung lags so// bdag cag/ gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dga' ba 'di lta bu thob pa
47a5(mdo): ni sngon ma myong lags te/ de lta lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / skye bo mang po la smra nad pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo srad du chos kyi rnam grangs
47a6(mdo): 'di ci nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la gyis par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rlo yad pa rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par byan gyis brlab tu gsal da / sems can/ zos nas mos pa ci lta ba
47a7(mdo): bzhin du theg pa tha dad pas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag bde 'gror mchi bar bgyi bar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol pa/ 
47a8(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ba'i bde dag gis// gsol pa btab pa mthugs su chud nas phyogs bcu ba rnam par gzigs so// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu rnam 'a
47b1(mdo): gzigs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa'igazhi chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyu red cing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
47b2(mdo): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am mi dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rnams kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / slo ba dang / dga' ba dang / bde ba skyes nas/ ci nas kyang phyi ma'i dus
47b3(mdo): na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par myi 'gyur ba byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems can la dga' ba rnams dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la lha'i
47b4(mdo): mchod pa dag byas shing / steng gi bar snang las me tog kyi chang dag kyang rab tu phab/ lha'i sil snyan dang / klu dbyangs dag kyang / rab tu gsild cing / blangs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
47b5(mdo): pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces pad/ pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ chos kyi rnam grangs/ 'di byin gyis brlabs so zhes ko bar yang mdzad do// de nas
47b6(mdo): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / byang chub sems dang lade dag dang dka' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dgal ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan
47b7(mdo): 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mchod pa byas te// rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bkal saHla danos/ byang chub sems dpal byams pa dang / 
47b8(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan ldi 'khor de yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags la lba'i bu rab tshal sems kyis zhus pa zhes
48a1(mdo): rgyab na macan pa mang rdzogs so// mu gar gyi ma na bzad na paras dang / bu chen gyil rgya ba na sa zhes spelas baphrogs pas 'gyur cing chus te gtan pa las pa// 
48a2(mdo): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya thi ba su la mi srid can ma lal yan sung// zod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal dbyig gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la byag/ 
48a3(mdo): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das lam pa ngan sen/ drab srong smra ba mi dgas kyi danan byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / nyan thos kyi dge' 'dun dam pa cig
48a4(mdo): ru bzhugs te// de nas cho dmas kyi bu dpal / dbyigs ces bya ba bar na me'i grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ bcom ldan/ 'das ga la ba de bsong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
48a5(mdo): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal da te/ lan gsum bskor byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig gise/ bcom
48a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo spya la btud ste/ bcom ldan 'das gsa'adi skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
48a7(mdo): sangs rgyas ci snyed cig 'das shing gshegs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal saHlad pa/ tshob dpon gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu byed
48a8(mdo): grangs myed pa 'das shis gshegs te/ dper na/ gang ka'i klung kyi bye ma snyed do// gso yod pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed
48b1(mdo): cig skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das zhe bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig da lta ra bzhugs shis 'tsho zhing gzhes lags/ bcom
48b2(mdo): 'das kyis bka' saHyad pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu myed grangs myed pa skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dper na gang ga'i klub
48b3(mdo): kyi bye ma snyed do// tshong dpon gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu myed grangs myed pa da ltar bzhugs la/ 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ dper na gang ga'i
48b4(mdo): klur gyi bye ma snyed do// de skad ces bka' saHlad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyigs 'dis de ces gso lad to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar myi brgya
48b5(mdo): 'am/ myi stong ngam/ myi 'bum gyis sngon 'bad de/ baH/ lad pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur da nabacom ldan 'das kyis 'bad de cha la da na/ ci'i slad du de myi
48b6(mdo): thob/ myi rtogs kyis de'i slad du zhugs pa rtse bar dgongs te/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar gnas par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das
48b7(mdo): kyis bdag pa de kar legs par bstan tu gso yod// de skad ces gsosad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon gyi bu dpal dbyig sa 'di skad ces bkalas \u0f7flang to// tshong dpon gyi bu
48b8(mdo): legs so// legs so// khyod kyi rtogs pa mdzes so// stospobs pa dge'o// tshong dpon gyi de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / las dang po'i byang chub sems dpa'as
49a1(mdo): ji ltar bya ba dang / ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bya bangs khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gas long te// tshong dpom gyi bu dpal dbyigs bcom
49a2(mdo): ldan 'das kyi lhar nyand pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyand pa dang / de la 'di skad ces bka' sa lang to// tshong dpon gyi bu las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas mi nyin cig bzhin du snying zag pa/ 
49a3(mdo): marnam pa 'i ma nas yid 'byas te/ sems sems cad kyis bas ma nas dus gsum tu dan dmachogs sa tsha ma dang / rim bya ba myi gtang bar num/ ba dpos kyi buga'ad sa ngas sa dang sa pa'i bya ma
49a4(mdo): sems dpas ni snying zag pa'i rus la'i 'ong nas yid la byas te/ sems thams cad kyis bsams nas dus gsum du dko na mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i yi dam kyi gtang bar
49a5(mdo): bya'o// tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas mi snying thag pa'i rus pa'i khor nas yid la byas te/ sems thams cad kyis bsams nas
49a6(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dkom mchog gsum gyis myi stongs par dus gsum cu gsol ba ga dpa pa myi gtang bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dkon mchog gsum skalapa pa dus
49a7(mdo): gnas pa dus gsum du gsol ba kadab pa gyi gtang bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi 'ams thams cad du sems can thams cad la bskalang ba su mar chom bstan par dus gsum chu gsos bgang la
49a8(mdo): kyi gtang bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la ci nus pa dang rgya mtshogs pa dang / ji ltar gsol ba 'debs pa bzhin du theg pa gsum la byang chub tu sems bskyed
49b1(mdo): bar dus gsum du gsol ba btab pa myi gtang bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad bskal ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad myur zhing / rings par
49b2(mdo): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar dus gsum du gsol ba gdab pa byi gtang bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis byang chu'i gsum thob par 'gyur
49b3(mdo): par mngon gsum du gsol pa gtab ba kyi gtang bar byamo// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su rtog pa'i sems can ngan 'gror skyes pa' thams cad ngan 'gro thams cad nas gdon par dus
49b4(mdo): gsum su gsol ba gdab par myi gtang bar bya'o// 'jigarten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa thams cad spong ba pa 'gyur ba gos pa/ 
49b5(mdo): ba gdab pa myi gtang bar bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad spong bar gsol ba gdab ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang yid kyi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa spong bar 'gyur bar
49b6(mdo): dadus gsum chu ga sol pa gdapa' gyi gtang bar bya'o// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dpad ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos
49b7(mdo): las mchogs pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i yab thams cad la/ dus gsum du rjes su yi rabab kyi gtang bar bya'o// cho ba dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang po pa'i bya rgyam
49b8(mdo): sems dpa' sa ni snying zag pa'i rus pa'i kho nas yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis bsams nas/ dus gsum du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smond pa dang / bdag nyid sdig pa spyod gal rnam par
50a1(mdo): smad pa dang / sdig pa spyod pa la bshung ba dang / sdig pa las nges par 'byung ba dang / dge ba thams cad 'dod pa dang / dge ba thams cad brang ba dang / tshe rabs tshe rabs su yang dkon mchog
50a2(mdo): gsum la bsnyen bkur bya bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / gcig tu nges par rnam par dag pa'i dge ba s+yad pA gsol ba gdab pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par
50a3(mdo): bya bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thas cad 'thob par gsol ba gdab pa dang / chos kyi 'khol lo bskor bar gsol pa gdab pa dang / skal dpa du mar chos bstanang par gsol ba gdab 'a
50a4(mdo): gtang bar bya'o// tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan yang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni/ pha ma la gnod pa myed pa dang / pu dang chung ma dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / 
50a5(mdo): zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' po dang / blon po dang / nye ru dang / rgan rabs la gnod pa myed par ji ltar mos pa dang / ci nus pa rus dus su sbyind pa sbyin par bya'o// tshong dpon gyi bu gzhan
50a6(mdo): yab las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni/ bslab pa li gzhi lnga la gnas shing 'dug pa dang / brtan por 'dug pa dang / phyi sdod par 'dug par bslab par bya'o// galang te bslab pa'i lnga la srog kyi nus
50a7(mdo): na ya pa/ des bzhi 'am/ gsum 'am/ gnyis sam/ de'i nang nas bslab pa'i gzhi gcig tsams yang bsrab par bya'o// gal te bslab pa'i gzhi gcig tsam la slob par yang myi nus na/ de sdig pa
50a8(mdo): 'i las myi dge ba dang kang kun tu spyod pa de la zhend pa ma yin pa dang / drag po ma yin pa'i sems dang / myi dgal ba bzhin dang / lhod pa dang / yang ba'i sems dang / don gyi dab pa dang / dgos pa'i dbang gyis kyang
50b1(mdo): bar byas te/ des mye dge ba'i bcu'i las 'khor ba'i dbang du gyur da pa dang / 'od du dzin med pa/ kho nad tu 'dzind pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang / dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba'i dbang du gyur da pas/ 
50b2(mdo): kun tu gyud par bya'o// kun du myang pa 'dod pa ma yang rnam par smad par bya/ rnam par gzhung bar bya'o// gyod cing 'dug pa na yang rnam par spad par bya/ rnam par 'thung bar bya'o/ kyang zin pa na yang rnam par sma / 
50b3(mdo): par bya/ rnam par bshung bar bya/ so sor bshags par bya/ nges par 'byung bar bya'o// legs pa dge ba ci yang rung ba zhig kun tu spyod pa na ni/ des ni de la sems zhe nad pa dang / drag pa'i sems dang / tshim pa 'i dang / 
50b4(mdo): mgu ba dang / lhod pa ma yin pa dang / yang ba ma yin pa dang / bar chad myed pa dang / dad pa dang / dka' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu ga' ba'i dbang du gyu rang ba'i sems kyis kun tu spyad par bya'o// 
50b5(mdo): kur tus pa mdod pa das gsasan pa'i dum pa'i 'anas ni de'abyas te// thams ca thams cad kyis thamams na/ sems can thams cad 'phral pam byed dang/ dkro'i ba phyir dang / 
51a1(mdo): mnyam pa myed pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi ring bar bya'o// rjes su yi rang nas kyang
51a2(mdo): dge ba kun tu byed pa de yang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rab sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos thams cad ya dbral bar bya'o// phul nas kyang sems can thams cad dang zur mongadu bya zhing / sems can thos
51a3(mdo): cang brnam pa'i phyir dang / 'grol pa'i byor dang / dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir dang / yongs su mya na las bzla ba'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / thams nad ma byed sa da
51a4(mdo): thob par bya ba byor/ nyan cig bzhin tu rgyas gsum su than byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su masngo khor bya'o// des gan nayin pa dang / can ta dang / ga sa'i 'du
51a5(mdo): satshogs pa dang / yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong ngam/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la ya dga' mgur spyod dam/ lam du 'gro ba 'am/ las byed dam/ bya ba thams cad byed pa na yang bla na myed
51a6(mdo): ba yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dun pa dang dad pa dang / don du gnyer ba dang / smond pa de 'bal shig rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chad par rjes su dran par bya'o// yid la bya'o// sdom par bya'o// lam mang du bya'o// de ltar
