78b4(mdo): da ni thabs kyis sems can rnams chos 'di la mos par byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag kam/ sems can nam srog kam/ gang zag tu myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs
78b5(mdo): pa ni sbyin pa'ang myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'ang myidamyigs/ ser sna yang myi dmyigs/ ser sna'i 'bras bu ya bamyi dmyi gas/ tshul khrims kyang myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi
78b6(mdo): 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs/ ngang tshul ngan pa yang myi dmyigs/ ngang tshus ngan pa'i 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs/ bzod pa yang myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i 'bras bu yang myi dmyig pa/ gnod sems kyang
78b7(mdo): myi dmyigs/ gnod sems kyi 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyang myi dmyigs/ bcon 'grus kyi 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs/ le lo yang myi dmyigs/ le lo'i 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs
78b8(mdo): bsam gtan yang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs/ g.yeng ba yang myi dmyigs/ g.yeng ba'i 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyang myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi 'bras bus/ 
79a1(mdo): phyi dbyigs mi zhes rab kyi myi dbyigs/ 'ams dpa'i shes rab kyi 'bras bus pagyi dmyigs/ bde ba yang myi dbyigs/ sdug bsngal ba yang gyi dmyigs rgyu nang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ya/ 
79a2(mdo): gyi dbyigs ba nas/ byang chub kyi bdu du med kyir myogs/ yongs su mya nganams 'das pa sa kyi dbyug // nangs pa sems can de dag de ltar bstan dpas/ sbyo zhing chos te/ 'bad kya gabakyi phyir sbyor ba nga
79a3(mdo): thol ba dang / 'bad pa'i chos de dag khong du kyi chud cing / myi 'thob ste/ gang 'di rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nas
79a4(mdo): mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du khong du gyi chud kyi tho lo 'o// tshangs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs kyis chos bste nad pa yin/ te/ sems can rnams dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind mu ga lu/ 
79a5(mdo): ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas thabs la mkhas pa la sbyor b.rabya'o// tshangs pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul bstand pa gang zhe na/ myig ni tha rad pa'i tshul lo// de bzhin du rna ba
79a6(mdo): dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnams ni tha rad pa'i tshul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig ni bdag dang / bdag gis stong ste/ de'i rang bzhin de yin no// de bzhin du yid kyi bar du yang bdag dang bdag gis stong
79a7(mdo): ste/ de'i rang bzhin 'di yin no// tshangs pa myi slu ba'i phyir skye mched thams cad ni sems can rnams kyi tha dad pa'i tshul du rig par bya'o// 'di ni sems can gyi tha dad pa'i la brtson pa myi slub ste/ gzugs dang / sA dang
79a8(mdo): dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnams kyang de bzhin no// chos thams cad kyi tshul 'di yin te/ gang 'di stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul dang / smon pa myed pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i tshul
79b1(mdo): dang / myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi 'gag pa'i tshul dang / 'gro ba myed cing 'ong ba myed pa'i tshul dang / shi 'pho myed cing skye ba myed pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir dang / dben pa'i tshul lo// rang bzhin gyis/ 
79b2(mdo): bems po yin pa'i phyir/ phan tshun gyi phrad pas// de bzhin gshegs pas yi ge thams cad las tha dad pa'i sgo'i tshul dang // tshangs pa yi ge thams cad la bden pa'i gtam du blta ste/ gtam thams cad ni de bzhi
79b3(mdo): gshegs pa'i tha rad pa'i tshul bstand pa bstand to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan dpag pa kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba de gang yang myed do// chos stond to chog tu tha rad par 'dren cing / mya ngan las
79b4(mdo): 'das pa stonod to// tshangs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul bstand pa yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' bslab par bya'o// tshangs pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa snying rje ji lta bus sems can
79b5(mdo): rnams la chos stond ce na/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshe gas pa'i snying rje chen po rnam pa sum bcu gnyis dang ldan pa skye 'o// sum bran+du rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ chos thams cad ni bdag
79b6(mdo): byed pa yin na/ sems can rnams mi bdag myed pam la yos te/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni sems cad myed pa sod na/ sems can rnams
79b7(mdo): ni sems can du smra ste/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni srog myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams srog tu smra'o zhes/ de'i phyir sems can
79b8(mdo): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gang zag myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gang zag la gnas te/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chem
80a1(mdo): po skye'o/ chos thams cad ni mam nyid byed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni bongs te/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyo de chem po skye// chos thams cad ni gnas byed/ 
80a2(mdo): pa yi men/ sems can rnams ni gnas la rten te/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa 'i snyi rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni kun gan byed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni kun gzhi la mngon/ 
80a3(mdo): pa dga' nye/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyib rje chen na bya'o// chos thams cad ni nga'i dbya ba byed pa yin na/ sems can rnams minga'i 'dzin pa la gnas te/ de'u nga
80a4(mdo): sems can rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi chen ma skye'o/ chos thams cad ni bdag po byed pa sa nan/ sems can rnams mas ngas su mdzad pa la bzod te/ gyur sems cas dmas 'a
80a5(mdo): gshegs pa'i rka chen po kyi'o// sa thams cad na dang sa pa byed pa yin / sems can rnams na dngos pa mtshan de 'byung thams can rnamasas/ decan da ga sa
80a6(mdo): gyur// tham ma sa skyes pa yin/ sa cananams ni rtse ba snga / 'os gyi sems can rnams na du zhenas pa sa nyi dag gyur// rnamasams dan
80a7(mdo): bya gA bzhen/ sems can rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs ste/ de phyir sems can rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi rje chen po byam// chos thams cad ni 'dod pag pa thas
80b1(mdo): tha yin pa/ sems can rnams mi chags par byed de/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni
80b2(mdo): zhe sdang bar byed de/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni gti mug par gyur da te/ de'i phyir sems
80b3(mdo): can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'ong ba yang byed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'ong ba la gnas te/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs/ 
80b4(mdo): pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'gro ba myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni skye ba la gnas te/ de'i rgyar sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skyer
80b5(mdo): chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du myi byed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni mngon par 'du myi byed pas spyod de// de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ 
80b6(mdo): / chos thams cad ni spros pa myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni spros pa la dka' ste/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la/ de bzhim gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// 
80b7(mdo): chos thams cad mi stong pa yin me/ sems can rnams ni lta bar zhugs te/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni mtshan ma byed pa yin na/ sems
80b8(mdo): can rnams ni mtshan ma la gyod yul bar gyurd pa yin te/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni spond pa myed pa yin na// sems can rnams ni smon
81a1(mdo): lam la gyod de/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phan tshun thod pas yongs su zin cing / gnod sems
81a2(mdo): kyi za ba'i skyon la zhugs par gzigs nas/ de dag la gnod sems kyi za ba'i skyon spang ba'i phyir chos bstand to// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig
81a3(mdo): rten gnas pa 'di ni byon mi log dang ldan zhing la mnyam nga bar zhugs pa lam gos pa la gnas pa yin te/ de dag yang dag pa'i lam du gzud par bya'o// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
81a4(mdo): ba'i snying rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni rkam/ zhing chags pa'i zili kyis non pa// cho ga myi zhes shing gzhan gyi nor 'brog pa yin te/ de dga' phags pa'i nor dang
81a5(mdo): pa dang / tshul khrims dang / zos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i nor la 'god do// zhes so mas can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skyer
81a6(mdo): kye ma'o sems can 'di dag nor dang 'bru dang khyim dang / bu dang chung ma la sred pas 'khor cing snying po myed pa la snying por 'dzind te/ de dag la shi nad tu myi rtag pa nyid bstan to// zhes sems can rnams
81a7(mdo): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag myi rigs pas 'tsho zhing gcig la gcig 'drid pa las gnas so// de dga'atsho ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos bstan to// 
81a8(mdo): zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// kyes sems can 'di dag myi mja' ba yin na/ khe dang bkur stis rgyas nas/ bdag chag yang lo snyam du sems te/ de dag gi ka
81b1(mdo): sdug bsngal rnam par zhi ba'i bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la shi nad tu yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya'o// sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can
81b2(mdo): 'di dag ni shi nad tu nyon mongs par gyur da cing sdug bsngal gyi chos mang ba'i khyim gyi gnas la mngon par dka' ba de dag khams gsum las bzla ba'i phyir 'byung ba'i chos bstand to// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin/ 
81b3(mdo): gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni rgyus nye bar 'gro ba rnam par bsgrubs pas// nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de/ 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba de la le yo byed do// zhes sems
81b4(mdo): can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// se mas can rnams ni chags pa myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mchog khyad par du 'phags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las
81b5(mdo): pa 'di btang zhing gang theg pa dman pa nyan thos dbang nga sangs rgyasakyi theg pa tshol da te/ de dag gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmyigs par bya ba'i phyir rgya chen po la sems mos par byan
81b6(mdo): zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// tshangs pa sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan
81b7(mdo): bar skye ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po la gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshangs pa byang chub sems dpal gapal la snying rje chen po rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan par sems can
81b8(mdo): rnams la 'jug na/ tshangs pa byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bsod nams kyi zhing / ka zi brjid chen po yongs su rgyas pa phyir myi ldog pa sems can gyi dom la 'acom par shes par bya
82a1(mdo): yang snying rje chen mo mchis kyi sku 'i khri'u bshad pa na/ srog chags stong phrag drug cu pa gnyis bra na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// srog chags brgya stong kyis
82a2(mdo): ni bzod pa rab tu thob par gyu rad to// lha'i bu stong phrag brad+hun cu rang gnyis kyis ni chos rnams la rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi myig rnam par dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
82a3(mdo): dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa khyad par sems 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di thos na dka' bar
82a4(mdo): myi bgyid rangs par myi 'gyur ro// khyad par sems kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gi rnam par shes gnyis dang lnga na ba de dag la ni dga' ba'am rangs sa 'gyur gyi/ 
82a5(mdo): gnyis su myed pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa la ni dga' ba yang myed do// rangs pa yang myed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sgyu mas sA la da pa'i skyes bu ni sgyu ma gang byed
82a6(mdo): par zhugs pa la/ dga' ba yang myed/ rangs pa yang myed do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul la
82a7(mdo): dga' ba yang myi skye/ rangs par yang myi 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa thos na dga' bar myi byed/ rangs par myi
82a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos rnams sprul pa'i rang bzhin du zhes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lhag par dga' ba yang myi skye'o// sems can gzhan dag la dman par yang byi 'dzin rten
82b1(mdo): tshogasas na pa dang / chu rnams dang / sa tu 'dzin pa dang / se cos dang du 'dzin pa dang / ba'i nga 'dzind pa dang / 'dad pa dang / 'dad chen dang / log pa skyo pa rnams la spyad na/ 
82b2(mdo): kyang de dag la rtsod dam/ smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod mo pa'i skye bo sa dmas kyi so so'i skye ba'i chos yongs su grub par 'dod dam/ smras pa so so'i skye bo nyid kyang myi 'dod na/ de dag gi chos yong
82b3(mdo): grub pa dag sa 'dod// sngam la rigs kyi bu ga 'di chos yongs su ma grub pa'i chos de la/ chags pa 'am spang ba 'am/ gti mug par bya ba bya 'dod dam/ smram pa
82b4(mdo): rinam ma / rnam parinas kyi zhumam thams da 'dod chags dang bras me sa dang bral gti mug dang bral ba'i gyod pa yang de'i mtshan nyid do// rigs kyi bu de sa gyud la gnyis su byed pa'i phying / mama'i byin/ 
82b5(mdo): gyod pa gang yin pa de nyid 'phags pa rnams kyi gyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu lang gyod pa thams cad ni khyod pa ma yin no// 'dog supa 'ams cad ni 'dogs pa ma yin na// 'gro ba sems cad ni 'gro ba ma yin / 
82b6(mdo): smras banangs pa de 'i ska mgyod pa thams cad gyod pa sa yin rnam pa skam 'a bye ba khrag zhig brgya sro tu rgyad rgya chos kyi byings la zhi ga pa gang car kyi ts+tsha/ te/ de'i phyir gyod lathams cad spyod pa ma yinan/ 
83a1(mdo): spras pa/ tshangs pa de ji ltar na 'dogs pa thams cad 'dogs pa ma yin zhe na// smras pa rigs kyi bu chos thams cad 'dogs pa ma yin pas btags pa ste/ de'i phyir chos thams cad du 'dogs pa/ 
83a2(mdo): rnam yin pa'o// smram batshangs pa de ji lta ra 'gro ba thams cad 'gro la ma yin zhe na/ smras pa gang yang gyi 'gro ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad 'gro ba ma yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa khyad par sems la/ 
83a3(mdo): tshangs pa legs so legs so// g.yang te bshad par bya na/ de ltar bshad par bya'o// zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas gzhon nu da gyu dad pa rdzab can gyi 'od kyis/ tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces
83a4(mdo): smras so// tshangs pa khyod gang 'di skad du/ gangs byis pa mas nyi skye bo thams cad gyod pa de nyid la bdag kyi dang / zhes zer na/ la de khyod kyis thob pa yin no// smras pa rigs kyi bu gal te bdas
83a5(mdo): la skye ba'i rgyu ba yod na ni// bdag gis gyod pa yang thob par / 'gyur ro// smras pa tshangs pa de gal te myi skye na/ ji ltar sems can rnams yongs su smyind par byed smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
83a6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i skye ba ji lta ba bdag gi skye ba de yang do dang 'dra'o// smras pa/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa la skye ba gang yang myed do// smras pa/ ji de bzhin gshegs pas sprul da par
83a7(mdo): snangangam/ smras pa sangs rgyas khyu mchog lta bur gyur da pa'i phyir snang ngo // smras pa rigs kyi bu las khyu mchog lta bur gyu da pa'i phyir/ bdag gi skye ba yang de bzhin du blta'o// smras pa tshangs pa ji las mngon par 'du/ 
83a8(mdo): byed pa la spyod dam/ spras pa rigs kyi bu bdag ni las mngon par 'du byed pa la myi myong ngo // smras pa las myed pa la de ji ltar las khyu mchog lta bur 'gyur/ smras pa las ji lta ba bzhin du de'i khyu mchog kyang de bzhin
83b1(mdo): las kyi 'ad mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas tan sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das glang po che 'di dag gi ldem po ngag la gang 'jug par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ bsod nams mang du skyed par
83b2(mdo): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de dag gi mying tsam zos pa yang legs par thos pa lags na/ chos bstand pa lta smos kyang mi 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na shing ljon pa sa chen
83b3(mdo): po la ma brtend par/ ya ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / pho ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu stond pa ltar/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang de bzhin du blta'o// 'di ltar chos thams cad
83b4(mdo): la myi gnas shing / myod pa dang / skye ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'pho ba dang / 'chi ba yang ston la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na yang gda' ba de/ dag la lhag par shes rab kyi spobs pa 'di lta bu yang spobs par
83b5(mdo): gyu rad to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi spobs pas rnam par 'phrul pa/ 'di lta bu mthong na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo su zhig bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems myi skyed
83b6(mdo): bam po gsum pa// / yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu me tog ces bya ba 'khor der 'dus shing 'dug par gyur da te/ des gnas rtan sha ri'i bu la 'di
83b7(mdo): skad ces smras so// gnas tan ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab can gyi mchog tu gsungs na// 'di ltar shes rab kyi stobs pas/ rnam par 'phrul la 'di lta bus rnam par 'phrul gyi nus pa/ ciganas rten gyi mchog
83b8(mdo): kyi bying ma 'dudu brgyad dang/ gnas tan gyis smras la/ gu tu ma rtog bcom ldan 'das kyis can pos rnams ni yul yil bu bzhi du yod to// rnas pa btsun pa gni'i bu chos kyi byings sum tu bgrang ngas
84a1(mdo): de ni ma yin do// smras pa 'o ma ji ltar gnas tas sha ra'i bu yul lilta bu bzhin du ston // smras pa nyan thos kyi 'ong du chud pa cimam par bstand pa yang de tsam yo/ smras pa ci gnas tan gyis/ chos kyi
84a2(mdo): dbyings kyi yul rnam pa tshad myed pa khong du chud dam// smras pa rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ smras pa chos kyi dbyings la tshad yod pa ma yin pas na/ chos kyi dbyings ni tshad myed pa yin te/ btsun pa sha ril bu
84a3(mdo): ji ltar tshad myed par khong du chud pa de bzhin du tshad byed par bstand pa yin na/ de ji ltar gang gi zhong du chud pa mi 'dra ba de'i bstand pa yang de 'dra bar 'gyur/ smras pa kun tu me tog chos kyi dbyings ni khong du chud pa'i mtshan nyid
84a4(mdo): ma yin do// smras pa btsun pa sha ri'i bu chos kyi dbyings padu chud pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin na/ ci khyod chos kyi dbyings dang / tha dad du rnam par kro la lam smras pa/ de ni ma yin no// smras pa tsa
84a5(mdo): phyir smras pa/ chos kyi dbyings tha dad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// smras pa btsun pa sha ri'i bu de'i phyir khong du chud pa ji lta ba bzhin du ts+tsha sa kyi dbyings kyang de bzhin no// smras pa kun tu me tog bdag ni stond
84a6(mdo): 'dod pa ma yin gyi/ bdag ni nyan du 'dod pa'o// smras pa btsun pa sha ri'i bu chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings myi 'gyur bar nges pa la ni bshad par bya 'am/ nyan par bya 'am/ smras pa de ma yin no// smras pa 'o na ci'i phyir khyod
84a7(mdo): bdag ni nyan nyam 'dod pa yin gyi/ stond 'dod pa ste zhe bya sems/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas kyang / kang gus par chos stond pa dang / gang gus par chos nyan pa'i gang zag gnyis ni bsod nas
84a8(mdo): mdudu bskyed do// zhes gsungs kyis/ de'i phyir khyod kyis zhod cig/ bdag gis mnyan no// smras pa/ kanas tan sha ri'i bu 'du shes dang tshor pa thams cad la/ 'gog par snyoms par zhugs la/ chos nyan
84b1(mdo): nus sam/ spras pa rigs kyi bu gang gis mnyan par bya ba'i gnyis la 'jug pa la 'gog pa byed do// smras pa gnas rtan sha ri'i bu chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'gag par 'dod dam/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de bzhin
84b2(mdo): te/ chos thams cad ni shind tu 'gags pa'o// smras pa de'i phyir gnas rtan sha ra'i bu rtag tu myi chad par chos mnyan pa'i skal ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'i phyir ro// 
84b3(mdo): smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod ting nge 'dzind las ma yangs par chos ston nus sam/ smras pa gnas rtan sha ri'i bu gang rtag tu mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i chos gang yang dmyigs sam// smras pa de ma yin no// smas pa 'o na byis
84b4(mdo): pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzind gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam par bzhag pa yin// smras pa/ chos kyi dbyings
84b5(mdo): gyi 'khrugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'o// sprus pa kun tu me ton/ de ltar yin du zin na/ so so'i skye bo rnams dang / 'phags pa rnams su bye brag byed par 'gyung ngo / smras pa btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 
84b6(mdo): de de bzhin te/ nga ni 'phags pa dang / so so'i skye bo rnams tha dad du dpyor par gyi 'dod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang chos gang yang ma 'gags/ byis pa so so la skye bo rnams kyis kyang chos gang
84b7(mdo): yang ma bskyed do/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid de gang yin pa de nyid las kyang myi 'da'o// smras pa rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin/ smras pa gang gnas gtan gyis yongs su shes pa de yin te/ gnas rtan
84b8(mdo): kyis kyang 'amags pa'i chos rnams bskyed dam/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// smras pa ni khyod kyis so so'i skye bo rnams 'gag par byas sam/ smras pa de ni ma yin do// smras pa yon mi khyod kyis 'phags pa'i chos rnams
85a1(mdo): thob pas/ sbas pa de ni ma yin no// sbas pa yon ci khyod kyis so so la skye bo'i chos rnams yongs su shes sam/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// smras pa'o na gnas gtan kyis yongs su shes pas/ ci mngon par
85a2(mdo): rtogs/ sbas pa byis pa so so'i skye bo mos pa dang phyi ldan pa/ rnams kyis de bzhin nyid gang yin pa rnam par grol ma thaka pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de yin/ yongs su mya ngan las/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de yin no// smras pa btsun pa
85a3(mdo): sha ri'i bu de bzhin nyid de ni ma thog pa de sanan nyid dang / ga'adam yin padre bzhin nyid dang / myi 'gyur ba de bzhin nyid dang / kyi 'thugs pade bzhin nyid dang/ btsun lag pa'i bu de ponan nyid 'dis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
85a4(mdo): rjes su rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan ba sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das / 'di lta ste dper na/ me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba'i me lde thams cad ni/ 
85a5(mdo): theg sa nye ba gan sa/ com ldan 'das de sanas phyogs kyi bu 'di dag gis bag da pa thams cad chos kyi dang pan/ ca dadapasems cad kya bang ba mams
85a6(mdo): theg par nye bar gnas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa sa dang/ shari'i bu de de bzhin no/ de de'i ska stod pa de ban te/ rigs kyi nus 'didag gis kyaganang pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings pasan da
85a7(mdo): rnas ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnamapa kyi napams cag tu gsungs na/ gnas nyan ga ri'i bu zhes rab gang gis/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa'i zhes rab dag yi/ rnam sa rab cad kyi ma
85b1(mdo): kang nyan thos byasI'i rjes su 'brang ba la rang gi rgyud sdang ba'i mtshan nyid nyi tse ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par grol ba'i rnams kyi shes rab ste/ shes rab des bdag shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu gsungs kyi byang chub ses
85b2(mdo): dpa'i shes rab kyis ni ma yin no// smras pa ci shes rab smos pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sbas pa de ma yin no// smras pa yon shes rab mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su pyod pa 'am/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// smras pa gnas
85b3(mdo): rtan sha ri'i bu mnyam pa nyid rjes su gyod pa pa'i shes rab kyis/ ji ltar shes rab tshad can du bshad/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyus ni shes rab tshad byed do// yul ji lta ba bzhin ye shes 'jug pas tshad zin pa'o/ 
85b4(mdo): smras pa btsun pa sha ri 'i bu ye shes tshad myed pa 'am/ 'on te tshad yod pa yin/ smas pa rigs kyi bu ye shes tshad myed pa'o// smras pa 'o na tshad myed pa ji ltar tshad zin par ston/ de nas gnas rtan sha ri'i bu cang myi zer bar
85b5(mdo): gyur da to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol da to// btso/ ma ldan 'das gzhon nung gyur da pa tra ba can gyi 'od ci'i slad du lnga ba can
85b6(mdo): gyi 'od ces bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' saHyang to// rigs kyi bu lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di dga' bar gyur da nas/ dge ba'i za ba yongs su smyin
85b7(mdo): cing blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba'i 'od nga gi dge ba'i ma ba yongs su spangs pa/ khyod kyis ston cig/ de nas gzhan dung gyung dpa dra ba can gyi 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das la lem
85b8(mdo): mo zhes gso lad to// gnyan nas p+pa kos brag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lta bas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de sogs su thal mo spya pad sa/ laka pa gams pa rda ba can sen mo zangs
86a1(mdo): lu bu las 'od zer byung nas/ 'od zer des chad byed mu byed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thal nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad byed pa rnams kyi'od kyis khyab par byas te/ 'od des phyogs bcu'i/ 
86a2(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa na/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can nam/ byol song gyi skye gnas su skyes pa 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'am/ yong pa 'am/ 'on pa 'am/ the po 'am// lag
86a3(mdo): zha'am/ nad bu can nas/ chags pa 'am/ gtum pa 'am/ rmongs pa'am/ gcer bu pa 'am/ ltogs pa 'am/ skom pa 'am/ bcings pa 'am/ bzung ba 'am/ dbul po 'am/ rid pa 'am/ rgas pa 'am/ 2
86a4(mdo): ba'i chos can nam/ ser sna can nam/ gnod par sems pa'am/ da/ ngang tshul ngan pa can nam/ 'jungs pa 'am/ dran pa nyams pa 'am/ 'chal da pa'i shes rab can nas/ ma dad pa'am// thos pa nyung
86a5(mdo): ma/ bsod nams chung ba 'am/ ngo tsha gyi shes pa 'am/ khrel rkyen pa 'am/ lta ba byor gyu da pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'od de reg ma thag tu bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// sems
86a6(mdo): can gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti muki dang / nga rgyal dang / 'chab dang / bla tog dang / khro ba'i yongs su gdungababs nyam nga bar gyur da pa myed do// sems can thams cad kyang dga' ba dang bde ba dang
86a7(mdo): ldan par gyur da to// gang sangs rgyas kyi khyang pan byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ngam/ nyan thos kyi 'khor tam/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / rdzi za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkhal lding dang / myi 'am ci dang
86a8(mdo): lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen mi dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ kha tog gcig tu gser gyi kha tog lta bur sdang ngo // 
86b1(mdo): thams cad kha toka gcig tu/ 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha tog dang / mtshan dang / gzungs 'chang bar snang ngo // thams cad kyang spyi gtsug ltar gyi sdang zhing / lug mchog gi gzugs su sdang ngo // thams cad kyang ba
86b2(mdo): mo'i stan la 'khod cing / rim po che'i dra bas khebs par snang ngo // de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rang bzhin du/ rang bzhin gcig tu snang ngo // de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dgal
86b3(mdo): ba'inam par bkod pa'i ting pe 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpal bzhin du 'di lta bu ni bde ba skyes par gyur to// de nas 'khor de thams cad pos char du gyur te// pad tshum dbyer byed de/ stond pa yang lhag par
86b4(mdo): gyi sems/ bdag nyid kyapa dman par gyi sems so// 'od de dag btams thag tu 'og gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bzhi byu ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sos
86b5(mdo): dpa' chen po smon lam yang dag par 'phags shes bya ba dang / khyad/ par bzang zhes bya ba dang / ye shes zla ba zhes bya ba dang / byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyis kyi thub rgyal
86b6(mdo): mtshan zhes bya ba ste/ de dag thal mo sbyam nas/ gang la phyag bya ba mi de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa 'di'i nang na gang yin snyam ste/ phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod pa dang / de dag gis bar snga las 'di ltar 'khob 'di zas
86b7(mdo): cad 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha tog tu kha toka kacig tu snang ba ni/ gzhon nur byu dad pa tra pa can gyi 'od kyi bye brag ko/ zhes sgra zos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de bzhi 'di skad ces 'dzer da te/ 
86b8(mdo): bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang kyis ji ltar 'khor 'di kha tog dang / gzugs gcig sde/ bye brag byed pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang bye brag byed ce na/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des/ bcom ldan
87a1(mdo): sha 'das shag kya thub pa la ba dang dung bye ba zhag pa gang mthong bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par byed par 'gyur ba 'ga' zhig mthong bar shog shig/ ces byas pa dang / de nas de'i mong sa bcom ldan 'das med de/ 
87a2(mdo): 'bri ba dang dadang bcas te/ tal gang tsam du mngon par 'phags par gyur da to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po 'di dag gis/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ tshig 'di skad ces gso lang co// 
87a3(mdo): na 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ depani gshegs pa'i mi nas byas kyis kyimams// 'di ska sems can rnams sa bde ba shan pasa?/ byang chub sems dpanan bcad kyi dkyis mdangs dang / 
87a4(mdo): 'di yang bsam gyis myi khyab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nur gyur da pa rnga ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bkalas \u0f7flad/ to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas te/ sems
87a5(mdo): can chad byed pa rnams byed kyis byang chub la bkad kyis/ rdzu 'phrul 'di phyir dul cig/ de nas gzhon nur gyur dpa rab can gyi kyis dedag phyir rtulang ngo // 'od de phyir bskul mas ga tu 'khor dems
87a6(mdo): cad khyod lam snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du snang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyang snga ma 'o na bzhin du seng ge'i khri pad mo can la bzhugs par snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnas rten 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces
87a7(mdo): gso yod to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di bzhi gang nas mchis/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhis smras pa/ kho bo cag 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'ongs so// smras pa 'jig rten gyi khams de ci mying
87a8(mdo): smras pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni rin po che thams cad ston pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ci zhes bya ba zhig chos 'chad smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ni rid pa che gdugs cig sa
87b1(mdo): de sargyal/ snyam pa dang gtad kyishem pa da mthadra can dang / mas/ maldan 'das sa byon dpas mabyed sa// rnam pa khyodadamapa dad ma dzangs/ smras pa/ byang chul sems dpa 'a jus can gyi'am
87b2(mdo): kyis 'od btang nas/ 'od des kho bo cag la reg ste/ reg ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das shaka kya thub pa'i mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpal tra ba can gyi 'od kyi mying thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / skyes bu dam pa 'dil
87b3(mdo): blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bdag cag 'dir 'ongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas rten 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams rin po/ 
87b4(mdo): che thams cad stond pa zhes kyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che gdugs gcig pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji srid gcig na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka las \u0f7fyad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas
87b5(mdo): 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung bdun cu cha gnyis kyi bye masnyed 'das pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di bzhi gang nas/ 'dir 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad stond pa
87b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rin po che gdugs gcig pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing yod do// gsol pa/ de dag de nas de nas ji srid tsog gis der mchis/ bka' sa tsa la da pa/ sems kyi skad cig gcig
87b7(mdo): gyis myi snang bar gyur da te/ 'dir phyi nad to/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpal dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'od zer de srid du mchis pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de dag de ltar myur du byind te ga byang
87b8(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'od zer gtong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs ni ngo mtsha rad to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla da pa/ 'od srung chen po de de bzhin te/ ji skad zer ba de bzhin no// gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
88a1(mdo): thams cad kyis ma yin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gyod pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos gzhon nur gyur da pa dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
88a2(mdo): rigs kyi bu khyod kyi 'od kyis 'khor 'di dag reg nas kha tog gcig tu 'di lta ste/ gser gyi kha tog tu gyu rad na/ 'di gang gi mthu smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la 'od srung chen po khyod kyisi ka so lad cig dang / de nyid
88a3(mdo): khyod la ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das lhas sngar byung ba 'di su lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas cha lad pa/ 'od srung
88a4(mdo): ba can gyi 'od byang chub thob pa'i 'khor kha tog gcig tu 'di lta ste/ gser gyi kha tog tu 'gyur ro// 'khor rnams gcig la mos pa 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems la mos par 'gyur ro/ 
88a5(mdo): de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi mying yang myed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag gi dge 'dun rdzu 'gyur ro// 'od srung chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan
88a6(mdo): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas cayad pa/ 'od srung ji skad zer ba de bzhin te/ 
88a7(mdo): de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas 'khor de yin pa nas srog chags stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa ba zhi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi bder
88a8(mdo): smon lam 'debs shing 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'adra ba can gyi 'od kyis byang chub thob par gyur da pa de'i tshe// bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar
88b1(mdo): shoka shig ces smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas rten 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rna ba can gyi 'od yun ji srid cig gis bra na myed pa ya
88b2(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sa ya la/ 'od srung khyod kyis de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rdzab can gyi 'od / 'od la/ rigs
88b3(mdo): kyi zhod sgrirtsib kyis zan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rgya ba cu ma po sa mardzogs par 'a mang sa bar 'gyur zhes bya bar dris shig// de nas gnas gtan 'od srung chen pos byang chub sems dpa' ba tsam kyi
88b4(mdo): 'od la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring ji tsam gyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ rdza ba can gyi 'od kyis smras pa
88b5(mdo): btsun pa 'od srung chen po la la zhig gis/ sgyu mas sprul pa// 'i skyes bu ya/ rigs kyi bu khyod yun ji tsam gyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
88b6(mdo): bar 'gyur zhes dris na/ de ji skad srung ston de/ smras pa rigs kyi bu sgyu mas spruld pa la yang dag par yongs su grub pa myed na/ de ci zhig lung stond par 'gyur/ smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de de bzhin
88b7(mdo): te/ sgyu mas sprukhad pa bzhin du chos thams cad yongs su ma grub pa yin/ su la khyod yun ji tsam gyis bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes 'dri smras pa/ 
88b8(mdo): rigs kyi bu ji ltar sgyu mas sprul dpa/ dben zhing 'gyur ba myed pa yongs su rtog pa myed pa/ byed pa byed pa/ de bzhin du khyod dang / gal te de 'dran khyod tshad byed pa'i sems can rnams kyi don ji ltar byed smras pa/ 
89a1(mdo): btsun pa 'od srung chen po sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de byang chub kyang de'i rang bzhin no// byang chub kyi dang bzhin gang yin pa de sems can rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no// sgyu ma dang byang chub dang
89a2(mdo): sems can gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de/ chos thams cad kyang de'i rang bzhin te/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po kho bos ni gang gi yang don dang don ma yin par ma mthong ngo // smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas su 'gyur
89a3(mdo): bar ma zhugs sam/ smras pa btsun pa 'od srung chen po mi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ smras pa de ma yin no// smras pa de bas na/ kho bos sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba dang / nyan
89a4(mdo): su 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i phyir ma zhugs smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod mi la zhugs/ smras pa de bzhin tu dag pa la zhugs pa de la bdag zhugs so// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
89a5(mdo): de bzhin nyid ni/ shugs pa 'byed/ ldog pa'ang byed do// sa pa 'ad srung chen po ji ltar de bzhin nyid ma zhugs shing ldan pa de bzhi du/ chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi 'jug pa zhugs
89a6(mdo): ba la myi 'jug myi ldog ko// smras parda ba can gyi 'od gal te khyod kyi 'jug kyi ldog na/ sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su sbyind par byed/ smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang smon lam 'debs pa de dag ni/ sems
89a7(mdo): can yongs su smyind par byed pa la brtson pa ma yin no// gang chos gang las kyang myi ldog pa de dag sems can yongs su smyind pa byed pa la brtson pa ma yin no// smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod sems can rnams 'khor ba
89a8(mdo): mas kyi thogags/ smras pa bdag cag 'khod pa nyid kyi dmyigs na/ the gang sems can rnams 'khor ba las bzlog par bya/ smras parigs kyi bu khyod sems can rnams mya nganams 'das pas gyi 'dzud do// 
89b1(mdo): spras pa mya ngan las 'das pa nyid bdag gis ma mthong na// sems cadan rnams ji lta de la gzud par bya/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ste/ 'di la 'khor ba yang byed/ mya ngad las 'das pa yang byed nga/ skyon ci'i phyir
89b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir byang chub tu spyod/ smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung ka 'khor bar dmyigs pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par yongs su rtog pa dang // sems can pu
89b3(mdo): shes pa la gnas pas byang chub tu myod sa/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyi bya'o// smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod mami gyod/ smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung kho ba chu na/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'dab pa dang / ses
89b4(mdo): can du 'du shes pa la gyi gyod mod kyi/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po khyod mi'i gyod ces de skad sma 'jim/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pas sgrub dpa ka pal gyod pa de
89b5(mdo): nyid la gyod do// smras pa rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ri mil yang myi gyad do// smras pa btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ sems can thams cad kyi rtsod pa'i mtshan nyid
89b6(mdo): kyang de ltar bung blta'o// sprus pa rigs kyi bu de ste/ sems can thams cad kyi gyod pa'i mtshan nyid de lta bu yin du ninan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprus pa rnams ni chags par gyi 'gyur/ 
89b7(mdo): zhe sdang bar gyi 'gyur/ rmongs par myi 'gyur na/ ci'i phyir sems cad rnams la 'dod chags dang / gti muka 'byung / smras pa/ de bas kyang gnas rtar nyid la 'di'i drim pa/ khyod kyi mos pa ji lta
89b8(mdo): bzhin 'di lung stond cig// ga nas ka tan 'od srung chen po la da ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yod dam/ smras pa de ni ma yin no/ smras pa'o na khyod kyi 'dod chags dA na
90a1(mdo): sdang dang / gti mug zad dam/ myed par gyu rad ta ma/ smras pa de ni ma yin no/ smras pa ga lad te gnas rten 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams 'dug gam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu byis pa
90a2(mdo): so'i skye bo phyi ni ci log dang ldan pa rnams kyi rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa'i gnas la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams 'byung gyi/ 'phags pa chos 'dul ba la ni phyin ci log tu
90a3(mdo): khong du chud pa'i rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa myi 'byung ste/ de la 'dod chags kyang myed/ zhe sdang yang myed/ gti mug kyang myed do// smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di snyam du sems/ gang
90a4(mdo): phyi nad ci log las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa de yang dag pa yin nam/ smras pa de ma yin te/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin no// smras pa bcu na pa 'od srung chen po 'di snyam du sems/ gang yang dag pa ma yin
90a5(mdo): ba de nam yang dag par 'gyur ram/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// smras pa gnas rten yang dag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de yang dag pa ma yin pa de las/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skye
90a6(mdo): bar 'dod dam/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no// smras pa btsun pa 'od srung chen po de lta yin du zin na/ gang dag kyis sems can/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'dod chags dang / ne sdang dang / gti mug gang yin/ smras pa
90a7(mdo): rigs kyi bu de ltar na chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba'o/ spras pa/ btsum pa 'od srung chen po 'di la bsams te/ 'di skad du chos thams cad
90a8(mdo): ni sum ma sprusad pa'i dang bzhin yin no/ zhes spo'o// yang bstad pa 'di bshad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bzhi pas ba'i rjes su mthur ba'i bzad pa skyes so// de nas bcom ldan
90b1(mdo): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'ang skad cas/ 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das su dag kyi myig gis byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od mthong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag la dran song ngam
90b2(mdo): 'gro log par ltung ba'i 'jigs par 'tshal bar myi bgyi'o// su dag 'di'i chos bstand pa thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag la yang bdud kyi las bar du gcod par 'tshald par mya bgyi'o// 'di su dag byang chub
90b3(mdo): pa yongs su smyind par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'tshal par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing g.yon tan bkod pa
90b4(mdo): bshad du gsol da// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa ma kha pa/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na gnas pa/ de dang dang / sems cad tshad myed pa rnams kyi don
90b5(mdo): byed do// 'od srung rigs kyi bu 'dis 'od byung ba khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyis mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bkams yang ba/ 'od srung stong gsum kyi stong che
90b6(mdo): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yungs kar gyis gang ba ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha rad phyi nad par nus kyi/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnga ba can gyi 'od bstan dpas/ su dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
90b7(mdo): byang chub tu nges par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gi mthar phyi nad par myi nus so// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'od bstand pas kyang / sems can rnams kyi don byed na/ chos bstand pa lta ci smos
90b8(mdo): 'od srung rigs kyi bu 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi yon tan bkod pa'i bye brag kyi phyogs 'atsam zhig brjod kyis nyon cika/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' rnga ba can gyi 'od/ skal ba grangs byed pa brgyad stong phrag bdun
91a1(mdo): cu h+ya drug na/ 'jig rten gyi khams khyad par gyi yon tan bsdus pa zhes bya bar kun tu 'od rnam par 'phrul ba'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
91a2(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ste/ de byang chub kyi shing drung du nye bar song ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de'i bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi sgra ji snyed yod pa de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
91a3(mdo): 'gyur ro/ sbyin pa dang / gtor ba rgya cher 'gyur ro// 'od srung 'jig rten gyi khams de lag 'thil lham mnyam par 'gyur ro// kos ka tsa li 'di ka ltar 'jam zhing bde ba la rin po che thams cad kyis smras par 'gyu
91a4(mdo): ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de me na song byed/ myi khom pa byed/ sdong dum dang / tsher ma yang byed/ bar 'gyur ro// 'dzi ga rtend kyi khams der pad ma bkod pa dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
91a5(mdo): rin po che'i pad ma rin po che'idri dang ldan pa dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de dri ma byed pa zhes bya ba cing rgya cher/ 'gyur ro// yang 'od srung 'jig rten gyi khams khyad par yon tan bsdus
91a6(mdo): des/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od rnam par 'phrul pa/ 'od zer gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de'i/ byang chub sems dpa' yi dge 'dun mtha' yas par bsgrub pa'i chos 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par
91a7(mdo): 'phrul pa 'od kyis kun cu brgya nad pa/ gzungs kyi gter thob pa/ ting nge 'dzind thob pa/ thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / ye shes kyis stond pa la mdzes pa/ mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / myi 'jigs
91a8(mdo): pa thob pa/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba rnams bcom pa/ rnam pa dang kla gros dang / rtogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / shes rab sbyangs pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu bsgoms 'dapag tu myed par 'gyur ro// 
91b1(mdo): yang 'od srungs sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ bud myed skye bar skye bar myi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad pad ma la skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug par brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'/ 
91b2(mdo): dag bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas dang ldan brar 'gyur ro// bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang btung ba dang bzhon pa dang / gos dang / 'chags dang / skyed mos tshal dang / khang pa tshigs pa dang / 'ab bra chu dang / chu myig
91b3(mdo): dang / mtsho dang / rdzing dang / steng ka'i yongs su khongs spyod pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'od srung kun tu 'od rnam par 'phrul pa/ 'od zer gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
91b4(mdo): sangs rgyas de ye ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis chos kyi stond te/ zhan du ma byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od des reg ma thag tu myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa so sor thob par 'gyur/ 
91b5(mdo): ro// 'od des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'gro ba la thogs/ pa myed par 'gyur ro// 'od de sems can gyi nyon mongs pa ba sal ba la/ nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// yang 'od srung
91b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'od las/ chos kyi tshul rab tu dbye ba'i sgra sum bcu rtsa gnyis rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ lta bar gyur pa yongs su dag pas/ chos thams cad stong pa'o// 
91b7(mdo): rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang bral bas/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa'o/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das pas/ chos thams cad smond pa myed pa'o// rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi pa 'as chos thams cad
91b8(mdo): 'dod chags dang bral ba'o// smond pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis chos thams cad zhe sdang da' bral ba'o// mun pa sun nag dang bral bas/ chos thams cad gti mug dang bral ba 'o/ thog ma nas ma skyes pas/ 
92a1(mdo): chos thams cad 'ong ba byed pa'o// 'pho ba myed pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad 'gro ba byed pa'o// rab tu myi rtend pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi gnas pa'o// 'das pa dang sa 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
92a2(mdo): byung ba dang bral ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad dus gsum las 'das pa'o// rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad bye brag myed pa'o// las kyi rnam par smyind pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa'o/ 
92a3(mdo): byed pa po myi dbyigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad las dang / rnam par smyin pa myed pa'o// mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad ma byas pa'o// mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// rab tu phye ba'i phyir
92a4(mdo): chos thams cad mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// skye ba dnga'ag pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'o// yang dag par sa byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad yang dag pa ma yin
92a5(mdo): ba'i phyir/ cig car mngon par rtogs pa'i tshul gyis chos thas cad dben pa mo/ sems can myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad bdag byed pa'o// don dam pa'i phyir chos thams cad
92a6(mdo): gang zag myed pa'o// shes par myi byed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad bems pa'o// mdza' ba dang / 'ong khro ba myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad btang snyoms pa'o// yongs su gzung ba myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad
92a7(mdo): ci yang myed pa'o// rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad nye ba'i nyon mongs pa myed pa'o// dben pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir/ tshul gcag pa'// chos thas cad tshul gcig pa'o// 
92a8(mdo): dben pa'i phun sum tshogs pas chos thams cad dben pa'o// myi 'khrugs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad yang dge ba'i mtha' la gnas pa'o// shi nad tu tha myi dad pa'i phyir chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la gnas pa'o// 
92b1(mdo): thams cad du rjes su song ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'dra ba'o// phan tshun myi 'du ba'i phyir chos thams cad rkyen myed pa'o// mnyam pa nyid kyis yongs su rgyas pa'i phyir chos thams cad
92b2(mdo): ton cing 'brel dbar 'byung ba ma/ jil pa bzhin du mthong bas/ bye ba'i phyir chos thams cad byang chub bo// yongs su ma grub pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad bya ngan las 'das pa'o// zhes 'od srung de ltar bcom
92b3(mdo): ldan 'das kun tu rnam par 'phrul pa 'od zer kyi rgyal thos / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las/ 'di lta bu'i chos kyi tshul rab tu dbye ba'i sgra sum bcu pa gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gnas gtan 'od srung chen pos/ 
92b4(mdo): gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od zer de sangs rgyas kyi mdzadabagyid par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba la dang/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa de me dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro// sangs
92b5(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing de ma bdud kyi las kyis bar du gcod pa myed par 'gyur/ ro// 'od srung chen pos gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su rtogs par 'tshal da pa la rigs kyi
92b6(mdo): gru 'di'i rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sa lang pa/ 'od srung 'di lta byang chub
92b7(mdo): sems dpa' bcad kyi sa sa/ ga nag brgya ma nga / dal sa mas su sate/ 'a na rtsod pa la song pa pan
92b8(mdo): 'ang byung bas mas sa rgyas byano da ga su yangs su ga zung da ma dgas kyi kyi mas kyang kyang chub ma sa sa kyi kyi mas sa / 
93a1(mdo): tshangs pa byed par sems kyis khya bachus sems dpal rnab can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pas yung bstand to// smras pa tshangs pa de bzhin
93a2(mdo): gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyang lung bstan to// smras pa cing lung bstan/ smras pa las kyi rnam par sbyind pa ji lta ba bzhin du lung bstand to// smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta bu cig byas na
93a3(mdo): rkyod 'di ltar lung bstand/ smras pa tshangs pa las gang lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ma byas pa de las de ni 'di'i zhes bstand du rung ngo // smras pa ci'i phyir/ smras pa ci byang chub mngon par 'du byed pa'i
93a4(mdo): mtshan nyid dam/ smras pa de ma yin no// smras pa pad+ma ba sems dpa' mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i mtshan nyid de/ byang chub ni ma ngon par 'du byed 'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// smras pa mngon pa
93a5(mdo): byed pas byang chub 'dus ma byas thob par nus sam/ smras pa/ de ma yin no// smras pa tshangs pa de lta bas na/ 'di la na mgrangs 'dis gang la las kyang myed/ las kyi 'bras bu yang myed/ 
93a6(mdo): mngon par 'du byed pa'i 'jug pa 'ang myed pa de ni byang chub bo// byang chub ji lta bar 'thob pa yang de bzhin du lung bstand pa 'ang de bzhin te/ mngon par 'du byed pas lung bstand par myi 'gyur bar rig
93a7(mdo): bar byar/ smras pa rigs kyi bu pa ro yang tu phyind pa drug la myang ras/ phyis lung bsta nad par 'gyur ram/ smras pa tshangs pa de bzhin te/ pha ro la tu phyi dang ba drug la kyang ngas/ byis lung bstand par/ 
93a8(mdo): 'gyur te/ tshangs pa gang nyod mongs pa thams cad yongs su btang ba 'di ni skyid pa'o/ gang mngod par 'du myi byed pa 'di ni tshul khrims so/ kangs kyi thong pa 'di ni bzong pa'o// gang dper pa des/ 
93b1(mdo): rtson 'grus so// gangarag tu kyi gnas pa de ni bsam gtan no// gang spros pa byed pa deni shes rab ste/ tshangs pa byang chub sems dpalag pa pa ro yang tu phyind pa drug la myong ba de dag mil gyong / sbas pa/ 
93b2(mdo): tsam yang myi gyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gyod pa ji tsam pa de tsam du gyod pa ma yin no// gang gyod pa de myi gyod pa'o// gang myi gyod pa de bla na myed pa la yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub la gyod pa ste/ tshangs pa
93b3(mdo): rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar gyod pa ma yin pa ni// byang chub kyi gyod pa yin par rig par bya'o// tshangs pa byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes de skad zer ba ni/ de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings ji lta bur lung bstan / 
93b4(mdo): pa de lta bur yang lung bstand to// smras pa rigs kyi bu de bzhi dan nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings ni sung myi stond to// smras pa'on de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings ji lta ba bzhin du lung bstand pa'i
93b5(mdo): de'i mtshan nyid kyang de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshangs pa khyad par sems kyi/ 'di skad ces gsol to// brtso ma ldan 'das ji ltar gyod na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
93b6(mdo): pa rnams kyis blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rgyab tu lung bsan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'as sadapa/ tshangs lanas byang chub sems dpa' skyeb sa yang gyi gyod/ 'gag pa las kyi myo
93b7(mdo): dge ba la yang myi gyod/ myi dge ba la yang myi gyod/ 'jig rten pa la yang myi kyod/ 'jig rten da las 'das pa la yang gyi gyod/ zag pa dang bcas pa la sang gyi gyod/ zag pa byed pa la yang gyi gyod/ 
93b8(mdo): mama'o ba dang bcas pa la yar gyi gyod/ khams po babyed pa la yang gyi gyod/ 'dus byas la yang gyi gyod/ 'dus ma byas la yang myi myong / rnal 'byor dpa la yang myi gyod/ rnal 'byor dam yin pa la yang gyi gyod/ 
94a1(mdo): spong ba la yang myi gyod/ spong ba ma yin pa la yang myi gyod/ 'khor ba la yang myi gyod/ mya ngan pas 'das pa la yang myi gyod/ mthong ba la yang myi spyod/ thos pa la yang myi spyod/ dran pa la yang myi
94a2(mdo): khyod/ rnam par shes pa la yang gyi gyod/ sbyin pa la yang myi spyod/ gtong ba la yang myi gyod/ tshul khrims la yang myi gyod/ sdom pa la yang myi spyod/ bzod pa la yang myi gyod/ myi 'gyur ba la yang myi gyod/ brtson 'grus
94a3(mdo): rtsom pa la yang myi gyod/ bsam gtan la yang myi gyod/ ting nge 'dzind lta yang myi gyod/ shes rab la yang myi gyod/ nan tan dag la yang myi gyong / ye shes la yang myi gyod/ khong du chud pa la yang myi spyod de/ bya
94a4(mdo): bya chub sems dpal de ltar pyod la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa bra ma byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa spyod pa mi tsam pa de tsam du lpag
94a5(mdo): bar byed pa ste/ byang chub ni lhag par byed pa ma yin no// gyod pa mi tsam pa de tsam du yongs su rtog pa nye/ byang chub ni yongs su rtog pa byed pa'o// gyod pa mi tsam pa de tsam su mngon par 'du byed pa
94a6(mdo): ste/ byang chub ni mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa'o// gyod pa mi tsam pa de tsam du smos pa ste/ byang chub sems dpal ni smos pa myed pa'o// tshangs pa de bas ma rnam grangs 'dis mi nas gyod pa thams cad las yang dag par
94a7(mdo): 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpal rnams la ung bstan par 'gyur bar de ltar rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsolar to// bcom ldan 'das yub bstan pa
94b1(mdo): sbo mu 'dogs te/ de'i phyir lung bstan dpa zhes bya ma/ sma mya 'dags te/ da 'byar/ sus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams kyi dben pa ste/ de'i phyir yub bstan da pa zhes bya'o/ tshangs pa ngas mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus na
94b2(mdo): skald pa mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la bkur stir byas// btsun par byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par
94b3(mdo): byas/ kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang na de gshags pa de dag gis pa lung bstand to// de'i pha rol tu bskal da ba shi nad tu sprul pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa bye baphrag bdun cu ram gnyis la
94b4(mdo): ras bkur stir byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par bya sa kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis nga lung ma bstan to// tshangs pa de'i yang pha rol ma/ tshangs pas bstod pa la zhes bya ba'i skald pa byung
94b5(mdo): ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag bco brgyad la ngas bkun sti bya/ sa/ btsun par byas/ ri gror byas/ mchod pa byas/ kyang de bzhi na gshegs pa de dag gis nga lung ma bstan to// tshangs pa de'i yang / 
94b6(mdo): pha rol da ma/ bskal pa legs par grangs pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag sum bcu ma gnyis la bkur sti byas/ btsun par byas// ri mor byas/ mchod par byas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
94b7(mdo): b.lung ma bstan to// de'i yang pha ro la na/ tshangs pa skal pa bkod pa zhes bya ba byed ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag brgya cu ma bzhi la ngas bkur sti byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas kyang / de bzhi
94b8(mdo): gshegs pa de dag gis pa yung ma bstand to// tshangs pa ngas gang rnams la ri mor byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / gang la tshangs par gyod pa spyad pa dang / ngas bdog pa
95a1(mdo): thams cad du sam su mata sa byag pa dang / rgyas khrim pa dang / rgyangs samangon tan ma bdag par gzung ba ras blangs pa dang / bgro ba'i sa pa dang / bla dog dang / dargyal dang / 'chab 'a byed par byas nas/ ngas bzod pa dang
95a2(mdo): byams pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / bsas gtan dang / rab tu dben par myod pa dang / dben par gnas mas 'chal ba dang / zas dang / sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i dri ga yongs su ri ba dang / de byed pa'i ba po ma 'grus kyis/ zos pa zhes
95a3(mdo): cang thong du chud par byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi kyi de ya nun sa dgams sdug par brjod du yod kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dgran byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lums bstand to// datsam
95a4(mdo): byi zhe na/ tshangs pa 'di ltar khyod lal gnas par 'gyur te/ bas mtshangs pa das grangs 'dis kyang ji nas byang chub sems da/ pa lagyod pa thams cad las 'das pa/ rnams la u bstan pa
95a5(mdo): yin par de ltar rig par bya'o// tshangs pa kang gi tshe/ ngas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad mthod ma thag tu myi skye ba'i chos la bzod bathob pa/ de nas gdod de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad
95a6(mdo): kyis ngal khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ skal da pa grangs myed pa na/ shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pal dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstand to// de na dgyod
95a7(mdo): pa thams cad las 'das so// de ma nga'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kang mtshan ma thams cad yongs su gtong ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyidad pa'o// gang dmyigs pa
95a8(mdo): thams cad rab tu zhi ba de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kang yul rnams la sbas par gyi 'gyur ba de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'o// gang chos thams cad dben pa de ni/ bcos 'grus kyi pha pon/ 
95b1(mdo): ma/ so khyesam sa kyi 'an da/ sa gtan kyi da par/ rang bzhin kyi kyi skye mamathams pa dam ma tha ma ni shes rang byab lang tu phyin papa / rangs pa
95b2(mdo): sa sa ma na pa rnams sangs su rdzogs par byas so// ngas paga' sems dang po bskyed 'chun ca kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba sa byas kyi dmyigs pas/ rgyan pa su
95b3(mdo): mas kyi ba kyi 'gro gnas/ dpa'i ba tus nye bar myi 'gro'o// gang dang po mtshos nims 'thal pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yan tam sang dag par blangs pa'i tshul khrisas de ni/ shind tu sbyangs pa'i sa
95b4(mdo): des dpo'i bar sus nye bar gyi 'gro'o// gang sems dang po laste dpa' tshus chad kyi/ bzod pa dang des 'des/ shinang du ba'od/ mchos nyid de la rgyur yang nye bar gyi 'gro'o// gang sems dpa
95b5(mdo): bskyed pa tshamadzade nas bzung ste/ brtson 'grus batshams pade mi blang ba myed pa dang / dor bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus de la dpe'i bar du yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// gab sems dang po bskyed pa rgyan
95b6(mdo): chad kyi/ bsam gtam rab tu dbes par gnas pa de'i rab tu zhib mtsham ma skyed pa de la/ dpe'i bar du yang nye bar gyi 'gro'o/ tshangs pa gang sems dpa 'o bskyed pa tshum chad kyi shes rab kyis so sor rtog pa de mi smos pa myed
95b7(mdo): pa'i shes rab de la/ dpe'i bar du yang nye bar gyi 'gro ste/ de bas ma tshangs pa rnam grangs 'dis 'di lta ngas de'i tshe pha rold tu byin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// zhes de ltar rig par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan
95b8(mdo): 'das ji ltar na/ pha rold tu phyi nad pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa lags/ bkalas \u0f7f lad pa/ gang gtong ba la rlom sems myed pa dang / tshul khrims la myi gnas pa dang / bzod pa la rnam par myi rtog pa dang / baphon
96a1(mdo): 'grus la blang ba myed pa dang / bsam gtan la myi gnas pa dang / shes rab la gnyis su myed pa 'di ni tshangs pa pha rold tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
96a2(mdo): pha ro sad tu phyinang pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas ci yongs su rdzogs par bgyid/ bkams ma pad pa/ tshangs pa pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
96a3(mdo): gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas/ thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bgyid/ bka la saHlad pa/ tshangs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i mnyam pa
96a4(mdo): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / brtson
96a5(mdo): 'grus kyi sa rolapa tu phyin pa'i mnyam pa nyid gapa yin pa dang / bsas gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / zhen rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mnyam pa nyid gang yis pa dadi/ 'ams
96a6(mdo): cad mkhye nad pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ de bas na mnyam pa nyid 'dis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid do// gzhan yang tshangs pa sbyin pa'i / 
96a7(mdo): 'du shes yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'du shes dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi 'du shes yongs su rdzogs nas/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
96a8(mdo): par byed do// thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni 'du shes dang bral ba ste/ de ltar tshangs pa pha rol tu phyirnyed pa drug yongs su rdzogs pas/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gsol pa/ bcom
96b1(mdo): 'das thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla dpa/ gang myig myi lend gzugs kyi le nad pa nas/ yid dang chos kyi bar du myi le nad te/ tshangs pa gang phyi dang nang gyi skye mched
96b2(mdo): drug po 'di rnams myi le nad pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs pa'o// tshangs pa de ltar thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ myig la gyi chags/ rna ba la gyi chags/ sA la myi
96b3(mdo): chags/ lcel myi chags/ sus la myi chags/ yid la myi chags te/ de bas med bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa yin no// tshangs pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni chos gang
96b4(mdo): la yang kyi len to/ tshangs pa 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa' ya nas la bya nyid ni chos thams cad kyi snod du ma gyu dad pa li na te/ tshangs pa snod ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po myed pa'i tshig pa
96b5(mdo): dgas so// dngos po myed pa zhes bya ba ni bla ga ba myed pa'i tshig bla/ dgasra so// thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni bla gab myed pa dang nga mtshungs ste/ de bas na de chos gang yang myi le nad to// tshangs pa
96b6(mdo): 'di lta ste dper na/ nem mkha' la gnas te/ bya ba thams cad kyang byed kyang / nam mkha' de ni myi gnas po/ de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la ye shes thams cad rnam par bzhag kyang / thams cad mkhyen dpa
96b7(mdo): nyid ni myi gnas so// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bgyi/ bkalas yang
96b8(mdo): tshangs pa nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa thams cad des shes te/ de'i phyir thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya'o// de dag gi bsam pa thams cad kun shes pa dang / sbyor ba kun shes pa dang / 
97a1(mdo): snying rje kun shes pa dang / bslab pa kun shes pa dang / yang dag par 'dzind pa kum zhes pas de'i phyir thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid ces bya'o// rgyu ba thams cad rnam par spangs pa dang / rlom sems can bcom pa de ni/ zas
97a2(mdo): cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'thob pa myed cing rnam par rig pa byed la/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi gyod pa de las zhes par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir thams cad mkhyend nyid ces bya'o// ye shes thams cad mngon par
97a3(mdo): rtogs pa dang / slob pa'i ye shes dang / myi slob pa'i ye shes dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes dang / 'di ltar rnam par gzhag pas na/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya'o// 
97a4(mdo): yang dag par sbyor bas 'di las ye shes 'jug pas na/ de'i phyir thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya'o// sman thams cad yongs su shes pas de'i phyir thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya'o// 
97a5(mdo): nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas pas// de'i phyir thams cad ma khye nad pa nyid ces bya'o// bcings pa thams cad bcom pasade'i phyir thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya'o// bag chags kyi
97a6(mdo): mtshams sbyor ba thams cad bcom pas/ de'i phyir thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya'o// rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pas/ de'i phyir thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya'o/ chos thams cad la the tsom myed pas/ de'i
97a7(mdo): phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes rnams kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di las rnam par gzhag pas na/ de'i phyir thams cad ma khyen pa nyid ces bya
97a8(mdo): ste/ tshungs pa de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni// thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'i tshig bla dgas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol da rto// 
97b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kyang mkhyend la/ sems kyi dmyigs pa la yang 'jug pa myi mngal ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis myi khyab ste/ 
97b2(mdo): ngo mtsha dang to// bcom ldan 'das de la yon tan gyi bye brag chang ma mchis pa 'di lta bu 'di dag gda' ma/ rigs kyi bu po 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo su zhig bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems kyi bskyed/ de nas bcom
97b3(mdo): ldan 'das la bya chub sems dpa' rnga ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bya brlab sems dpa' su dag yon tan ba'i srad du byang chub la 'jug ma/ de dag theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ma lag / 
97b4(mdo): par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das che bar bkyi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos thams cad ni yon tan dang bral zhing yo matan ma mchis te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpal rjes
97b5(mdo): kyis yon tan gyi srad du'am/ legs pa'i slad du byang chub la 'ju ka par myi bgyi'o// gzhan du ma snying rje la chen po 'i rgyus bdagagi sdug bsngal bam yongs su myi skrag pa'i slad du/ dge ba'i chos
97b6(mdo): bskyed par bgyi ba'i slad du/ lta ba las rnam par ba rad ba 'gyi ba'i slad du/ nad thams cad bsal ba'i slad du/ yongs su 'dzin pa gtong ba'i slad du/ mja' ba dang / phyi mdzal bal gyi lta ba'i slad du/ 'dzin
97b7(mdo): rten gyi chos rnams kyis kyi gos pa'i slad du/ 'dus byas las skyo ba'i slad du/ mya ngan las 'das pa pa la bde bar dgod pa'i slad du/ de ba'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams yongs su
97b8(mdo): sbyin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de b.rab kyi ste/ pha rol da la yi re bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bgyis pa dang / ma bgyis pa la 'gyod pa ma mchis par bgyid
98a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis gnod par myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan
98a2(mdo): kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i srid ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag par myi smra'o/ brgya byin du 'gyur ba'i yang ma yin no// tshangs par 'gyur ba yang ma yin te/ gang la skye ba dang / skye gnas myed pa de
98a3(mdo): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i yab yongs su dag pa'o// nam 'dag kyang dge ba'i yab yongs su kyi 'bril/ chung ngun byol song gyi skye gnas su song ba yan chad sems can gzhan gyi dge ba'i ya ba rnams skyed pa 'di
98a4(mdo): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i yab yongs su dag pa'o// dngos po thams cad la myi lta ba'i phyir gtong ba ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa pa'o// yongs su
98a5(mdo): sa byed pa bya rgyama'i masas bya bas kyi las+ho// gnadamams myed pa'i byer pa byang kyi sem sa dpa' dasas kyi da/ 
98a6(mdo): pa'i phyir ba com 'grus ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i pha ba'o// che gcig pa'i phyir bsam gtan ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i yab 'o// lnga ba dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab ni byang chub sems
98a7(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i pha ma 'o/ sems snyoms pa'i phyir byams pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i ya nu lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir snying rje'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
98a8(mdo): dge ba'i rtsaba'o// 'am masas pa byed 'i bye dga' ba byang rgyab sems dpa 'a rnams kyi dge ba'i tshaba'o// mngal pa dang mad 'byed na kya ga thal matang snyoms ni bya tum sems das sarnams kyi dge
98b1(mdo): pha ba'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis myi 'dod pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi sems myi 'dad pa la phyar bya gtong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i ma pa'o// 
98b2(mdo): bam po bzhi pa / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa 'khor de ba'adus te
98b3(mdo): cad myi zer bar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu rang gyur da pa 'di 'khor 'dir mchis te/ 'di ltar yang dag par brjod
98b4(mdo): ba'i gtam cung zad kyang myi ston to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis d+hA 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa la 'di skad ces bka' sarba la to// 'jam dpal chos bstand pa 'di la khyod gtam gyi rgyud
98b5(mdo): 'ga' zhig spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol/ pa/ chos gang bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par rdzogs parardzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de la gdags pa gang yang mchis
98b6(mdo): sam/ bka' saHya pa/ 'jam dpal chos bstand pa de la ga dgas pa gang yang myed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos de brjod par bgyi ba lags sam/ smra bar bgyi ba lags sam/ bstan par bgyi
98b7(mdo): ba lags sam/ bka' saHlad pa/ 'jam dpal chos de brjod par bya ba ma yin/ smra bar bya ba ma yin/ bstand par bya ba ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang la yang ma brjod ma smras/ ma
98b8(mdo): bstand pa de bshad par nus so// khyad par sems kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan dag la chos myi stond tam/ smras pa tshangs pa ci chos kyi dbyings gnyis su rab tu phye ba yin no
99a1(mdo): sra shenas padan/ masamathams ca chos kyi phyis mas/ snyam pa rnam pa me / dam sa/ rangs pa gas techos kyi dbyings kyang gnyis su myed pa yin la/ chos thams
99a2(mdo): rkyang chos kyi dbyings su nges na/ sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan dag la// ji ltar chos bstand par bya/ smras pa 'jam dpal gnyis kyang ma yin la/ chos bstand pa yod dam/ smras pa/ 
99a3(mdo): tshangs pa gal te stond pa'am nyand pa 'ga' zhig rnyed na yod do/ sbas pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas/ chos ma bsta nad tam/ smras pa/ tshangs pa bstand mod kyi/ gnyis su ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
99a4(mdo): ne na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su byed par chos ston te/ gnyis su myi mdzad do// smras pa 'jas dpal gal te chos thams cad gnyis su byed pa yin na/ de ji ltar byis pas ma'i
99a5(mdo): skye bo'o rnams gnyis su byed pa gnyis su byed/ smras pa/ bdag ki rgyud la bdag tu 'dzin pas/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams pa/ nyis su byed de/ gnyis su myed pa ni nam yang gnyis su myi 'gyur ro// 
99a6(mdo): ji tsam du mang du gnyis su byas kyang gnyis su myed pa'i mtha' la gnyis su byed do// smras pa 'jam dpal gnyis su byed pa ci rnam par rig par byed/ gal te rnam par rig par byed na/ gnyis su myed pa la
99a7(mdo): yin par 'gyur te/ gnyis su myed pa ni rnam par rig pa myed pa'o// tshangs pa gnyis shes bya ba ni rnam par rig pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par rig pa myed par chos bsta nad te/ chos de yang ji ltar bstand pa de bzhin
99a8(mdo): du ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de yi ge myed pa'i phyir ro// smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstand pa keng du 'gro/ smras pa tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pas/ chosu bstand pa ni 'gro ba
99b1(mdo): myed par 'gro'o// smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i chos ma bstand tam/ smras pa ci mya ngan las 'das pa la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong bar dmyigs ni/ smras pa mya ngan las 'das
99b2(mdo): la/ 'ong ba yang myed/ 'gro ba yang myed/ smras pa tshangs pa de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro ba myed par 'gro ba'i chos bstand to// smras pa ji ltar zos/ smras pa ji ltar brjod pa bzhin du'o// smras pa rje
99b3(mdo): lta bu brjod/ smras pa ji ltar rnam par dge ba myed pa dang / thos pa byed pa bzhin no// smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyand pa gang yin/ spras pa gang yul la zag pa myed pa rnams so// smras pa chos 'di sus shes par
99b4(mdo): 'gyur/ gang 'azod par gyi 'gyum pa dang / shes par gyi 'gyur 'ang / rjes su shes par gyi 'brum pa rnams so// snas ga jam dpal ji skar na dge slong chod 'a mang sa yin/ skam la mdam
99b5(mdo): rigs 'di ni gyi rigs so// zhes bya ba 'di ni phod pa'o/ de bzhin du bsdus te/ 'di ni 'bresad pa'o/ 'di ni ma 'brel pa'o zhes bya ba dang / 'di ni nyon mongs pa'o zhes bya ba dang / 'di ni rnam par byang so// 
99b6(mdo): byab dang / dad na ma/ 'dini kyi nas bya dang / 'don 'anas pol da ma pa'o/ 'did larnas pa 'byed pa zhes bya nga / 'di bga' dang bcas pa'o/ 'din ga byed pa nag
99b7(mdo): dang / 'don 'jig rten pa // 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhes byab dang / 'di 'dus // 'di ni 'dus ma byas pa zhes bya ba dang / 'did rgyal khrim mo// 'dini rang rgyam padas sa
99b8(mdo): 'din kyima'o// 'dis byal ma yin pa'o// zhes bya ba dang / 'dis ni thob par 'gyur ro// 'dis ni thob pa ma yin par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba 'di ni cod pam/ tshangs pa ci tsam su khengs pa dang / 'dung ba dang / 
100a1(mdo): lend pa dang / dor ba de tsam du chod pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni cod pa myed par chos stond to// smos pa la dga' ba la ni gyi chod pa byed do/ rtsod pa mang ba la mi dge sbyong du gyur da pa myed do// 
100a2(mdo): dge sbyong 'dod pa la ni zab pa myed pa'o/ smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar dge slong de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa byed pa dang / bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ smras pa tshangs pa nam dge slong bstod pa dang / smad pa byas
100a3(mdo): kyang gnod pa myed pa/ de ltar ma bstan pa bzhin du/ byed pa bzhin no/ kang yi ge'i rjes su kyi stegs na/ de ltar na bka' bzhin du byed pa yin no// gang mtshan ma thams cad las zhi bar gyurd na/ de ltar na
100a4(mdo): bstan da pa bzhini byed pa yin no// gang don dang 'gal bar gyi byed na/ de ltar na bka' bzhin byed pa yin no// gang chas sa ngas su srung na de snyam bzhan pa bzhin byed pa yin no// gang cig rnas
100a5(mdo): dang 'thun par gyi byed na/ de ster na bka' gzhin byed pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jas dpal ji ltam sa dge slong dam pa mchos so sa su srung ba yis/ smras pa// nga mnyam pa nyid las 'gas par
100a6(mdo): kyi byed cing / chas kyi dbyings rnam par 'jugs par gyi byed na/ de sar nadam pa'i chos yongs su srung ba yin no// smras pa 'jas dpal ji ltar na dge slong de bzhin gshegs pas nye bar gnas pa yin/ smras pa
100a7(mdo): tshangs pacas gangs sa nye ba 'am/ ring ba byed par mthong ba'i dge slong de ni de bzhin gshegs pa sa nye bar gnas pa yin do// rnas pa/ ji ltar na 'jas dpas dge slong de bzhin gshegs pas rim go dang / 
100a8(mdo): bsnyen 'akrum byas pa yin/ smras pa/ tshangs pa dge slong gang sum dang ga dang yid kyis brtul dpar myi byed pa'i dge slong di na de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed 'a'i/ rnab pa/ yang
100b1(mdo): dpal sus de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'gyur/ smras pa/ tshangs pa gang bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / myi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed thams cad mngon pa pa'adu myi byed pa'o// 
100b2(mdo): smras pa/ 'jam dpal sus de bzhin gshegs pa mthong / smras pa gang sha'i spyan dang / lha'i spyan dang / shes rab kyi rgyan dang / chos kyi spyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan la'ang mngon par ma chags pa des/ de bzhin
100b3(mdo): gshegs pa mthong ngo // smras pa 'jam dpal sus chos mtho / sbas pa/ gang rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong zhing / 'gal bar gyi byed pa rnams kyis so smras pa/ sus rtend cing 'breld par 'byung ba
100b4(mdo): mthatha/ spras pa ga mnyam pa nyid kyi skyed cing / 'gal bar gyi byed/ bas so// smras pa 'jam dpal su dag mngon par shes bzol/ smras pa gang zag ma bskyed cing / myi 'gog pa rnams so
100b5(mdo): smras pa/ 'jam dpal su dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrab pa la slob/ smras pa gang mngon par 'du gyi byed pa dang / myong ba myi byed pa dang / myi skyed pa dang / so sor gyi spong ba rnams so/ 
100b6(mdo): spras pa 'jam dpal su yang dag par zhugs/ smras pa/ ka khams gsum pa la ma zhugs pa'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang shi nad tu dul ba yin/ smras pa/ gang yang srid pa myo li nad pa'o// smras bka'adza
100b7(mdo): dpal gang bde bar gyur da pa yin/ spras pa kang ba 'di bya ba byed pa rnams so// spras pa 'jam dpa' su dag 'gro ba yin// smras pa gang dmyigs pa 'thugs par myi byed pa rnams so// smras pa 'jam dpa/ 
100b8(mdo): su dag rgal ba yin// smras pa gang 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gyi gnas pa rnams so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal zag pa zad pa'i dge slong ma dzad/ smras pa/ tshangs pa gal te zad par 'gyur nan/ 
101a1(mdo): zad pa zad par myi 'gyur te/ zad pa de dag ni skad cig pa ma yin pas/ des de dag de bzhin gshegs pas na/ de'i phyir zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal su dag bden par smra ba yin/ smras pa
101a2(mdo): dpal su sam ngan par zhugs pa yin/ kang chod pa thams cad las shi nad tu 'das pa rnams so// smras pa 'jam dpal su lam du zhugs pa yin// smras pa tshangs pa byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lam du zhugs pa'o// smras pa/ 'jam
101a3(mdo): dpal su lam ngan par zhugs pa yin// smras pa gang gis chos thams cad gang nas kyang ma 'ong ba dang / gang du yang myi 'gro bar shes pa'i 'phags pa rnams so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal bden pa mthong ba gang yin/ smras pa// chos
101a4(mdo): ga yang myi mthong ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji tsam du mthong ba de tsam du brdzun te/ mthong ba myed pa ni bden pa mthong ba'o// smras pa gang ma mthong bas/ bden pa mthong / smras pa/ lta bar gyur pa thams
101a5(mdo): cad ma mthong bas/ bden pa mnong ba mo/ smras pa de gang du btsal bar bya// smras pa/ byi nad ci log bzhi dag las bden pa btsa la bar bya'o// smras pa/ 'jas dpal rtsilas bsams nyid rbad sA/ 
101a6(mdo): gnang / snas byan byalag pan chos bgang yin padel/ rtag pa yang byed/ bde ba yang rjed/ bdag kyang byed/ gtsang ba la byed/ gang rtag pa byed 'a don gyi rtag pa'o// gangal bde ba byed pa de ni rkun
101a7(mdo): 'asngal laso// gapas bdag byed pa deni 'dag byed pal// gangs thapa ba byed pa deni gyi chang ba'o// ngas mtsham mams cad la ba na byed pa de mi 'phags pa'i 'den par tsho 'tho/ 'don mthos pa deni/ 
101b1(mdo): myi ltung zhing / chos gang yang dngos por yang gyi byed/ dngos por myed par yang myi byed de/ tshangs pa gnyis pa dang bral ba ni lam mo// lam gang gis btsal bas chos thams cad kyi dmyigs pa 'di ni lam mo// lam gang / 
101b2(mdo): du yang phrad par myi byed/ 'dod par yang myi byed/ cing / 'khor ba yang myed/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang myed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phrad pa byed pa yang byed/ 'dor ba yang myed pa ni/ 'phags pa rnams kyi
101b3(mdo): lam mo// de nas bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam par gnas pa/ zhes bya bas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na dge bsnyend sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba
101b4(mdo): yin/ ji ltar na chos la skyabs su song ba yin/ ji ltar na dge la 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin// smras pa rigs kyi bu nam dge ba ste/ na lta ba gnyis nye bar myi le nad pa ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ bdag tu
101b5(mdo): lta ba myi le nad pha rold tu lta ba myi le nad bdag tu / sangs rgya/ sa su lta ba myi len/ bdag tu lta ba myi len/ chos su lta ba myile nad/ bdag tu lta ba myi le nad/ dge 'u d+hun du lta ba myi len
101b6(mdo): de tsas kyis dge bsnyem sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge la 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu nas dge bsnyen de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs su khas kyi lend/ tshor bar ma yin+da/ 'du shes su
101b7(mdo): yin/ 'du byed du ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes par yang khas myi len na// de ltar na sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no// nam chos gang la yang rnam par gyi rtog cing sgo mya'i 'dogs na/ de ltaran
101b8(mdo): na/ chos la skyabs su song ba yin no// nam dge 'dun 'dus ma byas su 'ang mos la/ 'dus byas las kud na 'dus ma byas su yang mos par myi byed na/ de ltar na dge la 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no// gzhan
102a1(mdo): yang rigs kyi bu nam rakas kyang du dge bsnyen sangs rgyas su yang myi dmyigs/ chos su yang myi dmyigs/ dge 'dun du yang myi dmyigasaH/ de ltar na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no// 
102a2(mdo): mnyam par gnas pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' kang 'di dag/ byang chub tu rab tu zhugs pa de dag gang du rab tu zhugs pa yin/ smras pa/ bla gab myed pa la rab tu zhugs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
102a3(mdo): byang chub ni bla gab byed pa dang mtshur so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal dri lja na byang chub sems dpa' bya chub tu zhugs pa zhes brjod par bya/ spras pa rigs kyi bu nam byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa thams cad rab tu 'jug
102a4(mdo): pa ma yim par rab tu shes pa dang / chos thams cad chos ma yin pa/ ma rab tu shes pa dang / sems can thams cad sems can ma yin pa par rab tu shes pa ste/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
102a5(mdo): byang chub la rab tu zhugs pa zhes rdo bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bram ze shibs la chen po'i lta bu'i mnyam par gnas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
102a6(mdo): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bkyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' brtsal dang/ rigs kyi bu nas byang chub sems dpa' log par nges pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje skyed cing / yang dag par nges pa'i sems
