121b7(mdo): spobs so// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i spobs pas ni/ mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad gzhom par nus so// de ci'i srad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das tha na seng ge'i sgra bzod par yang kyi nus ma/ rab tu sgrog par
121b8(mdo): ! ka la nus te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin cu pa rol rgol ba thams cad kyis bla na byed pa'i seng ge'i sgras bzod par gyi nus so// de nas lha'i bu byir gyi ldog pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// 
122a1(mdo): ke'u shi ka se ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ji tsam gyis na seng ge'i sgra zhes bya/ spras pa lha'i bu chos gang la yang mngon par ma chags par brjod pa de dag ni seng ge'i sgra yin no// gang lta ba la mngon par chags par
122a2(mdo): brjod pa de dag seng ge'i sA ma yin te/ nga'i sgra'o// ga / bkum du ba ston pa de dag la seng ge'i skal byed do/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa// bu'i bu khyod seng ge'i sA dzig bu yin pa sloms par gyis shig/ smras pa/ 
122a3(mdo): ko 'u shi ka gang de bzhin gshegs pa la yang mngon par ma chags par ston na/ chos ngan pa gzhan lta ci smos te/ de'i phyir seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o// yang dag pa'i nan tan ni seng ge'i sgra ste/ de'i phyir seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o// 'di ni
122a4(mdo): mgo gcig tu bstanang ba yin te/ de'i phyir seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o// 'di mim bsgrag par bstand pa ste 'di ni/ de'i phyir seng ge'i sgra na sa bya'o/ ko'u shi ka gang chos thams cad kyi skyo ba dang / myi 'gog pa
122a5(mdo): dang / gyi 'thob par sgom pa'i phyir chos stond pa de dag ni seng ge'i sA yin te/ gang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang kun tu spyod pa dang / bral bar bya ba'i phyir chos stond pa de dag pa
122a6(mdo): seng ge'i skra myed do/ ko'u shi ka se ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ mgo gcig tu bstand pa chos thams cad gang zag pa myed pa/ bdag myed pa yin no/ ko'u shi ka seng ge'i sgra seng ge'i swa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta
122a7(mdo): ste/ mgo bo gcig tu chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yongs su bstan pa ni seng ge'i sgra zhes pa/ dam pa'i chos srung ba'i phyir smra ba ni seng ge'i sgra'o// 'di lta ste sems can thams
122a8(mdo): cad rab tu tha rad par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas su gyur da cig/ ces byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i tshig smra ba de ni seng ge'i sgra'o// longs spyod rung ba la cho ga shes par smra ba ni seng ge'i sgra'o// ko'u shi ka seng ge'i sgra se ge li swa
122b1(mdo): zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ dkon par gnas pa dang / yang dag pa'i le nad pa dang / gtong ba sngon du 'gro ba ni seng ge'i sgra'o// tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa kyi 'dor pa ni seng ge'i sgra'o// mdza' ba dang myi mdzab la sems/ 
122b2(mdo): mnyam pa ni seng ge'i sgra'o// brtson pa myi 'dor ba ni seng ge'i sgram/ nyon mongs pa spong ba ni seng ge'i sgra'o// shes rab kyis shi nang tu brtags pa ni seng ge'i sgra'o// seng ge'i sra bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum
122b3(mdo): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// sil snyan brgya stong ma brdungs par sgra 'byind to// 'jig rte nad rnams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur da to// lha'i bu brgya stong ma la la zhes smra 'byind cing
122b4(mdo): tshig 'di skad ces smra'o/ e ma'od pa 'dir lha'i bus seng ge'i sgra 'di bsgrags pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la na gnyis byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ 2dz+ra
122b5(mdo): ba mdzad pa dang / chos nyid kyis 'di ltar 'gyur te nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ 'od zer tog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ 'thing ka dang / ser po dang / dbar po
122b6(mdo): rang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shes dang / dpral kyi kha tog lta bu zhas nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa 'jig rtend kyi bar mu mngon par 'phags te/ phyir/ 
122b7(mdo): log nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bor gyi snang bar gyu rang to// bam po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis / 
122b8(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bsnyad do// yi ges kun mchog pa rol da phyind ning thub pa kun mkhyend kun zil nom// 'di la dus gsum sems can gyod pa sna tshogs mi mchis khyod kyis sa khyen/ 
123a1(mdo): gang de shi nad tu grol pa'i blo yul de dag bsam pa rnams/ lha'i jo bo kun mkhyen 'dzum mdzad 'di'i rgyu ni lung bstan gsol// nyan thos rang rgyal dgra bcom dri myed de dag gi yang gyod yul myin/ 
123a2(mdo): sangs rgyas ye shes bsam myi khyab cing 'thab bral khyod la chags pa myed// khyod kyis sems can gzhan gyi spong sems ga la mi 'dra'i gtam brjod mkhyen da// smra/ mchog thub dka' tshig dab pa 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni
123a3(mdo): bstand par gsol pa// 'od 'di shi nad tu yid 'ong sdug pa dri myed rab tu rnam par mdzes// nyi zla'i 'od dang de bzhin tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gzi yang zild kyis gnon// de bzhin 'khor yug khrag khrig ri rab dag kyang
123a4(mdo): shind tu snang ba gyis na// ci slad khyod kyis 'dzum pa mdzad deni rgyu ni rtsa bstan gsol// 'dod chags zhe sda brdegs las lan/ gas pa zug rngu bral zhi ba rab tu zhi// 'jig rten lha myi lto
123a5(mdo): 'phye'i tsho gas byams khyod zhal lta/ bder gshegs paltas kyang myi ngoms lus ni rab tu tshim zhing bde bar 'gyur// gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstand thub pa bdag cag rnams la gsungs// 
123a6(mdo): khyod kyis chos rnams nam la' la lta bu rtag tu byed byed gsog nyid dang // klog dang sprin 'ang smra ma lta bu ma gsob nyid su ba 'dra ba dang // rmyi la ma mtho ba dang chab pa stob 'amanam mkha' chan lta buras bye dang / dge sa
123a7(mdo): 'jum mdzad 'di mnasan gsung ni rab tu brjod par gsol// 'dzin dang rtog dpa nam rtog kun dang bral bas stobapa nyid la mos// bdag po zhes bya kun la tog thal kun la rtag tu ma chad pa byed pa dges
123a8(mdo): khyod na srid pa gsum 'dir ga pa la yang gyi smon da pasam gtan ting 'dzin da dges/ kang gi srad du 'dzum pa bston mdzab 'arjend pa 'di ni lub bstam gsol// skad la gyi chags sgra dang dbyangs dang mi ke dan/ 
123b1(mdo): 'angade bzhin te/ 'jig rten du yang chos sto tho yang bdag dang chom sa 'ab gnas kyi mdzad// 'dus pa so so gshegs padag tha dad chos sanod snyam du 'dzin / ye shes rdzu 'phrul dam po skabs mchog rgyas pa shes rab mtshungs
123b2(mdo): myed gsungs// khyod ni sdug bsngal kun sel na rga shi 'jom pa'i sman pa'i mchog lags te/ khyod ni dpa' bo bdud kyi stobs 'jom mthu bo che'i mthu dang ldan/ khyod ni skyos pa dpung gnyen 'jig rten 'gon skyabs sgron ma sngang
123b3(mdo): mdzad pa/ lha myim lnga dang klus mchod 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ga pa 'dide bstan gsold// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces bkal saHla to// tshangs pa khyod
123b4(mdo): kyis phyir myi ldog pa'i lha'i bu 'di mthong ngam/ gas yod pa ba ma ldan 'das mtho // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla pa/ tshangs pa phyir myi ldog pa'i lha'i bu 'di bskal pa brgya stong phrag
123b5(mdo): sum bcu ra gnyis na 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul da pa zhes bya bar skal pa tshangs pas bstod pa la/ bra na myed pa yang / dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
123b6(mdo): 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ bla na myed pa sngas dag yang rdzog sa pa' skyes bu 'du
123b7(mdo): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang myi rnams kyi stond pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab sgron pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang bye dur+ya dang / 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser dang / 
123b8(mdo): rin po che gnyis kyi gzhir 'gyur ro// de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge la 'dun 'bal zhig 'byung ngo // bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom zhing / dpa' bo sha stag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bza' dang / btu ba bsams pa
124a1(mdo): tsam gyis 'byor da cing / dga' ldan gyi khongs gyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de tshe dpag tu myed cing ltung ba byed pa'i chos stond pam 'gyur ro// khyad par sems kyis spras pa// lha'i bu
124a2(mdo): khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstand to// smras pa lha'i bu de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings lung myi bstand to// smras pa ji ltar de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings ung myi bstand pa bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'
124a3(mdo): thams cad la lung bstand pa yang de ltar lta'o// smras pa lha'i bu de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstand pas na/ khyod sngon gyi ying bdag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du tshangs par gyud pa la gnas pa de ni don myed/ 
124a4(mdo): pad+mayin no// smras pa gang tshangs pa gang gnas pa myed pa de ni tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'o// smras pa lha'i bu ji ltar kang la gnas / ba myed pa de tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa yin/ smras pa gang
124a5(mdo): khams gsum la myi gnas pa de ni tshangs par spyod pa la gnas so// tshangs pa gang yang khams gsum la gnas pa de ni tshangs par skye// dpa gnas pa ma yin no// gzhan yang tshangs pa bdag la myi gnas/ 
124a6(mdo): sems can dang / srog dang / gang zags myi gnas pa de ni tshangs par gyud pa la/ gnas pa yin te/ tshangs pa gang mdor mchos thams cad la myi gnas pa de ni/ tshangs par pyod la la gnas pa'o// sbas pa lha'i
124a7(mdo): par khyod pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ smras pa tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs pa gnyis su myed pa'i lam la rab tu gnas pa'i tshig bla dgas so// smras pa lha'i bu la ma la
124a8(mdo): rab tu gnas pa yang / mi la rab tu gnas pa yin/ smras pa tshangs pa la ma la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab tu gnas la
124b1(mdo): byed pa dang / me nang pa myed pa de ni sems rab tu gnas pa myed pa'o// smras pa lha'i bu ji ltar bsgoms na/ lam bsgoms pa yin/ smras pa tshangs pa ci nas kyang dngos po dang / dngos po myed par gyi ltung ba dang / chos ka pa ya
124b2(mdo): dngos por yang kyi byed/ dngos po byed par yang gyi byed par bsgom ste/ de ltar skom na lam skom pa la bcom pa yin no// smras pa lnga'i bu gang gis lam bsgom par bya/ smras pa tshangs pa mtho ba bas ma yin/ zos pas nga
124b3(mdo): na/ dran pas pa yod/ rnam par rig pas ma yim// thob pas ma yin/ mngon du byas pas ma yim/ gang chos thams cangs myi rnam pa de ni lam bsgom pa mo// smras pa lnga'i bu ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i cwo
124b4(mdo): 'grus kyi gos sra ba bags pa zhes bya/ smras can tshangs pa byang chu sems dpa' gang la yang gcig pa 'am/ tha dad par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ni / byangachub sems dpal ba rtson 'grus kyi gomam pa
124b5(mdo): bgos pa zhes byam// gang chos kyi dbyings ma 'dres pa'i phyir cho sreg pas yang 'byed par gyi byed/ gyur bar gyi byed/ de chos kyi dbyings ma rtogs par kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par bya sa
124b6(mdo): myi mthong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chom pa'i mchog go// gang chos thams cad bsal ba dang / bzhag pa myed pa 'di ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o// tshangs pa gang lus dang / ngag dang yid kyis brtson
124b7(mdo): ba myed pa de ni brtson 'grus phom pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu phyir myi ldog pa legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ tshangs pa khyad par sems la bkalasaHla pa/ tshangs pa lha'i bu 'di ji skad ston pa de
124b8(mdo): bzhin no// 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus chom pa'i mchog ste/ gang la lus kyi chom pa yang myed/ ngag gi bsgom pa yang myed/ yid kyi bcom pa yang myed pa 'di ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i mchog go// tshangs pa ngas la
125a1(mdo): mngon par shes pa gnas pa' 'das pa'i dus na/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsrungs pa thams cad ya bdag par blangs pa'i ba con 'grus pa rtsams kyang // nga de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ bla na byed pa yang dag par/ 
125a2(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstand to// de bzhin du bla ma rnams la ldang ba dang rim gro bya ba dang / dgon par gnas pa dang / mang du thos pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bya ba kyi yod ces/ bya ba la kun tu 'gro ba'i 'tshon 'grus pa
125a3(mdo): kyang / yungs bstand to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi chom pa la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir ro// tshangs pa nas pa'i lha'i bu 'dis/ ji skad du bstand pa'i ba rtson 'grus 'chom pa de lta bu dang ldan pa
125a4(mdo): 'gyur ba/ de'i 'og tu bde bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis bram na 'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su
125a5(mdo): 'gyur ro// zhes sung bstan to// mangs pa de skabs na/ byang pa sems dpa' lung bstan pa/ rgyang chum po par 'dod pasam 'grus chos pa 'di lta bu chom papa dad bu 'di sa ste/ tshamams/ 
125a6(mdo): cad la com pa myed pa'i baphron 'grus 'di la brtson par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das thom pa ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus de ka pa lags/ bka' sa kha pa/ tshangs pa gang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i
125a7(mdo): khartson 'grus 'acom pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus chos pa gang lags/ bkal sa la dal 'di lta ste 'das pa'i sems ni zad ma 'ongs pa ni ma byin/ bawAng
125a8(mdo): byung ba la ni gnas pa myed cing / myi dmyigs te/ gang zag de ni dmyigs su myed do// gang ma phyi nad pa de ni gyi skye ba'i mtshan nyid do// de bzhin ku sa da ltar byung ba de yang chos nyid kyis kyi gnas so// chos nyid gang yin la/ 
125b1(mdo): de sangs skyes paso// gsas ma skyes pa de ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no// kang 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de ni rang bzhin na/ 
125b2(mdo): rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni ma skyes pa ste/ tshangs pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus phom pa de lta bu thob pa 'di ni lung bstand pa myur du thob par byed do// tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa de lta
125b3(mdo): bu dang ldan pa ni/ chos thams cad gtong ba myed pa'i sbyin pa la mos so// chos thams cad srung ba myed pa'i tshul khrims la mos so// chos thams cad rlom sems myed pa'i bzod pa la mos so// chos thams cad
125b4(mdo): thom pa myed pa'i brtson 'grus la mos so// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind la mos so// chos thams cad rnam pa dar myi rtog pa'i shes rab la mos so// de de ltar mos pas lhag
125b5(mdo): par myi byed/ bri bar myi byed/ byed pa ma yin/ rnam par byedab ma yino/ sbyin pa yang sbyin par byed la/ de yang rnam par sbyind pa la myi re bas so// tshul khrims kyang srung la de yang
125b6(mdo): sgro btags pa byed pas so// bzod pa sgom la de yang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis so// bcom 'grus kyang chom la/ de yang yongs su grub pa byed pa so// bsam ka tan yang mnyam par gzhog la/ de yang gnas/ 
125b7(mdo): pa myed pas so// shes rab kyang sgom la/ de yang mtshan ma myed pas so// tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni bya ba thams cad kyang ston pa la/ bya bas kyang myi gos so// de myi gos pas
125b8(mdo): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob cing / rnyed pas kyang myi 'phrogs/ rnyed pa myed pas kyang myi 'brags ma yin/ snyan pas kyang ma yin/ myi snyand pas kyang ma yin/ spad pas kyang ma yin/ bstod pas kyang yin/ 
126a1(mdo): sdug bsngal bas kyang ma yin/ bde bas kyang myi 'phrogs so// de 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad las rnam par 'das te/ gnyis su dmyigs pa'i sems dang bral zhing / gnyis su med pa'i chos
126a2(mdo): rtogs pa'i phyir/ byings par yang kyi byed/ 'dud par yang byi byed/ sdug par yang myi byed/ khong khro bar yang myi byed/ gnod par yang gyi byed/ kun ras gnod par yang gyi byed/ rlom sems su yang myi byed/ bag myed/ 
126a3(mdo): pa yang gyi byed/ kun nas bag myed par yang myi byed do// sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ lta ba gnyis su ltung ba'i sems can rnams kyi don tu snying rje chen po bskyed nas/ ched du bsams ma/ srid pa
126a4(mdo): nye bar lend te/ tshangs pa kang 'di bdag myed pa'i bzod pa rab tu thog pas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ skye bo yo sa su 'dzind pa 'di ni/ bcon 'grus com pa'i mchog yin no// 
126a5(mdo): brtson 'grus brtsams pa bstand pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe// h+ya chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad kyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes pa ragyur da te/ de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das
126a6(mdo): kyis mying gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus brtan pa zhes bya bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa der byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstand to// de nas 'khor de ba tshe dang ldan
126a7(mdo): ba 'od srungs chen po 'dug par gyur da pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso yod to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ga klu chen po rgya mtsha lta bu'ang dag gsams kyi rgyung la 'babs/ de dag ni
126a8(mdo): char 'bebs ma/ rgya mtsho chen por 'bebs te/ sa phyogs gzhan du ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa klu chen po dang mtshungs pa 'di dag kyang chos kyi nang 'di 'jal 'di skyes bu dam pa
126b1(mdo): mtsho chen po rgya mtsho lta bu 'di dag gi sems kyi rgyud la 'bebs te/ sems can gzhan dag la ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla da pa/ 'od srung ji skad zer ba de bzhin yin mod kyi/ klu'i rgyan
126b2(mdo): de dag la ni gang gi phyir 'dzam bu kling 'dir char pa myi 'bebs par gyur dpali ser sna byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dzam bu kring gi sa phyogs kyis char ba'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam de dag myi bzod do// 'od srung gal te
126b3(mdo): klu chen po de dag gis kyang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chad pa phab par gyur da na/ des 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i grong dang / grong khyer dang / bcas/ ri dang brag dang ri bor bcas/ khor yug dang 'obs su bcas pa 'di lta ste/ snga ma'i
126b4(mdo): chus rgya shug gi lo ma bteg nas/ khyer bar gyu rad te/ de bas na nu chen da po de dag 'dzam bu'i krib 'di char myi 'bebs so// 'od srung de bzhin/ du skyes bu dam pa 'di dag la ni/ gang gi phyir sems can
126b5(mdo): de dag gzhan la chos kyi char myi 'bebs par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi ser sna myed mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag chos 'di lta bu dag gi snod du ma kye rad te/ de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag rgya mtsho lta bur
126b6(mdo): blo mchog dang ldan pa/ de dag la chos kyi char pa chen po 'bebs so// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper mchar pa'i rgyan shing rta'i srog zhi btsas bab pa de dag gis kyang / rgya mtsho chen po lnga'i yang byed gang ba yang byed do// 'od/ 
126b7(mdo): srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag skald pa rgya mtshos nyand tam/ 'chad kyang chos gang yang bri ba 'am gang bar gyi 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po de bkring chen po bzhi 'ili klu ba sna tshogs nas
126b8(mdo): gang chu 'bab pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ lan cha'i nor ro gcig pa'ang 'gyur ro// 'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag rnam grangs sna tshogs su chos bstand pa blos ma thag tu 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi dong po gci
127a1(mdo): tu mos par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dag pa chang ba/ dri ma myed pa/ gsal ba/ rnyog pa myed pa yin te/ tshwa rnyog pa can myi 'dzind do// 'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag
127a2(mdo): kyang / dag pa prab/ drim myed pa gsal ba ste/ gnod sems dang / zhe sdang dang / khro ba dang / khon tu 'dzind pa'i za ba thams cad kyi 'dzind to// 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'o// 
127a3(mdo): de bzhin du skyes bu dab pa de dag kyang chos kyi rgyas zab mo la rab tu zhugs shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni chu tshad byed cing / rin pa che mtshogs dang/ 
127a4(mdo): tu byed do// 'od sru de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang shes rab sa byed cing / chom rin sa cha mchogs dpag tu byed pa/ 'od srung 'disaste dper na/ rgyalatsho chen man ram mche tshogs kyi byis
127a5(mdo): gyu zhin tu kyis byas 'thubs badzi pa ba byed pa#'dabu 'das nyid per na rgyamasan pa 'das
127a6(mdo): gcig rin ma yod pa dang / kha cig rin par byed pa dang / kha cig 'ching bu lta bu dang / rnam pa gsum du byung ste/ 'od srung de bzhin du/ skyes bu dam pa de dag sems can gyi dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du chos stond pa na yang nyan thos/ 
127a7(mdo): kyi thog pa da rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / gam 'og pa theg pa men po la sems kyi rgyud rnam par gro tsa'od srung 'di lta ste dper dang / rgya mtshotshan po ni sems cad gcig gi don du rtsi gnams/ 'od srung
127a8(mdo): de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kya sems cad gcig gi don du byang chub tu sems kyi bskyed do// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni mis rad kyis gzhos/ mthadad kyis 'bab/ mthar da kyis bca mam/ 'od srung
127b1(mdo): de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du gzhom/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'bab/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du bab po// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig/ 
127b2(mdo): myi gnas so// 'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang lhan cig myi gnas so// ser sna dang ngang tshul ngan pa'i sems dang / gnod sems dang / le kho'i sems dang / 
127b3(mdo): brjid ngos pa dang / 'am sad pa'i shes rab kyi sems dang / lhad cig kyi gnas so// bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang gang zag dang / skyes bu lta ba dang / lhan cig kyi gnas so// 'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yang
127b4(mdo): bas sgeg par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ klung dang chu bran dang / chu myig dang / tshelu dang / rdzing bu dang / mtsho thams cad sngar skams par gyur pa te/ phyis rgya mtsho rgyan po zad cing skams par 'gyur ro// 'od
127b5(mdo): sru ba de dzi de bzhin tu dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ nyi tshe bar gyod par 'gyur bar zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos sngar nub par gyur da te/ phyis skyes
127b6(mdo): bu dam pa blo gros rgya mtsho lta bu sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzind pa de dag gi lag nas/ dam pa'i chos nub par gyur da te/ yang 'od srung skyes bu dam pa de dag ni srog kyang yongs su gtong bar
127b7(mdo): byed kyi/ yang 'ang srung skyes zung / dam pa'i chos yongs su gtong bar byed na/ 'od srub skyes bu dam pa de lta bu de dge gi lag nas/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba yod dam/ de dag gi dam pa'i chos
127b8(mdo): nub par khyod kyis myi blta'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po na nor bu rin po che rin po che thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba rdo rje tshogs kyi nor bu rin po che zhig yod do// de nyi ma bdun shar nas
128a1(mdo): tshangs pa 'jig rten gyi bar du 'od zer byung yang / rin po 'i tshig par myi 'gyur te/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na/ rgya mtsho chen po yod pa der / nor bu rin po ni de 'gro
128a2(mdo): bar 'gyur te/ 'od srung gam nor bu rin po che de rgya mtsho chen po gzhan du ma 'phos par 'jig rten gyi khams 'di tshig par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing / ko skabs byed de/ de ni gnas byed do// 'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu/ 
128a3(mdo): dam pa de dag kya dam pa mtsham yongs su zad pas gyur to// dang / 'jig rten gnas pa bdam pa ma yin pa'i chos bcum byung ba de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'byung ba da 'pho bar 'gyur ro// bdun gang zhen/ 'diH/ 
128a4(mdo): ste/ mu stegs can gyi gnas dang / sdig pa'i grogs pa'i yongs/ su zind pa dang // log pa'i spyod pa dang / gcig la gcigatshe ba'i sbyor ba dang / lta bar gyur da pa'i thibs po dang / dge ba'i
128a5(mdo): la 'jom par byed pa dang / ma thob cing mngon par ma rtogs pa ste/ dam pa ma yin pa'i chos bdun po de dag 'jig rten gnas par 'byu bab de na/ sems can rnams snod ma yin par shes nas/ skyes bu
128a6(mdo): dam pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'pho bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / dam pa'i chos nyand pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / dge ba'i cha ba yongs su 'bab pa dang / yang gyi 'bral bar
128a7(mdo): 'gyur ro// 'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper ma rgya mtsho chen po la rtend cing sems can tshad byed pa gnas so// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal la rten pacing / sems cad tshad byed pa dag yum sum tshogs ga suM
128a8(mdo): gnas so// gsum gang zhe na/ lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / myi'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ma sems can gzham
128b1(mdo): dag gis btung bar gyi nus so// 'od srung de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag gi chos gang bstand pa de dag kyang / pha rol kyi rgol ba rnams kyis btung bar myi nus so// 'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po na
128b2(mdo): nar sems can gnas pa de dag ni/ tshul gzhan gyi chos/ chos kyi de nyid la 'thung ngo // 'od srung de bzhin du/ skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang / gzhan gyi ngo bor lta bas/ chos kyi ro mya'i thung gi/ rang byung gi ye shes kyi chos
128b3(mdo): kyi mo 'thung ngo // de nas gnas rtan 'od srung chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang ngo to// bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen pola'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chen po'i gting ngam/ tshad gzung bar nus
128b4(mdo): kyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten da kyis skyes bu dam pa de dag gi gting ngamaH/ tshad gzung bar nus / de bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs zhes
128b5(mdo): brgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasas pad pa/ 'od srung gro gcu kye stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung kyi bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyi gting nga ma tshad ni gzung nus kyi/ nyan thos
128b6(mdo): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ skyes bu dam pa blo mchog dang lta bu dang ldan pa de dag gi gting ngam/ tshad gzung bar ni myi nus so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa
128b7(mdo): 'di dag gsungs so// ji ltar chos kyi shes par rgya chen gter// 'bab chu thams cad kun kyi chu tshol ba// de bzhin 'di rnams 'di la chos tshol kyang // rtag par chos kyis chog par 'byung ba myed/ 
128b8(mdo): ji ltar ji snyed chu mang rab bsdus kyang // 'di la rgya mtsho 'gribs shing gang 'gyur myed// dam pa'i chos zos nas kyang chos kyi dbyings// shi nad tu 'phel zhing 'grib par mthong ba myed// ji ltar ji myed rgya mtsho chu srung
129a1(mdo): kyang // rtog pa can gyi rgya mtsho der myi 'bab// de bzhimathub mkhas khyad pa gyod pa yang // de dag rnam dag nyon mongs myi sdud do// ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po lus chung bas// zab cing gting yangs pas na// 
129a2(mdo): gyi dpogs pa// de bzhin yon tan na pa rgya mtsho ye shes kyang // pha ro la zhol ba rnams kyis dpag kyi nus// ji ltar rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i 'bab ma rnams// rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang ro gcig 'gyur// de bzhin
129a3(mdo): rnam pa sna tshogs chos thos nas// de dag rnam par grol bar ro cag 'gyur// ji ltar chu 'dzind rgya mtsho chen po ni// skye bo gcig gdon bI myi gnas te// de bzhin byang chub tu yang zhugs pa dag// de dag 'gro ba kun la phan phyir zhu/ 
129a4(mdo): ji ltar rgya mtshor ni cen dbyings yin zhing // des gnas da nor bu rin cen 'gyu pa// de bzhin rin cen 'byung gnas sems can mchog/ de dag las ni rin chen gsum 'dir 'byung // ji ltar rngam par bya rtog rgya mtshom
129a5(mdo): rtag par rin cen rnam pa gsum 'byung ste// de bzhin de dag chos na mas ston pa da// theg pa gsum gyis sems cad dag par 'gyu ra// ji ltar 'bab pa dang ni 'gras nyid nas// rgyamatsho chen
129a6(mdo): ma mthar kyis gzhol bltar/ de bzhin sems can mchog rnams kun mkhyen gzhol// sems can rab tu bkrol phyir rtag tu bzod// ji ltar rgya mtsho po dang kyi gnas te// de dag gi ni ma 'dres chos 'di yin// de bzhi
129a7(mdo): byang chub mchogs zhugs pa yang // dam pa'i theg pa dang mi gnas kyi byed// ji skar rgya mtshoms 'grung rin ched de// rin chen srud ces bya ba pa bsngags pa// 'bregs pa ma na sa da' byung yang kyi rdzag ste/ 
129a8(mdo): desang 'jig rten 'dag ci gzhanas so// de bani drim byed tha mtshas 'jig to// bcod 'grus mchog ldan de dga' ba bcod padzid/ snod tsun 'jig rten nos myi 'dod gnas/ gnas brgyas pade
129b1(mdo): kyi drung du 'gro// nam zhig bsregs pa li skal dpa 'byung 'gyur te/ chu myig mchod pa steng ka skam par 'gyur// rgya mtsho 'dir ni phyi nas skam par 'gyur// stong gsum chen po 'di ya pa rab tu 'jig/ 
129b2(mdo): gyod pa nye bar gnas pali// 'di las mchog tu bya ba'i chos nus pa// de tshe 'dir ni sems can mchog chos 'di// lus dang srog dang 'or nas srung bar byed// bder gshegs 'das na rtag par bag byed pas// de ga rnams la
129b3(mdo): chos 'di gyi 'dzag go// de ltar de dag bsam pa rnam par dag/ chos la gnas shing gyod pa rnam par gyod// ji ltar rgya mtsho sems can tshad myed gnas// sems can gcig gi don du gyi 'dug pa// de bzhin 'jig rten
129b4(mdo): thams cad nam grol zhing // grags pa chen po 'di dag tu 'jug // 'jig rten khams 'di rgya mtsho dza snyed pa// malus par ni rnams shes rlub yang // rgyal ba de dag kun gyi spyod pa mi/ 
129b5(mdo): dgra bcom rang rgyal dag gis shes kyi nus/ ma lus phyogs rgya nam mkha mi dbyings rnams kyang // mchog rnams kyis ni tshad padz+ra/ banus srid kyi// nam ma' labs kyang lhag par de dag gi/ 
129b6(mdo): ye shes tshad mi dmas kyang gzung kyi dus// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtul brtan zhing // yang dag 'jig rtem ma lus dgrol ba'i phyir// rgya me yangs pa'i sems rab gzhol byas pa// 'od srungs de
129b7(mdo): mtshungs myed ga la ldag/ de dag rin cem 'byung gnas rgya mtsho 'dra// de dag bsod nams yid la bsod nams shing // de dag dpyad pa'i rgyal po sman pa'i mchog/ sems can yun ringam pa tha dad par byed// de dag
129b8(mdo): kanas yin skyabs dang dpung gnyen de/ skyob pa sgron ma de bzhin 'od byed pa// skye bo mdongs pa rnams kyi dbyig skyed pa// de thob pas ni de dag bdud yi thob par 'gyur// de dang de dag chos kyi rgyal mchog 'bar// 
130a1(mdo): de rnams rgya phyi mngon ma nga soms pa ste// tshangs pabs pa gtan bzhi la gnas pa yin// de dag tshangs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskod// de dag ded dpon mkhas pa 'dzin pa ste// log pa 'i lam du gnas/ 
130a2(mdo): la ma stond pa// de dang de dag bdud 'joms dpa' bo ste// sems can dam pa byang chub snying por gnas// de dag chos kar tshad myed zla ba bzhin// de dag 'od zer mngon 'phagras nyi ma 'dra// sprin lta bur
130a3(mdo): kyang tshad myed bro gas zhing // 'jig rten gsum du bdud ci'i cha rad pa 'bebs// de dag seng ge lta bur 'jigs skyon myed// glang po che ltar shi nad tu dul ba'i sems// de dag ri rab ri bo 'jar mtshungs te// 
130a4(mdo): de dag pha rolang rgos pas kyi thub bo// de dag rnam par dang / pa'i chu bzhin te// rtag tu bste nad par dka' ba mye dpa'adra// de dag rlung star rtag tu chags myed cing // sa dpa' tra bar tha ba rab tu/ 
130a5(mdo): 'angs/ gnod sems dargyal zab pra dog bral// de wAr ci'i shing sar rtog pabyed// 'jig rten chos rnams brgyad 'os mgos zhing // de dag tshul khrims rngam dag padas bzhi// 
130a6(mdo): de dag su tshul par 'i me tog sbyar // dge zhing skal pa bye bar sgra thos dka'// de dag rkang gnyis dpol byas pa gno// de dag sangs rgyas rigs la gnas par brtson// de dag snying rje mo zhi brtul bum
130a7(mdo): brtam// byams la gnas dang dka' la mngon par 'phags// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la btang snyoms shing // rtag tu rgyal ya dag gi nor rnams tshol// de dang de dag sbyin pas khyad par song // 
130a8(mdo): yi ges tshul khrims la yang rab tu gnas// de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis gcig tu dpal// bcom 'grus 'phags shing rtag tu mthu dang ldan// de dag bsam gtan mngon par shes la
130b1(mdo): mkhas/ de dag chad byed zhing du 'phrul gyis 'gro// thub pa dam mchog la yang chos nyan cing / ji ltar thos pa dag kyang stond par byed// ji ltar 'di mos rnam par grol ba yang / skye bo/ 
130b2(mdo): drag gi gyod pa de dag shes// ji ltar mos pa mkhas shing rtogs pa ste// nan tan snying por byed cing mu stegs thob// 'di rnams tshogs pa las ni 'di skye zhes// de dang de dag chos kun rab tu shes/ 
130b3(mdo): de dag rkyen de la mkhas shing rtogs pa ste/ mtha' gnyis lta ba spangs shing mnyam la dag la// chos 'di gang nas 'ongs shing gang du 'gro zhes// de dag chos la tshul bzhin rnam par lta/ chos kun 'ongs
130b4(mdo): pa ma yin 'byung ba myin// gnas pa chos nyid mtshungs par rab tu shes// ji lta ji ltar 'dus byas brdzun du mtho de lta de ltar snying rje can du 'gyur// myi bden nyon mongs skye
130b5(mdo): bo sdug bsngal te// de dag tha dad par bya phyir khyad pa myod nga dang nga'i zhes ni rnam brtags nas// byis pa myi mnyam pa la brtson pas gyod// chos de yang dag ma yin shes nas
130b6(mdo): ni/ lta ba slas ba'i phyir ni chos la 'gyod// bdag byed bdag tu gyi sdug sdug pa ste// sdug bsngal bde bar myi rtag rtag par yang / sems log so so'i skye bo rnams la ni// 'khor ba'i sngon gyi
130b7(mdo): mthal sa pa yod ma yin// de dag log pa'i spyod pa de shes nas// 'di la sems cad kyi bdang gang zag byed// gangs bdag sdug tag pa de byed pam// sa bdag stsom ga la ya pa rnam byar sgom// 'od sa
130b8(mdo): ral po par de badza pa// gi'i dul phra de bzhi phyogs cas // byang chub sems dpa' yongs dag khyod su gang // de dag 'a sngags pa mtha' las so// grong gsum 'jig rten mchod pa mi yo 'o// kun
131a1(mdo): kyis byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod// de las lhag par yang ni mchod 'os te// rgyal ba'i thugs sras dag mi byir gyi ldon// gab rnams sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bco ldan pa// de dag gis pa dang / 
131a2(mdo): ma byon dang // gang yang mya ngan las 'das la'i rgyal ba dang // ma lus phyogs zhugs rim gro byas par 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rang pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal
131a3(mdo): ji nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ lnga brgya tha ma la rab tu myod pa dang / rgyas par gyur da par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
131a4(mdo): la gsol pa thob cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam da/ bal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces/ smras so// tshangs pa de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
131a5(mdo): chos gang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i chos gang ya de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bstan da tam// spras pa 'jam da la de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ tshangs pade
131a6(mdo): bas na/ 'dis brjod pa byed pas ma/ chos thams cad byin gyis ma 'arlabs pa ste/ de ni nub par myi 'gyur zhing // bsrung bar bya ba ma yin no// tshangs pa gang chos gang la yang byin gyis brlabs par 'dod pa de ni/ nam lal byin
131a7(mdo): gyis rlob par 'dod do// tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' chos kang yang khas len pa// de ni chos sla ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' smra ba thams cad las phyir ldog pa ni/ thod pagyed pa lhur byed pa yin
131a8(mdo): na/ rnam pa/ byang chub sems dpa gang dag 'di snyas du mamar 'di chos 'di lung brgyad pa// snyam du semasas/ de dag sa chos la thos pababyed do// de mi'i phyir zhe na/ zas 'byed pa ni mamams paso// rnamapa ma
131b1(mdo): das pas byed pag mas sa/ sa// rga 'argya da dang / rngadang / grangs sras da/ rgyas ma mabargyad can/ ma rnam pal/ ga skye ma da da ga/ nas gzug pa / 
131b2(mdo): skra dang / ji dang / ro dang / reg dang / chosas kyi 'dzind pa de dag na chos thos pa'o// de nas 'khor dengs lnga'i bu stong phrag sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dge slong stong brag lnga dang / dge slong ma sum brgya dang / dge bsnyen brgyad brgyas
131b3(mdo): dge bsnyen brgyad brgya de dag thams cad kyis 'angam dpas kyi bsta dad pa 'disas nas/ kyi skye ba'i chos la bzod par tu tho ste/ tshig kyang 'di skad du 'jas dpa' de de bzhin no// rked snyim pa de bzhin te/ zam pa byed pa mtshas
131b4(mdo): zas pa'o// zhes ladze dang to// de nas tshangs pa khyad pa sems kyis/ bzod pa rab tu thoza pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos sam/ smras pa tshas
131b5(mdo): ba sabyed pa'i // bras pa byed kyis shar byed/ kyim chos kyirnam gras 'di 'igasung shes// rnas 'ji nababyed pa dang / dpa la shes pabyed ba des dang // sras
131b6(mdo): chos gang rab tu thob pas/ bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur da/ smras pa cho sa thams cad rab tu thob pa myed pa'i phyir ro// smras pa gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar rtogs par bya// smras pa rtogs par bya ba myed pa'i tshul
131b7(mdo): gyis so// smras pa chos bstan pa'i 'di byed kyi mngon gsum yin nam// smras pa chos thams cad bdag dang gzhan pa'i phyir/ mngon gsum yin no// de nas 'khor de nyid du lha'i bu dri ma myed pa'i tog ces bya/ 
131b8(mdo): ba'udus par gyur da pa/ des tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces smras so// tshangs pa gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las chu ba du na/ nyams par 'gyur ba de dag gal te/ de bzhin gshegs pas u pa ma bstasmad kya 'o// 
132a1(mdo): bos de dag bla ma myed yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'bras bu dang / sa bon chud myi gzon pa'o// 'phags pa yang dkyu par zhugs/ 
132a2(mdo): pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba'o// dge ba'i tsha ba thams cad yang dag par skyed pa'o// bdud dang phyir rgol ba tshar gcod pa'o// bar du gcod pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// dpab skyed par byed pa'o// dad pa dang
132a3(mdo): ldan pa rnams dka' zhipa mgu bar byed pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shi nang tu yongs su bzung ba'o// chos kyi dam grangs 'dir lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rterd gyis legs par bsrungs pa'o// chos kyi rnam grang
132a4(mdo): 'di ni gcig tu nges pa'i byir myi ldog pa'o// chos kyin mgrangs 'di mi byang chub kyi snying po gyis pa'o// chos kyi nam grangs 'di pags pa las pa rnam par sbyang bam// sangs rgyas kyings rnams
132a5(mdo): kyi bden pa'i 'byung gnas so// chos kyi nam grangs 'di ni rje sa kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'gyod pa rnams sel da par byed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'bakas ni
132a6(mdo): mnapa pa byung bar/ sa kyin sa grangs 'dzin pa da pa 'ad pa rnams kyis legs pa na/ chos kyi ma 'gra 'dang gzungs 'dod pa nams kyis legs par na du mam// ba kyi
132a7(mdo): ma das pa'ad dpas da panams kyis legs pa la dang la kyis yas 'das ces 'dang pa dmas kyis legs par 'byungs pa'o// ros kyang mgrangs 'din kyang ma mapa dra
132a8(mdo): grangs byed pa'o// rab kyi rnam grangs 'dom par mang rgas pa daphyogs pa can gyis kyi 'thogs pa'o// chos kyin ma grangs 'don sbyin par 'os pa rnams dang mazung bamo// chobatsan thams 'dzid
132b1(mdo): mkhas pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'don lte ba dang bral bas shes rab skyed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi ga ti mugaka 'joms par byed pas ye shes skyed pa'o/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni
132b2(mdo): ge'i tshig nges par shin tu nges pa'i tshig go// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'bru 'brel pas legs par bstand pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni don dam par mi yang dag par stond pas/ don yang dag par skyed pa'o// 
132b3(mdo): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos brjod pa rnams kyis yongs su ma btang ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shes pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ma bor ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni nor 'dod pa rnams kyi gter ro// chos kyi
132b4(mdo): rnam grangs 'di ni kun tu gdungs pa rnams kyi yongs su gdung ba skyed/ par byed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid skyed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni
132b5(mdo): le lo can rnams kyi brtson 'gras skyed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni brjed ngas pa rnams kyi bsam gtan skyed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shes rab 'tshal pa rnams la snang bar byed
132b6(mdo): pa'o// tshangs pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shi nang tu legs par gnas so// de nas lha'i bu des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i bsngags pa bstan pa na// stong gsum gyi
132b7(mdo): stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lha'i bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces
132b8(mdo): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'dis/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag las/ sdom chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa 'ad pa/ 
133a1(mdo): tshangs pa lha'i bu 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba zhag zhig phrag drag sul bzhi las chos kyi nam grangs 'dams te/ tshangs pa lha'i bu dril byed pa ma tog 'di skas pa brgyad ga pa zag gni bcu pa gnyis na// 'ang / 
133a2(mdo): pa ni med da du/ debani da gshegs pa das sa ga pa'i sa rtsab 'jig rted tu 'byung bar 'gyuro// ga sang de'i bar dusangs rgyag 'byung ba de dag pams cad la yangs nyes par byed par 'thar/ 
133a3(mdo): bkur mi byed par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyings grangs 'di yang thos par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / 
133a4(mdo): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / driH ga dag gis chos kyin ma grangs des bzod pa rob tu thob pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gno/ sa parin chen bkod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten kyi lams
133a5(mdo): chen ldan du skye bar 'gyur // de nas bcom ldan 'ad sa la gA'i bu ni ma myed pa'i tog kyis 'disad ces gsoyod to// bcom ldan 'das gang bdag sa byang chub myi 'am byi rjod
133a6(mdo): na / tog dang / da/ na 'das kyis da pa su ra/ mas kyi#
133a7(mdo): so dab kyis kyi / man pa me du 'dis kyang dran shems dpa khyo gam/ mngo par ma cags/ myi dbyigs/ bya 'dod/ yod/ kyi bam/ kyi sems/ 
133b1(mdo): byi tog kyang / sangs rgyas thams cad lu ston te/ lha'i bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' kang / byang chub la mngon par gyi dka'/ mngon par ma chags/ kyi dmyigs/ myi 'dod/ phyi smon gyi sems// 
133b2(mdo): rnam par myi rtog pa de la// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su bstonang to// de nas 'khor deng lha'i bu lnga brgya tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub la
133b3(mdo): mngon par myi dgal/ mngon par myi chags/ myi dmyigs myi 'dod/ myi smon myi sems/ rnam par myi rtog na/ ci'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung myi
133b4(mdo): bstanang/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gyi phyogs na steng gyi/ bar snang la sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya cu rtsa bzhi mthong ste/ de zhin gshegs pa de dag gis de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
133b5(mdo): pa'i byang chub lung ston te// de nas bcom ldan 'das la yA/ 'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas/ 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' ga
133b6(mdo): byang chub la mngon par myi dag la/ mngon par ma chags/ myi sems myi 'dod/ myi smon myi sems/ myi rtog rnam par myi rtog pa de/ byang chub tu lung bstand par 'gyur ro// zhes legs par gsungs pa/ 
133b7(mdo): de ni ngo mtshar te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ster gyi phyogs na/ sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya cu bzhi mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bdag cag bla na myed pa yang dag par ldog
133b8(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu mung bstan to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso ma to// bcom ldan 'das gang skad pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la/ 'jam bu'i dri / 
134a1(mdo): 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu gyod pa dang / yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag go cha chen po bgos pa/ ngag gi rna lam du gda' bar
134a2(mdo): gyur da pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag brgyad kyi las skyes shing / byung ba rnams kyi dbang du kyi 'gro ba dang / de dag bdud dam / bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis// grags rnyed par myi 'gyur
134a3(mdo): ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis yongs su bzung zhing / go cha chen po bgos te/ bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gyi nyams/ bar byin gyis brlabs par gsol// bcom ldan
134a4(mdo): 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ 'jam dpal de bas na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs pa dang / yun ring / dang du gnas par bya ba'i phyir lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
134a5(mdo): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / rmyi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum 'bebs pa zhe sa bya ba'i rig pa'adang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad kyis nyon cig
134a6(mdo): rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig de bcangs pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo chos smra ba de/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
134a7(mdo): po dang / grul bum rnams kyis yongs su bsrung ba rab tu 'thob ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ma 'am/ lam log par song ngam/ gtsug lag zhang du song ngam/ gnas zhang du song ngam// 'chag
134a8(mdo): ba la zhugs sam/ 'khor gyi nang du zhugs / song yang rung ste/ srung bar byed do// spobs pa skyed par byed/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa'i stobs bskyed pa nye bar sbyor te/ de la pha rolnga
134b1(mdo): gyi rgol ba 'am/ phas kyi dgra grags tshol ba dag gis klags rnyed par myi 'gyur ro// de dran zhing shes bzhin du ldang bar 'gyur/ 'chag par 'gyur// 'dug par 'gyur/ nyal bar 'gyur ro// 'dza
134b2(mdo): dpal de la rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig de dag kang zhe ma// 'di lta ste/ ud d+he de/ dU d+hu re/ maT Te/ tsaT Te/ mgo ra ts+yai/ shi la li/ hi li mi li wi yi/ hu lu phu lu su lu/ me ba de Te/ be ta Te/ ba kha rI/ be re
134b3(mdo): kha ra le/ a san ne/ 'dz+wa la ga ti/ ma hi li/ ma na sha tha/ ne ma se/ ba ra ga na te/ sarba ru re ra ba pa ka te/ sin du le/ na mo bud dwe bya/ tsa rid d+he/ na mo dar ma ya/ nirga ta ni/ na mo sa
134b4(mdo): ga ya/ ba he \u0f7f/ ba be byA ba shan ta ti/ sarba pa ba ni/ me'i tri me/ sa ba bud d+he b+ha/ sa t+ya ni dze sho bram ham pA rbo/ ma ta ni shig+hi/ pra sha sta/ tad tra tiSh+Than te/ sa rba bu d+ha/ gra
134b5(mdo): nam sarba pA dwe b+ha/ sid d+han tu me man tra pa da sra ha// / 'jam dpal rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson na
134b6(mdo): rtag tu shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ myi rgod pa khengs pa myed pa/ sems ma yengs pa/ kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba sotshogs pa dang bral ba// cho ga shes pa bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dka' ba/ 'a
134b7(mdo): 'dzi nyung ba/ lus dang sems dben pa/ byams pa dang / snying rje la mngon par dga' ba/ chos la dga' zhing mos pa/ bden pa'i tshig la rab tu gnas pa/ gyi sku ba nang du yang dag pa 'jog la mngon
134b8(mdo): par dga' ba/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la bathon pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bskyangs pa la mngon par dga' ba/ rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa la
135a1(mdo): sems mnyam pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon phur phyogs pa/ 'khor ba las 'jigs shing sgeg pa/ sdug pa dang myi sdug pa la sems mnyam pa/ 'du shes sna tshogs dang bral ba// lus dang
135a2(mdo): srog dor ba/ dngos po thams cad la gyi lta ba/ gyod pa dang cho ga phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims dang sdom pa la mngon par dga' ba/ bzod pa dang nges pa mang ba/ ngam du zer ba'i bzod pa'i rang bzhin can/ bcom 'grus
135a3(mdo): ba thams pa// sems can thams cad kyi bya ba mi mod ces bya ba la brtsod pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa zho gnyer zad bral ba/ gsong por sgrub/ nga rgyal bcom pa/ nges pa 'grogs pa na bde ba/ de lta bu'i spyod la la rab tu
135a4(mdo): gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos 'jam dpal sngags kyi tshig 'di rab tu gdon par bya'o// 'jam dpal de ltar na/ chos smra/ pa de'i tshe/ 'di nyid la stobs bskyed pa bcu rab tu 'thob bo// 
135a5(mdo): bucu gang zhe na/ myi brjed pa'i chos nyid pas/ dran pa'i stobs/ bskyed pa dang / chos rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas/ blo gros/ kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / mdo sde'i tshul khong de chud pas// rtogs
135a6(mdo): ba'i stobs bskyed pa dang / sdom pa dang gyod pa phyi gtong bas/ dang pa la stobs bskyed pa dang / bdag dang gzhan srub bas po \u0f7fshes shing / khrel yod pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / shes rab yongs su rdzogs pas thos pang
135a7(mdo): stobs bskyed pa dang / zos pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin de pas/ gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yongs su bzung bas/ spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / mngon par
135a8(mdo): shes pa lnga rab tu thob las/ zab mo 'i stobs bskyed pa dang / rgyar chu thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pas/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'askyed pa ste/ 'jam dpal gyod pa la zhugs pa'i
135b1(mdo): chos smra ba gang / rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig rab tu 'don pa 'di ni/ stobs bskyed pa de bcu rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig bstand pa 'di/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i tshe// rgyal po chen po
135b2(mdo): bzhi skrag cing / ba spu langs par gyur te/ g.yog brgya phrag du ma dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyi nad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal da te/ thal mo sbyar nas// btso
135b3(mdo): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi po 'di dag ni/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa de bzhim gshegs pa'i bka' sgrub par bgyid pa ste/ bshes gnyen dang bcas/

135b6(mdo): bdag cag rgyal po chen po stobs dang bcas/ 'khor dpa bcas pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi rim gro bgyid par bdag cag spro'o// bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spro ba dang / spobs
135b7(mdo): ba gzhan gyis go bar gyi bkyi zhing / gyi gtse bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag cag spro'o// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu gyod par 'gyur ba lis phyogs dang / dpag tshad ba tu

136a1(mdo): bu gnyen bshes dang // bran dpa' khor ts+tsha mchis pa// de dag bdag cag grogs bcas pas// bdag po de dag rim gro ba kyis// de nas rgyal po chen po myig phyi bza kyis// tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces

140a4(mdo): rgyu grangs ma mchis pa dang / gcer bu las la tshogs pa thams cad zil kyis mnan te/ myi mdzes par gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'angs de'i slad ru/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rnams/

140a7(mdo): dag par bstan par gso yang// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyud myi 'chad pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su gzub dugs yod/ sems can thams cad yongs su byigyi gtang bar
140a8(mdo): gsol pa/ ji lta bu'i tshul gyis chos kyi tshul gyis phan gdags pa 'as/ mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba'i lam bstan par gso yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yang/ byang chub sems dpal sems/ 
140b1(mdo): dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge la 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / myi bral ba dang / 
140b2(mdo): bskyangs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can gyi slad du/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi dgongs pa rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du/ blo gso dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / don rtogs pa rjes su thob pa'i slad du/ rtogs pa ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 
140b3(mdo): rang gi sems yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ ngo tsha dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa'i las thams cad spong ba'i slad du/ khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / cho ga dang phun sum tshogs pa'i slad du brtan pa dang ldan
140b4(mdo): bar 'byung ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba'i slad du/ dpa' bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor thams cad kyi nang du bag tsha ba dang bral ba'i slad du/ sran thub par 'gyur bar mdzad mu ga so lang/ @
140b5(mdo): ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam sa bsod nams yongs su myi nyams pa dang / chos yongs su myi nyams pa dang / shes rab yongs su myi nyams pa dang // ye shes yongs
140b6(mdo): su rtsi nyams par 'gyur lags/ ji ltar na lhag pa'i bsam pa bton pas byang chub kyi sems kyi nyams pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i nga ma par thug kyi bar du sems can thams cad la mjal ba brtan pa dang / ji skad smras pa
140b7(mdo): de bzhin du bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du gnas pas/ sems can rnams la myi slu ba dang / gtong ba thams cad kyi rjes su bstand pa'i sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang / sdom pa gsum yongs
140b8(mdo): su dag pa la gnas pas/ ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / gnod sems myed pa'i yid kyis sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas/ ma bstand pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa dang / yongs su kyi skyor ba'i
141a1(mdo): yid kyis don thams cad ba sgrubs pas ma bstan dpa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa dang shes bzhin la mkhas te/ bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la myi gnas
141a2(mdo): bas/ ma bstand pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan pa dang / lta ba thams cad dang bral zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sa snang ba thob pas/ ma bstanang pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa dang / sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis
141a3(mdo): bsdu ba la shi nad tu 'artson pas/ bsdu ba shin tu bsdus pa dang / lha dang myi'i skye ba thams cad la/ myi rtag par yid la bgyi ba la/ brtson pas re ba ma mchis pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems la legs par gnas
141a4(mdo): nga / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa dang bral bas sgo'i them pa'i rten lta bu dang / chos kyi dbang du bgyid kyi 'dod pa'i dbang du gyi bgyid pa dang / chos kyi rgyal srid dom du gnyer bar bgyid
141a5(mdo): kyi/ su dang phyi'i rgyal srid dom du phyi gnyer ba dang / mam rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar 'gyur ba dang / chos kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur gyi/ zabazid kyis kyi 'tsho ba dang / yongs

141a7(mdo): bral bas gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bres pas/ bdud thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang / sgo thams cad la yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas/ thabs la mkhas par
141a8(mdo): 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol da pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po li bdag po sred myed kyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' saHlad to// sred byed kyi/
