146a8(mdo): rgyab sems dpa'i stobs thos nas/ bdag gi nga rgyal dang / dregs pa chag ste/ ma mchis par gyun/ lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge la 'dun gyi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// 
146b1(mdo): sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu mi 'dra ba de lta/ 
146b2(mdo): gu yang bdag gis thos par gyur dacig/ chan bi che chen po drim byed pa'i gzi brjid las lA'i bu khrim tshig 'di thos nas// bra ma byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// 'di skad du bcom ldan 'a
146b3(mdo): bdag cag kyang / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i stobs dang ldan par gyur da cig/ ces smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sred myed kyi bus
146b4(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das dkyis gang gi phyir bkal sams nas/ nab myi gsung bar gyur dang 'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams thams cad bskus pa zhes bgyi ba de gang
146b5(mdo): lags// bcom ldan 'das ci nas byang chub sems dpal rnams kyis bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzi dang thob par 'gyur ba'i slad dubasod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin bshad du gsol pa
146b6(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sred myed kyi bu la bka' sam pa pa/ sred myed kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
146b7(mdo): tu sems bskyed pa des/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa 'i ting pe 'dzin pa 'di yongs su ma bzung ba de ni gang yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad ni byang chub sems bskyed pa de'i
146b8(mdo): khongs su 'dus shing / rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir ro// sred myed kyi bu dper na u gyig thams cad dang / mtsho bran thams cad dang / mtshe la thams cad dang / chu thams cad dang / rgya bram thams cad dang / rgya mtsho tshon po la yongs su
147a1(mdo): 'dus shing / rjes su zhugs pa de bzhin du/ sred byed kyis ba rnams bya ba'i dngos pa mi ya bdung ba/ sbyin pa las byung ba rnams dang / tshul khrims las byung ba rnams dang / bsgom pa las byung ba rnams dang / 
147a2(mdo): zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / zag pa myed pa rnams dang / 'jig rtend pa rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang / lha rnams dang / myi rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i bsad nams bya ba'i dngos po ji snyed pa'i bsod nams
147a3(mdo): bya ba meng ma pa de thams cad ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyi khongs su tshub la 'dus shing / rjes su zhugs pa dag gang// sred byed kyi bu de'i phyir bso rnams thams cad yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi zhum/ 
147a4(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed parabya'o// sred myed kyi bu dper na/ rin po che ri chen po ka dag yin pa 'di lta ste/ lhun po chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang
147a5(mdo): bzung chen po dang / khor sug dang / khod yug chen po dang / gzhan yang ri na po rnams dang / rtsa dang / shing byes pa rnams dang sman dang / nags tshal thams cad dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / 
147a6(mdo): grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / 'dzam bu'i gling dang / shar gyi lus 'phags dang / nub kyi ba yang spyod dang / byar gyi sgra myi snyan dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / 
147a7(mdo): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams dang / zla ba dang / 
147a8(mdo): nyi ma dang / gzal dang / rgyu skad ji snyed yod pa nas/ kring chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brag brgya'i bar 'di dag thams cad ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khongs su 'dus shing / 
147b1(mdo): rjes su zhugs par bya ba de bzhin du/ sred byed kyi bu bsod nams rnams dang / slob pa'i bsod nams rnams dang / myi spo ba'i bsod nams rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams rnams dang / bya
147b2(mdo): kyi khams na thams cam byed pa 'ad pa de dag pams masacas sa sbyar ba'i ba'adadapas kyi spong ba da sa gyur te/ sems pa dems 'a 'os blang khyim gamamam
147b3(mdo): jal de ga bu'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur dang / med byed kyi bu 'di nyim du sems/ ci ma mngon mas kyi phung pa do ma dngas/ bya bachub sems dpa' med byed kyi bus gsa'ad / bcom ldan 'das mamams
147b4(mdo): sbyar ba rgyam po gcig gas sa dmas kyi lung mi ya la pa lagasad/ sems pan gradas ma gachis pa de dag gi so / mas ldan 'das kyis bgasas ma da / zed byed kyi zug slongs su
147b5(mdo): kyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa sems can du 'asku bar bsdus pa/ de dag re re nas 'khor lo sa sbyar ba'i bsod nams kyi bum po dang ldan pa'am/ stong gsum kyi thos me po
148a1(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa lta zhog go/ sred myed kyi bu gal te 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed kyi sems can gang dag yin pa
148a2(mdo): de dag thams cad 'khor lol sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur da na/ sred byed kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po mngangam/ byang chub sems dpa' sred byed kyi bus kaso yo sa
148a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das sems can gcig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / mnyam par gyurd pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang dpag tu me 'a mchis/ grangs ma mchis na/ sems can grangs ma mchis pa 'khom los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba
148a4(mdo): de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po lta smos kyang mi 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal saHlang ba/ sred myed kyi bu khyod mos par byas/ khong tu chud par byas te/ de bas na ses dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub seMs
148a5(mdo): dpa'i bsod nams kyi phung po yongs su bzung ba cher ma pal/ ches dpag tu byed do// 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni bsod nams kyi phung po de'i brgya'i cher yang myi bod/ stong ka cha
148a6(mdo): dang / 'bum kyi cha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i ma dang / bye ba phrag snod kyi ma dang / bye ba brag 'bum gyi chom sa gyi bod/ grangs dang / ma dang / bgrang ba dang / dpel dang rgyur yang myi bzod de/ sred byed kyis
148a7(mdo): 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang po'o// sred myed kyi bu ka zhan yang stong gi bdag po tshangs pa ni/ stong kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang bar byas te/ byams pas khyab par byed do// 
148a8(mdo): sred myed kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gal te myi la la zhig gis stong kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te/ sbyin pa byin na/ sred myed kyi bu sbyin pa las byung ba dang / byams pa las byung ba'i
148b1(mdo): bsod nams kyi phung po de nyis gang mang / byang chub sems dpa' sred byed kyi bus gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong gnyis kyi 'bradag po tshangs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa de nyid ches
148b2(mdo): mang gye/ sbyin pa las byung ba ni de lta ma lags so// sred myed kyi bu stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i bu bsod nams kyi phu po lta zhog gi/ sred byed kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ stong gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pas/ stong gsum
148b3(mdo): ga chen pa'i 'jig rten gyimams thams pas rnam par byed pa/ med byed kyi kyil la zhig gis stong gsum kyig paben pan yog rten kyi kham ma na pa lnga bdun gyis gang bar byas te/ sbyin pa byinas/ phre byed kyi
148b4(mdo): pa las byung ba' dang / tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bso/ da nams kyi phung po gnyis gang mang/ byang chub sems dpa' sredamyed kyi bus gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa las byub ba'i bsod
148b5(mdo): nams kyi phung po ni/ tshangs pa chen po'i byims pa' dang ldan pa'i bsodanams kyi phung po'o// brgya'i char yang myi phod pa nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
148b6(mdo): maHla pa/ sred myed kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshangs pa chen po la byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta zhog gi/ sred myed kyi bu ka lad te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas
148b7(mdo): kyi sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa'i ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/ tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa// bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyu rad pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni// 
148b8(mdo): sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su grol ba la mtshon pa/ g.yo myed cing sgyu myed pa'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nas
149a1(mdo): kyi phung po gapa yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di nyid de pas ches mang ste/ tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de ni/ byang chub sems dpal de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang byi bod pa nas/ 
149a2(mdo): rgya'i bar du yang gyi bzod pa// sred byed kyi bu de ga na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang rgyu sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni dpag tu byed pa yin te/ sred byed kyi bu nam grangs 'dis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
149a3(mdo): bu mo gang dag gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / skyed par 'gyur ba de dag gis bsod nams thams cad yongs su bsdus pa de ltar rig par bya ste/ sred myed kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad
149a4(mdo): bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'dag pa gnyis pa'o// sred byed kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig da yod/ lho dang nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs
149a5(mdo): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig yod/ byang chub sems dpa' sred myed kyi bus so la pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma ma chis so// bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so// phyogs bcu
149a6(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni brjod pa'i/ brda ba sprad par rngo rgya thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sachal dab/ sred myed kyi bu gal te dper blang ba bstan pas/ bstan pa 'bum gyi bar du bstarang bas
149a7(mdo): skas dpa 'bus kyi bar du bskradad du zis kyang / phyogs bcun 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed yod pa ni bstanang bar sla ba ma yin no// sred byed kyi bu 'on kyang don 'di nyid brdal bsrad pa dang / bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i
149a8(mdo): ting nge 'dzand yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can bsod nams 'dod pa rnams phyir zhi ba 'bogs pa bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i sems can gyi ba thom 'grus chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya/ 
149b1(mdo): pa'i phyir/ ngas khyod la dpes bstand to// sred myed kyi dper na myi la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams/ 'di chu'i phung po yan chad srid pa'i rtse mo man chad yongs su nyungs 'brus gang bar byas la sred myed kyi bu de yas/ 
149b2(mdo): shar phyogs su nyungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ yungs 'bru gcig bor te/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis yungs 'brung dag thams cad yongs 'bru de dag thams cad yongs su zad par byas pa/ shar
149b3(mdo): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par myi nus so// lho dang na ba dang byang dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu'i kun tu sbyar ro/ sred byed kyi bu gas te 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klud kyi bye ma snyed yungs
149b4(mdo): 'brus yongs su gang bar byur das / debs phyis sa nig gas sungs 'bru rer yang yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi rang gses dam/ sred byed kyi bu 'di'i snyam du sems// yungs 'bru'i chang gces
149b5(mdo): de dag 'grang ba'i rgyas gyis las 'artogs pa nus sam/ bya sems dpa' sred byed kyi zhus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yungs 'bru gcig gi chagases pa'i mag bsags pa de yang / gling ba'i
149b6(mdo): pa'i sems can thams cad sha ri'i bu dang / 'dra bar gyur da pas kyang / skal bar yang rtogs par rngo myi thog lags na/ yungs 'bru'i chas gses pa' thams cad lta smos kyang mi 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlnga
149b7(mdo): pa// sred byed kyi bu la la zhig gis shar phyogs kyi yungs 'bru'i chag ses pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ yungs 'bru'i a ga ses pa re re khor te/ sred myed kyi bu de lta bu'i tshul gyis yungs 'bru'i cha
149b8(mdo): gses pa thams cad zad par byas kyang / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi mthal rtogs par myi nus so// lho dang nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs bcu'i kum du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro// sred da
150a1(mdo): kyi bu de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkhal songasu khyab pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyil la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te/ sbyin pa byim na/ sred byed kyi bu 'di ji snyam byas sa
150a2(mdo): myi de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ byang chub sems dpa' sred byed kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka las masad
150a3(mdo): sred myed kyi bu de lta bu 'i sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ g.yo myed pa/ sku myed pa/ 
150a4(mdo): sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol la la bcon pa'i snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen po bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma'i brgya'i char yang kyi bod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// 
150a5(mdo): sred myed kyi bu dper na/ gzugs kyi rnam pa nam mkha'i khamasakyis ma khyab pa ci yang skyed la de bzhin du/ sred myed kyi bu dang zhan du byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa
150a6(mdo): des ni/ phyogs bcu li 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhi ba ji snyed pa/ de dag ma khyab pa gang yang myed de/ 'jig rten gi khams de dag na/ sems can 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i
150a7(mdo): byams pas yongs su khyab bo// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag sems can du bsdus pas bsdus pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyu rad ta ma/ de bzhin
150a8(mdo): du brgya byin gyis bsad nams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyu ra da ta ma/ de bzhin du tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyu rad kyang / byang chub sems dpal lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ g.yo myed pa
150b1(mdo): sgyu myed pa/ sems can yongs su dgrol ba la brtson pa/ snying rje chen po la zhugs pa/ byams pa chen po la gnas pa'i gom pa bdun la bsod nams kyi phung po bsdus pa gapa yin pa de ni de/ de las ches ma pa ste/ sems can
150b2(mdo): thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de na mi yin no// sred myed kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzi ring la 'jug pa gsum
150b3(mdo): ba'o// sred myed kyi bu gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba dang / mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldam par gyur da kyang
150b4(mdo): de dag thams cad ni bas byin kyi las rnams kyi phung po 'i rgya ma yang myi ma pa lnga/ rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// sred bye kyi bu ba gsum gyi stob chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems cam
150b5(mdo): ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad brgya byin dang / mnyam pa'i bso// da nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur da kyang / de dag tha mas cad ni tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang
150b6(mdo): myi phod pa nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// sred myed kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po dang / mnyam kha'i bsod nams kyi phu
150b7(mdo): po dang ldan par gyur kyang / de dag thams cad dge bsnyen nag po'i mchog gi bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang gyi bong pa nas/ rgya'i bar du yang myi bzod do// sred byed kyi bul stong gsum gyi stong rje
150b8(mdo): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge bsnyen dag po'i mchog dang/ mnyam pa 'i bsod nams kyi phu gi dang ldan par gyur kyang / de dag thams cad mi sha ra'i bu'i zhes rab nga / 
151a1(mdo): ye shes dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs phung po'i brgya'i char yang myi bod pa nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do/ sred myed kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can tha
151a2(mdo): snyed pa de dag thams cad sha ril bu dang mnyam pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur da kyang / de dag thams cad mi rang sangs rgyas gcig gi shes rab dang / ye shes dang / bsod nas
151a3(mdo): kyi phung po la'i rgya'i char yang gyi bong ba nas/ rgyu'i bar yu yang gyi bzod do// sred byed kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chem po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi shes dang / 
151a4(mdo): be shes dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur nas kyang de thams cad ni/ byang chug sems dpa' sems dpa chen po nges par byung das/ gas pa lnga brgya lon pa'i shes rab da
151a5(mdo): ye shes dang / bsod nams kyi phung po brgya'i tshar yang myi bor ba na sa/ rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// thams cad la de bzhin du sbyar te/ sred byed kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i
151a6(mdo): ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa bzhi pa'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ gyi sum khri bzhi stob kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi
151a7(mdo): 'bas 'dis pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// lha dang phyi'i sil snyan dag kyang grag go// lA dang myi'i me tog gi sprin dag kya bab ste/ me tog gi spri ni dag gis ma chen po 'di mu la drub shu le du bkram mo/ lha dang
151a8(mdo): klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang / tshig 'di skad
151b1(mdo): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / skyed par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag gis ni/ bdag cag zil dgyes
151b2(mdo): gnad to// mam ldan 'das bdag ngag ni sems can de dag ga do byasrid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mdan bdag gis 'tshal dab sangs/ sems can kang dag bla ma byed pa lab das/ 
151b3(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma zhugs pa de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzind las mngon par byung ba yang ma lags/ de dag thams cad ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzind 'di la/ 
151b4(mdo): yang dag par gzhol pa yang ma lags kyi// bcom ldan 'das gang dgagyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i
151b5(mdo): ting nge 'dzin las mngon par byung ba yang ma lags/ de dag thas sa cad mi bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la yang dag par gzhol ba yang ma lags so// / le'u dang por// 
151b6(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das la chen po chen po dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// / bcom ldan 'das bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzind 'di thob par bgyid pa'i chos
151b7(mdo): rnams gang lags// de skad ces gsosad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chen po che chen po rna mi byed pa'i gzi brjid la 'di skad ces bstsa yod to// rigs kyi bu bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ti'i nge 'dzin da 'jog
151b8(mdo): par byed pa'i chos kacig ste// gcig gang zhe ma/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems kyi gtong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos kan po 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzind 'thob par byed
152a1(mdo): bam// gas kyi bu gnam sa bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa ma ting pe mdzin 'dib ba par byed pa mtshas gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mnyan 'ams yongs su thos pas chog kyi zhes
152a2(mdo): ba dang / ji ltar zas pa'i chom sa tshus bzhin sums brtag ste/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di gnyis ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzham yab bsod nams thams cad bsus
152a3(mdo): pa tong nge mdzin de thob pa'i chos gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sdig pa thams cad yongs su spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yongs su sngo ba la mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi ru
152a4(mdo): chos gsum pa de dag mi bsod nams thams cad 'asum mama'i 'dzin 'dom ba par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bso/ da nams thams cad bskus pa'i ti nge 'dzin da 'dithob par byed pa'o
152a5(mdo): nis/ ga shes 'dzin/ ma po mdud/ dang / pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs sudang / shes rapa yongs su dag pa de/ rigs kyi tshu ma mam
152a6(mdo): dag ni/ bsod napas mams par 'akrus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'das par byed pa zhams lnga ga zhe na/ 'dis ste/ sdug pa'i bsas pas/ byang chub bzhugs pa dang / ngag tu bden pa'i tshig sA pa dang / 
152a7(mdo): g.yo byed pa dang / ba tog byed pa dang / sems ca thams cad la sems snyoms pa ste/ rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag ni lasod nabs thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin da 'di thob par byed pa'o// / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
152a8(mdo): bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin da 'di thob par byed pa'i chos drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnye rang pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spang ba dang / tshogs kyi khamyi 'dren pa dang / 
152a9(mdo): rgya gnas ya bso mngam pang 'ardzus pa mi ma pa'i ma 'a thol par khyim pa sechis lnga // 
152b1(mdo): dben pa'i gnas na gnas pa dang / byams pa chen po mI gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos drug po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i tong nge 'dzin da 'di thob par byed pa'o// rigs
152b2(mdo): kye bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa mi chos bdun ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas yongs su tshol ba dang / lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / rgya yongs su zhes pa dang / 
152b3(mdo): rte nad cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / yang dag par bslab pa dang / lal gyi tshogs yongs su tshos pa dang / lam bsgom pa le lo myed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu bdun po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting
152b4(mdo): 'dzirib 'di thob par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod rnams thams cad bsdus pa'i ti bi pe 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus khas su rung ba nyi
152b5(mdo): dang / sems las su rung ba nyid dang / tshor ba la so sor rtog pa nyid dang / chos la lta ba nyid dang / sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa la rnams myi skyed pa dang / sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba dang / 
152b6(mdo): dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa dang / dge ba'i chos rnams skyes pa rnams ku mnas bsrung zhing / yongs su sbyong pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos brgyad po de dag ni/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzinang 'di thob
152b7(mdo): par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu ka' mkhang chos thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa 'di thob par byed pa'i chos dgu ste/ dku gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa kyi zad pa'i chos nyid dang / ma 'ongs pa bya zad pa'i chos nyid
152b8(mdo): da ltar byung ba myi zad pa'i chos nyid du so sor rtog pa dang / sgyu ma'i chos la so sor rtog pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / chos thams cad la ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa dang / stong pa
153a1(mdo): nyid spong ba dang / mtshan ma myed pa rnam par bsgoms nas/ smond pa byed pa dang bral pa dang / bsams bzhin du med par skye ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos dgu pa de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa
153a2(mdo): mtshanas byad pa rnam par bskams pas/ 'dibab par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yab bsod dpas thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dathob par byed pa michos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di sa ste/ bdag myed pa la mos pa
153a3(mdo): dang / brag byed pa la yod pa dang / gang zag byed pa la gcig tu nges pa dang / myi rtag pa la yid ches pa dang / skye ba thams cad la sems can dmyal bar 'du shes pa dang / phung po rnams la gshed sar 'du shes pa dang // thams
153a4(mdo): rnams la sprul gdug par 'du shes pa dang / skye mched rnams la grong nga bar 'du shes pa dang / srid pa rnams las nges par 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang / rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo rnams la nges par 'du shes pa ste// rigs
153a5(mdo): kyi bu chos bcu po 'di dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge rje nad 'di thob par byed pa'o// de skad ces bka' sa chalang ba dang bcom ldan 'das la tshan po che chen po dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid kyis
153a6(mdo): 'di skad ces gam song ngo // bcom ldan 'das bsod rams kyi tshogs yang dag par bsdu bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen pos bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzidang 'di mnyam par bgyi'o// 
153a7(mdo): bsod nams thams cad baphags par 'tshalang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// bsod nams bsam gyis myi khyab par thob par
153a8(mdo): 'tshalang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// mos par bgyi'o// bsod nams myi zad pa thob par 'tshalang ba'i byang chub sems dpal
153b1(mdo): sems dpa' chen pos ting pe 'dzin 'di la 'dzin par bgyi'o// bsod nams rgya mtsho thob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzind 'di la gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bshad par
153b2(mdo): bgyi'o// bsod dmas brgya'i mtshad yongs su bzung ba yangal ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting pe 'ang ring 'di bsgom pa'i rdul 'byor dal brtson par bgyi'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la chan pa
153b3(mdo): chen po dri mi myed pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par brtson pa 'di lta ste/ bsod nams myi zad pa dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho dang / 
153b4(mdo): bsod nams bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / bsod nams mchog sa pa dang / bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis chos 'di dag ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol
153b5(mdo): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chen po che chen po dri ma myed pa'i kazi brjid la 'di skad ces bka' mcha yang to// rigs kyi bu gsum po 'di dag ni bsod nams nye bar rtond pa dang / 
153b6(mdo): bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / bsod nams 'dru ba dang / bsod nams rgyas pa dang / bsod nams myi zad pa dang / bsod nams pasam gyis myi khyab pa dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho yani te/ gsum gang zhen
153b7(mdo): 'di lnga ste sbyin pa'i tshogs dang / tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang / zas pa'i tshogs so// rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i tshogs la ji ltar brtson par bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
153b8(mdo): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dngos po ga pa la de gtong ba'i sems myi skye zhing // gtong ba'i blo mya'i byung ba'i dngos po de blang bar myi bya'o// yongs su gzung ba gang la btang ba'i sems kyi
154a1(mdo): ma gdus sas su gzung rgya'o// ngam spong ba rnams kyis spangs na yongs su 'dzin pa' gro skye ba'i g.yon 'khor de gzung bar myi byam/ dngas po ka
154a2(mdo): slong ba rnams kyis/ bslangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' myi gtong ba'i blo skye bar gyur da pa'i rgyal srid de blang bar myi bya'o// longs spyod de dag dang / nor de dag dang / rdzas de dag dang / rin po che de dag
154a3(mdo): blang bar myi bya ba nas// de lta bu'i dngos po co yang rung ba'i bar blang bar myi bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gi us/ 'di yang
154a4(mdo): sems can thams cad la gtang ste/ yongs su btabs phyi rol kyi dngos po rnams lta ci smos snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gzhan yang sems can kang dang / gapal dngos po gang gis dgos pa
154a5(mdo): ka ka byed par 'gyur ba de yod na/ de dang de la de myi \u0f7f/ 'ab myed pa dang / 'gyod pa myed par sbyin par bya ste/ lag 'dod pa rnams la la ka pa yang sbyin mo// rkang pa 'dod pa rnams la
154a6(mdo): rkang pa dang / myig 'dod pa rnams la myika kyang sbyin no/ sha 'dod pa rnams la sha dang / khrag 'dod pa rnams la khA ka dang / rkang 'dod pa rnams la rkang dang / yan lag dpa nyid lag 'dod pa rnams la yan lag
154a7(mdo): dang nyid lag dang / 'go bo 'dod pa rnams la 'go bo yongs su gtang bar bya na/ phyi rol kyi dngos po 'di lta ste/ nor dang / 'bru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / rgyan dang / rta dang / glang po che dang
154a8(mdo): shing rta dang / bzhon pa dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / tshong dus dang / ri 'or ba dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / 
154b1(mdo): bu dang bu mo das/ chung ma dang / 'khor rnams lta mi smos/ gzhan yang sems can gang dang gang la gang dang gang gyis don byed pa pa 'gyur pa de dang de yod na/ de dang de la dngos po de sbyin par bya ste/ myi dga'
154b2(mdo): ba myed pa dang / 'gyod pa myed pa dang / rnam par spyo nad pa la myi re bar yongs su btang bar bya'o/ myi lta bar sbyin par bya'o// gzhan du na sems can la phan gdags pa dang / sems can la snyi rje ba dang / 
154b3(mdo): sems can la snying rtse pa dang / sems can de dag nyid bsdu ba'i phyir bya bar zad do// bdag gis byang chub thob na/ ci nas sems can 'di dag chos kun rtogs pa myu dad cig/ snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rigs
154b4(mdo): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gangasu dag de ltar sems bskyed par byed pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srogs yang gyi lta ba
154b5(mdo): yin te/ de ni srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du rgya byed do// lus rtas par bya ba'i phyir yang ba'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar gyi byed do// de ni srog gi phyir la pa gzhan la spong khro mya byed
154b6(mdo): yongs spyod kyi phyir myi dge ba'i mngon par 'du kyi byed do// g.yog 'khor gyi byir yang rjod pa dpa' zab mo slong bar myi byed do// chungs dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams kyi phyims bgazha dag la yab 'dzi
154b7(mdo): par myi byed do// gzhan gyi lo gyong dag la yang brnab sems bskyed par myi byed/ sem sna'i sems skyed par myi byed do// de ni 'dod pa nyung ste/ sems bskyed pa gcig kyang dge ba dang gyi ldan pa skyed par gyi
154b8(mdo): byed na/ mang po ste ma thos/ de de lta bcos na/ 'dod chen dang / chags pa spob bar 'gyur ro/ 'do chen dang chags pa spangs nas/ btsal bar bya 'a tshos par myi byed do// bcas par bya ba rgya chos da
155a1(mdo): yang dag pa la brtson par myi 'gyur ro// yang dag pa la brtson na yang dag par 'gro ba thob par 'gyur ro/ yang dag par song ma yang dag pa'i bsgrub pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa la zhugs na/ 
155a2(mdo): yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams mnyes par byed do// yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bzhes gnyen rnams mnyes par byas nas/ sbe dad par byed/ 'grogs par byed/ bsnyen bkur byed do// de dge ba'i bshes gnyen nas
155a3(mdo): rang bgad cing 'grogs pa bsnyen bkur byed pa/ dge ba'i bzhes gnyen rnams las yang dag par nges pa'i chos rnams thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang bsgrub par byed de/ de yang dag pa ma chos la zhugs nas/ log par
155a4(mdo): A la la gnas pa'i/ bams can rnams kyi da mams cad byed pa 'gyur ro// de sems cad kyi na sa bso ma/ byi rigs par srung bar gyi 'gyur ro// de rigs pas zhugs ma'adas ste/ sems can
155a5(mdo): rnams kyi dbang po masog dang / mchog ma sod pa zhes pa dang / tshu ma yin pas mkhas pa thob par 'gyur te// rigs kyi bu des/ ma sbyin pa'i tshogs la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni som tan
155a6(mdo): kyi byung bar de ga bu dag thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bugazhanas pabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen pas ni na dang phyirol gyi chos rnams la gcig 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// gnyis kyi 'bru shes bskyed par gyi
155a7(mdo): bya ste/ nad gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus 'di ni pha dang shing dang / cig pa dang / lam snang ba dang / 
155a8(mdo): 'dra ste/ gyod pa myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa sems pa myed pa/ snying po myed pa/ khams kyis bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro// gal te 'di la la la zhig gis bcad dam/ btubs sam/ dbyug pa 'am/ mtshon ma
155b1(mdo): shi pangam/ bong bas bsdud kyang rung ste/ de dag la bdag gis tshor bdi rnam par rig pa bskyed par myi bya'o// lus la blta bar myi bya'o// sems can de dag la yang za ba dang sdang ba'i sems bskyed par myi bya'o// snyam pa'i steng du/ 
155b2(mdo): des sems can de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dper na/ sman gyi shing ljon pa ni 'am pa las khyer ram/ sdong po 'am yal ka 'am/ shum pags sam/ lo ma 'am/ me tog gam/ 'bras bu'i
155b3(mdo): snying po las khyer pa 'an/ 'di snyam du bdag gi pa khyed la sdong po ma khyer cig me 'am/ bdag gi sdong po khyer ya ba ma khyer cag rtse 'am/ bdag gi yal ga khyer kha lo ma mkhyer cig rtse 'am/ bdag gi lo ma khyed la yal ga ma
155b4(mdo): khyer cig cig ce'am/ de bzhin du bdag ga yal ga dang / ze'ud/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang/ shun pags dang / snying po las mkhyer cig me'am/ bdag gi snying po myed pa las khyim sa/ d+hi
155b5(mdo): po las ma khyer cig snyam du rtog par ma byed de/ de ltar na sman gyi sdom pa ni thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par rtog par myi byed mo kyi/ 'on kyang slam gyi shing ljon pa ni/ rnam par gyi rtog bzhin du/ 
155b6(mdo): dadang ba dang / 'brib dang / pham sel bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'byung ba la chen po bzhi 'i lus 'dis sman gyi shing ljon pa lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// ses
155b7(mdo): nag ga sa cid cidags pa der ring bzhin sa khyerd cig a b+han+ta/ lag pa 'dod pas ni / rnapa pa 'dod pa paninas/ ga 'dod pa lam chog/ 'dod pa pa ga/ than 'dod pa pa na
156a1(mdo): gcan mchogs na byung byal byo mi su bathob /

156b1(mdo): bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzham yang byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pas nye bar brtend par bya ba'i phyir zad par myi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa ji lta ba zad par 'gyur/ 
156b2(mdo): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan pa rnams kyi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yongs su ma bsngos pa dang // thabs kyi mkhas
156b3(mdo): ba dang / dma' bar skye bar 'dod pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po ste nad pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa rnams kyi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'

156b5(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / chos kyi rgyal srid 'dod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ste na da pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

156b7(mdo): byin par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems myi gtong ba dang / sems can la snying che ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang / myi 'gal ba dang / chos dang zang zad kyi sbyin pa'i
156b8(mdo): rnam par smyin pa la myi re ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen pos chos gsum po de dag mngon du byas la/ sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
157a1(mdo): sems dpa' chen pos sems can rnams chos gsum la dgod pa'i phyir/ sbyin 'byin par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad byang chub la dgod pa dang / chos bstand pa de nyid la
157a2(mdo): dgod pa dang / sems can thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bde ba la dgod pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu chos gsum po de dag la sems can rnams dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
157a3(mdo): sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gnyis 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin par spyan kya gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spyod pa chen po dang / gtong ba'i sems te/ chos de

157a5(mdo): sbyin pa byin par bya'o ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa dang / ser sna ste/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di gnyis yongs su snga nga ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin
157a6(mdo): bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhes/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab dang / ye shes te// 
157a7(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos 'di gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chem pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzham yang chos gnyis gob par bya ba'i phyir byangangang ba sos
157a8(mdo): dpal sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o ste// gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste zad pa shes pa dang / myi skye ba shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di gnyis thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
157b1(mdo): ba tsun pa dang / latu bcwo ba'i sbyin pa dang / 'dang // nye ni pa mangs su rdzogs pa dgas kyi tsu pa pan pa da na/ 
157b2(mdo): mam me pa dmas rgyas bya ba dan go// rigs kyi bums pas/ byang chub sems dang 'onams rgya zad pas mngon par 'byung bar 'dod pas/ rnyeng pamachag sa 'dis ma
157b3(mdo): la bcon par bya'o// de skad ces bkalas ma dpa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshan po che chen po rdzi ma byed pa'i gzi brjid kyi/ sa/ 'di skad ces gsosad to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
157b4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i tshogs 'di bka' saHla dpa/ po mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
157b5(mdo): chen po gang dag sbyin pa'i tshogs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni rnams kyang bsod nams yongs su nyams pa 'os/ ye shes yongs su nyams pa 'am/ shes rab yongs su nyams par gyi 'khyer lags so// bcom ldan
157b6(mdo): 'das kyis ba sa ma pa / rigs kyi na de can do// khyo dang skad per ba bzhin te/ byang chub sas dpa' sems dpal chen po gang dag sbyin pa mtshogs 'di lta bu dang ldan pas/ de dag ni bsad napas phyi med pa dang
157b7(mdo): bsod nams rgya mtsho mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pas dbul por yang myi 'gyur ro// de dag ni chos kyi chun dang ldan pas/ long spyod chen por yang 'gyur ro// 
158a1(mdo): de dag nor bdun dang ldan pas phyug por yang 'gyur ro// de dag bsod nams brgya'i mtshan yod pas/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa yang yin no// de dag ni sems can thams cad
158a2(mdo): nye bar 'tsho bas bsod nams kyi zhing yang yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis chen po che chen po mi myed pa 'i gzi brjid la gzhan yang bka' saHmed pa/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul
158a3(mdo): khrims kyi tshogs gang zhe na/ kang tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / bslab pa yongs su myi rtong pa dang / tshul khrims 'amadzad pa rnams la snying rje ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la gus pa grag po dang ldan
158a4(mdo): pa dang / lus kyi yan lag gsum yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gin lag bzhi yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi ya ma lag gsum yongs su dag pa dge la bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blang ba rjes
158a5(mdo): su grub pa ste/ gzhan dag kyang des 'dzud pa dang / de dag 'dodabar byed pa dang / bdag la gyi stong pa dang / gzham la gyi smon pa dang / tshul khrims dag langang tshul can du gyu da pa dang / 
158a6(mdo): tshul khrims kyis myi rlom pa dang / brtson pa myi 'dor ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsgyangs pa dag las/ myi g.yo ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs gnas par byed pa dang / rang gi sems srungs
158a7(mdo): da/ gnas kyi 'khrub pa dgas skyon na gyi lta ba dang / sdig pa thams cad kyi byed pa dang / srid pa mngon par grub pas mngon par myi dga' ba dang / gzhan rnams dge ba'i nga bdag la 'dzud pa dang / 
158a8(mdo): gzhan gyi bya ba dag la pa dang / 'di 'dag pa mi can du gyi 'gyur ba dang / dgon par gnas pa rtso 'dom 'dang / dad pa dmas kyig sog byed pa nga/ sa nas kyang dgam pa dang / chog tud nam par byang/ 
158b1(mdo): ngan man na byed pa dang / du byed padag pa dang na medad pa dang/ bzung byed pa rnams pa byangs par gyi byed pa/ rnyed pa dang / marnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pas/ 'an pa dang / 
158b2(mdo): da / sun pa da ma tha pa kyi byung / nus 'angs kyi 'byung ba dang / sa su chags pa dang / mdzin pa song pa dang / tshan du 'dzind pa dang / rtag tu phyu gyi 'chad pam
158b3(mdo): pa la gnas pa dang / mja' shes pa dang / dgra rnams la sems snyoms par lta ba dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po la mchog tu gyi 'dzind pa dang / theg pa gzhan du yongs su kyi sngo ba dang / lha gzhan la phyag myi 'tshal ba
158b4(mdo): lte bar gyur da pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / bka la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba rnam par gnon pa dang / 'gyod pa spong ba dang / yid la gcag pa myed pa dang / dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong pa la
158b5(mdo): mchog tu dga' ba dang / skye ba'i gnas thams cad la lhag par chags ba myed pa dang / bsams bzhin du srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba dang / myi dga' ba la bzod pa dang / bcom 'grus chom pa dang / 
158b6(mdo): sems rab tu 'dzind pa dang / dbyigs pa la rnam par g.yengs pa myed pa dang / mye skye ba la bzod cing myi skrag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na 'di byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi tshogs yon te/ tshul khrims kyi
158b7(mdo): tshogs de la brten nas/ srog kyi phyir yang bslab pa nyams par myi byed de/ de ni rgyal srid kyi phyir tshul khrims srung bar byed do// mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/ rgya byin du 'gyur ba'i phyir ma yin/ longs spyod kyi phyir
158b8(mdo): yis/ dbang phyug gi phyi ma yin/ kha tog gi phyir ma yin/ grags pa'i phyi ma ma yin/ snyad pa dang / skra dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin/ rnyed pa'i phyir ma yin/ bkur sti'i byor ma som/ srog gi phyi
159a1(mdo): ma yin/ gos kyi phyir sa yin/ zas kyi phyir ma yin/ mal cha dang stan gyi phyir ma yin te/ ne ba'i gso sman dang / spar zong kyi phyir/ tshul khrims srung bar myi byed do// myig dang / rdza ba dang / 
159a2(mdo): sA dngab bye dang lus la brten te/ tshul khrims srung bar myi byed do// gzugs dang / skra dang / rje dang / ro dang re sa phyu sa rtend te/ tshul khrims srung bar byed // gzugs la brten te tshul khrims srung bar myi byed do// 
159a3(mdo): tshang ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la brten te/ tshul khrims sru bar gyi byed do/ 'dod pa'i khams la brten te tshul khrims srung bar byed do// gzugs kyi khams la brten te tshul khrims
159a4(mdo): srung bar gyi byed do// gzugs myed pa'i khams la brten te tshul / mas srung bar myi byed do/ sems can dmyal las sAka ste/ na tshul khrims srung bar gyi byed do/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs/ 
159b1(mdo): grub pa dang bde ba 'dang de/ rgyala'i mas srung bar byed do// sangs rgyas kyang sa gnas par 'do da / rgyal khrims srung bar bya dang / chos kyi 'thar ma bskang ba 'dang de 'tshul khrims srung bar byed do/ 'phags pa'i ge 'dus
159b2(mdo): yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir tshul khrims srub bar byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhingab myi chad par 'dod pa dang / chos gyi rigs myi 'chad par 'dod pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs kyi 'chang bar 'dod de/ tshul khrims srung bar byed do// 
159b3(mdo): 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi yongs su spyad par 'dod de/ tshul khrims srung b.rabyed do// lha'i mngon par shes pa 'dod pa dang / ting nge 'chi nad 'dod pa dang / shes rab 'dod pa dang / rnam par grol ba 'dod pa dang / 
159b4(mdo): rnam par grol ba 'i ye shes mthong ba 'dod de/ tshul khrims srung bar byed do// rdzu 'phrul 'dod pa dang / mo 'phrul 'dod de/ tshul khrims srung bar byed do// de'i tshul khrims de yang ma nyams pa dang / ma zhig pa dang / 
159b5(mdo): ma 'dres pa dang / ma 'chol ba dang / dbang ba pa yod pa dang / legs par tshar byind pa dang / legs par bsams pa dang / mnogs pa dang / ma myed pa dang / gtsang ba dang / dri zhim pa dang / mkhas pas bsngags pa dang / 
159b6(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa dang / ma spad pa dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa'i snying por byed pa yin mo/ de tshul khrims kyi phung po de lta bu dang ldan pa'as chos bcu las nyams par myi 'gyur te/ des ya
159b7(mdo): bcu gang zhe na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la sa yongs su nyams par gyi 'gyur te/ de la yang bag yod la byang chub 'dod pa dang / brgya byin las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur te/ de la yang bag yod la byang chub 'dod cing
160a1(mdo): sangs rgyas mamong ba 'ab zhig 'dod pa dang / mangs pa las yongs su nyams par gyi 'gyur te/ de la yang bag yod la byang chub 'dod pa dang / shes nas dad pa thob par bya ba phyir sangs rgyas mthob sa las yongs su
160a2(mdo): thamamasams du un sa bya mams sas sangs su nyams pa kyi 'gyur pas/ byang chub ses pa dag sa bcas pazhes pa las yangs su nyams pa kyi pa dang / dan
160a3(mdo): rtsa ba'i chos thams cad shes pa/ 'dod pa'i phyir spobs pa myi chod pa las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / byang chub
160a4(mdo): sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsngags pa las yongs su nyams par gyi 'gyung ba rab/ mngon par shes pa ltung ba dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i yin/ sa yong su rdzogs par bya ba las yongs su nyams par gyi 'gyur ba dang / 
160a5(mdo): tshul khrims kyi phung po de lta bu dang ldan pa'i 'duchu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni chos bcu po de dag lus yongs su nyams par gyi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi phung po de lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub
160a6(mdo): sems dpa' mams dpa' chen pa la lha rnams kyis rtag tu phyag byas pa'i sar mo// klu rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags pa yin no/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis rtag tu bkur sti byas pa yin no// ri ma rnams kyis rtag tu mchad pa
160a7(mdo): yin no// klu'i dbang po dang lha ma yin rnams kyis rtag tu pa cho pa yin bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no// rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis rtag tu bkur ba yin no// mkhas pa/ 
160a8(mdo): rnams kyis rtag tu tha dad du 'gro bar bya ba yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs pa yin no// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rtag tu ston par bkur ba yin no// sems can thams cad la snying che ba zhin// 
160b1(mdo): mag par 'grangs kyang sa bams dpa' thams sa na pa ma 'gos pa'ang 'gro #/ sas du byim par #

160b8(mdo): 'brad par myi 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa dang / 'brang bar myi 'gyur ba dang / mtshon gyi bar gyi skal pa dang phrad bar myi 'gyur la dang / mu ke 'i bar gyi skam pa dang phrad ba
161a1(mdo): phyi 'gyur ba dang / nad kyi bar gyi skal ba dang phrad par myi 'gyur ba ste// tshogs kyi bu de ltar yul khrims tshul khrims kyi phung po yang dag par srung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi rnam par
161a2(mdo): 'jig pa bzhi po de dag dang drang bar gyi 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu ga 'ang ya rtul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par mtho ba ba'i thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhem/ 
161a3(mdo): 'di lta ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la myi slu ba dang / lnga la myi slu ba dang / sems can rnams la myi sku ba dang / rang gi sems myi slu ba dang / de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
161a4(mdo): dpa' sems dpal chen po mngon par mtho ba na po de dag 'job pa 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzham yang de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po sa gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' so se da chen 'i/ 'jigs
161a5(mdo): pa bcu las yang dag par 'da' ra 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'dal bar 'gyur ba dang / dud 'grol skye gnas kyi 'jin/ 
161a6(mdo): ba las yang dag par 'dal bar 'gyur ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang / dbul po'i 'jigs pa yas yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang / bsngags pa/ 
161a7(mdo): dang / snyand pa dang / grags pa dang / skra dang / tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa dang / bdud kyis kun nas dkris pa'i 'jigs pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa'i 'jigs pa da
161a8(mdo): lha dang / klu dang / kand sbyin dang / drin dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gyi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / srin pa ma 'jigs pa dang / drug dang / mtshon dang / me dang /

161b3(mdo): 'jigs bcu po de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rten ni tshul khrims yin te/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas so// 
161b4(mdo): gang la tshul khrims yod pa de li/ ting nge 'dzinang 'di yod do// gang / la tshul khrims yod pa de la ni shes rab 'di yod do// tshul khrims yod pa de la ni rnam par grol la 'di yod do// gangal tshul
161b5(mdo): khrims yod pa de la ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba 'di yod do// rigs kyi bu de la gang nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi ba'i tshul khrims ni gang yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa rnams
161b6(mdo): shes bya zhe na/ nyon mongs par byed pa na// nyon mongs pa rnams te/ 'di ltar khams gsum du sems can rnabs nyon mongs par byed pas na/ nyon mongs pa rnams shes bya'o// de dag zhi bar byed pa gang zhe na/ 
161b7(mdo): kang rtog pa myed pa dang / rnam par rtog pa myed pa dang / yongs su rtog pa myed pa dang / rgya ba byed pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / kun tu rtog pa myed pa dang / yid la byed pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs
161b8(mdo): pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag nyon mongs par rab tu zhi ba myi zhes pa de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po ni/ yongs su dag pa ma yin no// 
162a1(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhes/ de dag ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du song yang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa bzod do// de dag ni srid pa'i rtse mor yang nyon mongs pa dang bcas par bzod do// rigs kyi bu de bas na rnam
162a2(mdo): grangs 'dis kyang khyod kyis/ gangal khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams myed pa de'i tshul khrims kyi phung po mi yongs su dag pa yin par de ltar rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldam 'das la chen po che la chen po rnga ma
162a3(mdo): byed pa'i kazi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis can pa che chen po dri me byed pa yi/ gal te khams gsum pa 'i nyon mongs pa rnams ma mchis pa la de'i tshul khrims kyi phung po de
162a4(mdo): yongs su dag pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de ji ltar khams gsum par smond par bgyid/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
162a5(mdo): kyis chen po che chen po dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid la 'di skad ces pa ka' saHla to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'i phyir khams
162a6(mdo): gsum par smon dpar myi byed de/ rigs kyi bu gang dag bdag nyid kyang nyon mongs pa myed pa ya/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir khams gsum du kun nas nyon mongs pam 'gyur ba de ni byang chub ses/ 
162a7(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi thabs yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ myi la la zhig gis nam mkha' la ri mo rnam pa sna tshogs bkra ba stond par byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci myi de dka' ba byed pa yin/ 
162a8(mdo): nam/ gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de ltar lags te/ myi de ni dkal ba byed pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' laHpad pa/ rigs kyi bu
162b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' gang dag bdag nyid kyang nyon mongs pa byed la/ sems cam yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ khams gsum du sa pa kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can yongs su//

162b3(mdo): sgo yang mthong la/ sems can rnams la snying pa che ba'i slad du/ khams gsum na gnas pa de dag ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ dgum pa'i gnod pa las/ 
162b4(mdo): thar da lags pa'i myi slar dgum pa'i gnod pa gnas su mchi ste/ dkum pa'i gnod pa bgyid pa rnams la 'di skad du bdag sod cig/ gzhan ma gsad cig/ ces mchi ba de bzhin du// 
162b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das dkum pa'i gnod pa'i gnas lta bu ni khams gtsu ma lags so// dgum par bgyid pa lta bu ni 'jig rten gan ba lags so// dgum pa'i gnod pa bgyid pa lta bu ni 'du byed rnas
162b6(mdo): lags so// dgum pa'i gnod pa spangs pa lta bu ni/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po khams gsum las rnam par grol ba de dag lags te/ sems can yongs su spyi dang par bgyid pa/ sems can yongasu

162b8(mdo): sems cad ga da bya// de ci'i srid du no/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dpa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad la ni de sa nam 'i mchen mo ma ma mchis/ mams ma mams sas mangs pa'i thad du// dam
163a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis chen po che chen po rdza ma myed pa'i gzi brjid la bkam sa sad pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen pos zos pa'i tshogs la ni ji ltar brtson par byal/ des thos pa/ 
163a2(mdo): mi ji ltar btsal bar bya/ zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mkhan po dang // slob dpom la nga rgyal bcom pa dang / bka' blo bde ba'i sa bla ma'i srizhu dang / gus pa dang / 'phangs
163a3(mdo): pa dang / gces pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o// des chos la ni sman gyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// mazhan po dang / slob dpon rnams la ni ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// des bdag la ni nad pa'i 'du
163a4(mdo): shes bskyed par bya'o// des chos kyi gangs ngag sto nad pa la ni sman ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// des sems can thams cad/ la ni nad pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// des sangs rgyas kyi/

163a6(mdo): kyai bya'o/ nor phun sum tshogs pa la des chags pa bskyed par myi bya'o// chos gtso bor byas te/ dor thams cad shes rab 'das pa yongs su gtong bar bya'o// dam pa chos kyi don dang / dam pa chos yongs
163a7(mdo): su gzub ba ma byor 'jig rten thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// chos kyi rnyed pa 'dod pas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad la yongs su gtang bar bya'o// chos kyi rgyal srid 'dod pa'i phyir
163a8(mdo): thaM papa ma mams sa / mas sa dasogs la // thamasasam dpasas
163b1(mdo): bas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung las brtson par bya'o// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis dge ba'i zab thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur ro// 
163b2(mdo): rigs kyi bu de bas na/ byang chub 'dod pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma 'dod pa dang / shes rab kyi ka ba bsgreng bar 'dod pa rnams kyis thos pa la bathon par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lnga
163b3(mdo): ste/ dper na/ khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed ni/ ka bas brtan pas sum bcu pa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'du bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi ka ba ni/ thos pa'i stobs kyis yongs su
163b4(mdo): gzung bar gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ po rnams dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten du 'du bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub tu ses
163b5(mdo): bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas te/ bdag sangs rgya sa su gyur da cig ces smras la/ de yang zos pa yongs su rgya la ba la myi bco ma ma/ sems can thams cad shes rab 'chal dab
163b6(mdo): bya ba la zhugs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pa yongs su tshol ba la rol bar byed na/ des sems can thams cad kyi shes rab yongs su rdzogs 'ang
163b7(mdo): bya ba'i phyir/ nye bar brtan par byas pa yin no// ldan pas kyang de'i tshe de la mgu zhing yod bde bar gyu rad nas/ sa sra skyes bu dam pa 'di ni thos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / shes rab spobs pa'i blo gas rna
163b8(mdo): zab par nus so// ma la la skyes bu 'dis ni shes rab kyi mtshor gyis nyon mongs pa 'i pa'i byed thams cad nam pa thams cad kyi thams cad drug cang ba nub bo/ mal la skyes bu dag pa 'dis ni sems ca
164a1(mdo): thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston nus so// masas skyes bu dam pa 'das sngon gyi rgyal ba bzhugs pa zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug par nus so// al la skyes bu dam pa/ 
164a2(mdo): 'dis ni bdud dpung dang gzhon pa dang / bcas pa 'bam par byed nus so// a la la byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nus so// zhes ched du brjod par
164a3(mdo): byed do// rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' chos nyan pa la brtson pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por 'gyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi zhes
164a4(mdo): bdud sdig can rnams dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lhag pa dag yin pa de// dag thams cad de'i tshe sdug bsngal zhing / yid myi bde bar 'gyu/ ra te/ 'di ni bdag cag gyi dbang du myi 'gyur ro// 'di la bdag
164a5(mdo): nag dbang myed do// 'dis bdag cag rnam pa thams cad du bcom mo/ 'dis ni bdag dbang du byas so// snyam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar thos pa dang ldan na/ shes rab skye
164a6(mdo): bar 'gyur/ shes rab dang ldanan nyan mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// tan mongs pa byed na bdud kyis klags kyi da dang / zos pa dang ldan na rtogs 'ang 'gyur / rtog sa yod na chus pa'in tshungs yongs su
164a7(mdo): chos par 'gyur ro// tshul bzhi du chos yongs su tshol ba la bcoms/ bdud sdig can gyis klags kyi rnyed de/ thos pa dang ldan mchog par lta ba dang bral bar 'gyur la/ yang dag pa'i lnga ba yang skyed par 'gyur ngo/ 
164a8(mdo): yang dag par zhugs na/ bdud kyis grags kyi rnyed do/ yang dag pa zhugs na/ don la nye bar rton pa dang / gnod pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ don 'dod na/ don la yang dag par 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu
164b1(mdo): grangs des kyang thos pa mang po la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brnyang bzhi 'pham par byed nus par 'gyur ba'i de ltar rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po'i bdud dang / nyon mongs
164b2(mdo): pa 'i bdud dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud dang / lha'i bu'i bdud de/ bdud bzhi po 'di dag 'bam par byed nus so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' chos don tu gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod
164b3(mdo): pa rnams kyis zos pa yongs su btsal ba de las cung zad tsam khyod la bstand par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus ma/ skam ba grangs byed pa bas kyang / ches grangs skyed pa/ yum dang bo tshad myed pas gis kyi
164b4(mdo): khyab pa 'das pa de'i tshe/ de 'i du sa ma/ drang srong chen po mchog ces bya ba/ nags dang nags 'dab dang / ri la gnas pa mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa/ rtag tu byams pa la gnas pa dang / snying rje la gnas
164b5(mdo): pa zhig b+h+ya ste/ dra ba srong de mchog tu spang to// de nags chung de / naganas pa/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag byams paganas pa 'din/ sems cas rnams kyi dgas pa bskyed par
164b6(mdo): la/ byams pa 'di'i/ yang/ sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang/ ses dang / gti mug / nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs patha'as cad kyang nye bar zhi bar byed kyi nus so// #
164b7(mdo): 'dis ni// 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba yang skyed par gyi nus so// snyam ma/ de yapa 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa'i lta bgapa las skye zhig snyam mo// de la rtog pa 'di lta bu zhig byung ze/ hA/ 
164b8(mdo): pa'i yang dag pa'i khya bye ba lan tu gnyis dang / rkye gnyis sa dang / gnyis gang zhes/ 'dig she gzhas kyi sas/ mas dang tsal tshul pani yangs byed pa / 'di ga nyim na'i shin pa
165a1(mdo): skye ba'i rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyin so snyam mo// de de'i tshe chos yongasu tshol ba la btsun pa'i blo skye ste/ legs par gsungs pa bdag gi ga la rnyed par 'gyur skams mo// 
165a2(mdo): de chos kyi phyir chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson nas/ grong dang grong khyer dang grong 'dal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang / rgyal ba'i pho brang du song nas chos btsal lo/ btsal kyang chos
165a3(mdo): smas pa 'ag ma rnyed do// de nas de'i mdun du bdud kyi ris kyi lha zhig byung ste/ de drang srong de'i thad du song nas/ 'di skad ces smra so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs las sangs
165a4(mdo): rgyas kyi gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi tshig su bcad pa gcig bzung ba nga la yod do// drang srong des smras pa smros shig/ lha des smras pa ga lte khyod kyi rang gi lus las lpags
165a5(mdo): bshus te nyi ma la skams nas/ sho'ur byas te rang gi khrag dang sbyar ba'i sdug cha byas la/ rang gi rus pa'i smyu gu byas te/ nga las tshig su bcad pade 'dra ni/ de ltar nas sangs rgyas kyis
165a6(mdo): gsungs pa'i tshig su bcad bdengs khyod la sbyin no// rigs gi bu de nas drang srong chen po mchog de 'di ska mo de sems te/ bdag gi lus 'di 'khor ba thog ma myed pa nas skye ba de dang de dag
165a7(mdo): dang / skye ba'i gnas de dang de dag du/ skal 'bum phrag mang por nyes pa byas nas dgra dang 'ashed ma'i lag tu song nas/ chos rkun dang rgyal po'i bkrabs pa las bstsogs pa'i mtshan
165a8(mdo): rnon po yin lag dang / rkang lag thams cad dum bu du ma bcad cing bachubs te/ 'dod pa'i phyir dang na gyi phyir dang / gsad pa dang cang ba dang brdeg pa dang / bsngags tha las stsogan/ 
165b1(mdo): babaka' ba yum nyams myong mod kyim kyang bdag ga lus de dag dang / tshor bde dag gi sems can sul mang na gyi yang byas pa skyed na/ bdag gi slong po myed pa lus 'das ca
165b2(mdo): snyed par gyur pa ni/ bdag gi snyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam nas dga' zhing 'gu nas yid rangs te/ lha de la slob dpon gyi 'du shes bskyed nas/ mtshon rnon po'i rang gis lus las sngags
165b3(mdo): shus te ma la skam nas shog byar byas te/ rang gi lus la khrag gzags nas/ rang gi khrag gi snag cha sbyar te/ rang gi rus pa'i myu gu byas nas/ lha de la thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces
165b4(mdo): smras so// lha sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bsdus pa'i tshig su bcad pa de dag la gsungs shig/ khyod kyi ji skad bgo ba bzhin du bdag gi bgyis lags te/ 
165b5(mdo): bdag gi sngags bshus te skam ste/ shog gur bgyis nas rang gi khrag gi sngag sar sbyar te/ rang gis rus pa'i myug gu gyis lag so// zhes byaso// rigs gi bu de nas bdud kyi ris
165b6(mdo): kyi lha des/ drang srong chen po mchog de'i gus pa dang don du gnyer ba de ltar bya mthong nas gnod gnod ltar byas te/ de nyid du myi snang bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de nas drang song chen po mchog
165b7(mdo): des de'i tshe lha de myi snang bar rig nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdagis tshigasu bcad bde ma thos su zin kyang / gang gi phyir bdag gi chos la gus pa chen po'i/ sdug ca 'di dang rang gi sngags
165b8(mdo): bshus te/ skam nas/ rang gi khrag dang sbyar ba dang / rang gis rus pa phyung te myug gu byas pa/ bdag gi chos la gus pa'i dge' ba'i dartsa ba 'di chud za bar myi 'gyur ro// slu bar yang rgya
165b9(mdo): phyor ma/ kyang dag sa sa pa'i mas pa dang pa'i mye mamam rnams lan
166a1(mdo): des / 'jig nyid kyi khams rnaM dang / 'jig rten kyi khams gzhan dag na/ chos gsung zhing chos ston pa dang / bdag nyid chen po su bzhugs kyang rung ste/ de dag gis bdag la zhal bstan par gsoyad
166a2(mdo): bad chos kyang thos par yang tug so yod/ zhes byas so// rigs kyi bu de skar dang blong chen po mchog gis tshig de skad ma smras ma bag tu/ zhan cig da dang / bang cig de dang / yud tsam de nyid la 'ogs
166a3(mdo): phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum bcu cha gnyis 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams kun nas drim byed pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de med bzhin gshegs/ 
166a4(mdo): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dris myed bar grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang stonang to/ des drang srong chen po mchog de'i
166a5(mdo): lhag pa'i bsam bzugs su chud de/ 'dzas bu kling 'di'i sems yongs su sbyin par yang gzigs nas/ dben na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskums pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskums
166a6(mdo): ba bzhin du skad cig par cig yud tsam de la/ de bzhinar gshegs pa rdzi ma myed pa'i grags pa'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpal lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu de nas/ myi snang bar gyu rad nas/ drang srong chen po mchog ni
166a7(mdo): mdum du bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri la myed par grags pa'i rgyal po de blangs thag tu de'i mod la nags khung de spang ba chen pos khyab par
166b1(mdo): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'dus par gyur da to// de nas drang srong chen po mchag la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdzi ma skyed par grags pa'i rgyal ba la 'od kyis phog ma thag tu de nas de'i mong sa kha tog dang / 
166b2(mdo): gzugs snga ma tshan bzhin du gyur te/ ma dang ldad pa byed par gyur da to// de nas drang srong chen po mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i zhabs la ma ga thos kyang/ 
166b3(mdo): 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das la yan gsum skor ba byas nasasor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar ba spyi bor bzhag nas/ de bzhi na gshegs pa dri myed par grags pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol/ 
166b4(mdo): to// / bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi stond pa lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gyi dge
166b5(mdo): 'dun la skyabs su mchil/ ci nas bdag gi chos thos nas/ log par zhugs pa'i sems can lta bar bya dad pa'i klag klag pa/ gyod yul ba/ rnams kyi log par lta ba mun par bas la nas/ 
166b6(mdo): yang dag pa'i lta bar stond par 'gyur par/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstand tu gsol dang / bde bar gshegs pas bdag la chos bstand tu gsol da// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
166b7(mdo): drim myed par grags pa'i rgyal po des/ drang srong chen po mchog gtso bor mdzad nas/ lha'i bu de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bsod nams bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid las brnams te/ 
167a1(mdo): mims pa'i bul bar ngos nganas rjom dge ba'i tshab song su srungs pa'i lha'i bu brgya grong tha ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bras drub tu sems paskyed par 'gyur ba dang / drang sro chen la mchog de yang dag
167a2(mdo): pa dang / sa pa lang kya pa dan da/ 'das das mjig sa cad pa 'di dag kyang bsan/ ga na
167a3(mdo): chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir rapabazhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o// chos thams cad yongs su chad pa'i phyir zag pa byed pa'o// chos thams cad ni gnas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir gnas
167a4(mdo): myed pa'o// chos thams cad ni gnyis su byed pa'i phyir sgo myed pa'o// chos thams cad rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo kun nas ston pa'i phyir kwa/ na nas sgo'o/ chos thams cad ni 'gro ba myed pa'i tshul gyis 'pho
167a5(mdo): dus gsum mnyam pa ste/ rdo rje'i tshig brgyad po 'di dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdzi ma myed par grags pa'i rgyal po des/ chos thams cad nges par byed pa'i phyir bstand to// mchog
167a6(mdo): gzhan yang chos kyi sgo'i/ tshig brgyad po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yid brtul bar myi 'gyur pa ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mying ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ sgo sna tshog
167a7(mdo): bad gzhag pa'i phyir ro/ sgon chos thams cad kyi zla ste/ dag tha dad pa'/ brjod pa'i phyir ro// brda' ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ chos thams cad mngon par zhe dad pa byed pa'i phyir ro// rnam par
167b1(mdo): gapa' dmas thams cad kyi sas/ gsob dang / gsog dang / las rnaman par byer mo/ bdag nangab nyid thams cad kya'o ste/ bdag gang banyid byed pa'i phyir ro// zag pa byed pa ngab nyid byed pa phyi/ bkab na nga/ 
167b2(mdo): thams cad kyi sgo ste/ yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// gdags pa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ gdags pa 'byung ba myed pa'i phyir ro// mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ ro gcig pa'i phyir ro// mchog chos kyi rna
167b3(mdo): tshig de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid brtul bar myi 'gyur ba'o// mchog gzhan yang sa bon gyi tshig brgyad po 'di dag spobs pa myi zad par 'gyur ba ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mchog a
167b4(mdo): zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma skyes pasngo nad to// mchog pa zhes bya ba yis bon gyi tshig ni chos thosacad don dam par stond to// mchog na zhes bya ba ma sa bon gyi tshig
167b5(mdo): ni/ chas pasas can gyi mying dang gzugs sangs su shes par 'ar te/ ga zhes bya bas pan tu chen nams thams cas da zhi bar ston to// mchogs zhes bya ba ni sa thor gyi tshig ni smos
167b6(mdo): nams chos thams cad las yang dag pa pa 'das pa ston to/ mchog te zhes bya ba sa thon gyi tshig na chos thams cad de bzhin tu dper byed par gad to/ mchog ka zhes bya las bon gyi tshig na chos zad pa nyid du spo pa/ 
167b7(mdo): to// mchog ma zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad dbus dang / mtha' yongs su chad par stond te/ mchog sa bon gyi tshig brgyad po mede dag ni spobs pa myi zad par 'gyur ba'o// de lta bas na sa bon
167b8(mdo): bya tshig 'di dag dang / chos kyi na 'a tshig 'di dag dang / de rje'i 'di dag la dran pa dang / shes bzhin du gyod pa mnyam pa nyid / 'tshon pa mabya'o// rtag tu 'argya 'ang byed pa gyod pa sas tshul bzhin du sa ma/ 
168a1(mdo): pas brtson sa bya/ rtag tu gang sa nis/ ma nim 'dod lam brtson par byam/ rigs kyi bu de ga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa drim byed par grags pa'i rgyas pa ras/ 
168a2(mdo): su ba deng/ nam btadas/ 'jig rten gyimapas de rna pa sa da cing / rab tugapas pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag da mabs tsag tu myo snang bar gyur te/ nad cigazang cig su

168a4(mdo): nga sa bgyid dzad pa de dang mang ldan pa thamangs su bzung ba thob par gyur to// lus yongs sarung bdes bdud byer dga' sa ma mtshams nas/ tha
168a5(mdo): grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyalapo'i pho brang du song nas/ sems can rnams la chos stonod to// bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa 'di nyid rgyas par bshad

168a7(mdo): chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sbyind par byas so// srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni 'khon los sgyur bar yongs su sbyin par byas so// srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong
168a8(mdo): mi brgya byin du yongs su sbyin par byas so// srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni tshangs par yongs su smyin par byas so// srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni tshangs par langs su sbyin par byas so// byams pa bsgom
168b1(mdo): pa la bkod to/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong na dgel ba bsgom pa la bkod do// srog chags brkyang khri bzhi stong na ba tang snyoms bsgom pa la bkod do// srog chags brgyad tra ba sha sta dpag tu myed pa zhig ni mtho ris
168b2(mdo): kyi 'jig rten du 'gro bar byas so// de'i 'og tu drang srong chen po mchog de shi nas/ lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma myed par grags pa'i
168b3(mdo): rgyal bang nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi nang kun nas nim byed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skyes so// rigs kyi bu de'i me de 'dus na/ rang srong rjer po mchog de gzhan zhig yin par khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis sam the tsom mdza/ 
168b4(mdo): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar myi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma nyid de tshe de'i dus ma drang srong chen po mchog tu gyur da te/ ngas chos 'dod pa dang / chos la gus pa'i gnas gnas pa'i bden pa
168b5(mdo): byin gyi rlabs des/ 'og gi phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe gas pa dri ma myed par grags pa'i rgyal po de spyan drangs so// dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid rnam grangs des kyang / khyod kyis 'dod
169a1(mdo): yang // chos pa sras pa byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pa las rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lta bar gyur dag / rnams na mos dpapa ma'adas/ yang dag pa'i lta ba ni bsgrub par sa'ang/ 
169a2(mdo): do// dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid la gus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dang / 
169a3(mdo): sems dpa' chen pos zos pa'i tshogs la mkhas pa la brtson par bya'o// thos pa'i chos la mkhas pa la bathon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba
169b1(mdo): sa kyang gongs 'am/ debs kyang zhag par 'gyur te/ nim byed pa gzi brjid gsum po 'ang dag ni bsong rnams nye bar rtog pa dang / mamang rnams kyi tshogs dang / bsod rnams 'byung ba dang / zas das
169b2(mdo): rgyas pa dang / bsod nams kyi rgya mthun pa dang / bsod nams myi zad pa dang / bsod nams bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho yin te/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen no
169b3(mdo): dag gi bso nas sa rnams kyi ma mngam/ mang ni rtogs par gyinus so// drim skyed pa'i ga brjid rgya mtsho chem pa'i thogs pa rnams kyi tshad dang / mtha'an rtogs par nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
169b4(mdo): dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyim pa'i tshogs dang / tshul khrims kyi chog/ sa dang / zos pa'i tshogs bstsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung / de po'i chad dang / mtha' ni rtogs par myi nus so// drim byed/ 
169b5(mdo): ba'i gzi brjid stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas la ri dang / shib sdod pa dang / nags tshal dang / mayod pa rnaM mas cad ni/ srang chad kyi chad dang / mang brtags pa 'am shes
169b6(mdo): par nus kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i tshogs dang / tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang / thos pa'i tshogs bstsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de tshad gzung bar myi nus so// 
169b7(mdo): zhes pa pA'i de nas bcos ldan 'das la can ma che chen po drim byed pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshogs gsum po sbyin pa'i tshogs dang / tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang / chos 'i
169b8(mdo): gzhanas/ gas ga sa ga dang/ ga na da kyis ka[।]/ ma byed pa'i ga tshogs sul ma chog pa/ 
170a1(mdo): tshogs dang / thos pa'i tshogs de dag mi nang na thos pa'i tshogs 'ba' zhig mchog ces bya/ rab ces bya/ rab mchog ces bya/ gya nom pa zhes bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya/ 
170a2(mdo): bla ma zhes bya/ bla na myed pa zhes bya/ gong na byed pa zhes bya/ gong ma'i yang gong ma zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi mdun na/ yungs 'bru ka cig 'dug pa bzhin du sbyin pa'i tshogs
170a3(mdo): dang / tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyang de dang 'dra bar blta'o// ri'i rgyal po ri ba ji lta ba bzhin du ni/ thos pa'i tshogs blta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper ma/ nam mkha'i bya'i rjes ji lta ba bzhin du/ sbyin ci
170a4(mdo): tshogs dang / tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// / phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' mtha' yas pa la ji lta ba bzhin du// ni thos pa'i tshogs blta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'i tshogs
170a5(mdo): ni bya ba gnyis byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngan 'gro sa lad pa dang / bde 'gro bsgrub pa ste/ bya ba 'di gnyis byed do// shes rab kyi tshogs kyang bya ba gnyis byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
170a6(mdo): lta bar gyu rad pa thams cad me med pa dang / shes rab sgrub pa ste/ bya ba 'di gnyis byed do// rigs kyi bu sbyim pa'i tshogs ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang / le nad pa dang bcas pa dang / phung por rnam par spyor pa'o//
