250a8(mdo): ki bya ba dang / 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mo ngas pa thams cad kyis myi gos pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzhan dag gis bltar myi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin te/ 
250b1(mdo): bzhi la gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi da'ang phyag dang / shes rab kyi dbang phyug dang / ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / thabs kyi dbang phyugs/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ gzhan
250b2(mdo): dag gis bltar myi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin ni// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal chos bzhi dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthod kyi bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams sangs
250b3(mdo): rgyas la yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug pa dang sems can rnams chos nyan pa yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i
250b4(mdo): ting nge 'dzin pa dang kyi bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthapas dang kyi bral ba nam/ sa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang la
250b5(mdo): na/ shind du rtsal zhing myi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin te/ bzhin/ gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi rnam par grol ba/ ye shes mthong ba'i mngon sum
250b6(mdo): gyur da pa dang / bden pa la nye bar brtags pas chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin dang / bag chags kyi 'tshams stso pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa la mkhas pa mgyu da pa dang / nyan mongs pas kyi 'khrugs 'bas
250b7(mdo): chos cas / rigs kyis kyang chub sems dpa' chas can pa 'di dag dang zhan shi na du chus zhing gyi mthugs pamam ma can rnams yin no// rigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhed pa ldan na/ sa rnams tha
250b8(mdo): babyed par 'am pan rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen 'di nya te/ sems can thams can sadan na rnam pa sun tshogs pa rnams yin/ sems pan yong sa sbyind pas bya la btan na bamam la rgya byed pa na/ 
251a1(mdo): yin bdag gi bden pa la gyi chags pa rnams yin/ gang ye shes chog ne yang / sems can thams cad kyi ched tu yin gyi bdag 'bal zhig gi phyir ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal chos bzhi
251a2(mdo): mo 'di dang ldan na/ chos rnams grangs pa myed pas sol dpon rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams kyi rtonas par 'gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
251a3(mdo): 'di lta ste/ bdag gi don btang zhing gzhan gi don byed pa rnams yin// bdag gi bdel ba thams cad gtong zhing sems can thams can rnams la chos kyi bden pa sbyin pa rnams yin/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos ston/ 
251a4(mdo): pa la ngal ba myed pa rnams yin/ chos kyi mtsho'i bas 'tsho'i zang zing gi 'tsho ba ma yin pa ste// rigs kyi bu bya ba chub sems dpal chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// sems can thams cad kyi rton
251a5(mdo): par gyu dad pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khon rjes su skor ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen 'di lta ste/ gzungan
251a6(mdo): rab su thob pa dang / thog pa rgyun myi chad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa shes pa la 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam tu khrid cing myi byed pa'i chos ston pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
251a7(mdo): chos po 'di dag dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bsko da pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bsru pa
251a8(mdo): thob pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ spyod pa thams cad yas rab tu 'das pa rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las myi ldog cing myi skye ba'i chos bzol pa rnams yin/ bsams bzhi bu che dang 'chis
251b1(mdo): 'bol dang / skye ba yang ston/ byin gyi ldog pa'i phyag brgya btal la rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas yang dag par gnas nang/ sa bcur nges par byang nas/ marnas sams mas ma mangs pa yin te/ 
251b2(mdo): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang sku rad pa thos pa rnams yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bskul pa 'i cho sgyu rnams grangs 'di bshad pa na/ stong
251b3(mdo): gsum gi stong chen po 'jig rtend kyi khams 'di rnams pa drug tu g.yos nas/ snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rte nad kyi khams khyab par gyu da to// steng gi bar sna las la bye la khrag khrig brgya stong gis lha'i klu / dbyangs blangs
251b4(mdo): lha'i me tog ma ma b+ha ra ba'i char rab tu phab nas 'di skad ces/ kye ma bcom/ yAn 'das kyis bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs myed par bsgrubs pa gang lags de/ 
251b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhin pa bsgrubs pa'i chos rnam grangs 'dir bsnyed/ cing bshad de rab tu bstan to// bcom ldan 'das bzhi pa bsku/ bas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyand pa dang / thos nas kyang mos
251b6(mdo): pa dang / mos nas 'dzind pa dang / samang pa dang / klog pa dang / kun tshul par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang stond pa dang / byang chub sems dben gyi 'bral ba'i sems can de ni dgel 'a'i ma pa ngamangon ldan pa lags
251b7(mdo): te/ dedag ni ji ltam de bzhin gshegs pa dang bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da smras seng ge sanags pa bzhin rtsa/ dang kyi dang yam yin gyi 'jig rtend kyi mthun byas geb sa sgrogs pas 'gyurar/ 
251b8(mdo): ma ldan 'das bdag cag kyang ban pa 'asgrubs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dagos pas nye la legs pa nyid do zhes ches su brjod pa med du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa 'askul pam chos kyi nam klas
252a1(mdo): 'di bshad pa na lha dang / myi'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' khri nyi stong ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod par gyu rad to// 
252a2(mdo): ske nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po lnga mi cod pan 'di skad ces gso yad to/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin
252a3(mdo): pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag/ chos rtsad dang ldan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHkhad pa/ rigs kyi lug pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las
252a4(mdo): 'das pa'i mdol sde 'di lta bu 'dzind pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par stond pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de dag
252a5(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bsams la nges te/ ras ma pa phun sum 'tshogs par yang 'gyur pa dang / sems cad/ thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'i sems myed de/ shi nad tu byams pa la sgos
252a6(mdo): pam 'gyum pa dang / sems can thams can yongs su sbyind par bya ba la gnas te/ snying rje chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / chos 'dod na chos don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba dang / thos pa tshe yangs kyi ngoms ca/ 
252a7(mdo): mcho chen gyi rgya mtshol lta bur 'gyul pa dang / lus srog 'das zhing rnam pa'i sa yongs su 'dzind par 'gyus padang / de rnams kyi tshogs bsags te/ dkris pa'i thams brtan par 'byar ba dang / 
252a8(mdo): rgyas kyi byi nad kyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ smon da lam yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor gyi nang du 'jigs pa myed pas bdud dang phyir rgol pa bcom par 'gyur la ste/ rigs kyi bu kar
252b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta gu 'dzind pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya chem ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dan na chos brgyad po 'di dag dpa'an par 'gyur ro// de nas des
252b2(mdo): tshesangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum ga stong chen po'i 'jig gi khams 'di rnam pa drug rtsa g.yos par bya da ta// stong gsum gyi ston chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams 'di na// gang dag la phyogs mthon dman can dang / 
252b3(mdo): nas po dang / rba myig dang / mtshol dang / ma che 'u dang / steng ka dang / rgya mtsho 'i chen yo de dag kyi skang bam gyund ti// sa chen po 'di dag thams cad kyang lag 'thil yar mnyam par gnas par gyurd to// mun gnas pa
252b4(mdo): yi sems can rnams la yang gnod pa myed paras gyurd to// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams 'di na shing skam gapa dgra lo brgya lon pa de dag thams cad las kyang me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs
252b5(mdo): skyes par gyur da nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su dud mngon par rab tu bcud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur da to// de ma yin pa shing gzhan thams cad las kyang mye tog dpa 'bras bu sna tshog
252b6(mdo): skyes rnas par gyund nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la la de logs su bdud mngon par bdud nas/ phyag 'tshal bar gyur da to// sa chen po sa kyang pad ma chad shing rta'i phang lo tsam sna tshogs pasta na mug pa2
252b7(mdo): doge dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa/ yid su 'ong ba dag mngon par 'thond to// snang ba chen pos kyang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams 'di khyab par gyur da to// myi snang zhing ma bgrele bar yang snyed
252b8(mdo): kri bar snang las lha'i sil snyan dang / grul dbyangs kyi sgra phyung ste grags par gyu rad to// ri'i rgyal po gangs dang / r-i'i rgyal po sos kyi ngad ldan des las a tog gi char chen po phal ste/ kya lha'i me tog sa
253a1(mdo): tshogs sngon dri myi mnam pa rnams kyang mchog gi dri rang byung ste/ dri des stong gsum gi stongab chen po 'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di dri zhim po mnam par gyurd to// ri'i rgyal po gangs dang / ri'i rgyal po spom/ 
253a2(mdo): kyi ngad ldan des las me tog gi char chen po 'al ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khon gang na ba dedar mngon pan khag nas/ sa chen po 'dir me tog gi char de dag gis pus nub tsam du gyudad to// me tog
253a3(mdo): gi shing de las me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bas cing / si la stan dang klu dbyangs sna tshogs kyi sgra dag kyang byung // steng gi khar snam la rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzugs dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshad tsam chu rkun
253a4(mdo): rtsa gnas par gyurd to// rin po che'i gdugs de/ las mu tig/ gi rgya nad phreng ba dang rin po 'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dril bu sna tshogs kyi dra ba 'phyang bar gyur da to// dril bu g.yer ka saM pra ba'i skra yid du 'ong ba'i
253a5(mdo): yid dgal bar byed pa/ chags par byed pa des stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nad kyi khams 'di go bar byas par gyur/ da to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus// bcom ldan 'das la 'di
253a6(mdo): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dgal bar bgyid la/ mgul par bgyid pa'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di la bu dang stong gsum go skad chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams 'di rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan da par gyur na/ 
253a7(mdo): par dgal la 'di su las ltas lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal saHla dpa// sha ri'i bu 'dini gyi 'am rtsi'i rgyal po lnga nad pa'i spos kyi rang lnga nas 'khor gyi 'am ci stong phrag su ma dang / 'khor ci
253a8(mdo): zas snyom phrag sum dang / 'khom lha stong pag sum cu ma dang / 'ad bdel 'chi snga ltas so// de skad gsungs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de las kyi 'am gyi'i rgyal po ldan pa sil snyan dang klu la dbyangs len pa
253b1(mdo): mi zhi she dang / la'o brgyad song khrag tu mas bskon nas steng gi bam snam nas me tog chu'i cham 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi la sa de nangs te/ byin nas latsha ma dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi rnams
253b2(mdo): la phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskom pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 'dang 'jug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gyi 'am ci'i rgyal po ston pa bdag nyid kyi pi bang gi log pa le
253b3(mdo): rgya las byas pa/ 'jam pa rgya po'i gser gas pa le'u can/ sa ye ska ma dang / nor bu rin po'i rnams spras pa/ sngon gi las kyi rnam par sbyind pas yongs su sbyangs te/ sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong dag dang
253b4(mdo): lhan cig tu grags par byed do// myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pas pi 'ang de blangs ma thag ru/ de nas mi bad gi skra des stong gsum rgya stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams dbyangs kyis dgo bar gyur na to// 
253b5(mdo): pi bab gi skA des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rgyud kyi sgra dang / kU/ li sma dang // lha'i klu dbyangs kyi skra rnams zi lad kyis man nad taM/ myi gsal khar gyur da to// de nas pi khang gi swa/ des bskul pas 'dod
253b6(mdo): pa na spyod pa li lha'i bu de dag gis lha'i rol mo bo red te// bcom ldan 'das ga la kha der lpags so// myi 'am ciyi rgyal po ljond pas pi khang de brangs ma thag tu/ de nas stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khas
253b7(mdo): 'di'i shing dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / gdun/ mo kyis ldang sna 'azung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / de ma yin pa gzhan gi ri nag po dang / sa dang / dang / shing gel la dang / smand dang nags tshal ji snyed pa de dag
253b8(mdo): rnams pad ldeg go// g.yo su ga yo kun tu rang thug so'o// 'ayul ra thu 'gul kun du rab bya 'gul sa// 'di lta ste dber na chang gis ra ro ba'i gyi 'gyur rab dul khyas kun tu 'khyam pa de bzhin du/ shing de dag
254a1(mdo): thams can dang mi de dag thams cad kyang bcun rab tu 'dud kun tu rab su 'dun do// myi ma tsho'i rgyal lo sngon du pas 'i ma log pa kye rtsa rgyams byas pa blangs ya thag tu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor kI dkyil
254a2(mdo): 'khor des 'dus pa'i nang nas/ phyir byed myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge la slong dang / dge' slong ma dang / dge la bsnyen pa dang / dge la snyen ma dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za'
254a3(mdo): dang u ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldi dang / gyi 'am ci dang / lho'i phye chen po dang / rgya byind dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / gyi dang myi ma yin pa dang / rnam pa mtha rad pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom pa dang / 
254a4(mdo): byams cad dang ldan pa'i 'thar kyis pi bang gi sgra de thos pa dang / dpi 'ang gi ska de ma bzod nas/ rang rang gi stan las sangs te/ 'damar la yu'adang kun du rab tu 'dar ro// bdud rab tu 'chud kun rtsa rab
254a5(mdo): da do// kar byed rab tu gar byed kun rtswa rab tu gar byed do// nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyang / rang rang gi stan myi dgel ste/ 'gul ral phu 'gul kun du rab rtsa 'gul kun thur ya
254a6(mdo): 'bul zhing / phyir lam yang 'khrugs nas/ byis pa/ chub ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur stand to// de nas byang chub sems dpal lha'i cod pan gyis/ nyan thos chen po'i dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa
254a7(mdo): nyan thos chen po dag nyon mongs pa dang bral la rnams pa ma tha dad pa brgyad las bsam gtan pa/ bden pa bzhi mthong bar gyu dad pa yin na de ci'i phyir rang gi lus 'jog par myi nus shing / tshe dang ldan pa dag gis
254a8(mdo): rgyang ma bzhin lcags byed pa lta bum stond// nyan posachen po de dag gis sa pa// rigs kyis kyi'am chi'i rgyal lo ston pas phyi 'ang 'di grangs pa dang / sem snyed tshul dbyangs spyan pa 'am/ 
254b1(mdo): lci ba gi sgral des bdag cag dbang myed par bdag cag gi lus rang rang gi stan da la 'jug par myi dgal zhi ba 'dam rab tu 'das te/ sems rnam par gzhag par yang ma nus so// de nas byang chub seMs
254b2(mdo): dpal lha'i cod pam gyis/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po rgas gzugs 'khogs pa/ 'dod pa cupa ba/ chog shes pa/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan 'dzin pa/ 
254b3(mdo): lha dang myi dang lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten rtsa gyur da pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rang gi lus 'dzind par myi nus shing / gnas brtan da su gyurd kyang byis pa chung ngu bzhin cu gar byed pa ltar ston da// gnas
254b4(mdo): brtan 'od srungs chen pos smras pa// rigs kyi bu dper na/ rlung rnam par 'thor byed yangs pa na/ shing dang nags dang / ri thams cad 'di ltar pa dag cag rnam par gzhag pu'i stobs myed
254b5(mdo): mthur myed de/ de dag thams cad kyi 'dod bzhin du g.yo rab g.yo 'gul rab tu 'phrul lo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin dunang 'di/ myi 'am ci'i rgyal po smond pas/ pi 'ang blangs pa des spru
254b6(mdo): zos pas bdag cag/ rlu rnam par 'thor byed kyis rin chen pobadas pa bzhin te/ bdag 'dzind ma nus par gyu rang to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa 'di'i smon pa lam dang bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi
254b7(mdo): par ni 'di 'dra ste/ des nyan thos kyi 'asod nams dang / ye shes dang gzil brjid thams cad zild kyis nond to// byang chub sems dpa' lha'i tshon pan gyis smras pa// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po phyir myi ldog pa
254b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpal dang gzi 'dzid dang / sa cad/ stobs la gapa gi phyir pi 'ang gi sgra des bskul la 'am bskyod par gyi nus pas/ btsun la 'od srungs chen po su zhig blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
254'a1(mdo): pa'i byang chub kyi sems myi skyed// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gape nyi tshe'i ye shes dang ldan par rnams kyi stobs dang / gzi brjid de ni pi 'ang gi sgra 'dis zil gyis nond to// gang theg pa chen po la yang dag
254'a2(mdo): gan zhugs pa rnams kyi stobs dpag rtsi 'arjid de la ni/ 'i lad kyis nond par gyi nus pa la yis/ de nas kyi 'am ci'i rgyal po sngond pas/ pi bang gi sgra de sgrogs pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus kyi 'am ci'i rgyal ba sngon pa
254'a3(mdo): mthun ma thon pas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ pi bang de dang / mis spyan brgya che ba ni stong pa de dag las/ tshigs su bcad 'di dag byang // pa ma 'chid dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyi// ma rnams
254'a4(mdo): thams cad mnyam zhing chos rnams dben// zhi ba stod pa gyi rgyam 'khrugs pa myed// gzod nas dag ste dri myed namamal bzhin// gang dag da stan gyi dang 'das pa'i// sems can kun
254'a5(mdo): mnyam sems can myed// sems can skad du sgra rnams 'byung ba yang // chos kyi sgra dang mtshungs te de yang myed// zhing rnamathams cad zhing dang zhi byin te// bar snang dang ni mtshungs shing mnyam pa
254'a6(mdo): skad// 'phel ba ma yin gyi bzad ma skyes te// gsol gsog nam mkha' lta bum rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas kun mnyam sangs rgyas myin// chos dbyings nges par 'dres pa myed pa ste// tshul khrims shes rag
254'a7(mdo): ye shes rnam grol mnyam// mnyam nyid gcig te mtshan mnyam mtshan nyid myed// nyon monges thams cad nyon mongs ma yin grol// rtog dang rtog pa kun rtog rnam par rtog/ nang na rgyu ba ma yin phyir med myin// 
254'a8(mdo): 'du shes 'dud la byin da kyi log las kyard// rnam par rton pas chos dbyings kyis btags pa// phying de nyid kyang gzhan byin de bzhin byin// mying dang gzugs kyi rang rjes rtanas pa// de dag rtag tutu gyi chags
254'b1(mdo): 'jig rten spyod// gang rnams 'das pa'i 'di gshegs grangs myed pa// de dag kyis ni gang gsungs chos mang ba// gzo nas khad ci dengs dpa 'jigs pas dben// de dag sus rnam byonas su 'gro ma yin/ 
254'b2(mdo): chos 'di dag ni yi ge las byung ste// yi ge de dag zad can zad pa'i chos// yi ge zad pa'i chos nyid shes pas na// chos rnams kun la rnam pas rtag gyi byed// sems kyi rgyud ni rgyud mnyam rgyad ma yin// rang bzhin
254'b3(mdo): gzhan dang gzhan te chags pa byed// sems dang sems byad chos 'tha' byed shes pas// 'phags pa rnams ni mnyam pa'i chos la 'jug/ mtha' dang 'tha' byed kun chad rnam par chad// zag ma khas par mnyam/ 
254'b4(mdo): par gyud// rgyas gsum dag ni dben pas shes pa mnyam/ shes pa de yang mthal yod ma yin no// skye bo rtag tu mying dang gzugs la chags// mthal dang mtha' byed skabs gos pa rnams/ 
254'b5(mdo): rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar shes pas na// bdag dang sems can rnam par rtog ma yin// bdag tu ltung pa rtag tu ldang ma yim// chos de kun ni bslang ba myed pa ste// gang dag ldang dang lda
254'b6(mdo): ba myed rtogs pa// de dag bzod pa mnyam nyid rjes su mthun// ka chos kun rtag tu mnyam myed rang bzhin te// sprin dang nam mkha' lta bur gsog dang ni// bdag dang sems can rtag tur pa bzhin stong // 
254'b7(mdo): 'di ni gzungs kyi phyag rgyar 'jug pa yin// mtshan nyid gcig te mtshan nyim mtshan myed par// rang gi tha dad pa'i sgo gsum rnam rtogs nas// thug pa myed pa'i chos rnams ston byed kyang // chos la yongs
254'b8(mdo): su rtog pa myi byed do// ma 'bring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyi// chos 'di dag ni yi ge rnams kyis brjod// yi ge rnams la rnam par rtog myi byed// de lta bur ni don rnams bshad pa yin// don dang tshig
255a1(mdo): 'phrul gnyis so kyi 'jug s+ho// gnyis myed rtag rtsa don ni sgra dang bral// gang gi mthal ni dben par shes gyu da pa// de'i son gi mthal ni nye bar chad// gang dag sngon mtha' nye bar chad pa rnas
255a2(mdo): 'gro ba 'i don tu 'argyas byos rnams la spyod// yang dag mtha' ni rtag su mthal byed shas// de'i byams pa dang snying rje shin da ma dag/ gang gi byams dang snying rje nam dag pa// sug bsnga la dpa ni bde ba mtshungs
255a3(mdo): mnyam spyod// rgon dang khengs pa ma yin brtan pa'i// skyes bu mchog de don gi chog shes// chos kyi tshul 'di zhi zhing dben pa he// 'chad pa dang ni dgal bathos par 'gyur// nam yang 'phel ba myed cing 'bril
255a4(mdo): byed// chos nyid 'di ni rab 'dzin myed cing zhi// bar sna lam gri s+tha ni 'azung myed de// gang gyis bshad pa myed kyang grag par 'gyur/ gang gis bshad dang gang la bshad pa rnams// de dag thams cad
255a5(mdo): brdzun du pa ya mtshal// tshigs su bcad la ma/ don par bskug 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpal brgya/ stod myi skye ba'i chos la/ bzod pa thob par gyu dad to// 
255a6(mdo): de nas yicom ldan 'das la// byang chub sems dpa' lnga cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsuyad ta// bcom ldan 'das tshigs su bkrub pa 'di sa bu 'di dag las byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas cal dang / 
255a7(mdo): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kyi/ 'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pa la dris shig dang / des de'i lam ston par 'gyur ro// / de nas byang chub sems dpal la 'acod pan gyis// gyi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldand pa la 'di skad ces
255a8(mdo): smras so// gyi 'am ci'i rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di dag gang las kyang // sbas pa rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad gang las 'byung pa las byung ngo // smras pa dmyi
255b1(mdo): byayidapa nas myi 'byung ngam// spras pa rigs kyi bu 'di snyam bya sems/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra nad lus kyi nang gi khong pa nas 'byung ngam/ 'on te sems las 'byung // smras pa gyi 'am ci'i bdag po lus
255b2(mdo): mas kyang ma yin// sems las kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ni bems po g.yol ba myed pa byed pa myed pa ma dang bo ba dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / myig g.yor la bu'o// sems ni
255b3(mdo): gzugs myed pa bstan du myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa/ rnam par rig pa myed pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'o// smras pa rigs kyi bu lwa das dang sems ma gtogs par gzhan gang nas spa 'byung bar 'gyu
255b4(mdo): smras pa myi 'am ci'i bdag po sems can rnaMs kyi skra ni yid la/ byed pa las/ 'byung bar btags so// smas pa gal te nam ma kha' myed na s+tha gang las 'byung // smras pa myi 'am ci'i bdag
255b5(mdo): ba nam ma'alam gtogs par/ gzhan gang nas snga 'byung bas 'byor// smras pa rigs kyi su de'i phyin/ rnam grangs 'dis sA'i tha snyad gang ji snyed 'byung ba de dag thams cad ni nam la'alalas 'byung bar mig/ 
255b6(mdo): bar bya'o// nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid ni skra ste// rnam par rig ma thag tu 'gag go// 'gags rnam mkha'i ngo pho nyid du yang dag par gnas so// de'i phyir chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes byas
255b7(mdo): rnam par rig pa byed pa/ nam la gas pas bya ma yin med kyi/ dang sgra'i 'das brjod de// brjod pa de yang sa stan na// gabazlas parna pa 'di 'dra bam rab tugs pazhin// rnam gsams
256a1(mdo): mngon par gyi chags so// gang mngon pan gyi chags pa// rnam par gyi 'grom// gang rnam pas gyi 'gro 'di kyis ma// nam kyi 'khor bzhin gyi byed pas// gang kyi byed pa zhin gyi skye'o// 
256a2(mdo): gyi skye ba de myi 'jig par 'dod do// kab kyi 'jig pa de dpa ba log dang 'a de dag pa'o// gabadag pa de dri ma myed pa'o// gang dri ma myed pa de 'od gsal ba'o// kang 'od gsal de sems kyi rab bzhin no// seMs
256a3(mdo): kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de 'jug pa'o// gang 'jug pa de mtshan ma thams cad gnan pa'o// gang mtshan ma thams cad gnond pa de skyon myed pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed pa la 'u rtag
256a4(mdo): pa gang yin pa de ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa lo'i ste/ des na skye na myed pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thol pa zhes bya'o// gab bzod pa thos pa des thams cad bzod/ de stor/ 
256a5(mdo): pas ya bzod/ de gang zag su yang bzod do// detsal phyir zhe na/ gang zag las som pa gzhan ma yin te// gang zag nyid rnapa pa/ 'o// de mtshan mar yang bzod/ de mtshan ma myed par yang bzod do// 
256a6(mdo): dkyil phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma'i po ba nyid mtshan ma byed pal// de smond par brjod/ de smond pa byed par ya bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dang las kyi ma nyid kyi mtshan nyid smond pa myed pa'o// de
256a7(mdo): sems can thams cad nang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pan yang brjod// de sems can rnams 'aman pos pa dang / bye bang yang bzod do// daci'i phyin zhen/ min pa la dang skye ba ni sgyu ma 'i mam nyid dang / gas
256a8(mdo): gyi bye chom pa padzad pa thos pa'i byang chub sems ni 'gag pa myed pa chos thams cad dang 'gal bgyid pa yin na// bdag bzod pa'i rjes su cwal ya thams thams cad kyi ris bu
256b1(mdo): 'gro bas kyang 'gro// bdag bzod pa'i rjes su yang / chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bas kyang 'gro ste/ 'ong ba yang myed 'gro la yang myed do// chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings la gnas par yang / yang dag pa ji lta ba
256b2(mdo): bzhin du rab tu shes so// mi ltar chos kyi gnas pa de snyam sems can thams cad gnas te/ gang gis gnas pa de 'bos pa'i gnas myed pa'i tshul gis rjes su thob pa de sA'i brda'i tha snyad kyi sgra nye bar bzung nas kyi
256b3(mdo): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// gyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni gang gis kyang bzod la'am/ bstan pa'am bstand par yang myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don de ni brjod su myed pa sku myed pa/ 
256b4(mdo): ba shad du myed pa yin yang / brjod du myed pa'i don brjod pas thestand pra 'di ni rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid do// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpal lA'i con pan
256b5(mdo): gyis 'di skad ces gsold te// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyi'am ci'i rgyal po ldand pa 'di ji mang chos zas mo la nan pabaston par spangs pa dang / 'di snya bum rgya che ba'i yul la nye
256b6(mdo): spyod cing / 'ongs spyod pas spyodad pa dang / chos stond pas zab mo lo bzod pa 'di lta bu rgya dang ldan ni ngo mtshard to// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
256b7(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snyed cig la dga' ba'i ma pa bskrun nas des thabs pa 'di lta bu grub pas gyurang// com ldan 'das kyis bkal pa sad pa// rigs kyi phyag gami rlung gi bye snyed kyi 'jig rten/ 
256b8(mdo): kyi 'ams kyi 'ar ma'i gzugs ji snyed pa dag ni bzang ba'i tshul gyis chad zin par nus kyi phyi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldand pa 'dis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dgel ba'i chal bskyed pa
257a1(mdo): tha ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bcal ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs la de dag gis gan na tshangs par pyad pa smyon pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtsam pa ya dag
257a2(mdo): par rdzogs pa yi sangs rgyas de dag ni chad bzung bar myi nus te des na 'diyi spobs pa 'di 'dra'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpal lha'i cod pan gyis// myi 'am ci'i rgyas po lce nad pa la 'di
257a3(mdo): rgan ces byas so// kyi kyim bdanam tshad de bzhin gshegs pa // brtsam la yang dag par rdzogs pa yi sangs rgyas mang po de dag sas dgel ba'i la ba bskyed pa/ dges pa'i sa kha mapa'i de ltar hA
257a4(mdo): bsdom pa masamamathun myed pa yang dag mdzasapar byang chub mngon pa rdzogs par 'cha rgya'am// kyi sa pa'i rgyas ma ldand pas smras pa// rigs kyis byang chub pos
257a5(mdo): sa ga san mams rtod pajis te/ bya gshed da nye de gsad ma rgya chub pa dang / chonyas tu ma ba dang da cha mas 'bra
257a6(mdo): myi ngoms pa dang / chos rgya cher rab rtsa bstand pas myi ngoms pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par bya bas kyi ngoms pa dang / dge' ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pas myi ngoms dang / 
257a7(mdo): na papa yongs su gyi ngomangs pa dang / ye shes mngon paranas cadang zhing yongs su smin par byabs kyi ngoms pa dang / tsho ma'i ma par sems zhing
257a8(mdo): bzhin sa rab tu ston par myi dmas pa dang / bsod nams dpa ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su 'acas pas kyi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag pas bsgrubs pas kyi ngomangs pas
257b1(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams dgel ba'i ma pa yang dag par bsgrub pa na/ gang dag gis nam cu ngoms par myi 'gyur la// byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi phyi ngoms pa bcu/ 
257b2(mdo): gnyis te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgel ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs 'phags pas myi ngoms pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ myi 'am ma'i rgyal po ljond pas 'di skad ces gsol da to// 
257b3(mdo): ma ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rin chen 'byung gnas shes bgyi la mchis te// byang chub sems dpal ting nge 'dzind de la brten dan yon tan nin pa che'i khyad par gyi chos ma
257b4(mdo): mos pa ma 'gyun ro// zhes bgyi ba zhig/ bdag gis thos na bcom ldan 'das/ gang thos pas byang chub sems dpal rnams yon tan rin po che'i khyad par go chos thams cad 'thob pam 'gyur bam bgyi
257b5(mdo): 'i slad rtsa// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i 'byung nas de// de bzhin gshegs pas legs pa/ ra bshad tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas pad
257b6(mdo): myi 'am ci'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rang la yid la zung shig dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting de 'and/ rin po che 'byapa gnas ngas khyod la bshad do// myi
257b7(mdo): ci yi rgyal po ljond pas/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsosad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lham nyand pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bkad ces bkalasaHmed to// myi 'am ci'i bdag
257b8(mdo): po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog rgyun myi 'chad pa dang / chos dkon mchog rgyund myi 'chad pa dang // dgel 'dun dkon mchog rgyand myi 'chad pa bya ba yi phyir// seMm spyad
258a1(mdo): pa zhin po che brgyad 'acul pa 'di dag la 'jug go// brgyad cu gang zhen 'di lta ste// de thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems rin po yi gyi 'dzin pa dang / sun pa mi bsam kha'i sems rin po che myi gtong/ 
258a2(mdo): ba dang / dgel 'a thams cad kyi sems nim po che yongs su myi 'dom pa dang / dge ba'i ma pa thams cad lakhyen pa la sems rin pa yi gyi brjod pa dang / lug pa'i bsam pa la sams zhin mo ma myo pa 'is
258a3(mdo): rin po ma yangs su gyi 'anos pa dang / yi dmal brtand pa 'i sems rin po che yongs su gyi 'do pa dang / bdag snga thams cad yongs su gtab pa'i sems rin po sa byang chub tu yongs su bsnol bas rnam par sbyinas
258a4(mdo): kyi'i bu'i sems rin mo ma la mthun pa dang / gyi dge ba'i ma ldanam par nadungs/ sa kyi rkyen kyi sems dan pa ni dang / ngan mi byon nam 'am ni rnas pam thada'as pan ni rkyed kyisam
258a5(mdo): dang man la dang / na sems dang / mas marnam par byeng ngas sems kyi rkyen kyisems chen bzhi/ sa sa sa nis rgyad byed de ma na / 
258a6(mdo): na chanas ma yin pas/ tshul khrims kyi rgyand kyi sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad pa sems byams pas khabal na sdud pa'i sems rin po med pa/ sems canathams cad kyis
258a7(mdo): ldan pas bzad pa dang // nges pas sems das che dang / byang chub kyi yan lag ya la pa'as/ lus dang sngags kyi la lasems rin po medang/ man dman byed pas ches / 
258a8(mdo): chags pa dang / 9balbo sa dang bral ba'i sems rin po che dang / zhum pa myed pas brtson 'grus brtand pa'i go cha'i sems rin po che dang // lhod pa myed pas 'artson pa thams cad nyams 'og chu chud par
258b1(mdo): byed pa'i sems rin pa che dang // byang chum kyi lam gatshogs pa sogs pas dran pa dang tho gas dang rtogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / mas pa 'arjed pa myed pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems la dbapa byed
258b2(mdo): mas pasas gzha nga rnam pam da pa dang / de bad dang rnams par 'jug pa la skyed pa'i sems chen po che dang / na chos brtsog pa chos yongs su chos thos bams zhin po'i dang / 
258b3(mdo): 'jigs pa myed pa'i spobs pas/ thos pa 'dzind pa'i sems rin po che dang / sdig pa 'dod pa 'ang bral bas khang zing myed par chos smond pa'i sems rin po che dang // chags pa'i sems myed pas// 
258b4(mdo): slob dpon chos la dbye mkhyud byed pa myed pa'i sems ni na po dang / nan tan snying por byed pas/ tshul bzhin da la byed pa'i sems rin po che dang / de lam byed pas
258b5(mdo): ma thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'i semasarin po che dang/ gzhan gyi dri la gyi 'jog pas/ rab kyis so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems
258b6(mdo): can thams cad sa byams pas khyab pas/ byams pa chen po'i sems nyin po che dang / sems can thams cad sa khas/ snying rje chen po'i sems rin po che dang / chos kyi kun dgal la rags
258b7(mdo): po mkhas dga' ba chen po'i sems rin po che dang / chos thams cad nges par sems pas/ btang snyoms chen po'i sems ring po che dang / dgel ba'i a pa ba sogs las/ kho ban gyi skyo
258b8(mdo): mi sbom sa rin po che dang / bdag gi bdel lal gyi chags las/ sems can thams can yongs su sbyid mar byed pa'i sems rin pa che dang chos 'dzin pas sdug pa'i dngos pa'i sems rin pa
259a1(mdo): mchedang/ thams can tu rnam par 'grus pas/ mangs pa shes pa chen po sems rin pa che dang / mthos pa chos nyan pa'i phyir/ dge' ba'i bshes gnyen sa bsnyenas pa'i sems na pa ma dang / 
259a2(mdo): dge' ba'i ma ba thams cad chotshogs pas/ sdig pa'i grogs po sbeng ba'i sems rin po che dang / tha dad pa myed pas/ sems can thams cad la sbyospyor pa mnyam pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam
259a3(mdo): pa la 'jug pas/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad yongs su shes pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// chos kyi snga nad thams cad yang dag
259a4(mdo): par sbyor pa'i sems rin po che dang / ye shes kyi che ba nyid tu 'gyur par bya ba'i phyir/ ma bslangs pa rnams la myi brtas pa'i sems rin po che dang // sems can thams cad la btud pas/ brgyal myed
259a5(mdo): ma'i sems rin po che dang / bcos pa byed pas/ g.yos dang spu myed pa'i sems rin po che dang / das pa'i chos yun ni du gnas par byed pas/ chos la dgal ba'i sems rin po che dang / sas
259a6(mdo): rgyas thams cad la byas pa bzol bas dam pa'i yongs su 'dzind pa'i sems rin po che dang / mjal ba brtand pa'i phyir byas pa shes shing byas pa bzo ba'i sems rin po che dang // myos pa myed pas lan su phan
259a7(mdo): 'dogs pa la myi le ba'i sems rin po che dang / dkar po'i phyogs srung bas dgond pa la dga' ba'i sems rin po che dang / las byas brgyad kyi gzon pas rtag su rab tu byang ba'i sems rin po che dang / sdom pas
259a8(mdo): byed pa la sogs pas/ 'phags pa'i rigs la dgal ba'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad ma gul bar byed pas/ spangs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang / oM kyad bsrungs pa'i sems rin po che dang / 
259b1(mdo): shes rab kyis myi ngoms pas 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes pa'i sems rin po che dang / lus dang sems dben pas spong zhing dben pa'i sems rin po che dang // mtshan dang dbyel byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par
259b2(mdo): byed pas/ bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis myi ngoms pa'i sems rin po dang // sems can thams cad the tsom gcad pa'i phyir ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tsholabs myi ngoms pa'i sems rin po che dang / sangs rgyas
259b3(mdo): la lta ba dang myi bral ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang // chos mnyan pa dang myi bral ba'i phyir/ chos rjes su dran sems rin po che dang / phyir myi ldog pa'i dgel ba dzin la gzhol ba'i phyir
259b4(mdo): dges 'dun rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang // byang chub kyi sems las kyi gsol ba'i hrI/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'i se ngas rin po che dang nyon mongs pa mas pa thams cad yongs su 'ad
259b5(mdo): bas gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang / skye sa gcig kyis sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' res su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang / mtshungs par byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
259b6(mdo): dpal rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang / non thams cad rtogs pas don so so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che dang / chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa byed pas/ chos sa so yang dag par rig pa'i sems
259b7(mdo): rin po me dang / sems can gi tshig thams rtogs pas nges pa'i tshigs so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che dang/ ga 'bru 'i rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pas/ spobs pa sa so yang dag par rig pa'i
259b8(mdo): mas rin po chen no/ rnam par shes pa rgyal sa zun yongs su shes pa'i rgyal gis// shes la nyanam pa 'i semam chen po me dang / rnam pa'idon named de 'i las dang / byang pa dang / rags pas/ nges pa
260a1(mdo): don gyi ma rnas nan pas sems nin ma dang / na ni bzhin ras su rtags pasanyan pa nyon thamams mtshan pa chenapa// khams gsum thams cad la mngon par zhend pas/ 'di/ 
260a2(mdo): pa'i phyir/ 'du byed thams cad la myi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal khanas so rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad la bdag myed pas/ chos thams cad la bdag myed par so sor rtog pa'i sems
260a3(mdo): rin po che dang // 'dod pa'i khams las shin bu 'das 'as/ myi gtsang 'ams sor rtog pa'i sems nis po che dang // shin rtsa zhi zhing nye 'dra zhi 'as mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi khams so brtog pa'i sems
260a4(mdo): rin po me dang / btsun pa'i no la yang dag par gan sa bsapham sa dad pa'i ga nang pa nyid dang mtshan ma khyed pa dang na mo// nad la byed la byed pa la mos pa'i sems rin po che dang / 
260a5(mdo): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thol bas/ chos thams cad ya ma skyes dang / ma byang bar mos pa'i sems rin po che dang pa thams cad la mngon par zhend pa myed chos thams cad la sgyu
260a6(mdo): ma dang / phyi rgya dang chu zla dang myig yor dang rmyi la ya / bus yang dag pas gzhol ba yi sems rin po che dang / rtag pa dang / chad pa dang / bral bas rtend cing 'brel par 'byung la dang / 'thun pa'i sos
260a7(mdo): rin po che dang / gnyis dang rnam pas mtharas/ ba thams cad se yang sems rin po che dang // reg pa gcig tu khong du chud pas gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i sems rin po me dang / skyon
260a8(mdo): myed pa la 'jug pa'i spyod pas thams cad las ldog pa yi sems rin po che dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ yang dag pa skyon myed pa la sa so rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang / sangs
260b1(mdo): rgyas kyi chos sems cad pa'i skye ba'i phyis/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yayang dag par bsgrubs pa'i sems rin po me te/ 'di dag ni chos rin po me brgyad na'o// gyi 'am ci'i bdag po zhe ltan/ ga
260b2(mdo): chos brgyad cu po 'di la 'jug pa dang / rol dang / nan tan byed pa de ni ting nge 'dzind rin po che 'i 'byu ba'i gnas shes bya'o// chos 'di dag ni to de 'dzin 'di bsgrub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe
260b3(mdo): dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzind 'di ral su thob par gyur da pa de'i tshe/ des gang la dbang thob par ma gyu dad pa'i rin po che 'jig rtend kyi 'am 'jig rtend las 'das pa de/ gang yang myed do// kyi
260b4(mdo): 'i bdag po de la 'jig rten du kyirin mo che ni gang / 'jig rten las 'das mdzin pa che ni gang zhen/ gyi 'am ci'i bdag po de la 'jig rten kyi rin po me ni 'di sa ste/ skad pa kyi rnams kyi che ba nyid na/ 
260b5(mdo): byin dang ngas nyid dang/ 'jig rtend myong pa nyid dang / 'khor lo ldan pa'i che ba nyid dang / na namanyim 'das dang / bram zel dang / rgyam rigs sa
260b6(mdo): ma rnams yang dag par sgrubs/ 'di ni lag rten gyi rin po che zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten da las 'das pa dzin pa mig zhen/ 'dis/ 'jig rten las 'das pa sa chas rin che/ 
260b7(mdo): na tan las mi man ma tshigapanan/ chos ga 'jig rten dalas sgrol ba'o// 'jig rten las gros pa mas ga zhan/ 'di 1/ 'pharnam pa 'dzin tan las 'dam
261a1(mdo): yin no// gyi 'am ci'i bdag mo 'di sa te/ dbenan/ klung thams cad kyi ma ni rgya 'tsho chen pa dang / rithams cad ga so mni ri'i rgyal ba mi rab po// skam ma khams cad kyi gcol sa ni sla ba'o// sna 'a sams
261a2(mdo): cad kyi gso bon nyi ma'o// ri dgas thams cad kyi gcol po ni seng ge'o// skye dgu thams cad kyi gcol po ni rgyal po la// sum bcu la pa gra sum pa thams cad rkye gcas ni brgya byin no// tshangs pa'i dbang
261a3(mdo): margyal rnams kyi gsosani tshangs pa chen po'o// kyi 'am mabadag po de bzhin du/ 'jig rten na las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi gtso ba ni shes rab ste/ de mi'i phyi shes ni chos
261a4(mdo): mas cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o// ma segs las bsakyis 'des pa bas // nyan mongs pa'i ses 'di phyir snyan pa'o// gsalasas rlom zhe'i byed dman
261a5(mdo): sa nas 'di khyim mas// dran ma nyamam mags pa kyis can pa'o// dag lam 'das rnamasanyam pa nyid de// 'thus dkyi rnam pa bskyed par/ 
261a6(mdo): dbang po rnams/ mnyam pa'i phyir myi 'gal ba'o// mtha' ma myed pa'i phyir 'azod pa myed pa'o// 'byung ba myed pa'i phyir myi 'gag pa'o// bden pa'i phyi dod nams yongs su shes pa mthar thug pa'i
261b1(mdo): da pa'i // sa pa myed pa'i rnasas nan// na dag bapyodapan pa yin zhes
261b2(mdo): na la 'das byed paras bdas par gnas la9/ dga' #sa ban/ kya bam do na pa 'dzin/ 
262a1(mdo): sa/ maldan 'das kyis bgal sa lad // rigs kyo nga cad kyipa ldan khris gas stod du gyu das// denas chub sems dpa'i
262b1(mdo): shes pa bgrang la ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin 'di ni gzugs su snang ba ma yin no// ting nge 'dzind 'di ni myig dang / rna ba da / sna dang / sre dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gzung ba ma yin/ 
262b2(mdo): skye ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin/ 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin// gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin/ rgya nad chad pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin/ mtshan nyid ma dad pa ma yin/ mtshan nyid ma yin/ 
262b3(mdo): mtshan nyid dang bral ba ma yin/ mtshan nyid myed pa yang ma yin te// brjod par bya ba ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin 'di ni yongs su rtogs par myi nus te/ kun tu rtogs pa ma yin/ rnam par rtogs pa ma yin no// 
262b4(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te ting nge 'dzin da 'di la yongs su gtogs pa 'am/ kun da du rtogs pa 'am/ rnam par rtogs par 'gyusan ni/ brtag pa 'i gzhi de nyid rtsa 'gyur gyi/ ting nge 'dzin ma yin no// 
262b5(mdo): rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba ni/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid de/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de pa/ khobo mnyam tsha/ de dang sems thams cad kyang mnyam mo// 
262b6(mdo): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ting 'dzin du 'di dang sems can thams cad mnyam mo// da sos phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad ni song pa ste/ stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'dir// sems can thams cad ni mtshan sa
262b7(mdo): myed pa ste/ mtshan ma myed pa'i mtshan nyid mi ting nge 'dzin 'dis// sems can thams can thams cad ni smond pa myed pa ste/ yond pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin da 'dir // sems can thams cad mi dben
262b8(mdo): ste/ dben pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin da 'dim// sems can thams cad ni bdag myed pa sa/ bdag myed pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o// de ni lus dpa ga dang sems kyis reg myi
263a1(mdo): ka pal la dag/ chos la reg par byed pa dang mnyam par byed pa dang / mngon par mnyam par byed pa de dag thams cad ni/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul pa la/ 
263a2(mdo): brgyal can du stond to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cad pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pa'i spyod pa bag chags
263a3(mdo): mchings pa 'di lta bu dang / chos la stobs pa 'di sa su mdo mtshan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasas lan pa// rigs kyi bu bya ba thams cad kyang kund tu stond ma// bya ba thams cad kyis kyang
263a4(mdo): myi gos pa 'di ni/ thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa'o// rigs kyi bu/ myi'// ma ci'i rgyal po ljond pa 'dis/ rgyud kyi sgra dang / klu'i ska dang / 
263a5(mdo): sil snyan dang / theg brdabs pa byas pa 'di'i tshul 'dis myi 'am ci'i bye ba phrag bdun/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzon/ sa pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smyind par byas so// dri za bye
263a6(mdo): phrag bcu la than byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su sbyind par byas so// spos rtse chen po kyi 'thag pa ni bcul yang blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sbyinan par byas
263a7(mdo): so// rab gi 'khor srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong yang byang chub tu yongs sbyind par byas so// shes rab dang thabs kyi ye shes 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpal ni gang dang gang ki tshe/ 'khor gi che
263a8(mdo): nyid 'khol pa dang / de dang de'i tshe/ sems can grangs myed dpag tu myed pa yongs su smyid pa ma byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyu myed par myi 'bar ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal
263b1(mdo): sems dpa' chen po dben pa na gnas pa yang / sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i me myi 'bar ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyu yod na me 'thar ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub
263b2(mdo): sems dpal sems dpa' chen po skye bo phal po che'i nang na lug na/ sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba 'bar ro// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir nam grangs 'dis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpal ji ltar ji lta bur
263b3(mdo): yul dpa'akhoram chen po 'byord par gyur pa de lta de lta bum/ sems can dpag tu myed pa yongs su sbyind par byed par rig par bya'o// de skad ces bkal saHkhad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
263b4(mdo): dpal lha mi cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pas/ rgyad da kyi sgra dang / kUli sgra dang / sis snyan dang / pheg brde ba la bgyid
263b5(mdo): pas/ sems can yongs su sbyin da par bgyid/ com na 'das kyis bka' sa la pa/ rigs kyi sa gyis ma ci me dang/ tha dang / sa kyi'i chen po mu gang rnam ma'i sgra dbyangs su
263b6(mdo): mom pa rnams pa kyi ma ma'i rgyal ba stonan pas gang gi tshi 'i ba gi mos pam byed cing sim stan dang / thu dbyangs spyod pa den/ gyi'am ci'i dam rjesal dang ltu byel chen po de dag dga' 'a dang / 
263b7(mdo): rab tu mgul ba chen po 'thob po// de dag dgal ba dang / mos pa dang / rab tu mgul ba thog nas rgya nad kyi sgra dang / sil snyand kyi sgra dang / gru dbyangs kyi sgra de dag las sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo // chos
263b8(mdo): kyi sgra dang / dgel 'dun gi da s+tha 'byung ngo // byang chub kyi sems la dga' ba dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems skyed par spyod pa'i sgra 'byung ngo // sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus pa// 
264a1(mdo): bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi sgra 'byung // byams dang nyi rje dang / dga' ba dang btam snyoms kyi sgra dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sas dag pams tha' dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa dang / dgra
264a2(mdo): po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha dad pa dang ka ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgra 'byung ngo // gyi rtag pa
264a3(mdo): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa dang skye ba myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed
264a4(mdo): pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i sgra 'byung ngo do// byang chub sems dpa'i/ snrel snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang gzungs dang / rdo rje'i tshig dang / 'khor gsum yongs su ston pa'i sgra 'byung do// phyir myi ldog pa'i
264a5(mdo): sa kyi 'char lo rab tu bskor ba'i sgra dang / chos thams cadal rnam sa par nges pa'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / chas thams cad la
264a6(mdo): dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sra dang / chos thams cad la dab po byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sku dang / rnam par dgokod pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / rin chen sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sku dang / rin po che 'byung
264a7(mdo): gnas kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / rin chen tshigs pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi skra dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / dga' bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi skra dang / pad ma kar po'i ting nge 'dzind kyi
264a8(mdo): sgra dang / pad ma bla ma'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / dam+b+ha pa'i chos pad ma kar po'i ting nge 'dzind kyi swA dang / 
264b1(mdo): khyad par can gyi ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / rnam par rgyal bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / che bar bsgyings pa 'i tipa de 'dzind kyi ska dang / rnam pa ya sems dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzi nad kyi sgra dang / seng ge bsgyings pa'i
264b2(mdo): ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / nyi ma'i smon pa'i ting pe 'ang nad kyi ske dang / 'amal yas 'khyi pa'i ting nge 'di nad kyi sgra dang / rgya nang gi rjes su song ba 'i ting nge 'dzi nad kyi sgra dang / rdo rje dkyil 'khor na tid pe 'dzind kyi sA dang / 
264b3(mdo): rdo rje rgyal mtshan gi ting nge 'dzind kyi sra dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / rdo rje lto ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sna dang / sa 'dzind kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi sku dang / spun po sngon ma'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sA dang / phun po rgyal mtshan
264b4(mdo): gi ting nge 'dzind kyi skra dang / rin chen mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzind kyis dang / sems la dbang byed pa li ting nge 'dzind kyi sma dang / sems kyi sems la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / spyod pa zhes
264b5(mdo): cad kyi yul las nges par 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad kyi sgra dang / za mo sbed par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / spobs pa sA nas kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / bltar myi mthong ba li ting nge 'dzin
264b6(mdo): kyi sgra dang / chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad kyi sgra dang / rnam par dze led pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad las nges par 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / bcud
264b7(mdo): kyid dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / gzugs thams cad kun dro ston pa'i tI de 'dzind kyi sku dang / skathams cad 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sku dang / lus thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i
264b8(mdo): ti nge 'dzin kyi sgra dang / spyod pa sems cas la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / shes rab smon la me tim pa 'dzind kyi sgra dang / lag na smon dam mi ting nge 'dzind kyi sna dang / byang tshul mngom
265a1(mdo): snang byed kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra dang / so sa yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ston pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi skra dang / yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgra 'byung ngo // rigs/ 
265a2(mdo): kyi bu de ltar rgyu nad kyi sgra dang / sil snyan gyi swa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra de dag las/ chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu 'di dag dang / ting nge 'dzi nad kyi skra 'byung ngo // s+tha de dag gis sems can de dag yongs su sbyind par byed
265a3(mdo): par 'gyu ra te// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen po rnams ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// myi 'am ci'i rgyal po lo nad pa'i yon tan pa sngags pa bstand pa
265a4(mdo): 'di bshad pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gi lag lam lha li me tog man b+ha ra'i phur ma khyab nas/ do dag gis me tog gi phur ma de dag/ myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pa la gtor
265a5(mdo): de nas kyi 'am ci'i rgyal po lnga nad pas/ byin gyi rlangs pa/ 5 bus/ me tog de dag lag pa g.yas par blangs te/ me/ tog gcig kyang sa la myi lung ba de lta bu'i byi nad kyi rlabs byind
265a6(mdo): kyis brlabs nas/ me tog blangs pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon pam gtadad to// danas me tog de dag gtodad ma las sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ gan cig de la spong gi 'jig rten gi khams/ 
265a7(mdo): me tog rin po che'i gzugs gcig gis khyebs par gyur da to// me tog rin po che'i gzugs des/ mu tig gi rgyand 'phreng ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu byung ngo // mu tig gi rgyand 'phreng gi
265a8(mdo): de thams cad las kyang / 'do gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum 'byung ngo // 'od gzer thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang / pad ma sna tshogs blta na sdug pa/ kha tog dang ldan pa/ dri dang / 
265b1(mdo): ldan pa/ yid pa 'ong ba dag srung bar byar to// pad ma thams can la ya/ bcom ldan 'das gag kya grub pa mi 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ skyil mo sum bcas shing bathunas
265b2(mdo): pam kun tu snang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis kyang / myi 'am 'i'i rgyal po bsngon dpa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes su dam pa khyed kyis/ sems can ma po yongs su
265b3(mdo): sbyin par byas so// sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyis/ gang yul las rnam par grol yang / yul thams cad kyang ston da/ 'khor ba las dz+wa la yang bsams bzhin tu srid par skye ba kun tu
265b4(mdo): dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i skyon de myed pa tho ba yang mas gsum na nye bar spyod pa 'di la bu ni/ byang chub semashes dpa'i bya ba yin te// legs so legs so// de nas myi 'am
265b5(mdo): ces rgya tho ljon pas de'i nas su sems te/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi dbul la/ rin tshe'i gzugs gzhan dag byind kyis 'arlabs so snyam mo// de nas
265b6(mdo): myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon da pa de'i tshe chen po che'i gzugs bkod pa zhes bya ba 'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// myi 'am ci'i rgyal po sngond pa rin po che yi gdugs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzind de la snyoms
265b7(mdo): par zhugs ma lag tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbu'i drang dad kyi steng na/ rin po che 'i gzugs rnams gnas pas kun tu snang ngo // 'khoram de thams cad kyi lag pa g.yas panas kyang / rin
265b8(mdo): po che li gcugs rnams byung bar gyurd te/ de dag gis rin po che yi gcugs de dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mngon par bka' ba'o// / de nas kyi 'am ci'i rgyal lo ljond pa 'di
266a1(mdo): snyam cu sems te/ 'di snyam bdag gis gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag yamam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge
266a2(mdo): 'dun dngapa bcas par bshes la spyan drangs te/ 'di ltam bcom ldan 'das lakho rang dang bcas pas/ ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngan ldan gyi bdag gi gnas su gshegs pa gsol lo// desam na bdag gi gnas yongs
266a3(mdo): bu skyed par 'gyur ro// lha dang kyu dang / gnad sbyin dang / dri zal dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldan dang / gyi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs myed la la yan btags par yang 'gyur ro// 
266a4(mdo): de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkum par bya ba dang / yongs su spya par bya bar sngo bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de dag ni yun ring po yi don dang phan pa grub pa dang bdel ba dang / byang chub
266a5(mdo): dpa'i bsgrub pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas myi 'amaci'i rgyal po ljond pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhibs la/ mgo bos phyag 'tshald te/ thal mo sbya rad nas bcom ldan
266a6(mdo): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs pa che pa dang / sems can thams tshad ma mchis pa'i dgel ba'i la spel ba 'i srad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
266a7(mdo): dag la rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i dge la 'dun dang / thabs gcig tu ri spos kyi ngad ldang gi ngos la bdag gi gnas su dgung bdun zhig bzhugs par bdag la gnang bar mdzad pu gsold// 
266a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khom dang bcas la la bsnyen du bkur dang / yongs su spyad par bgyi 'ang mA'o// 'chom ldan 'das kyis kyi lam ci'i rgyal po ljon pa/ la thugs
266b1(mdo): bseban phyim/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyanams kyi tshogs dpa mas pan zhag brgyan rna mas kyi san rnams la 'azugs pa na dadang // danas kyi 'am ci'i rgyam ma ldan pas/ som ldan
266b2(mdo): 'das kyis gnang ba ma ni gnas/ tshim zhing mgul la yid rangs shing ral tu dgas ste/ dgal la dang yid bdel pa skyes nas/ sras dang / gnyen med pa dang / g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'as
266b3(mdo): kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas yan gsum bskor pa byas te/ sil snyan dang rol mo'i dbyangs sA byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas song nas ri'i
266b4(mdo): rgyal po/ sos kyi ngad ldang la gnas so// de nas myi'i co'i rgyal po ljond pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rang gi khyim rgyan thams cad kyis brgyand te/ 'khor kyi khyims rgyar
266b5(mdo): kho ma yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgyal ba/ bye 'u rtsa sngon po dang // 'dzam bu'i chu li gser gi pad mas legs par brgya nad pa/ rin po che bums rnam par smras pa byas so// 'kho da kyi kyis
266b6(mdo): des gdam khri ma 'ar rin po ches pas byas pa/ lA li ras btsas su brgya stong bting la brgya stong phrag mang pos 'ashams so// ma ldan 'das kyi bdan seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bcu gnyi
266b7(mdo): 5/ rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ rin po che kha khyen gyis bskar la/ gcugs dang rgyal mtshan dpa' dan bsgreng ba/ snying po mchog gi gdugs pas gzugs pas lnga re bres pa// rang gi lnga khrimang po
266b8(mdo): bres pa/ lha'i me tog gtored pa bshams so// seng ge'i khri de 'i phyogs bzhir rin po che'i shing ldan pa sna tshogs bltal na sdug pa/ bzhi spru la da te/ skye bo zas rta bsdus nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di
267a1(mdo): dag snyam // sa bam matan ma bzhin// sangs rgyas 'byung sa da / mchog de ni dang gyub 'byasas kyis/ tshul lanam da
267a2(mdo): pas mtshan la gyis// brgyal dag dang rgyags dang ga yon spongs pa// mdag sem na la da bzhin rgyurnams dang / nod pa thams cad yong su babyos pa// skyon la lus dang las pas mtshan lagyis/ 
267a3(mdo): ngad 'am pa 'di na sa yul ki/ kye tog khyad pas 'phags pa ji snyed pa/ de dag thams cad gcig rtsa bsdus nas su// skyes su khyu mchog sa ni mchod pa gyis// sems can mchog sa mchod pa bya la
267a4(mdo): tshan pam 'phas sa/ pa nas sun la / ma ban nam ma
267a5(mdo): seMdag nag me gas byed pa// ldan par byas dga' ni padapa' yis/ nang gnyis mchog la mchon pa rab tu kyis// / lus pa myed pa mamazas nyid dgas pa// de bzhin gshes
267a6(mdo): la lta ba'i brgyags rnams dang / gdan dag dang rgyal mtshan chos gos dang / bla re dmar po yid 'od gzung bar byos// sangs rgyas mchog pas bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// brgya byind dang ni 'jig
267a7(mdo): rtend skyong bar 'gyur// tshangs pa dag dang dbang byed dbang phyug dang // lha dang myi'i bdag po chen por 'gyur// myi mchog mchod pas gzugs dang kha dog dang / grangs dang brjod pa dpa' khor dang longs
267a8(mdo): spyaD+ha dang / de bzhin dbang phyug dang ni mnyan tshig dang / de bzhin gzugs par 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur// kabadag 'dir ni lha dang de bzhin du// myi rnams kyi 'dus byas bdel ba dang // bdel pa ba
267b1(mdo): chim pan 'dod sa nas// 'jig rten 'gan tshanas mtsha bgyis/ rang rgyas kya chum da bzhin tanams dang // de dmas mtshag gsan pa dang // rgyan gyi tha ba rnams ca rnams gang 'dod pam/ 
267b2(mdo): sems can mtshas de la ni mchod pa gyis// nanas kyi ma thas rgyal ba ldanan pas rang ga gsag la ma thams cadan par byas // mnananang sri pa breb pa dang / rmun pa mnogs nas/ 
267b3(mdo): pa'i zhal zas bgams te/ ri'i rgyal ba yoms kyi ngang sang gyi lho phyogs kyi rnas la/ brgyag nas sal snyan dang / sprul dbyangs grangs te/ rgyud kyi sgra dang glu'i sA dpa la ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyungs
267b4(mdo): kyis/ com ldan 'das la gdugs tshol bab pa// ban mdza cing dgal mdzad pa de mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das// zhal ni mang 'jam zla ba'i ngas snyam dri khyi mngal// skyes mchog dge la skyob dam/ 
267b5(mdo): lha dang gyis mchod pa// bdel b.ram gshegs pa khyod 'dir nigs pa'i nus 'di lags// stobs brgyal rnams/ kyi stobs mnga' pha rol da dpung 'joms pa// gzhan gyi
267b6(mdo): tshogs rnams 'joms zhing 'grol ban pa mdzad// ma 'khrugs su brtogs dri ma mtha' spangs pa// phan pa mdzad pa khyod 'dir gshegs pa'i dus 'di lags// sbyangs pa'i yon tan nul
267b7(mdo): sa cig par gtas// dran dang thags pa mnasams chags thags ldan/ da 'das te/ yan pa sa na ci nga su du byas pa
267b8(mdo): na tha rnams mdan pa dzid/ ma gyid pa sa dang mi 'a ga yon // sa na pas rgyas chub khyo 'dam yin gyid pas// di 'di mams nas rgya
268a1(mdo): 'di ni lha ga'o// khyod kyi lha srang shul skad gyi 'am pa'i bu sgra'is// yang dang yang mu 'bar pa'i nyon mongs ni bar bgyi// skan mchog yangs pa tshangs pa rnams kyis skad kyis// nyon mongs thams
268a2(mdo): cad zhi bar bgyid pas 'bar ma lags// smand pa gang dag phyogs bcur rgyu yang de dag gis// gang rtswa'ang 'gro ba'i nyon mongs zhi bar bgyid myi nus/ smand pa'i rgyal po bla myed gang tshe gsungs pa brjod// de tshe
268a3(mdo): nyon mongs kun gzhi la bde ba thams par sbyind// shin du ro mtshar 'od dang stobs mchog mtshungs myed stobs// gsung ni skyon bral 'khrul pa myi mngal dgra 'dul pa// rdul myed rab rig dag gis mund pa
268a4(mdo): shi nad tu bcom// dgra bral phan mdzad khyod kyi dus lags 'dir ga/ gas gsol// sbyind dang rdul dang legs spyod myi mnyam ma/ chungs dang mnyam// tshul khrims brtul zhugs myi 'khrugs
268a5(mdo): brtul zhugs ka' thub partson// bzod dang rdul dang shin da tu dge la nges pa'i thugs// dgal gsung dgra rnams kyi ni dga' dron gshegs su gsol // dbang po stobs dpal ma dges bsam/ 
268a6(mdo): gtan mngon mkhye nad ro lad// dram dang blo gros rtogs dang mos gnas pa'i thugs// 'od ni rab su lha ke shin dang tu dges pa'i thugs// yon tan mngal ba khyod 'dir gshegs pa'i dus 'di lags// byams dang sbyin
268a7(mdo): rme dgal dang btang snyoms bsgoms pa'i thugs// skyond kyi mun pa bcom zhing bag la nyam dang bral// tshangs pa'i lam ni rab bslabs rgyal ba'i lam la gnas// dag la mdzan 'del bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/ 
268a8(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas gzugs chod la bab pa'i tshogs su bcad pa la gas mnas dgel slong gi dge la 'dun la bka lasaHlad pa// dge' slong dag kyi 'am cil rgyal po l-I dad las/ 
268b1(mdo): gags cho pa pab kyis/ sngam bzed da mags tha nas la zhan bdun gnas pa'i gtsug cag kha myongs pa thos shig// / de nas byang chub sems dpal ma can yan 'di snyam ma sems te// 'di sa
268b2(mdo): bdag gis kha pa brtsegs pa bkod pa 'di lta bu spu lad la khapa pa brtsegs pa den/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' nyan ngos kyi tshogs dang bcas par zhugs te// rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khril
268b3(mdo): bzhugs pa'i khang pa 'artsegs pa/ bdag gis lag pa g.yas par blangs ste/ nam mkha'i ro se la ri'i rgyal po spo bas dad lAng du bkur bar byind kyis brlabs po snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha
268b4(mdo): na sdug pa/ gru bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam pa shi nad tu rnam par phye/ ba khyud do// khang pa brtsegs pa der stobs dang ldan pa'i/ pad ma bkod pa'i khri rnams kyang byung ngo // khang pa brtsegs
268b5(mdo): der bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rin po che par ma bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri 'bang cu myi mdun yod pa khya // de nas byang chub sems dpal lnga'i cod pan gyis/ khab pa brtsegs pa bkod pa
268b6(mdo): dang / seng ge'i khri bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bdag la thugs pa chel ba yi slad cu bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpal dang / nyan thos chen
268b7(mdo): bgadi dag dang/ thabs gcigs/ khapa la legs pa se ge'i khri bshams pa/ 'dir bzhugs su gsol// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khapal brtsegs pa 'di sug pa g.yas pas blangs te/ ri'i rgya
269a1(mdo): po spos kyi rad lnga pa rdzu 'tshal nas gzhag par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la thugs pa che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dpal dang / nyan thos chen
269a2(mdo): po de dag dang / thabs gcig tu/ kha pa rtsegs pa der/ ji ltar khri pa shams pa de dag la bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpal yA'i cod pan gyis khang pa legs pa de// lag mthil g.yam par blangs te
269a3(mdo): to pa gi nam mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis song do// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i shu rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpal lha'i cod pan gyi rdzu 'phrul gi cho 'phrul 'di mthong nas
269a4(mdo): tshim zhing mgul la yid rangs shing rab tu dag la ste/ dgal ba dang yid bdel ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpas sems dpal chen po lnga 'i cod pan la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ 
269a5(mdo): ma tog dang / 'jug pa dang / zab pa dang / byug pa thams cad thogs te/ mim lhan dang / theg brnas pas/ bcom ldam 'das kham pa pa cheg pa na bzhugs shing / nam mkha li masas
269a6(mdo): gnags pa sa mchad pa byas // rang rgyal pa tham ma kyi nga 'ab sa phyin te// kyi lam tha'i rgyal zo bsngond pas mamams ldan 'das khang pa 'alegs na 'azhugs dang/ rnam pa 'a 'angs sas gnanas pa mad / 
269a7(mdo): mthong nas kyi a mi dang / dri zal brgya khri bzhi stong gis panan te/ me tog dang 'jug pa dang / sras dang bre pa dang byug pa thams cad thogs nas/ pil snyan dang / ben rdom pa dang / sru dbyangs lenas
269a8(mdo): pa dag pa byas te/ ma ldan 'das bsum pa'i phyim byang dzini nas kyi ma pa'i rgyal ze sngond par bu dang bas ya ma dang bcos pa/ yom ldan 'das kyi rnamams ma mas rgyasamanganas
269b1(mdo): ji lta thogs pa'i me ton dang gtsug pa dang spos dpa'abreb sa dang phyag phra de dag dang / sil snyand dang/ pheg rdob pa dang / gru dbyangs lend pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so// de nas
269b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs rjod spos dpa' phreng pa dang / byug pa de dag dang / 2bal bar mkhyend nas/ byang chub sems dpal dang / nyan thos chen po dang / brgya byinang dang/ tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
269b3(mdo): myong ba dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yA'i su rnams dang thabs gcig tu/ myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljo nad pa'i 'khoram gi khyams bkod pa der gshegs te/ rang gi se ge'i khri ji ltar bshams la la bzhugs so// 
269b4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad kyar/ so so ci rigs par 'khod do// de nas myi 'am ci'i rgya po ljo nad pas/ brgya byi nad dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
269b5(mdo): dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha/ li gu de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa dang / thabs gcig rtsag gas tshod gsol gyisaH/ khyed
269b6(mdo): thams cad 'dus la tshur spyond// de nas kyi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pa sras dang bcas bu dang bcas/ gnyen 'das dang bcas/ 'khom dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas te/ rang rang gi lag gis
269b7(mdo): brtsal sa dang / bcal pa rgyan ma pa ma ba/ ro dang ldan pa/ so 'phya ba yigal bas na tshogs bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'argyan dang / dges slong gi dge' 'dun gi 'khom la brims nas/ 
269b8(mdo): si 'del 'am bstan sas te tshim par byas so// tshim par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bzed bzhag/ phyag bcabs par niganas/ dpu pa dpa bcas g.yog dang bcas te/ chos nyand
270a1(mdo): ga pa'i phyi/ mam ldan 'das kyi spyan ldan mi snyan bdag la rnam pa sa gan la 'jug no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyi ma ci'i rgyal po ljond pa dpa skye mo phal po med dag la ga chos/ 
270a2(mdo): kyi gtam yang dag par stond to// yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go// de nas bcom ldan/ yang dag pas gzeng bstod do// yang dag pa ma rab tu dgal ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi gtam
270a3(mdo): ni 'di yin te/ gyi 'am cis bdag po nam/ sum bcu la rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyind pa'i pha rol da su phyind pa yongs su dag la yin no// rnam pa sum bcu pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 
270a4(mdo): myi 'am ci'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pra sbyin pa na/ byang chub kyi sems sngon tu 'gro bas sbyind pa/ de sbyin pa dang / theg pa dman pa spang ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa de sbyin
270a5(mdo): pa dang / slob pa zhen sda ba myed pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / le nad pa rnams la sbyin gnas su 'du shes bskyed de// sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / lend pa rnams la dge la da'i/ 
270a6(mdo): bshes gnyen du 'acu shes bskyed de sbyind pa de sbyin pa dang / nang gi kun nyin mongs pa'i dri ma sangs te sbyind pa de sbyin pa dang / kun tu 'dzind pa myed pa'i sems kyis dgal sa dang / dang ba dang mchog su dag lang / 
270a7(mdo): thob nas sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / lag pa rgyang ste sprug par gton pa rnam par gtong ba la dga' bas sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / rgya chen po la mos te zhum pa myed pa'i sems kyis sbyind pa de sbyin pa dang / 
270a8(mdo): skye ba thams cad la gyi gnas par sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / rnam pas sbyin pa la ne ba myed par sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / lan la re ba gyed pa'i thos sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
270b1(mdo): ba'i thos sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes su bsngos te sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / gzung ba myed pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang bsdug pa'i dngos po sngon du 'gro bas sbyin pa de sbyin// 
270b2(mdo): pa dang / bdag sems can yongs su sbyind par byed par 'gyur ro/ zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag chos 'dzind par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkal dang 'thun
270b3(mdo): par 'gyur ro zhes sbyind pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag bcud kyi phyogs tshar gcod par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyor bar 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag skyes
270b4(mdo): su dam pa'i las byed par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag yi dgas kyi lam rnam par spong bam 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag gi 'dog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i
270b5(mdo): rgyu bakhrugs par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag gis yongs spyod chen pod 'gyur ba'i sgrub pa yongs su bzung ban 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag yang dag 'gyur ba
270b6(mdo): chos rnams la gnas par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang // bdag la dge la bshes gnyen dkon par myi 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa myed pa'i phyis/ 
270b7(mdo): skyed par 'gyur ro zhes/ sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag gi sbyin pa des bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrubs pas 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpal gtong ga phun
270b8(mdo): sum tshogs pa gzhan rnams kyis rjes su bslangs par 'gyur zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / 'dag / mtshan dang dbye byad bzang po bsags pa yongs su bzung 'ang 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / 
271a1(mdo): bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi ning yongs su dag pa dang / bdag la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum cu 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa ste/ kyi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam gsum pa stsa gnyis la/ 
271a2(mdo): di dan zhes kyang rgyal sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pharo lad tsa phyind pa yongs su dag lam yin no// / gyi bam cis bdag po// rnam pa sum bcul cha gnyis kyis/ byang chul sems dpal sems dpa' chen
271a3(mdo): bo'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha no la da sa phyind pa yong su dag pa yin te/ sum bsums gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste// chags pa dang zhe sdab dang gti mug dang bral bas yus yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / bdag
271a4(mdo): lha sangs rgyas la myi sprul ba'i mtshan nyid kyis/ ngag yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / brnal sems dang gnad sems dang / lo ge la ma lta ba myed pas sems yongasu dag pa'i tshul
271a5(mdo): da / lha dang gyi yi phun sum tshogs pa myo bas/ dgel lang/ chu'i yas kyi kham yongasu dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / nying yis thams cad myi stond pas byang chub kyi sems dang / @
271a6(mdo): gyi brjod pa'i tshu khrims dang / shin rtsa nyams pa myed cing ge yo la dang bral bas// zhus pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / skye bo phal pa thams cad sdud pas 'a phags pas skye bos
271a7(mdo): bsngags pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas byams pa sngon du 'gro ba'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad yongs su skyog pas/ snying rje chen po la rab tu ston
271a8(mdo): ba'i tshul khrims dang / dam bcas pa'i stobs kyis bskal ya legs par rdzogs pa yang dag par 'dzind pa'i tshul khrims dang / khan ma tho la chung rdul yang 'jigs pam ltabs poche shes shing / 
271b1(mdo): ma yod pa yun sum tshogs pa'i tshul khrims dang / shi nad tu myi gtong pas skyon da myed pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyod pa shind ma dag pas yum chags ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas/ 
271b2(mdo): zhing gzhan tu 'gro las rang gi rnam pa yas pa la dbang byed pa yi tshul khrims dang / skye ma sakhas pas rig pa 'i phyis pasngags pa'i tshul khrims dang / ngan mo pa ngan 'gromams cad kyi lam las tshul
271b3(mdo): tshul khrims dang / bde ba'i dngos popo thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ sangs rgyas kyis gnapa'a'i tshul khrims dang / 
271b4(mdo): yi dam la brtand pas myi lhod pa'i tshul khrims dang / rang gi sems nges par sems las/ bdag la myi stod gzhan la myi smod pa'i tshul khrims dang / nyon mongs pa myed pas nges par
271b5(mdo): sems dpa'i snying rje'i tshul khrims dang byang chul kyi phyo gsakyi chos thams cad nye bar byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / ra rba dgal ba ma byed pas dga' bar byed pa yi tshul khrims dang / 
271b6(mdo): 'don pa la chags pa myed pas chog shes par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang // denan tan snying por byed pas bsgral pa rlabs so ches tshul khrims dang / khyim zhi na gnas thams cad la gyi lta bas rab sa bya la
271b7(mdo): la gzhol ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos kyi kun dgal la dga' mos pas dkon pa la dgal ba dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang/ 'phags pa'i rigs la/ rton pas 'dod pa chu zhi pachog shes pa la nges
271b8(mdo): pa'i tshul khrims dang / sdig pa 'dod pa thams cad dang bral bas sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la yang dag par sbyon pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can myed pa ma rnam par sbyan
272a1(mdo): bas dmyigs pa myed par myom pa yi tshul khrims dang / chad pa dang rtag pa yongs su spo pa 'as lta ban song ba thams cad dang / gti mug se lad pa'i tshul khrims dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung
272a2(mdo): bal gyi 'gal zhes byang chub kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i tshul khrims te// gyi 'am ci mi bdag po rnam pa sum 'argyam gnyis po 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol da tu phyin pa yongs su
272a3(mdo): dag pa yin no// myi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam gsum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha ro lad tu phyind pa yongasu dag pa'i yin te sum bcu pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// lus
272a4(mdo): la myi lta bas bzod par lta ba dang / srog la myi chags pas bzod par lta ba dang / zhe 'gras pa'i sems myed pas bzod par blta ba dang / nye bar smras pa'i tshig dang du lend pas bzod
272a5(mdo): pan lta ba dang / nyam chung ba'i sems can la snying rje bskyed pa/ sa bzod par lta ba dang / ma bslas pa la myi brnyas pas pa/ zod par lta ba dang / gdon par byed pa rnams la lan glan pa'i
272a6(mdo): mthul yod kyab lan gyi ljon pas bzod par blta la dang / yan log dang nyil lag samams cad bcad kya kyi 'khrugs shing gnod sems myed pas bzod par blta ba dang / brlab pa myed pas bzod par swA
272a7(mdo): dang / gshel la sa 'phrar gyi gzhal bas 'thad pa mas pa dang / bsam pa dag pas bzod paras ba dang / rten pa'i sems byed pas bzod pam blta' ba dang / shugs pa mi sems byed pas man/ 
272a8(mdo): bam lta ba dang / sems can thams cad pam pa'i dngos pa ma bzod pam la lte ba dang / snyib me'i tho dang ldan pas bzod pam blta pa dang / nga rgyal byed 'azod par lta pa dang / sems can thams cad sa brtan
272b1(mdo): pa thams cad cing 'jud pas bzod par blta ba dang / 'bam pa myed pas bzod par blta ba dang / nyes pa zhi bas bzod par blta ba dang / nges par sems pas bzod par lta ba dang / bdag gi 'khrug pa la so// 
272b2(mdo): son rtog pas brjod par lta ba dang / gzhan ga 'khrul pa'i skyon dal gyis bas bzad par 'askal pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pas 'azod par ltal dang / dang po'i dngos po bzod par lta la dang / 
272b3(mdo): sems la gdung ba myed pas bzod pam lta pa dang / bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer myed pas/ bzod par lta la dang / gso por skabs bzod 'am ltas // rnam par thadad pa'i sgo gsum la sA pa la myed pa
272b4(mdo): bzod par lta ba dang / ma skyes pa dang ma byung pa la mos pas bzod par lta ba dang / ma skyes pa dang ma byung la la mos pas bzod par lta sa drang/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thog pas bzod par lta ba ste// myi
272b5(mdo): tham ci'i bdag po rnam ya sum brgyam gnyis po 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'azod pa'i mdo lad mu phyi nad pa/ yongs su dag pa yin no// / gyi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam
272b6(mdo): pa sum bcu la ma gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpal rnams 'phon 'grus kyi pha rol du phyind pa yongs su dag pa yin te// sum bcu cha gnyis gang zhe na/ myi 'am ci'i bdag po 'di la ste/ 
272b7(mdo): byang tshul sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyand kyi 'chad par bya ba ni phyim brtson 'grus ma pa dang / chos kyi rigs rgyan gyi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir bcon 'grus tshim pa dang / dgel 'dun de rigs rgya
272b8(mdo): cad par bya ba'i khyim brtson 'grus mam ya dang / sems can chad myed pa yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir 'tshon 'grus mtsham pa dang / 'khor lachad myed pa yo sa bzu ba 'i phyir 'tshon 'asum tsho ma pa dang / 
273a1(mdo): sangs rgyas tshad myed pa la mchod pa dang nim gro bya ba'i phyir pa mon 'grus p+pa dang / dgel ba'i sa pa tshad ShA bsags pa'i phyir brtson 'grus 'acom pa dang / sangs rgyas thos pa tshad myed
273a2(mdo): gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus chom pa dang / sems can thams cad la legs par bshad pas tshim par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus chos pa dang / sems can thams cad la rab tu ga dpa bar bya ba'i phyir 'artson
273a3(mdo): 'grus 'acom pa dang / sems can thams cad la bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la spo ba'i phyir brtson 'grus chom pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su myi tong pa'i phyir ba can 'grus chom pa dang / sems can
273a4(mdo): thams cad tshul khrims kyi bslal pa la gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grum rtsom pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs thams cad dang / des pa myi nyams par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus chom pa dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par
273a5(mdo): tha dad pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa tham/ sa cad bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus chom pa dang / cha chags pa myed pa'i shes rab mchog yongs su bskab pa'i phyir bcom 'grus chom
273a6(mdo): pa dang / byams pa dang snying rje dpa dgal ba dang btang snyoms pa li gnas pa yongs su bsla ba'i phyir brtson 'grus mom pa dang mngon par shes pa thams cad la brtson 'grus bskyed pa'i phyir 'tshon chus
273a7(mdo): rnam pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan bshad pa rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing su yongs su 'phrul ba'i phyir 'artson 'grus chom pa dang / bcu thams cad gnol ba'i phyir 'artson 'grus tshim pa dang / stobs brtan
273a8(mdo): pa chen pom pa no 'ad gnas pa'i phyir 'ayon 'grus chos mo dang / pa ni sa dan sang pa sams pad kyis dang mun par cham gcod pa'i byi tshon 'grus mam pa dang / stoms bcu la dang kyi 'dzin pa la rasangs kyi
273b1(mdo): rgya cham yongs su snang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus chom pa dang / lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyand kyi phyin brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bya ba thams cad nyams ma 'og tu chud par byed cing brtson pa myi gtab pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus/ 
273b2(mdo): rtsom pa dang / sems zhum pa myed par bya ba'i phyir 'artson 'grus bcom pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis kyi ji bar bya ba'i bu bon 'grus bcom pa dang / ma rgal pa bsgral ma grol ba dag dkrol dbugs ma byind pa
273b3(mdo): dbugs/ 'byung / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya nga las bzla' ba'i phyir partson 'grus chom pa dang / bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gi tshogs bstsags pa'i phyir brtson 'grus 'tshom pa dang / sangs rgyas thams
273b4(mdo): cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus chom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rdzu 'phrul kyis 'gro zhing sangs rgyas par blta kha'i phyir batshon 'grus tshim pa dang / sus
273b5(mdo): dang sems dben pa'i phyir de'i brtson 'grus de dben pa las desapar byung ba dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes la' jug pa'i phyir di'i brtson 'grus de blang ba myed cing dod pa myed la gdeg
273b6(mdo): ba myed cing gzhan pa myed de/ skye ba myed cing 'byung ba myed pas bsdus pa yin te/ myi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu ma gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yo
273b7(mdo): su dag pa yin no// // myi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa um bas sa gnyis kyi byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ sum mya \u0f7f gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 
273b8(mdo): dran pa yongs su dag pa dang / blo gros yongs su dag pa dang / rtogs pa yongs su dag pa dang po tshe shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / khrel yod pa yongs su dag pa dang / mo sa pa yong su dag pa dang / bsngo ba yongs
274a1(mdo): rba dag pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi brjed pa yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po smras pa yongs su dag pa dang / gyi gnas pa yongs su dag pa dang / de la ma chags pa yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par/ 
274a2(mdo): shes pa bskyed pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems las su rung pa yong su dag pa dang / lus dben pa yong su dag pa dang / brag cha shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / nang nye bar zhi ba yongs su dag pa dang / phyi ro lad tu gyi rgya
274a3(mdo): ba yongs su dag pa dang / dmyigs pa'i stal spob pa yongs su dag pa dang / bdag byed pa dang / sems can myed pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gsol ba myed pa dang / gang zag myed par ma som rtog cing khams sum
274a4(mdo): pal myi gnas pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgo yong su dag pa dang / sems can la blta ba'i snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa dang / shes ral la 'jug pas rab rig myed cing sApa pa yongs
274a5(mdo): su dag pa dang / mya dang 'bras bu dang rnam par sbyidad pa dang / myi 'gal ba yongs su dag pa dang / chos la sems pa'i zod pa yongs su dag pa dang / tshul bzhin gyi rnam pa'i chos las
274a6(mdo): rtog pa yongs su dag pa dang ga rgyu dang 'bras bu dang rnam par spyan de pa dang / myi 'gal kha yongs su dag pa dang/ chos sa sems pa'ong zad pa yongs su dag pa dang / tshul bzhin/ thabs sa mkhas pas/ bsdu
274a7(mdo): yongs su das byang chub kyi snyi po bsgrug pa yongs su dag pa dam/ nyan thos dpar nga sangs rgyas dang kyi 'dre ba yongs su dag pa dang / gyi g.yol ba'i bsam gtan skul pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
