274a8(mdo): ti de 'dzin thog pa sa gyi g.yes yoms su dag pa dang / sems pan thams cad kyi sems dang byed pas sa yongs su dag pa dang / sems cad kyi dang pal chog dang mchog yin bya shes nas so
274b1(mdo): so ci rigs par chos ston da pa yangs su dag pa ste/ myi 'am cimi bdag blo sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gyis/ byang chub sems dpal bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag pa yin no// / myi 'am ci'i/ 
274b2(mdo): bdag po rnam pa sum bcul sa gnyis kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol da su phyind pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ thos pa tshol bas rgya ngoms pas mang du thos pa dang / tshul
274b3(mdo): bzhin yid la byed pas chos rnams la spyod pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa dang / byang chub mngon sum du byed pa yi bdag nyid kyi chos bsgrub pa shes pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang 'jug pas rnam par grol ba shes pa dang / chos
274b4(mdo): kyi dbyings la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang / mya dang bya la khor chu chud pas/ smod pa'i rnam par rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa las mkhas pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa'i
274b5(mdo): shes pa dang / der myi lhung ba'i skyond myed pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa dang / bsams bzhin du skye bas skye bas sor myi rtog pa'i/ shes pa dang / bzod ma nas rnam par dag pa yis/ chos thams cad myi skye
274b6(mdo): bar shes pa dang / byi nad mi logasu gyur pa yongs su sbyind par byed pas/ sems can thams cad bdag myed par shes pa dang / 'dod tshogs dang bral ba'i mtha'i chos thams cad chos gcig phra shes pa dang / nam
274b7(mdo): dang mtshungs pa'i phyin zhing thams cig tu shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis kyi khyal pal la zhugs pas/ sas rgyas gcig tu shes pa dang / yi ge shes pa la mkhas pas chas kyi tshig rab su dbyel bas bstand
274b8(mdo): pa shes pa dang / legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim pas byed pa'i phyir chags pa myed pa'i spongs pas/ chos rgya cher shes pa dang / thos pa thams cad 'dzind pas gzungs brjed pa myed pa'i shes pa dang / 
275a1(mdo): nyonabacud de dag thams cad spyo snga su sbyin par khyen pas brgyad kyi las thams cad khod du chud pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par bsrubs tes so nye bam granas par shes pas chom thams cad sgyu ma la yur rtogs
275a2(mdo): pa'i shes pa dang / shinan tu yongs su grub pa byed pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad myil ma dang phyag rgya dang rgya sbal dang kyig gsor dang / thag ma la bu'i tshul tu stand pa shes pa dang / shes pa rnam par dag pa sa phyim sems can gyi
275a3(mdo): sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kho ru chud pa'i shes pa dang / shin da tu bslabs pa'i phyir 'khor ba dang mya/ ngan las 'das pa brtags par shes pa'i thams la mkhas pas dang / rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo'i phyir snyoms can nyid dang
275a4(mdo): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i rnam pa'i chos shes pa dang / gzod ma nas 'brel pa myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhib dang / nye bar zhi par shes pa dang / ma rig pa dang gtil mug yang dag/ 
275a5(mdo): par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad la rab rib myed cing snang ba/ thob pa dang / chos thams cad gar yang myi 'gro gang nas/ kyang myi 'ong bar shes pas/ shes rab kyi 'od dang ldan pas/ 
275a6(mdo): sems can thams can la rnam par tha dad pa'i chos stond pa dang / las dang bya ba kho du chud pas/ sems can rnams kyi 'arol dang / 'grol bar skye ba bskon pa dang / chos dpa nges/ 
275a7(mdo): ma tshig dang spobs pa'i tshul la mkhas te byed par de kho na'i lung stond pas sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / bdag rtul ba dpa zhi sa dang grol pa dngasdus pa dang byab ngas yongs su mya ngan la
275a8(mdo): sgrol bami phyin pa don yod pa'i chos ston pa dang / dam pa mtsham yongs su 'dzind pas / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis de shes rab la nges pam byang bar rig nas/ chos kyi grong khyem thams cad/ 
275b1(mdo): yongs su sbyong bar byin gyis rlom pa dang phyir gyi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang dag par gzhol te/ mthal la / gnas pa'i tshul khrims nges par byas pas/ sung bsund pa'i sa rab tu thol pa yin te/ 
275b2(mdo): gyi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum brgya rtsa gnyis pa 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol dngas kyi nad pa yongs su dag pa yin no// / gyi 'am ci'i bdag po// byang chub sems dpa/ 
275b3(mdo): rnam pa sum bcul gnyis dang ldan na// thabs la mkhas par rig par bya ste// sum bcu la cha gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la lta zhing bdag zad par myi byed
275b4(mdo): pa dang // sems can yongs su spyand par bya ba'i phyir bsod nam sa chen po la gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad skye dan gnas yin pas sbyin 'anas tshol ba dang / sems can
275b5(mdo): dbul po yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir rgya chen po don tu myi gnyer/ la dang / sems can thams cad dag bsdam pa la sbyar bayi phyir/ lkug pa dang dag pa lta bur stond pa dang / bud
275b6(mdo): byed dang gzhon nu ma'i yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir bud myed yongasu 'chi nad pa dang / khye'u yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir khye'u yi gzugs su stond pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba dang / 
275b7(mdo): mthun par bya ba'i phyir gzugs thams cad stond pa dang / sems can myos pa yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir myos pa ma lus su stond pa dang / de la mos pa'i sems can rnams la chos stond pa
275b8(mdo): pam khyim myon pa dang sems g.yengs pa'i gzugs su su nad pa dang / sos can yong du phyind par bya ba'i khyim mo brgyam bsags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po 'dor pa dang / chos 'dzin kya gzhan/ 
276a1(mdo): pa'i phyir/ sems cam rnams la dgal ba dang / brtse ba dang longs spyod thams cad stond pa dang / del mos pa'i sems can yong su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir/ g.yon can gyi mthun/ 
276a2(mdo): pas 'tshol ba lta bur yang bdag nyid stond pa dang / bud myed gab chong dpo med pa khyim bdag dang rgyal po'i chung mar gyur pa bud myed pa'i tshe 'dod pa'i mya ngan gyi zug rtsu pa ldan zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mya nga la/ 
276a3(mdo): de na byang chub sems dpal rigs de dag dad cing yongs su sminab par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du de'i bum 'gro ba dang / 'brog dgon par song ba'i sems can/ dbul po la/ bzal ba dang btud pa dang nar
276a4(mdo): sbyin zhing 'go bshal bya ba'i phyir 'dron pa mang po'i nang du ded dpon da chen por 'gyur ba dang / gter chen po matsun bu bzhag ste/ nor gyi phung po chen po byin nas chos ston da ya nga / mya ngan gi zug rngu dang
276a5(mdo): ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi zug rtsa bsal nas rdzu 'phrul da / sa chos stond pa dang / gter stond pa'i sems can rnams kyi mdun tu gter chen po nye bar bstand nas 'tsho ba yongasu dag
276a6(mdo): pa'i phyir chos gan pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan du pa la dazug pa'i phyir gzhan mu stegs can sto pa dang kun su rgyal rnams kyi nab cu 'byung ba dang / sems can 'did chags kyi sngags kyi
276a7(mdo): zin pa rnams yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir smad 'tshong ma'i khyim dang sras kyi nang rtsa byad myed gzugs mdzes pa bldan sug pas spyond pa dang / sems can rnams mos pA ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyis
276a8(mdo): yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir 'dus pa chen po dang tshogs mang po'i nang du rnga bo che dang rdzal rdza dang gling bu dang rung gi sbas sa chen po mdzes par byas nas bdag nye bar stond cing / sems can 'dus pa
276b1(mdo): de dag la rol da mo'i dbyangs sgra de dag las chos stond pa'i sgra 'byind cing bzol dang / las kyi gnas thams cad nye bar stond pa dang / mya ngan du son pa'i 'dron pa bzel dang btung ba zad pa la mngon par shes
276b2(mdo): pa chen pos rnam par che zhing de'i stobs kyis bza' ba dang btung bzhi nas bkres pa dang bral ba'i sems can rnams la chos stond pa dang / sems can gang dag dmus khod su gyu dad pa de dag gi nad dmus
276b3(mdo): long lta bur gyur de nas dbul po myig myed pa de dag la rdzu 'phrul kyi stobs kyis/ bza' ba dang btubab 'byor da par byas nas/ myig byin te rang gi gzugs bstan nas ji lAn de dag bla na myed pa
276b4(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos stond pa dang / rgyal po'i khri mun rtsa bcug pa'i srog chags brgya phrag rtsam g.yo'i sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ de dag yongs su sbyin
276b5(mdo): par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin rtsa bdag rkun por stond cing de dag g.yon no zhes shes par byas nas khri mun du bcug pa// dang / de der zhugs nas rdzu 'phrul kyi stobs kyis bcings pa de
276b6(mdo): dag gi lus bkrus shing bskus te gos bzang po bskor nas bza' ba dang btung gdabs lus tshim par byas te bcings pa dam po de dag las bkrol nas ji lta bA na myed pa yang dag
276b7(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur sa de lta/ bung chos ston pa dang / seMs can ga dag rgyal pos gsad par bkri ba/ srog bcad pa 'jig rten pa yol pa// sdug bsngal gyisanyam thab pa de dan/ 
276b8(mdo): yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdzu 'phrul da kyis gzhan dag cig sprul da te/ rdzu 'phyald kyis gshed ma bskri nas// gsad par 'os pa'i gyi de dag bcangs
277a1(mdo): de dag las bkro sa te/ 'jim rten pa dang bral bsog rnyed pa dbus bgyinan pa de dag la mi snyam thu na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chu nges par 'gyur ba de sa de la bur chos m+b+ha dang / 
277a2(mdo): phyogs gang na don dang nor dang zhing dang khyim gyi dngos po dang bran po dang bran mo dang / las byed pa dang dmag myi'i phyir mtha' sa pa dang phod pa dang 'gyed pa dang / 'tshang 'drul bar 'gyur der/ byang chub seMs
277a3(mdo): 'apa' seMs dpa' chen po thabs kyis dbus su 'dug nas rdzu 'phya lad kyis don dang nor dang rin po che la yongasu btang ste de dag 'dum pa sbyor ro// de dag 'dum par rig nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
277a4(mdo): pa'i byang chub yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzind su 'jug pa dang / byang chub seMs dpa' thabs la/ mkhas pas yan lag dang nyid lag thabs kyis dbang po nyes pa myed kyang seMs can
277a5(mdo): yongasu sbyind par bya ba'i phyir dbang po nyes par stond pa dang / spyod lam phun sum tshogs kyang ses can yongs su sbyin da par bya ba'i phyir spyod lam thams cad 'khrugs par yang byed/ 
277a6(mdo): pa dang byang chub ses dpal thabs la mkhas pas/ gzhan mu stegs can stond pa dang / thag ring du gnas pa bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod pa bdud kyis brlabs pa li mu stegs can de dag sangs
277a7(mdo): rgyas kyi bstand pa la dgug pa'i phyir// de dag gi mdun tu dkon mchog gsum gyi baspangs pa brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams la mkhas pas sos can yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir
277a8(mdo): gtan dang sa rnam par tha dad pa dang ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs las log nas bsams bzhin rtsa 'dod pa'i khamasu skye sa mye ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa rnaMs la skye ba'i nus
277b1(mdo): bsngal bstand nas dben pa khros pa nas bla ma'i kham sbom dutu gzud pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa stond pa dang skyon myed pa la ma zhugs pa mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'dun pa rnams kyi mdun cu byang chul seMs
277b2(mdo): dpa' thabs la/ mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi sku la stond pa dang / sangs rgyas la dad pa thob cing seMs mnyam par bzhag pa rnas byang chub kyi seMs lend cu gzud pa'i phyir/ rkyend 'di shes pa la 'jug la nye bar ston
277b3(mdo): pa ste// myi 'am ci'i bdag po rnaM pa gsum bcu la sa gnyis po 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpal thams da la mkhas par rig par bya'o// pha rol da tu phyind pa dang / thams la mkhas pa la 'jug pa
277b4(mdo): yongs su dag pa'i le'u 'di bstand pa na/ myi 'am ci'i rgyal po/ ljond pa'i 'khor dang / de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang klul dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i srog chags bayul khri brgyad stong
277b5(mdo): dri man byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chus masabaskyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'a'ang byang chub sems dpal las kyang mams sa dpa' khri brgyad songan gyi skye
277b6(mdo): chos pa bzod pa thob par gyur to// myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ni shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob par bya dad to// / de nas kyi 'am ci'i rgyal po lnga nad pa bcom ldan 'das
277b7(mdo): kyis chos kyi gtam phyis yang dag par dgal bar byas/ yang dag par 'dzin da du bcug/ yang dag par bzed bstod/ yang dag par bstand pas tshim zhing mgul la yid rangs te/ dag la ba dang yid
277b8(mdo): dil pa bskyes nas 'an rang myed pa'i ras bcos su thugs cig lacom ldan 'das kyi sku la gso srid ni// byang chub sems dpa' phyim dge' bdun dang/ nyan thos kyi dges 'argyan rnams cad la
277b9(mdo): rin las rtsod pa'i gos kyis so sor bkas po// gnas thams cad ni yangs su langs 'byed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sa yul log// de nas kyi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon da pa'i gru ba rgya mung pos/ 
278a1(mdo): rin po che'i pad ma mi bkod pa dang / rin po che'i gzugs brgyad stong tu chab bas/ bcom ldan 'das sa mngon par bka' skye gtan ma thag su sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad 'jom
278a2(mdo): byams de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bu si pa zad kyi steng gi khar snab dpag tshad stong tsamra na rin po che'i gdugs gcig tu gnas par gyurd // de nas myi 'am/ ci'i rgyal po ljond pa'i bu brgya stong pos/ bcom
278a3(mdo): ldan 'das kun gyi cho 'phrul rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas/ tshim zhing mgul la yid rangs shing rab tu dgal ste/ dgal ba dang yid bdel ba skyes nas lhag pa'i bsam khas bran myed pa yang dag par
278a4(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems skyed do// de dag gis byang chub tra sems bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das gang tham pas bdag cag byang chub
278a5(mdo): kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag papa bskul par 'gyur / byung / te chub tu yongs su sbyind par bgyid pa'i chos/ de bzhin na/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
278a6(mdo): bdag cag la 'gang phug so med to// de nas ldan 'das kyis myo ma ci'i rgyal po 'i bu de dag gis lhag pa lo bsam pa mkhyen nas ta la bdun srid kyi ste ga bar snang la sbyis
278a7(mdo): dang / ltol 'khyil chen po de dag dang / 'dod pa na smon pa'i lha'i bu de dag gi rol mo sil stan snyam pa sna tshogags de dag thams cad ma mtshungs ma grol bar mdzes pa dang ldan par 'khrol lo// ri'i rgyal
278b1(mdo): go spos kyi ngan ldan ma spos kyi zhing dang kye tog ni shing dab 'bras bu'o zhi pa'i snyed pa de dag las kyang rol mo'i sim snyand kyi sgra 'byung ngo // bco ldan 'das kyi sku'i khu bu mas cad nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba Shag zhig brgyad stong kyang ngo // 
278b2(mdo): 'od zer thos cad kyi rtse mo las kyang pad ma tshad shing rta'i phang lo tsam dag byed do// pad ma'i snying po thams cad la yang byang chuban pa'i gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan su bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgya nad pa'i lus dang gnas
278b3(mdo): par kun tu snang ngo // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus ro ye mo'i i ye snyan de dag las ni yong su dri ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'byung ngo // byang chub seMs dpa' de dag mas cad ni skra dbyangs dang skad cig tshigs su bcad nas nges par lan
278b4(mdo): 'debs so// de nas sing stan las tshigs su bcad pa// // / bla na myed pa'i byang chub sems// ji lta bur ni bskyed pa dang // byang chug snying por 'jug par du// seMs ni brjed pa myed par 'gyur// byang
278b5(mdo): chub sems dpa'i gzugs nas kyis smras pa// sems can kun da kyi ched kyi phyir// lhag pa'i bsam pa mun sum tshogs// snying rje che dang ldan pa ni// byang chub seMs brjed kyi 'gyur ro// sil snyan rnams kyi/ 
278b6(mdo): smras pa// de dag bas pa ji lta bu// rab tu sbyor ba 'am ci 'dra zhig/ de dag snying rje chen po pa// nges par seMs dpa' ji ltar skye// byang chub seMs dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// g.yo' byed lhag pa'ibs pa ste// de dag
278b7(mdo): sbyor ba bcom pa myin// mya ngan 'das sgor 'jug pa ni// de dag snying rje de 'dra'o// sim snyan nas kyis smras pa// de dag gtong ba ci lta bu// ji ltam byind nas 'gyod myed cing // na sbyin don du myi gnyer zar// byang chub
278b8(mdo): sis dpa'i gzugs nas kyis smras pa// de dag gto po kun la gyi lta ba// des ni byin nas 'gyod pa myed// byang chub lam du 'jog byed pa// de byin sam sbyin de ba myed// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// ji sbyar tshul
279a1(mdo): khrims ldan pas kyang // tshul khrims kyi sa ni rlon sems myed// theg pa chen po bla na myed pa la// tshul khrims 'chal da la sbyind par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i gtsuH
279a2(mdo): rnams kyis smras pa// byang chub sems kyis tshul khrims ldan// stong nyid kyis rlom sems myed// byams pa chen po bskyed pa ni// tshul khrims 'cha'ad pa yongs spyodad byed// sa med snyand nas
279a3(mdo): kyis smras pa// ji ltar bur na sems kyis// smyos shi bsdigs la bzod byed cing // sems kyis gnod pa myi byed la// mchog tu dgas bya skye bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs nas
279a4(mdo): kyis smras pa// bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi// nyon mongs ka so'i sma nad pa snyam// de dag ngan par sprul ba'i tshig thas zhesdang myi 'gyur ro// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag
279a5(mdo): bcom 'grus ji lta bu// tu yod pa yang ni ji 'dral zhig/ ji ltar zhum pa myed sems kyis// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa ra 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras
279a6(mdo): chos dang sems can spang ba ni// tshuld pa dang ni 'artson 'grus so// dge' ba'i khakhas brtan ya ni// des na sems ni zhum gyi 'gyur// sim snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag tshi snyam dram dpa lan/ 
279a7(mdo): chen lagrags 'ang// mas kyi ma gtan sum gtan byed// des na nas mas kyi rgyad// gis spyan rnams kyis rnal sa// jisnyan gas sa ldan pa dang // dasapan pan
279b1(mdo): rnams rnam par dbyed pa la// mkhas shing 'jigs pa myed par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis sbas pa// thos las rlab kyas sa 'phel// brtend da pas la la dang por 'gyur// chos kyi sbyin/ 
279b2(mdo): pas des 'gyurang te// tshul bzhin gyi zhi don rtogs 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// ji ltar shos pa btsal da pas na de dag zos ma thag tu 'gyur// gang gis che ba'i bdag 'gyur bar// zosde pa'i chos nas/ 
279b3(mdo): stond par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// gus par byas te thos tshol da ni// sprul pas thos pa mang cu 'gyur// zang zing myed par chos sbyin pa// des ni che ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur// 
279b4(mdo): sil snyand rnams kyis smras pa// / de dag byams pa ji lta bu// de dag snying rje mi 'dra zhig/ de dag dgal ba rdzi lta bu// btang snyoms kyang ni mi 'dral zhig/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs
279b5(mdo): rnams kyis smras pa// sems dpabasam snyoms byams/ pa ste// sems can 'gro ba snying rje'o// sangs rgyas chos dgal dgas pa ste// gnyis spangs pa ni btang snyoms so// 
279b6(mdo): mi yad snyan rnams kyis smras pa// ji ltar sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// sems kyang ji ltar dpa'ar 'gyur// chos thos nas ni ji lta bur// de dag me tsom skye myi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzum
279b7(mdo): rnams kyis smras pa// sangs rgyas rjes su dran bsgoms pa// des ni 'dren pa mthong bar 'byam// the tsom byed cing bsam dag pas// chos thos nas ni som nyi byed// mas stan rnams kyis smras pa/ 
279b8(mdo): bsod nam latshogs na ngas su// ye shes tshogs kyang 'i 'dra zhig// thom pa yang ji lta bu// byang chub d+mal la gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// dmangs kyi shes pas bzod nams yon mad/ 'di la rnams
280a1(mdo): ni ye shes tshogs/ zhi ba'i sems mi'i gnas te// chos shes pa mi lhag mthong ngo // sim snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag gi ni 'apyod 'ayu gang // de dag gnas kyang ji sa su// de dag gnas pa

280a3(mdo): sal// dedag na kyilas gang da/ sa rgyas zin pas jisas/ dra la las byas na/ gams ##
280a4(mdo): nas mi sa/ bani// bya ba ma// bas nyan rnams kyis la// na na
280b1(mdo): ba de dag 'jig kyi byed// seMs snyam rnams kyis smras pa// ji snyam dam pa'i chos sra zhing // sems can yongs su sbyin par byed// ji lta bu'i thabs kyis na// de dag byang chub bsgrub par

280b5(mdo): lam ni ji lta bu// log pa'i lam yang ji 'dal zhig/ bu myed byang chub lam cu ni// ji ltams can rab tu 'god// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis smras pa// lam ni pha rolang phyi nad
280b6(mdo): pa drug/ theg pa dman pa log pa'i lam// shes rab thabs yabasrabs pa ni// sems can lam la 'dzud pa'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras lo// mi lta khum na nor chen 'gyur// de dag rnyed pa 'ang pi rba zhig/ 
280b7(mdo): gter rnams kyang ni ri la ru// gang gis de dag 'gro tsho mo byed// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis smras pa// nor brgyan dang ni rtag tu ldan// chos brnyed pa ni rnyed pa so// de dag gter ni gzungs yin te// ra
280b8(mdo): rnyed nas tshim par byed// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi // de dag gi pa ma gang // nye ru'i tshogs ni ji lta bu// g.yog rnams kyang ni ci 'dra zhig dugang gis mkhas// dag mdzes
281a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// ma ni shes rab pa ni thabs// nye du byang chub phyogs rnaMs yin// dge' ba nas ni g.yog yin te// des ni mkhas pa de dag
281a2(mdo): mdzes// sil snyan nas kyis smras pa// ji ltar bdag myed rtogs nas ni// byams pas 'gro ba khyab par byed// bdag myed pa dang byams pa dag/ de la ji ltar mtshungs par 'gyur//

281a5(mdo): dpa'i gzugs rnaMs kyis smras pa/ dam pa'i don du 'od myed de/ gang du yang 'gro ba yod ma yin// kun rdzob rgyan lam 'jug/ cing // nam par sbyind pa nye bar stond// mis snyan nas kyis

281a7(mdo): zong nyid gang yin la de sngond myed// mtshan mdon tuganyer myed pa// mtshan nyid gcig cing don gcig te// nal sa rad pa'i sgom bstand to// mi la stan nas kyis smras pa// gang gis kyi
281a8(mdo): ngan 'das 'gro ba'i// stong par rtog pa ji lta bu// seMs can lta ba ji lta bu// yongs su sbyin byed ji lta bu// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis kyis smras pa// shes rab kyis ni stod par rtogs// 
281b1(mdo): thabs kyis som can rnams lha// snyom tshe yongs su stond par byed// des ni mya ngan 'das pas 'gro// mil snyam rnams kyis smras pa// chos 'di dag ni khyim nyid kyis// phye ba myed cing 'byung myed par// 
281b2(mdo): tshul mchog 'di 'dra shes nas ni// gang gis 'khor bar skye bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis smras pa// myi skye ba dang myi 'byung ba// de ni shes rab spyod yul lo// bsam bzhin tu ni
281b3(mdo): kang skye ba// de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no// sil snyan gyis 'dras smras pa// gto la dga' bar ji ltaram 'gyur// ji lta bur na phyir myi ldog// ji ltar bzod pa phun sumatshogs// ji ltar rnam pa nyes
281b4(mdo): bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs nas kyis smras pa// mnyam par gnas pa gtong la dga'// chos kyi dbyings las phyir myi ldog/ myi skye ba la bzod pa ste// chos shes nas ni rnam
281b5(mdo): par nges// sil snyan rnaMs kyis smras pa// byang chub snying po'i mtshan nyid gang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub mtshan nyid gang // ci'i phyir rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bya// de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar
281b6(mdo): gros// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs nas kyis smras pa// byad chub snying po nam mkha' ste// byang chub nam kha'i mtshan nyid do// gang yang kun nas gtis mug byed// de bzhin nyid phyir de gshegs
281b7(mdo): de nas kyi'amachi'i rgyas tho'i bu de dag gis// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ kyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zob bo// de dag gis bzod la thob nas// rang rang gnam dang rgyan/ bcom ldan 'odas kyi sku
281b8(mdo): pha gsolar te/ 'di skad ces kyang gso yod to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad su/ bdag cag gis nyan pa'i na bar 'di sa bu thos pas// sangs rgyas ni bdag cag gi ched mi byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi
282a1(mdo): snyan dang grul dbyangs ni dag las/ the tsom 'dri ba'i sgra 'di lta bu byung ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis dris pa/ de dag thams cad kyis na btag pas/ 'khor 'di'i dogasas pa mas/ 
282a2(mdo): cad spangs pa dang / bdag cad kyang chos kyi snang ba dpag tu ma mchis pa skyes pa ngo mtshadad to// bcom ldan 'das sil snyand de dag las sgra 'di lta bu byung ba'i rgyu ci lags/ su'i byind kyi rlabs

285a1(mdo): bod kyis drald// tshangs pa'i sgra skad lha'i gsung 'arjod pa// sho bye ma lags kyi 'gyur 'drid ma/ lags// bu su mtshogs gsung de dag zos nas ni// thal mo bsgyur te skyabs su nye bam mchil/ phyag gi 'chil/

285a3(mdo): kyi chos don nyer zhing mchis pa rnams// de dag so sor chos bstan na thos nas su// zhabs nyis la ni rab tu gtug pa la gyid// de nas kyi sa ci'i rgyal po'i sras rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis man
285a4(mdo): par spyod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ldan 'das bdag cas than byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs na/ gras gyed kyi dngos pos bla na myed pa yang dag par
285a5(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus na/ ji ltar bdag cag/ bud myed kyi dngos po/ las gyurd te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa
285a6(mdo): rdzogs par 'tshang rgyal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos/ de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la/ legs par bshad tu gsol // de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis myi laM ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i slas de dag la 'di skad ces
285a7(mdo): bkal pha lad to// sring po dag de'i phyir rab tu legs par nyon la zung shig dang / ji ltar bud myed kyi dngos po las gyur da te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing / mya rad tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par
285a8(mdo): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ngas khyed la bshad par bya'o// gyi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i sras rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsold te// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyand pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
285b1(mdo): de dag la 'di skad ces bka'asaHlad to// srid mo dag chos gcig dang ldan na bud myed bud myed kyi dngos po las gyur da te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par
285b2(mdo): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyurd te// chos cig po ga zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems skyed pa dang / myi mnyam pa'i sems skyed pa dang / 'jig rten gsum las
285b3(mdo): khyan par du 'phags pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / dgel ba'i a ba thams cad la brjed pa myed pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/ sring mo dag chos gcig po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud myed bud myed kyi dngos po las gyu rad te/ skyes pa'i dngos
285b4(mdo): po thob cing myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan pa dang / bud myed bud myed kyi dngos po las gyur/ 
285b5(mdo): te skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na myed pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te// gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pra dog myed pa dang
285b6(mdo): semasna myed pa ste/ sring mo dag chos gnyis dang ldan na bud myed bud myed kyi dngos po las gyurd te// skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing mya rad tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzog
285b7(mdo): par 'tshang rgya par 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na// bud myed bud myed kyi dngos po las gyur da te skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
285b8(mdo): kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi sdom pa bzhi yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi sdom pa gsum yongasu
286a1(mdo): dag pa te/ sring mo dag chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud myed bud myed kyi dngos po las kyur da te skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myu rad tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par
286a2(mdo): rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na bud myed bud myed kyi dngos po las gyu da te skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing mya ra tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang madra
286a3(mdo): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bzhi ga pazhe na 'di lta ste/ g.yol byed par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / g.yol byed pa bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa dang / g.yol myed par tshul khrims bstend pa dang / g.yol myed par chos nya
286a4(mdo): pa ste// sring mo dag chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud myed bud myed kyi dngos po las gyurd te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par

286a6(mdo): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// lngag pa zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos thos nas tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas khud myed bud myed kyi dngos po la smod pa dang / rtag pa
286a7(mdo): rgyand tu skyes pa'i lus 'thob par sems bskyed pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/ sring mo dag chos lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na bud myed bud myed kyi dngos po las gyur da te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur tu bla
286a8(mdo): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na bud myed bud myed kyi dngos po las gyurd te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur

286b3(mdo): mo dag gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldan na/ bud myed bud myed kyi dngos po las kya ra da te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/

286b5(mdo): su dran pa dang / smon de lam yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul TI/ mas rjes su ngan pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su do/ ba'i phyir gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag
286b6(mdo): par bya ba'i phyir lha rjes su dran pa dang / de dag dkrol ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la sems pa se/ sri mo dag chos bdun po 'di dag dang ldan ma/ bud myed bud myed kyi dngos po las gyur da te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing /

286b8(mdo): cing myur bya bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ brgyad ga bzhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zas la sred pa ma yin pa dang / skom la sred pa ma yin pa dang / me tog dang / sos/ 
287a1(mdo): dpa 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma sred pa ma yin pa dang / skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar sred pa ma yin pa dang / dgod pa dang 'jo ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang / klu dang kar dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sma la sred pa
287a2(mdo): ma yin pa dang / dgal ba dang phyed mo la sred pa ma yin pa dang / rna ba dang skra dang / sna dang dri dang / lce dang ro dang / lus la dga' ba la sred pa ma yin pa la ste/ sring mo dag chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud myed bud myed kyi
287a3(mdo): dngos po las kya rad te/ skyes pa'i dngos po las gyur da te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan

287a6(mdo): zag tu sma' ba ma yin pa dang / 'byung bar lta ba ma yin pa dang / 'jigs par lta ba ma yin pa dang / rgyu dang rkyend la 'jug pa la mkhas pa yin te/ seng mo dag chos dgu po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud myed bud myed kyi dngos po// 
287a7(mdo): las kyi rad te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs khar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bsu dang ldan na/ bud myed bud myed kyi dngos

287b1(mdo): pa dang / gzhan gyi longs spyod la brnab sems myi bskyed pa dang / skyes pa'i sems su yid la byed pa bskyed pa dang / srog gi phyir yang brdzun gyi tshig myi sprul pa dang / phra ma'i tshig myi smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig myi sprul pa dang / 
287b2(mdo): tshig kyal pa gyi sprul ba dang / pha rolang po dgal zhing che ga la phra dog myed cing gnod sems kyi bag la nyal mngon par gyi sgrub pa dang / yang dag par lta ba dang ldan par gyurd pa dang / rnam par sbyid pa la le ba myed pa ste/ sring mo
287b3(mdo): dag chos bcul po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud myed bud myed kyi dngos po las gyur da te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'bog cing myur tu bla na myed yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan
287b4(mdo): yang bud myed du zab mo la mos pa yin te/ de gzugs la dbu ba rdos pa/ lta bur so sor rtog kyang gzugs kyis rgyags shing myos par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshor ba la chu'i chu'i bur lha bur so sor rtog kyang bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su
287b5(mdo): 'chags pa myed pa dang / sdug bsngalagi tshor ba la kho ba khro bar gyi// 'gyur ba dang / bdel ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor bas kun tu gti mug par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes la/ smyig rgyu la zhu
287b6(mdo): so sor tog cing / bud myed kyi 'du shes kyi bskyed/ skyes pa'i 'a shes kyi bskyed pa dang / 'du byed nas la chu shing gi phung po lta bur so so ra rtog ste/ 'du byed thams cad la snying po myed par rtogs nas/ 'du byed kyis
287b7(mdo): cad la gyi gnas shing de la gnas pa kyi skyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa la spru la sa yung so sor rtog ste/ sems dang yid dang rnam par rig pa de sgyu ma byas pa bzhin du rtogs nas chos thams cad la chags pa myed zhe sdang myed gcis
287b8(mdo): mug myed pa dang // lus la 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan par sa sor rtog ste/ 'di la ste/ sa'i khams dang ldan pa dang / chu'i khas dang ldan pa dang / me'i khams dang ldan pa dang / rlung gi khams dang ldan par lus la
288a1(mdo): so sor rtog go// lus 'di ni bsdus pa/ 6 dang / shi pa dang / thob pa dang / tshig pa dang / myig yor lta bu ste/ 'di nag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin/ byin
288a2(mdo): si log sngon du song bas rgyu dang bya ba dang / las kyis byung ba'o// gzhan yang bud myed dmyig la kha zas skyes pa sha'i gong po// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa/ rang bzhin gyis dbyen par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang /

288a6(mdo): tshim zhing mgul ste/ yid rang shing rab tu dgal nas dga' ba dang / yid kho dol ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ tshul dnga'adra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// 
288a7(mdo): dri byed dri bral dri ma gcod mdzad ya// rdul byed tshul khral lhag pa'i gzi' 'ching mar la// pad ma'i 'dab 'dra li spyan dang mdzes pa'i thugs// dri myed khwa zhal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dga' mdzad zhi mdzad nyon mongs gcod
288a8(mdo): mdzad pa// dgal ba ston de pa rtag tu dgon par dges// rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen mdzod maral ba// yon tan mchog mang la khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol gshegs la gzhan gi tshogs rnams 'joms// pad ma wA bur
288b1(mdo): stor mchog bka' mchid gsung // lam mchog po lad cing dam pa'i don ston da pa// mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi li bkal mchid gsung // sa la rgyu ba 'di la myig col da pa// 'khon/ 
288b2(mdo): lo mchog gi mtshan nyi ni stong mnga' ba// rdul myed phan mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs tshul bsal dam pa mthul po che// mgon po 'gro la mchog gi don mdzad pa/ bcud kyi dpung rnams stobs myed 'jig
288b3(mdo): mdzad pa// bcom ldan stobs bcu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sred pa'i khri shing gcod mdzad mnyam pa myed// brnyes pa dag dpam brnyes mtshungs pa'i thugs// 'jig rtend 'byin snang ba'i sgron mdzad pa// rgya mtshol
288b4(mdo): lta bu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rul zhing stobs bcul chen po na dam pa mnga'// sbyin bco lad cing rtag tu gtong la 'gyes// / dul ba zhi gnas yon tan pha rold phyi nad// nyon mongs rdul bsald khyod la phyas
288b5(mdo): 'tshal lo// mtshan mchog 'gro ba kun la dam pa tshol // skye bo'i 'drend pa lha'i mchog pas mchog/ sems dang stobs/ dang bzod la nges par dgyes// mchod 'od pa de gshegs khyod la phyag
288b6(mdo): 'tshal lo// mar me lta bu dri byed zla ba 'dra// phyi nangapa nyon mongs dri ma mchog mdzad pa// nyon mongs spangs pa yon tan bsod nams gter// zhi 'khrugs zhi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dad pa batshogs pa dge' spyod na
288b7(mdo): mdzad pa// ston pa skye mched drug las thar du mdzad pa// rjes u dran drug shin tu yongs u dran// rgyal ba dge la stong rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dom gang 'od ni gser gi kha dog lta// gsu snyan dam pa rnams
288b8(mdo): par dag pa'i dbyangs// bcom ldan gang zag dam pa skyes bu mchog/ srid gsum zhi mdzad khyod la phyag/ 'tshal lo// shes rab mun pa ma mchis pha rol gshegs// rtag tu dka la thul brtul zhugs rab tu spyad// 
289a1(mdo): de bzhin kho na gzhan gyin de bzhin gsung // mun par sgron ma 'dzind la phyag 'tshal lo// bde la gshegs grags ldan yon tan pas ma/ 'chalang // de bzhin nyid kyi gnas ni bskon da mdzad pa// yon tan 'arjod
289a2(mdo): pa mtho zhi grags bsgrags pa// mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bsngags la gnas shing brtul zhugs dka' thub 'phags// khengs dang rgyal rgyags pa gcod mdzad pa// ye shes 'byab gnas rdul bral
289a3(mdo): blo gros mchog// skye bo mtha rang phyind khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ka la khyi ka tshangs dbyangs thugs rje can// 'dod pa 'azod bgyid dri ma sel mdzad pa// phung po yongs mkhyend mkhas pa bdel bar gshegs// yon tan chog+sa/ 
289a4(mdo): mchog mngal la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan stond pa yon tan spyod ma chod pa// zab mo ba lta dka' shinan tu rtogs par dkal// 'dzum zhal wA 'dra gsong por gsung mdzad pa// bdud stobs 'joms mdzad khyod la
289a5(mdo): la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam thugs kha lo sgyur ba rab rtul khrugs// kun gyis mngon stod mnyam pa'i lam la gnas// thub pa mchog gsung bden pa'i bka' mchid can// bde gshegs ma/ 
289a6(mdo): thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// las yod snyan pa'i shinan tu 'jam pa'i dbyangs// bdud kyi sde mdal 'jom mdzad nga rgyal dang // gzhan dag lhag pa ling rgyal gyi mngal tshul myi 'chos// thub pa dge la spyod rgyas
289a7(mdo): 'tshal lo// stobs dang mthul dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dges// rtag tu 'dod chags skye nod dang rab rib bral// bde bar gshegs pa myi g.yol gnas la bzhugs// stobs bcu la mchog mngal khyod la phyag/ 
289a8(mdo): 'tshal lo// phyag dang zhabs ni dri myed drams 'brelang // skye dang rga dang 'chib gyi mngal la// rgyal bar 'os pa 'gro ba kun las rgyal// nam mkhas mnyam thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 
289b1(mdo): de nas myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pa'i slas/ myi 'am ci mo brgya khri bzhi stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyend nas/ de'i tshe/ 
289b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas/ 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs byung ba
289b3(mdo): ste/ 'di lta te/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / lebarkam dang / shel dang / dngulang ki kha dog lte bu'o// de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khaMs mtha' yas mu myed par/ 'od kyis khyab par byas

289b5(mdo): gtsug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun rga po stand las ngas te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo ga ya sa pa'i lha ra sa la/ btsugs te/ zhes dang bcas shing gus pa dang bcas
289b6(mdo): par bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su lal mo sbyard ba badzud te/ tshigs su bcad pa mngon par sgrub pa 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa// bde ba gshegs la ci smad 'dzum ston dpa/ 
289b7(mdo): sra ba drim myed zhal khyod la thul// dri myed gzi'i rjid mngal ba khyod la su// gser gi kha dog la bu khyod la shu// 'de bar gshegs pa mi slad 'dzum ston pa// dam pa'i gzugs rnams mngal ba khyod la zhu// 'gro ba/ 
289b8(mdo): nas kyi don mdzad khyod la zhu// lha dang myi nas kyis mchod khyod la shu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// sbyin dang tshul la brtson pa khyod la zhu// tshul khrims yongs dag gyu dad pa khyod la zhu// bzod pa
290a1(mdo): yi stobs dang stobs pa lang khyod la shu// bde gshegs pa ci srad 'dzum brtond pa// brtson 'grus stobs dang mthul mngal khyod ya u// bas gtan mngon shes dges khyod la lu// shes rab nam mkha' mnyam pa
290a2(mdo): khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ji slad 'dzum stond pa// rtag tu byams pa'i thugs can khyod la zhu// rtag tu thugs rje ldan pa khyod la zhu// dga' dang btang snyoms dgos pa khyod la u// bde bar gshegs pa'i slar 'dzum stond pa// 
290a3(mdo): srid pa gsum po ma rang byind khyod la 'u// sun gsum drim gyi ma la khyon la 'u// brgyan chos rnams gsung la khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci srad 'jum smond pa// bcud rnams tha mar 'byind pa khyod la zhu// ngan pa
290a4(mdo): tshogs rnams 'joms pa khyod la zhu// bden pa dam pa gzigs pa/ khyod la shu// bde bar gshegs pa ci smad 'dzum pa ston da pa/ stobs bcu la dam pa maral la khyod la sh+ya// the tsom dag ni gcod mdzad khyod
290a5(mdo): sa sh+tsa// yon tan spong gis rgyas pa khyod la zhu// de skad ces gso san pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis me dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bkams lan to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyi 'am ci'i rgyal po sngon/ 
290a6(mdo): pa'i sras rnams pa las dge ba'i rnam pa bskyed de/ lhag pa'i bsam pas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed nas/ bud myed kyi dngos po las sbyar zhing skyes pa'i dngos po grub par bya ba'i phyim// nga'i rkang pan hU~M/ 
290a7(mdo): la gcugs pa mthong mag gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' mas sad pa// kun dgal po gyi 'am ci'i sras brgya khri bzhi stong po de dag gyis/ lhag pa'i bsam khas dgel ba'i phal
290a8(mdo): bskyed pa 'dis 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ bud myed kyi dngos po sas gyur da te/ skyes pa'i lus yo ba nas/ dgal ldan gyi lha rnams dang / skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang // byang chub seMs dpa'
290b1(mdo): mes dpa' chen po byams pa dang yun cig pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun 'gro la byed par 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub khob pas/ mnyes par byed ci dam pa'i cog/ 
290b2(mdo): kyang kun 'gro bar byed par 'gyur ro// gas mamabs pa'i ni bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang mis kyis ma nyes par byed par 'gyur/ de dag gi rnas pa'i chos kyim thun 'grob byed par 'gyur// 'dzid par 'gyur ro// de
290b3(mdo): dag ris kyis byang chub kyi lcags kyi chos sum bcu yang dag par sgrub pa bya ba thams cad kun rdzogs par byas nas gang gi ci// kyi lam ci'i rgyal po bla ma byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chab rgyab pa
290b4(mdo): 'gyur ba de'i tshe de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur te/ des de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lupa bstond par stsa ra 'gyur ro// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gyi 'am ci'i rgyal po// 
290b5(mdo): ljond pas 'di skad ces gso yod to// bcom ldan 'das de ba/ zhin gshegs pas bdag cags/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do// ngan so pa ngan 'gro thams cad kyi shul bkum mo// bde 'tsha
290b6(mdo): thams cad kyi shul rnam par sbyangs so// bdag cag byang chub kyi la la rab tu bkod do// bdag cag la chos kyi gter bstand to// bdag cag ye gos kyi sa la bkod do// dgel ba li ma kha thams cad 'bar bar mdzad do// 5
290b7(mdo): ros da byin 'ba'i phyogs bsta da to// thabs la mkhas pa lastand to// bdag cag byang chub kyi sem yang dag par 'dzin yus lad to// chos spags pas rab tu dga' ba mdzad do// dga' ba dang dang ba dang / mchog
290b8(mdo): rtsadagal ba thob pas yang dag par bzengs stod do// chos zab mo'i bzod pa la dga' bar mdzad do// bdag cag phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bkod do// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la byas pa bzol sa lags kyis/ 
291a1(mdo): byas pa myi mthal ba ma lags kyang / bcom ldan 'das 'dag kyis pa dang ga gis kyang de bzhin gshegs la kha/ lan gyi yon ma/ gzhan gyis lan lon par myi 'gyur ba la smos kyang mi 'tshal// de nas 'khor de'i/ 
291a2(mdo): nang nas byang chub sems dpal kha cig 'di snyam lu ses te/ ma la/ myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pa 'di/ srid cig na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// 'di'i myir ni ji skad ces bya bar 'a
291a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i dge' 'dun ni ji snyed cig tu 'gyur/ longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ de 'i seMs can bkod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni ci la 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur snyam mo// 
291a4(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpas de dag gi dmas kyi rnam par rtog layugs kyis mnyend nas/ 'dras mdzad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhas kyi sgo nas 'od zer bu mal dag la dang pa khad
291a5(mdo): rgyam pa zag su ma byung te/ phyogs bcu kun gyi phyags med pa sa rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bar byas te/ sems can rnams kyis ngan song gi sug sngal zhi bar byas nas/ lha dang gyi dang sA ma 'i
291a6(mdo): chu bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dun par byas te/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan stong tu bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i chug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' gos// bcom ldan 'das sa kyis sngon rdza
291a7(mdo): ma mdzad pa'i mdzum pa mthang nas// spyanang las yadas te/ mal me sbyad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag/ 'tshal te/ san gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga 'dug ste bus mo g.yas pa'i spangs la
291a8(mdo): grags nas// bam ldan 'das gal ba de logs su lal ma sbyar ba na nas/ bcom ldan 'das la cigs su badzid pas gamam la// bde ba gshegs kyi 'jum 'dzes la// de ra du brang ste zug byed kyi 'ayon / 
291b1(mdo): rgya chen phyogs bcu'i gang ga'i rdul mtha' yas// khyab pa de 'dra sngon chad yod ma mthong // tshang ba de bzhin 'jig skyo pa dang / nor bu me dang nyi ma zla ba'i 'od// myi dbang gzil brjid kyis ni zil tu rlag/ 'dzum mdzad 'di'i rgyu ni lung
291b2(mdo): bstand gsol da// su'i ched rtswa dpa' bo khyod kyis 'od phyung bas// 'dir ni ran gsum zhi byang chub yan lag rdzogs// chos kyi rje yis bdag cag rnaMs kyi dogs la/ solan// myi rjes kyi ni yid gnyis ma/ lus legs parakhum// 
291b3(mdo): 'khor kun dga' bas/ rtogs bgyid na// khyed kyis su slad de ring 'dzub pa bstan // / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dgal bos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par stond nas/ bskor ba byas te rang
291b4(mdo): gi stand la 'jug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe glang po/ che'i lta stangs kyis phyogs bcur gzigs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po la 'di skad ces bka lasaHlad to// kun dgal po khyod kyis myi 'a
291b5(mdo): ci'i rgyal po ljond pa 'dis// tshul 'di lta bu dang rnam pa/ 'di lta bu 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod la byed la mthong ngam/ gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa
291b6(mdo): mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas lad pa/ kun dgal po/ myi 'am ci'i rgyal lo// ljond pa 'di skal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bsu ras brgyad na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub man
291b7(mdo): par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ste/ dkon mchog 'byung zhes bya ba'i ska lad pa la/ 'jig rten khas zla ba dri ma phyed ces bya bar// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal por
291b8(mdo): snang ba zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyend pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur la bla na myed pa/ lha dang myi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'jig
292a1(mdo): rten tu 'byung ngo // kun dga' bo 'jig rtend kyi khaMs lba ba dri ma myed pa de ni lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur te bye du rgya dkar po las grub pa/ zla ba lta bur snang ba shi nang tu dri ma myed pa
292a2(mdo): shind tu rnam par dag pa/ 'ching bu myed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'i'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge la 'dun yang tshad myed par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po thams cad kyang phyir myi ldog pa/ 
292a3(mdo): rnam par tha rad pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa thog pa sha stag go// byang chub sems dpal de dag ni nam mkha' la khang pa rtsegs pa na longs spyod do// de dag nam mkha' la kha pa brtsegs pa na gnas pa na bye l+yar+ya dkar po
292a4(mdo): las grub pa'i sa chen po der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yo/ na tan gyi rgyal por kan snang ba de'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur ro// de dag gyis mthong ma thag tu chos 'di dag thams cad ni gzugs rnyan/ 
292a5(mdo): lci bu'o zhes dran pa skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' gapa/ ces gapal me tshom za ba na/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la swAng par gyudad ro// de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang / byang chub seMs
292a6(mdo): dpal de dag la zhus pa'i yus bstand pas sems rangs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpal de dag gyis chos de thos nas myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// kun dga' po 'jig rtend kyi 'a
292a7(mdo): de na/ grong dang / grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor yod par myi 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad kya ba nam mkhal la khang pa lartsegs pa ma 'khod par 'gyur ro// 
292a8(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bud myed du gdags pa'ang myed par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad kyang / pad mo'i snying po las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rtend kyi khams de na kha zas su gdags pa myed de/ seMs can
292b1(mdo): de dag thams cad ni bsam gtan la dga' ba dang / chos la dgal ba'i zas can du 'gyur ro// 'jig rtend kyi khams de dag na theg pa gzhan rnam par bzhag pa myed de sems can de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la nges par 'gyur/ 
292b2(mdo): bdag go// 'jig rtend kyi khams de na tshul khrims log par zhugs pa 'am/ lta ba log par zhugs pa 'am/ cho ga log par zhugs pa 'am/ 'tsho ba log par zhugs pa'i sems can 'gal yang myed par 'gyur ro// 
292b3(mdo): sems can de dag thams cad ni nan tan dang ldan pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la khartsom 'grus pa pham par 'gyur ba sha stag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bcud dam brgyad kyi ris kyi lha 'am/ gzhan mu stegs can 'apyod
292b4(mdo): pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / dmyigs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhend pa dang / da phas kyi rgol ba myed par 'gyur ro// sems cad de dag thams cad ni zab mo'i spyod yul stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab par
292b5(mdo): 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na myi ru btags pa tsam dang / 4shes tsam ma gtogs khar/ lha dang myi zhes tha dad du bya ba myedapar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad ni yongs su 'byon/ 
292b6(mdo): pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro// kun dga' po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa yi sangs rgyas yon tan byi rgyal pong snang ba de yang lha dang myi rnams kyi skye bo ma pa po ya phan pa
292b7(mdo): skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir/ bar gyi ska lad pa brgya la tham par ya bzhugs par yang 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal por sdang ba de dgang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las/ 'das par
292b8(mdo): bzhed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba'i 'og su bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
293a1(mdo): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyum pa// bran
293a2(mdo): myed pa/ lha dang myi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpal brtsom 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba/ lung bstan nas mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// kun/ 
293a3(mdo): dgal po lam gyi skal pa de yang / sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dgel 'dus dkon mchog dang kyi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ bar gyi ska la pa de ni dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes brjod do// de
293a4(mdo): nas myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pas/ bcom ldan 'das las lung bstan pa thos nas/ dgal zhing mgu ste/ yid rangs shing rab tu dga' nas/ dgal ba dang yid bdel ba skyes ste// byang chub
293a5(mdo): sems dpa'i dgal ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis/ sa las steng gi bar snang la shing ha la bcun tsam chu 'ang gas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa 'i 'khor dad pa rgya che spem da a dang / 
293a6(mdo): dgel ba'i lam thas pa dag par bskyed de phying / sangs rgyas kyi mthul dang / rab gi shes rab kyi sobs pas/ de'i cha tshigs su bcad pa/ 'di dag smras so// chos 'di thams cad rab tu dben pa dang // dri ma myed
293a7(mdo): de nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// rgyud kyi dam pa 'di ni rnam shes nas/ de'i phyir de dag thugs sras gru khor 'gyur// rmyi lam bzhin du mtho ba pa cung zad myed// thams cad myed de gzung myed gsog dang gsol// grung po 'an/ 
293a8(mdo): dam sgyu 'dra snying po myed// chos rnaMs thas cad rmyi lam/ 'drar shes nas// 'dus byas dag la naM yang skyo ba myed// la las sgyu ma li rta dang glang chen dang // shing rta la dpung bu chu ba dang bzhon mthong la// dam pa'i don tu snying
293b1(mdo): po myed pa lham// phung po 'di snying po myed// gzugs kyi rang bzhin dbu kha rdos pa bzhin// tshor ba 'di mi chu'i chu'i yum 'dral// 'du shes dag ni spyig rgyu 'dra bar gsungs// 'dus byas thams cad chu shingapa snying po byed// srid sum
293b2(mdo): 'di na seMs yid rnam par shes// rgyal bas de bzhin sgyu 'dra gsog tu gsungs// gzugs kyi rang bzhin stong par rig nas nis// 'dus byas dag la nam yang skyo ba myed// khams bzhi po ni chos kyi dbyings 'dra na// skye mched nas
293b3(mdo): ni grob stong lta bu dang // chos 'di gsog dpabasob ltar rnam shes pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos mdzod 'dri nad pa yin// rab tu rul phyir sbyind dpa' rul ba dang // de bzhin tshul khrims rnam dag tshul khrims dang // rtag su 'phags
293b4(mdo): pa'i tshul gis bzod kyi zad// stong pa nyid phyir bcon 'grus rnam dmadag// bsam gtan rang bzhin 'gyur ba myed pa dang // de ltar she ras rab chags myed myed spros par// gang gi 'jug pa de 'drar gyu rad pa de/ 
293b5(mdo): de dag pha rol phyind pa'i pha rol phyind// bdag myed kho na nyid phyir byams pa mnyam// nam mkhal lta bur kong ru snying rje dgazhi phyir dga' dang btang snyoms bcas pa li// lam/ 'di tshangs pa li
293b6(mdo): he rtag tu zhi// bskul ba bzhi po khyad par 'phags pa 'di// ni par 'dren pas rjes su bzung phyir gsungs// 'dzind pa myed cing rnam/ rtog myed pa// de ni U la'i dngos po'i pha rol phyind// sems can 'di
293b7(mdo): dag bdag myed seMs can myed// srog dang gsol bag pa zag myi rnyed do// dbang po drug ni stong ste rab zhi bar// gang shes de ni byang chub sems dpal yin// sems can myed cing byang chub sems dpal myed// de ni gang
293b8(mdo): du'ang bdag myed rlom sems myed// gnyis dang bral zhing ma chags spros myed pa// sems can byang chub sems dpa' de dpal ldan// chos 'di snying po myed de sgyu ma 'dra/ gang rtswa'ang myi 'ong nam yang 'gro myi 'gyur// / 
294a1(mdo): chos dbyings 'di yi gnas pa rig nas ni// rgyal bas de bzhin nyid ni mnyam sangs rgyas// gang na'ang yod pa 'am myed pa myed mod kyi// rgyu la rten nas chos rnams 'byung bas na// mkhal la klog/ 
294a2(mdo): mthong 'jig pa lta bur ni// sems kyi 'khri shing de ltar shes par bya// rlung ni nam mkhal myi chags rgyal ba bzhin// gzugs myed sems ni 'dus byas/ dag la rgyu// sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag de shes nas na nyon / 
294a3(mdo): mongs gzug myed sogs par gyi 'gyur ro// lus ni tshig pa ma dang lo mam 'dra// bems po rje myed rdo shing ngan pa ltar// de yis snga ma'i rang bzhin 'drar shes nas// lus kyi chos la gnas par myi byed do// tshig ni rtag tu
294a4(mdo): bzung myed rlung dang 'dral// ri dang / phug gi khrag 'cha lta bu ste/ de 'drar sbra ni rab tu dben shes na// sgra rnams kun la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags byed// bdag ni nam mkha'i ngos nas myi lhungs// mkha'
294a5(mdo): las srung ba'i gnas kyang yod ma yin// chos 'di nam mkha' 'dra bar bsgoms nas ni// de ltar sems can sems can mye/ da mtshungs gnas// bskayad pa brgya phrag mang por bsregs kyang ni/ 
294a6(mdo): dri ltar nam mkhal nam yang sngon tshig/ chos rnaMs thams cad nam mkhal 'drar shes pa// de srid bskal de che zhing rnams brgyar yang 'gro// ri dang ri rab kho ra khor yug ni// de bzhin ri dngabacas pa'i sa rnaMs kun/ 
294a7(mdo): nam mkha'i ngos kyis bye bar rig nas de// rdzu 'phruld kyis bye ba'i zhing du 'gro// sa dang / mu dang me dang rlu dag dang // khams bzhi 'di dag namo mkha'i ngos mnyam par// dpal bo tshul 'di khong du chud pa dag/ 
294a8(mdo): mkhal las bye ba mtha' yas zhing rdzu 'gro// srid pa gsum na sgra dang skad kyi bag/ bzang ngan de bzhin bring po kyi yod pa// de'i mtha' ma bskal da pa brgyar brjod kyang // sngon gyi rang bzhin myi snang rgyu ba myed/ 
294b1(mdo): rapa 'byung ba ni mtshan mchog ma yin pam// sems kyi chos kyis gzugs kyi rab tu phye/ sems dang yid ni mtshungs par dben par 'gyur// rgyal ba thams cad chos mtshungs nyid phyir mnyam// sngon gi srid par byang chub
294b2(mdo): spyad spyon cing // dge' ba brgya stong rab tu bsags nas ni/ khyang chub mnyam zhing mnyam par rab shes pa// grags pa chen po rnams ni lung bstand 'gyur// chos rnams kun ni rang yul yongs dag ste// mtha'
294b3(mdo): yas phyir ni rgyal ba'i yul du mnyam// mnyam nyid 'di dag gang gis rab shes pa// yon tan ldan pa de dag lung bstan 'gyur// bdag ni gzugs myi na tshor myin 'du shes myin// sems dpal ma yin rnam par shes// 
294b4(mdo): myed kyang // byang chub khod du chud pas bdag lus bstan// phung po khams kyis bdag ni lung ma bstan // bzod pa kang zhig bzod ma nas zhi yi// skad cig ni zad dang 'dri ba myin// 
294b5(mdo): mtshungs myed kyi skye ba la bzod pa na// myi dbang 'gyur zhes rgyal bas lung bstand to// chos nas kund tang bdag tu rang bzhin mnyam// bdag ni bdag myed stong pa'i rang bzhin te/ 
294b6(mdo): stong pa nam mkha' ba'i kho bo nyid// bya ba chub rtag tu mkha' mnyam rang bzhin no// zad par bya phyir zad pa shes myi nus// myi zad pa ni zad pas zad myi 'gyur// zad pa'i sgo yis chos rnams kun ma skyes// 
294b7(mdo): mazod dang ldan pas sangs rgyas lu ston to// mtshan skyed gnas 'jug pa'i myed de// yang dag 'dus ma byas pa 'dus yas grol// ma byas byed dum bcug byang ba byin// de bzhin nyid 'drang rgyal bas 'das
294b8(mdo): lung bstan par ni 'gyur snyam na// chos lam tshul la myi mnyam sbyor ba yan// sems dang yid kyis sbyor la sbyor ma yin// chos spyor khyad par 'phags 'di mtshungs shing mnyam khyed cag thams cad
295a1(mdo): sa'i steng na 'khod// bdag ni nam mkha'i dkyilo na rnam par gnas// sa dang nam mkhal mnyam par shes nas ni// srid la gsum na chags myed ye shes 'jug/ de nas myi/ 'am ci'i rgyal
295a2(mdo): po lpe nad las// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ steng gi bar snad las khabs ste/ thal mo sbyard nas// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom
295a3(mdo): ldan 'das sangs rgyas ni bdag gi ched du bya ba ga lags so// de ci'i slad su zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don ma mchis par bgyis te// sngon gi dgel ba'i ma ba rnams kyis
295a4(mdo): bdag ma bslus las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskab bu'i slad du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lu bstand to// de nas 'khor da de
295a5(mdo): 'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig/ 'di lta bu'i sem sa skyed te/ myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas de bzhin gsheg sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ka las
295a6(mdo): dang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis// byang chub sems dpal de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas
295a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang las bya nga chub sems dpal bskyed pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan
295a8(mdo): lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal rtsa lad pa// rigs kyi bu sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i rus na bskal pa grangs myed pa'i yaM ches grangs myed pa rgyas pa tshad myed pa/ bsam gyis myi khyab par gyurd
295b1(mdo): de'i tshe de'i nus na / rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ska lad 'a ba la// 'jig rtend kyi khams dgel la zhes bya ba ra/ de bzhin gshegs la/ dgra bcom pa ya ma dag par tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ 
295b2(mdo): bde lan gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes su 'dul ba'i kha lo skur pa bla na myed pa/ A dang kyi rnams kyi ston da la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen phung po zhes bya la 'jig rtend tu/ byung ngo // rigs/ 
295b3(mdo): kyi mu de'i tshe de rus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen phung po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dgel 'argyan ni bye ga khrag drug bcur bya rad te/ thabs cad kyang 'dzin
295b4(mdo): bkyus la thams pa/ bzod la thob pa// blan myed pa yang dag pa/ tshogs pa'i byang chus las phyir gyi ldog yan sdug go// de'i tshemi da tshad ni lo bye la phrag drug thul par gyur na to// 'jig rtend kyi khams dgel
295b5(mdo): zhes bya ba de yang / bye ru mya las grub pa/ rgyand thams cad kyis rgyand pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad ldan pa// dkal ldan ga lha'i ris lta bur khab khyim dang / longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang / bza'
295b6(mdo): pa dang brdung ba bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor da pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na theg pa chen po ma gtogs pam// theg pa gzhan rnams par gzhag pa myed par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i rus na/ gling bzhi la dbang ba'i
295b7(mdo): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po// sa 'dzin ces bya ba/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de 'i slas ni stong phrag bzhi bcu yod do// de'i bu ni stong tham pa yod de/ dpal ba// rdul khod pa/ yan lag mchog gi
295b8(mdo): gzugs dang ldan pa// lo bye ba kram par yi du shong ba'i chos gos dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos smand dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar sbyar pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba thams cad bsnyen da bkur
295b9(mdo): rol kyi sde rab tu 'jom pa stsas so// rigs kyi lus mardzi me ma mngomamasam 'das de bzhi gshegs pa rin chem phub te pa dang / byang chub sems dpal rtse sa phrag dru
296a1(mdo): byas nas/ des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ rin chen phung po de la mchod pa dpag tu myed pa byas te/ dgel ba'i mamakhas nye bar brtan nas// bud myed bzhi stong de dag dang / bu stong po de dang / srog
296a2(mdo): chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// des byang chub tu sems skyed nas kyang / lo bye bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la bsnyen
296a3(mdo): bkur byas so// de rus gzhan zhig na/ bu thu bo brtul zhugs yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba rgyal por bcug nas// rgyal srid thams cad bor te/ skra dang / kha su/ bregs nas/ gos rus smig bgos de bcom ldan 'das de
296a4(mdo): li stand las dad pas khyim nas myed par rab tu byung ngo // de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gyis kyang / rim gyis khu thu bo re re rgyal por bcug nas phya'i rjes su rab tu byung bar gyur da to// rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam grangs 'dri
296a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs la/ de'i tsheba'i tshad ning bar gyurd to// rgyal bu ga zhon nu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de las rab tu byung / nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu tha chungs snying rje'i blo zhes bya ba gcig pu ma
296a6(mdo): gtogs te/ de ni chos kyis rgyal srid byed pa chad pa myed pa dang / ma tshon ma myed pa dpar chos dang mthun par dbang byed cu bcug go// rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po a 'dzind de bu dang bcas par/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i
296a7(mdo): bstan pa la rab tu byung nas// thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po'i de'i rnam pa'i chos ril tu bzung ngo // rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i
296a8(mdo): rgyal pos 'dzind ces bya bar gyu ra pa/ de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za'am/ yid gnyis su su dang na bstan/ byang chub sems dpal spyad pa byed de// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de lur myi
296b1(mdo): lha'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pa/ 'di'i rus na / rgyal pos 'dzi nad ces bya bar gyur da to// rgyal po de'i bur gyurd pa de dag thams cad ni da ltang phyogs bcul na / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// 
296b2(mdo): rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de lasarba/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de bla na myed pa yang dag par
296b3(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems skyed tshun chad de'i bar thams cad du// sangs rgyas mthong ba dang chos nyand pa dang / dge la 'dun la rim 'gro byed pa dang / ma bral bar gyur da te// 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byar
296b4(mdo): chub kyi tshogs kyang mya rang cu yang dag par bsgrubs pas// 'di/ saras 'di ni ma/ 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba com pa ya pa dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal po snang
296b5(mdo): zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes/ yu bstanang // / de nas bcomam ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen po lha'i cod pan gis 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan
296b6(mdo): 'das ci tsam bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcol pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyal thogs pa myi mngal ba'i mkhyen ya dang ldan pa/ 'di sreng dgel ba'i ma ba mngon par 'phrubagyis pa'i skyabs na/ yun
296b7(mdo): ring du lags pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa myi mngal ba'i mkhyen pas gzigs pa ni ngo mtsharang to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal saHla da pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin
296b8(mdo): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom phra ya bdag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rdzogs pa myed pa'i ye shes dpa ldan no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ gang sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa 'i sas
297a1(mdo): kyi rgyud zad la/ 'gags pa dang / bral dang / rnam par gyur da pa/ skrag pa dag las sems kyi rgyud de dag byung ba dang / myu ga pa dag myed pas bzad pa/ dgel la 'am/ myi dgel ba 'am/ lung ru bstan/ 
297a2(mdo): pa 'am/ lung sum bstand pa 'am/ lung ru ma bstand pa yang rung ste/ sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang byung ba de dag thams cad kyang / rnam pa dang bcas// yul phyogs dang bcas/ gzhi rtse las gyurd pa dang bcas
297a3(mdo): bar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyu dang / sems las byung ba'i chos dgel la 'am/ myi dge' ba 'am/ lus bstand pa 'am/ lung ma bstan pa yang
297a4(mdo): rung ste/ sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas/ gzhi i las/ gyur da pa dang bcas par/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// 
297a5(mdo): rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzon sa pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs pa myed pa'i ye shes dang ldan no// de/ bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyend pa thogs pa myi mngal la bstan dpa
297a6(mdo): bshad na srog chags sum 'bum gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas myi 'am ci'i rgyal po sngond pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpal dang / nyan thos kyi dge' 'dun gyi sakho
297a7(mdo): dang bcas pa la/ zhag bdun bde bar sbyar kha thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/ yongs su yongs spyad par bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi kha pa khyim dang/ 'khor gyi khyams der yang / bcom ldan 'das la yul te/ 'di skad ces
297a8(mdo): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la zhugs pa phel ba'i slad rtsa 'dir gshegs shing bzhugs par gsol // de nas skye bo mad po le phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs ba chedra ba dang / skye bo
297b1(mdo): phal po che'i don dang dkyi 'am cil dang dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams la phan pa dang ba del bar 'gyur ro// de nas myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pa'i bu dri myed pa'i myig ces bya khas / bcom ldan 'das la nor bu rin po che yi dra ba yul
297b2(mdo): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da te/ bcom ldan 'das myi 'am ci'i bdag cag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs su lags kya pa bdag cag ni sil snyan dang / ro lad mo'i dbyangs sgal/ 
297b3(mdo): dang / klul dang gapal rab tu chags// spos dang / bcug pa dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la lag ma mchis par dga' ba'i zhing che lags na ji ltar bdag cag bag mchis par 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
297b4(mdo): yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos rin po che'i phyag rgya'i sgoli dam ngag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la khasaHlad bar gso/ la da/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ myi
297b5(mdo): 'am ci'i rgyal po'i myi 'u dri ma myed pa'i myig la 'di skad ces bkal ba tsal da to// bzhin bzangs de'i phyir/ deb phyi nad chad sil snyan dang glu byangs de dag las byang chub yongs su sbyind par byed pa'i chos drug
297b6(mdo): bcu rtsa bzhi bya bas khyed la byi nad kyis rlab par bya'o// drug bcu bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ myi rtag pa'i sgra 'byung pa dang / sdug bsngal gi sgra 'byung la dang / bdag myed pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i
297b7(mdo): sgra dang / dben pa'i sgra dang / gyi skyed pa'i sgra dang / dngos po myed pa'i skrad pa/ 'byung ba myed pa'i sgra dang / gnas myed pa'i sgra dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgra dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi skra dang / seMs
297b8(mdo): can byed pa'i sgra dang / srob sbed pa'i sgra dang / gang zag byed pa'i sgra dang / sbyin pa'i sgra dang / tshul khrims kyi skad pa/ bzod pa'i sgra dang / brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang / bsam gtan gi sgra dang / shes rab kyi sgra dang / byams pa/ 
298a1(mdo): swa dang / snying rje'i sgra dpa / btang snyoms kyi sku dang / 'bab myed pa'i sgra dang / 'gro ba myed pa'i sgra dang / rgyab myed pa'i sgra dang/ gnas pa myed pa'i sgra dang / brtan pa myed pa'i sgra dang / sto ya nyid/ 
298a2(mdo): kyi sma dpa / mtshan ma myed pa'i sgra dang / smond pa myed pa'i sgra dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang / 'byung ba myed pa'i skra dang / rtend gyes pa'i sgra dang / rten pa myed pa'i sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / 
298a3(mdo): dge la 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tshad myed pa'i skra dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sgra dang / yang dag par spong ba'i sgra dang / rdzu 'phrul da kyi rkang pa'i sgra dang / dbang po'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / byang
298a4(mdo): chub kyi yan lag gi skra dang / lam gyi sma dang / zhi gnas kyi ska dang / lhag mthong gi skra dang / thabs kyi sgra dang / bskul pa da'i dngos po'i sgra dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i
298a5(mdo): sgra dang / bdud tshar bcad pa'i sgra dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i sgra dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang rmyi lam dang / gzugs brtan dang / mum+ba dang brag cha lta bu'i sgra dang / chos
298a6(mdo): kyi dbyings 'dres pa'i sgra dang / 'jom pas yongs su myi skyo ba'i sgra dang / 'byung ba'i sgra dang / dgel ba'i rtsa pa'i tshogs thams cad snga sa dang mya lam dang / dbus dang chu'i chu bu dang / sbyin rgya dang / chu shing na
298a7(mdo): phung po dang / sgyu ma dang snying po myed pa'i sgra dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bya zhing chos grub pa'i sgra 'byang bar 'gyur ro// bzhin bzangs dag de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus sil snyan dang klul dbyangs de
298a8(mdo): dag gapagis/ khyed bag yod par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// // de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas
298b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci tsam ru/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'di byin gyis rlabs kyis/ shi nad du byind kyis rlabs pa dang / chos bstand pa dang /

298b3(mdo): chub sems dpal rnams shin tu bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpal yongs su bzung bas/ sems can thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas// byang chub
298b4(mdo): sems dpa' yongs su bzung ba gang yin pa de sems can gyi don nyid do// / de ltar na sems can thams cad kyi ched du// de dag go cha gang gis/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa/ 'khor pa las mya ngan 'dal
298b5(mdo): 'i lam du gzung bar 'gyur ba'i go cha chen po gyo nad to// grogs po dag rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar da ltar zhugs kyang rung yongs su mya ngan/ las 'das kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su
298b6(mdo): bzung ba mdzad pa gang yin pa des/ sems can thams cad yongs su bzub pa yin par rig par bya'o// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpal la ge so dong bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dpan pa'i bsos smand dang / yo byad rnas
298b7(mdo): kyis rim 'gror byas pa ni/ sems can thams cad la rim gror byas par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpal bde bar sbyar pa nye bar bsgrubs pa ni/ sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar dngal nye bar bsgrubs par 'gyur ro// 
298b8(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grogs po dag than byang chub sems dpa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rdul pa ga pa yin pa de thams cad la snying rje chen po reg su thob pa dang ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba 'i phyir yongs su 'dzin to// 
299a1(mdo): de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gcab ma'i lA'i bu de dag dang / klul dang gnod sbyin dang / dri zal dang / gyi 'am si dang / lto/ 'phye chen po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de
299a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su yi rangs nas/ lha'i me tog nam pa ma tho la dog na sogs pas/ com ldan 'das la mngon par gcod to// / denas kyi lam ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ 'di sa du sas
299a3(mdo): te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sam// gzhan gyi byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrus kyis bdag gi gnas nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i mil gshegs pa ni bdag gi ma ma yin gyis// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la ma

299a5(mdo): de yang bdag 'khor dang bcas pas drangs nas/ de lta na 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// snya ma mo// de nas kyi 'am ci'i rgyal po smond pas yid las byab 'a'i lha'i rim
299a6(mdo): bo che sna bathun gyi shing rtal 'phang rgyu dpag tshad ya/ khyo nang tu dpag tshad lnga pa/ kha khyer rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor pa// shing ldan pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyand pa/ steng du rin po che'i drabs bres pa/ rin po

299a8(mdo): mngon par smra dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan zas kyi dge 'dun thams cad kyi gnad ya so mom mngon pam smras da / gang dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyid mi/ zhas ring mu 'brad ba la byind dang / 
299b1(mdo): tshangs pa dang / 'jig te na skyong ba dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gi stan da yang shing rta li steng du ci rigs pa sprul da to// de nas myi 'am ci'i rgyal po sngond pas/ de

299b4(mdo): nas kyi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pas// rdzu 'brus kyi stobs kyis shing ta de lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ shing ta la bdun srid kyi bar sna las gas nas// den gyi 'am ci li bu mo brgya khri bzhi stong thams cad kyang / su~M
299b5(mdo): brgya stong po de dag dang / gzhan yang gyi 'am ci'i dang / dri zal dang / lho phye la chen po brgya stong phrag ru ma dang // myi ma ci'i rgyal pho And pa nyid kyang rin po che'i zag pa thogs nas/ shing rta la btags
299b6(mdo): tenam mkhal las drangs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi ra snang gi shing rta la la bzhugs shing / nam mkha'i dkyil nas gshegs pa la myi 'am ci'i rgyal po la rgya khri bzhi stong po de dag gis/ sil snyan
299b7(mdo): dmub dbya sa blangs nas/ bsod pa byed de// brgyad ma 'do zhing/ com ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par thod// phyi 'am ci'i nu mo 'argya 'o mi ngan thazag// gzugs kyi dam pa dang ni
299b8(mdo): pa dang // mi la stan rnams ni rab tu dkrim bgyid cing // yang dag bsags pas 'dren la bstod pa bgyid// ma can mchog bsod nams kyis ni gzi' brjid kyang rang // gzugs mchog mthong na dgal bar bgyid pa'i
300a1(mdo): gzugs// / bden pa'i yon tan la ni rtag gnas pa// yon tan mtsho chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams dang khyod myi 'dra// g.yas g.yon na yang rnam par mthong ma myong // ji ltar ri rab
300a2(mdo): cha rtand zhing myi g.yo' ba/ de ltar khyod kyi sku ni dpal gyis mdzes// 'drend pa khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// chags pa ma mchis par ni mkhal las mchil// nam mkhal lta bur dag cing dri myi mngal// bcom ldan nyon
300a3(mdo): mongs lasal la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dang myin dab pa dang srin po dang // brgya byim tshangs pa dang ni dag pa'i lha// nyi ma zla ba skar mang bcas pa'i 'od// khyod kyi mdzod sprul 'od ni mchis par 'gyur // shes rab 'bya ba gnas shes
300a4(mdo): rab rgya mtshol ldan// sems can kun gyi sems kyi spyod la mkhas/ 'jig rten gsum na 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod// 'jig rten rtse/ grags pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud bzhi'i po'i skyon rnams khas
