300a6(mdo): rtag tu dul zhing thugs ni mnyam par bzhag/ legs par gsungs pas 'gro la chim mdzad kyang // khyod ni tshig dang skad la gnas ma/ lags// khyod kyi gsu ni yid/ 'ong rab tu bstan // zhing brgya dag tu thogs pa myed par ma chi// 
300a7(mdo): sgra de sems can gang gis mos gyu rang na// de dag thams cad de bas tshim par 'gyur// sems can la lo / sgyur ba spu gcig tu// stong gsum rgya mtsho'i cheng rnams zhugs kyurd kyang // sems can rags pa rnams la'ang myi gnod sa/ 
300a8(mdo): rdzu 'phrul ga yang skyon ni yongs kyi yangal// stong gsum gi ni ni mo mi rab dag/ phyag gcig gi ni ma mi cu banaganas su// zhing mang bye ba dag tu gshegs mdzad kyang // khyod kyi sku'i sgozas ni zhum ma mchis// khyed ni bskal pa
300b1(mdo): brgya gi ma mams na/ brtul thugs dka' thun tshul rnams yon tan dang / byin dang nus dang sdom dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus pas ma gtan shes rab gnad tu bslabs// sangs rgyas bye ba mngal bsnyen dkur mdzad// de dag / 
300b2(mdo): kyis na pa ma chos kyang bzung // thugs rje ldan na rgya ba zhin gyi sa// byed pa sangs su skye ba'i drugs kyis nga// des 'byed pa kyis sum par gyi 'gyur zhing // ris 'gro bgyis pas mthol dar 'gyun ma lags// dgas sa du
300b3(mdo): stsobs shing myig so ste// 'jig rten chos gnas kyigs pa dam bzhin// chos rnams so pa ma can su mchis kyang // mamra 'dra zhing sbru ma sa bu dang // dmub rnam can kyis ma grog 'dra dang // smyig rgya mtshan nyid sa bur dbu ma khyenapa/ 
300b4(mdo): ngo bo nyid kyis gang zag padag ma mchis// gdod nas stong zhing myi g.yol rje ma mchis// nam mkhal lta bur dag cing dri ma mchis// dngos po bas par dngos po ma mchis 'dra// las dang bya ba rgyu dang rkyen de rnams las// byA ba ba lasra/ 
300b5(mdo): kyis rje ni ma mchis pan// tshul 'di rnam par sbyang ba mdzad pa na// de phyir khyod kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bgyi// gang dag/ 'dren pa mthong zhing thos gyur dan// de dag la ni ngan song 'jigs ma mchis// de dag
300b6(mdo): de 'gro dag tu mchog gnas te/ ga chags de rnams kyin nyid pags// bdag cag rnams kyi gang pag dam pa khyod// bran du mtshad pas mchon gakyis nas su// byang chub tu ni sems kyi bskyed bgyis te/ 
300b7(mdo): ga sa chog yar thams can 'am zlon// nam mkhal la ni shA nus kyang 'dag ga rgyamatsho can mas kyi nas kyang ku pa// nam pamalas par ni nyung ma dang yi// sangs smram yod rnams par gargyar rtsi gdag/ 
300b8(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das shing nyal la bzhugs te// nam mala'i dkyil kyi lam nas gshegs pas gshegs shing // gser gi 'jog/ 'dral bu 'i sru las 'od gang gis so pa gsum gi stong chen po la 'jig rten gi khams
301a1(mdo): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od byung ba dang / 'od des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyim chen po dang / bya rgod phub po'i mi yang ra' du khyal par gyu dang to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rtal des rgyal po'i khas kyi grong khyem dang / 
301a2(mdo): da kyi phung po'i midagal ba de gshegs so// danas rgyal mas kyi rgyal po sa bye // rnan pa da da/ na nga/ ban pa dang / kyis 'das mas pa dang / dge' ba dang / 
301a3(mdo): dang / dgel sten dang dge' snyen ma rnams 'od des bskul nas/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / sos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gzugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das bcu
301a4(mdo): de'i phyir/ rings par rings pas/ rgyal po'i lar gyi grob khyer chen pon sa kyang ste/ bya rgod phung po mangs bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dadza// ljon pa'i sras rnams shing rtal 'dren bzhin du mi la stan brgya
301a5(mdo): chun song byed do// kyi 'am ci'i bu mo'i rol mos la na gyi sgra des/ rgod kyi phum po'i mi thams cad du grags par gyu nga to// des kyi 'am ci'i rgyal po sngonang pa dpung dang 'acam mkho pa bcas 'as/ mu 'gyur
301a6(mdo): snyoms kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam ma kha'i kyis nas khye te rkyeno phung po'i di la bzhan no// denas cos ldan 'das shing tsam sems mams nas// rang gi gnam su bad rnams pas bzhunas so// byang chum mes dang
301a7(mdo): de m-i dang / nyan mos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khom kyang shi na' di las 'azas nas/ bcwom ldan 'das kyi namams man las byan 'acas te// mam ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ tsham ldan 'das sa kun
301a8(mdo): mamed te/ rang nga gi gan lam 'dan// 'dod pa na ston pa dang gzugs na stun pa dang gnas gangs mchis kyi sa'i bu dag kyang / shing tam de las ngas te/ cos ldan 'das kyi nangs la man nas phyag 'tshas nas/ 
301b1(mdo): phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal dang / bcas pa dang / dgel slong dang / dgel slong ma dang / dge' bsnyen dang / dge la snyen ma rnams kyis/ 
301b2(mdo): tog dang / bcug pa dpa som dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gzugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ji ltar thogs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo las
301b3(mdo): phyag/ 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la sku ma snye lad tam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol nas phyogs cig u 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsold to// @#
301b4(mdo): ldan 'das kyi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pa g.yog 'khor nga bcas pas// bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te shing rta las bzhugs pa/ nam mkha'i nas drangs pa'i dge' ba'i sa ba/ 'dis kyi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pa 'khord dang
301b5(mdo): bcas bus ci zhig mthong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bas lad pa// dgel ba'i a pa des/ gyi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljonan gsus dang bcas/ bu dang bcas/ nams dang bcas pas// 'dir byang
301b6(mdo): chu 'u sems dpa' bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad nas byang chub kyi snying po ya jug gi bar du mngon par shes pa las kyi nyams pa// rab tu mam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi ning 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du phan tshun 'gro/ 
301b7(mdo): bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // chos mthong ba dang / dgel 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / myi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur/ lung bstan pa thol par 'gyur// dam pa'i chos yongs
301b8(mdo): su ladrungal la 'artson par 'gyur/ sems can yongs su srid par bya ba la spo bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dmas/ gyi 'amatsha'i bdag ma snad lal 'di ska dpes smras so// gyi ma mi bdas chog san 'das/ 
302a1(mdo): kyis khyod kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pas/ khyod kyis rnyed pa legs blaram rnyed kyis khyod kyi dgel ba'i cha ba ni gang sems can thams cad dang kho las kyang 'thob par 'dod de/ myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pas smras
302a2(mdo): rgyal po chen po dge' ba'i cha ba 'di thams cad bdag gyis// khyod dpa sems can thams cad la phul lo// de ci'i khyim zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgel ba'i ba ni gang sems can thams cad dang / thun meng
302a3(mdo): ma yin lagapa sang byed do// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni sems pa na ma yin te/ de dge ba'i ma la thams cad / seman gyi skyed do/ dgel ba'i cha ba thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la gtob yang
302a4(mdo): na gyi 'dis kyi byung/ pyod par gyi 'gyur mo// rgyal po chen po/ de chum sems dpa'i dag pa'i ma / mas cadas khye yu la thom pa napa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'chol par rgyan
302a5(mdo): da'i phyir nan/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chus ni/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas byed pa dang / sems canas sbyor ba dang / sems cad kyi phyir 'brab par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen ma
302a6(mdo): khyod kyis gang gi phyir/ dge' ba'i bzhes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nu kya da pabyed de/ de gnyis sas cad kyis dam pa mimams sa nas/ des kyi shes pa'i mun pa dang / gti mug gi ying tog chen thom mams
302a7(mdo): byed pa'i khyod pa 'byung ba'i sems pas sa nas/ byad kyis ma mams kyi nang 'chen sas can 'des byed da yang rnab pabyed pa ma' gnas pas/ khyod kyis kya nyin pa legs par rnyed do/ khyim thocan po
302a8(mdo): mas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' len pas gus par byas te/ cinas kyang chos kyi tshig dang / mig 'phrul ga mam pa yang / dren par gyi 'gyung ba dang / chud thal bar gyi 'gyu pa dang / sum du 'thung ba dang / 
302b1(mdo): yongs su bzung ba'i phyir bdag chos kyi snod du/ 'gyur bar bya'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das/ la byang chub sems dpal lha'i cod pan gyis/ 'di skad ces gsoyad to// bcom ldan 'das/ rdzi ltar a byang chub sems dpal chos kyi/ snod
302b2(mdo): 'gyur ba lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpal lha'i cod pams 'di skad ces bka lasaHlad to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos um bcu cha gnyis dang ldan
302b3(mdo): na chos kyi snod du 'gyur te/ sum bsu sa gnyis gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i snod sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i snod bsam pa dang / byang chub sems kyi lam nye bar rtond
302b4(mdo): pa'i spyo pa dang / dge la ba'i sa la khyad par rtsa 'gro ba'i snod lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mang rtswa thos pa'i snod dran pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i snod bre gros dang / don rtogs pa rjes su rtogs pa dang / longs 'apyod chen po'i snod
302b5(mdo): sbyin pa dang / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i snod tshul khrims/ dang/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcumaH gnyis 'thob pa'i bzod pa da/ pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing / thams cad 'grub pa'i snod pa con 'grus dang / 
302b6(mdo): thams las su rub pa'i snod bsam gtan dang // dogs pa yams nad/ sa rab su 'das pa'i snod shes rab dang / sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i snod byams pa dang / dbul zhing nyam yag pa thams cad bskyas
302b7(mdo): pa'i snang snying rje dang / chos sa dgal ba'i snyed dgal ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong kho la spang ba'i snod btang snyoms dang / dgel ba li a pa thams cad 'dzin du bcug pa'i snod dgel ba'i bshes gnyen dang / shes
302b8(mdo): rab rgya ma no la tu phyind pa'i skad rnam pa tshol bas rnams kyi myong pa dang / byi ltom pa'i snod ral su 'byung ba dang / don nyung zhing bya la nyung ba'i sdod danan pa la gnas pa dang / bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa'i sgon
302b9(mdo): dben pa la dgal ba dang / sems can yongs su byin par bya ba'i snod bskul ba'i dngos po dang / chos skang thal sto dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / tham sa thams cad 'dzin pa'i snod gzungs dang / 
303a1(mdo): sa nod pas kya ga/ da pa na la rnam pas dang / da ma ma'adun
303a2(mdo): byed pa'i sems dang / nya bar byad pa thams can 'a ba dzid stong pa nyid la mos padang/ 'a badzizhin lagasas pa pong na song ba'i 'od rtenan glen par 'gyur bdang/ kyi ga pa gir byed par sras ma
303a3(mdo): da da #/ pa na / sa kyis than byed pa mang dag pa'i tshogs pa'i mams byed payin sa ma
303b1(mdo): 'di lta ste// sems can gi khams tshad myed pa thos na skrag pa dang / 'khor ba tshad myed pa thos na skrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad myed pa thos na skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad myed pas mtshan dang dbye byad bzang po
303b2(mdo): grub pa thos la ma skrag pa ste/ kyi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su skye ba rig par bya'o// gyi 'am tsa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po dang ldan na yongs su kyi skye
303b3(mdo): bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi khams tshad myed pa de yang / bdag gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla' bar bya'o zhes mos nas kyi skrag pa dang / bsod nams chad myang/ dgel ba'i rnam pa bsgrub pa'i phyir
303b4(mdo): 'khor ba tshad myed pa yongs su bzung bar bya'o zhes thos nas kyi skrag dpa/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes tshad myed pa de dag gyis dngas su rdzogs par bya'o zhes thos na myi skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad
303b5(mdo): myed pa lacags pas mtshan dang dpel byad bzang po grub ste/ bdag gis kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes zos na gyi skrag pa ste/ kyi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dpa ldan na/ yongs
303b6(mdo): sa kyi skyo bar rig par bya'o// phyis ma ci'i dag po gzhan yang ga byang chub sems dpa' chos pani dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi ga zhen 'dis ste// skabs zhangs su nyan chos kyi meg pa 'dod pa dang
303b7(mdo): nangs su dang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa na yal ban 'dor zhing yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / gzhan sang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub yang dag par 'dzin du gyi 'jug pa ste
303b8(mdo): bye ma ci bdag so// byang chub sems dpang chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs su skyo bar rig pa bya'o// rgya ma so dag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' tsham bzhi dang ldanan yongs sa kyi stso lar rig par
304a1(mdo): bzhig pa zhe na 'di lta ste rab tu nyen kyang byang chub kyi sems myi gtong ba dang // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis myi 'dod pa dang / lus dang srog kyang 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos srung ba dang / dpag tshad stong du 'gro na/ 
304a2(mdo): gzhan dag byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa ste/ gyi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' ches bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su myi skyo bar rig par bya'o// myi 'am cil bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos
304a3(mdo): la zhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ slob pa mthong na yongs su skyo ba dang / gsor nyams byed par sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa dang / mang du thos pa tshol la la myi brtson pa dang / ji ltar
304a4(mdo): thos pa'i chos nas gzhan la myi stond pa dang / myi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpal chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su skye ma rig par bya'o// myir+thi'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal chos bzhi
304a5(mdo): dang ldan na yongs su skyo bam rig par bya ste/ bzhil gang zhe na 'dis ste/ spong ba la dges ba'i bzhes gnyen du su shes skyed cing zhe 'dras pa'i sems myed cing 'dzum zhing 'phro gnyer byed de/ chur shen
304a6(mdo): legs par rangs so zhes bya ba'i tshig spa ba dang / bdag 'de' bas skye sags shing sems can sems cad la bde par 'a phyin pa dang / ma dugs pa col pas kyi rims shing gi ga thos pa thos rnams kyang / gzhan dag sa rgyan
304a7(mdo): na kyang bang mi byed pamams dag gzhan sarab su sto pa / rgya ma na pa bya mam pa dam mtshan 'di dang dang nan/ bams kyi phyob jig pa byas// kyi dag can
304a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' chos pa'i dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste / bzhi gang zhen 'dis ste/ phyin pa'i ma do med pa byin pams pa yongs su gyi mos pa dang / 'askul ba'i dngos po la gyi byom pa dang / sems can thos
304b1(mdo): sbyin par byed pa'i brtson 'grus myi bcom pa dang / yon tan chung ngu tsam gyis chog par 'dzind cing / gong du gyi tshol ba ste/ myi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpal chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// 
304b2(mdo): gyi lam ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongasu myi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhen 'di lta ste/ mgo dang gos la e 'bar bzhin du pha rol pa tu phyind pa li lam yongs su chos pa dang
304b3(mdo): bskul ba'i dngas po la hag tu brtson phra dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par brtson 'grus bcos pa dang / dge' ba mams cad yong su gang ba'i phyir de la gyi chags pa yin te/ gyi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos
304b4(mdo): bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bzhi pa bsgrab pa 'dis/ gyi da ci'i bdag so ljon pas lan btab nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgral la 'di
304b5(mdo): skad ces bka lasaHlad to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis byang chub sem sa dpal rnams kyi yongs su skyo ba dang / yongs su myi skyo ba dang / bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'jug pa la 'jug pa 'di thos sam// rgyal pom
304b6(mdo): gas sang pa/ bcom ldan 'das sas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas yad pa// rgyam mchen po de khas na/ stod kyang chub sems dpa'i spyod las yongs su gyi skye ba spyad par bya'o// rgyam ma ma skyes zhes
304b7(mdo): sa pa/ khyi mtha bdan pa cad ci gang sems can 'das sa byin yar byed pa dang gi thabs sengs pa'i byen par rgyal las skyes dma'i rgyasamamomame pa ma spyod pa yongs su rkang bar phyi khyod kyis ma dang ca / 
305a1(mdo): de nas myi 'am ci'i rgyal po sngon pas rang gi pi khang de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga blangs so// pi bang de blangs me thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthul dang / myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldom pa'i dge' ba'i ngam pa lig
305a2(mdo): brjid kyis pi khang gi sgra de las / seng ge la sgyings gastar shing sa la yum g.yo'i ba'i slar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/ 'di dag byung ngo // phan pa spyod pa dag dang don spyod dang/ chos thos nan tan
305a3(mdo): byed pa spyod pa dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yongs su skyo ba myed par spyod// bde ba spyod dang skyid pa spyod pa dang // sems can kun la sems snyoms spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang
305a4(mdo): spyod pa// de dag rgya chen ma yin spyod pa byed// brtan snyed dang bden pa spyod pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa pyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gar chu'ang
305a5(mdo): byed spyod pa yin// stsal ba spyod dang sbyind pa spyod pa dang / dngos po sems cad yongs su gtong spyod dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang bapyod pa/ de dag ser sa myed par spyod pa yin// chu byi
305a6(mdo): spyod pa mnyam myod pa dang // sas dpangag ni yongs dag spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag tshul khrims 'am lang ba'i spyod la byed// brtul zhugs spyod dang bzod pa spyod yang nga / khro nyan
305a7(mdo): chos can gcad pa'i chun pa dang / sa cig gaspyod pa gang spyod pa/ me ga gnod sems myed pam spyod payin// tshan 'grus myong mtha rnams khyen pa dang / sa yongs su kyi chu btsun pa dang / 
305a8(mdo): byang chub mchog gi phyin pa gang spyod pa// de dag ye mo byed par spyod pa yin// bsam gtan spyod dang ting 'dzin du spyod pa dang // sum dam sems ni rab tu dben myong ba// byang chub mchog go khyo ma gang yod pa
305b1(mdo): de dag g.yeng ba myed par spyod pa yin// shes pyod dang blo mchog spyod pa dang // chos rnams thams cad ji bzhin spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag shes rab 'cha yad pa'i spyod ba myed// 
305b2(mdo): byams pa spyod dang phan 'dod myed pa dang // sems can kun la snying rje'i myong pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag khro ba'i za ba myed par 'apyod// stong pa spyod dang rab tu dben spyod pa// mtshan
305b3(mdo): mgyed par yongs su rags spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag smod pa myed par spyod pa yin// yang dag spyod dang de bzhin nyid spyod dang // shes pa thams cad yongs su dag myod dang / 
305b4(mdo): byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang rgya'ang chags pa myed par myod// dad par byed dang dpa' ba spyod pa dang // dran gse pa myod matsun pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang myong ba/ 
305b5(mdo): bsam gtan spyod dang rnam parang spyod pa dang / gi spyod pa gang pyod pa// de dag chags pa myed par spyod pa na// sangs rgyas spyod dang dam chos spyod pa dang // dgel 'chud dkon
305b6(mdo): chog nye bar brtan bapyod dang // byang rgyab mchog gi khyod lagang pa// de dag dkan mchog mchog gi myong ba yin// rdzam myo sa dpa nan du rigs gyod dang // sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin
305b7(mdo): spyod dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rgyan myi chad par myod pa yin// bya ba spyod dang chos rnams bapyod pa dang // mamal kun yongs su gcod pa'i spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi myod
305b8(mdo): pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du 'angalta bar spyod pa byed// dgal myed dang rnam par dag spyod dpa// nyon mongs thams cad yongs gcod spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi myod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yongs su
306a1(mdo): gzung bar spyod pa myed// bde ba spyod dang shIn tu rnam thar da pyod// sems can kun la 'jigs byed mchog spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod la ga pa gyod pa/ rgya byin kya dang tshangs pa'i spyod pa dang / 
306a2(mdo): dgam pa la phyags rnams yongs su chags kya dang // byang chub mchag ga ma skyed lagapa spyan pa// sa lham lacas 'dzag tan phyag bya la// de dag smon pa las spyod pa gyod pa yin// nyim spyod dang zla ba spyod pa dang // pad ma lta bu gos/ 
306a3(mdo): ba myed spyod dpa// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag ltar bcas 'jig rten phyag bya ba// brgya byin spyod dang tshangs pa'i spyod la dang // dkar po'i phyogs rnams yong su rdzogs 'apyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// 
306a4(mdo): de dag bdud rnams sdem bcas skrag par byed// mchog spyod pa dang khyad par 'a phags spyod dang // 'dod chags nyes pa la ba gcod spyod la// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang chu'ang gti mug spyod pa myed/ 
306a5(mdo): 'am spyod pa dang mu stegs spyod pa dang // shes rab myig ni yongs su dag po da dang // byang chul mchog gi spyod la gang spyod pa// de dgra kun tu rtog par spyod pa byed// rus pa spyod pa rab tu ni spyod la// mying dang gsum
306a6(mdo): sa gyi chags spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag lha dang kyi ni mang pos yod// 'phags pa'i spyod pa shin sa thu ma nyam spyon dang // g.yon phyogs lam ni yongs su gcod pyod dag// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa/ 
306a7(mdo): ga pyod pa// de dag rtag tu na la bang payin// dpa' mi spyod dang shinid tu brtan spyod dang // phun kyi rnams de dasu 'jig par byed khyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang yod pa// dodag kyang chu'i snyi por gno ba na
306a8(mdo): gzung ba stod dang don yang spyod pa dang // gzungs la g.yeng ba skyed par byed pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang dru ga yeng ba byed par spyod// marig spyod dang ral chu dben spyod dang // rtag sur su 'byang
306b1(mdo): par spyod pa dang / bya chu la mchog gi spyod lag pyod pa// de dag nan tam byed par spyod pa yin// gso bo'i spyod dang khyad par 'phags pa'i spyod pa dang // 'jig rten thams cad zi la non spyod pa yin// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang
306b2(mdo): spyod pa// de dag dman pa la ni spyod pa myed// rigs pa spyod dang thabs la spyod pa dang // bsam gtan 'de las ldog par spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag kyi zhes spyod pa myed pa yin// lta ba spyod dang
306b3(mdo): rnam par lta spyod dang // myi ba dang gzugs la myi chags spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag 'jigs pa myed par spyod pa yin// thams cad spyod dang kun tu spyod pa dang // dbang po yongs su smyind par spyod pa dang / 
306b4(mdo): byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang myed pa// de dag ye shes nam mkha'i mtha' dang 'dra// / bya ba sems dpa'i dpyod la bstand pa'i tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di// pi 'angag ste de las byung ba na// byang / 
306b5(mdo): chub sems dpal snga skor gyi skye ba'i chos la lathod pa thob par gyur to// rgyal po me skyes dgra'i 'khor dang rgyal po khab kyimam ze 'dang khyim bdag dang / rgyalab ci dang dri zal dang / ko 'bye chen po de dag kyi
306b6(mdo): mthong gi ga chags brgyad stong / blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed nas// cig 'di skad dpes bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang / kyang chub sems dpa'i spyod la 'di'i sa slab par bgyi'o// nan tan gyis
306b7(mdo): 'grub par bgyi'o// sems can chad pa mchis pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la 'di nyid yang dag gam 'dzin du ma lad par bgyis zhes smras so// de nas com ldan 'das kyis kyi 'amachi 'i rgyal po ldand pa 'byor ga das/ 
306b8(mdo): dadas ma ma'ang das kyis gnas kyi lang nyi rgyal pa nad pa bu dang bam/ nga dang a/ mas dpa na dmasatenama'an las kyi rnams ma mno'os byas
307a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bsko re pa byas te bzod pa gsolan nas/ sil stan 'akrol na// me tog gi cham pa ba / 'od zer gyi hra la bya ste/ sa chen po rnam pa drug su g.yos par byas ma/ 
307a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi ba nas song ste/ de gan cig yang cig/ ldan tsas de nyid la ri'i rgyal po mas kyi dang kun tu rang gi khyim du byid to// de nas som ldan 'anas la lharnams kyi dab po san nyin gyis 'di skad
307a3(mdo): ces gsoyod s+ho// bcom ldan 'das kyi'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pas// de bzhin gshegs pas yod ladamams dag sa kyi na // sem ldan 'das kyis bga' sa 'ad pa
307a4(mdo): kol+la shi ka/ rgyal ba ldand pas khyod 'phral shig mad kyis mnad pas yin ki/ kau chashi ga byang chub sems dag semam dpa' chen po ma ma man togs pam/ gang dag slo gsu
307a5(mdo): gi stong chen po 'i 'jig rte nad kyi khams kyi rgya byind dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyob sa dang / nyan thos dang / rabs sa rgyas de dag thams cad/ myi 'am tsa'i rgyal la sngon khas zil kyis
307a6(mdo): nan rto// nakyi byin zhen/ gtsu shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyen sa mag pas rnams sa da / ngasangs rgyas thams can dang / brgya byin da mangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong pathams cad kyi yid kyis non na ma
307a7(mdo): kan ska bas na kyang rgya sems dpa' ni/ bas pa'i lan rted kyis ris kyis kyi na to// nang bya chub sems dpalas kyiyin kyi non pa la la don/ de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i sa
307a8(mdo): nad yang na / gan nyi ben/ byang rgyab lams dpal las de bzhin gshegs pa gyung // de bzhin gshegs pa mas tanas la sa nga// denas rnams kyi
307b1(mdo): byin gyis bstan pa 'di thos nas lal mo la sbya de te mchi' ma bsgrags nas 'di zhan ces// rkye 'o 'dag ni sangs rgyas kyis khyend pa chags pa gyi mnga' zhi ba sgom pa gyi mngal ba 'di lta thu las ni gams me zhag
307b2(mdo): smras so// / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po 'irgya kyi da kyi bu/ lha'i 'od zer srung zhes bya ba 'khod de nyid du 'dus par byard te 'dug pa zhes/ lha rnams kyi dbang po 'argya byin ya 'di skad ces smras so// 
307b3(mdo): yab 'di ltar gang rab tu dben pa rnam par bskur par nye bar gnas pa mnyam zhing ma lags pa'i chos rnams la/ bran myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems kyi skyed pa de ni// sems can thams
307b4(mdo): cad la snyi rje bskyed da pa ma lags/ rgya chen po la mos pa'i dgel ba'i bshes gnyes la bstend pa 'am la ka te// phyis/ 'gyod par 'gyurapa'o// yang skyon myed la zhugs te rgyad chag cad sa 'o na tshig/ sate/ theg pa
307b5(mdo): chen po'i snod du ma bya dad pa la da lagyir ci ma mchis nad la 'di bshad pa na sum bsu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu las/ lha'i bu sto tha mkhas bla na myed la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
307b6(mdo): sems bskyed do// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu 'od zer srung gis 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bka' ya s+yad
307b7(mdo): pa khargya stong phrag ci snyed pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa skyed pa na btar ba ni bdag la mngon sum du gyur da to/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpar gyur dpa
307b8(mdo): 8/ de bzhin gshegs pa dga'acom pa yang bdag pa ma tshogs pa yi sangs rgyas mar bye mdzad las kyi skye 'dis ma la bzod pa yis pa'i 'thod pa de la 'jug pa rnams rnam par dkyil ba gnad lanam zad
307b9(mdo): ma ldan nas kyis 'gan tu gses// bam ldan 'das 'i gangs/ byang chub sems dpal gyi skyen nas mas bzod pa thong pa gang bdag gi ma mtshan pa/ de gnan gshegs nyid sa sa
308a1(mdo): chos de 'thob par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od zer srung la 'di skad ces bka las yad to// 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpal dge ba'i nyam pa
308a2(mdo): rta chan bskyed pa rnams kyis ni/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par myi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i dgel ba'i mkhas brtand pa rnams kyis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pathol bar 'gyur ro// 'od gzer srung bya ba
308a3(mdo): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid dang / chos mnyam pa nyid dang / dge la 'dun mnyam pa nyid
308a4(mdo): dang / zhing mnyam pa nyid de/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa / 'chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod/ yathob par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu gzhan ya pa byang chub sems dmyal
308a5(mdo): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ kyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gabazhin 'di sa ste/ thasam gtan lani stong la nyid rnam par 'tshal la dang / pha rol dasu kyin 'jug gis labs mkhas
308a6(mdo): pal rnam par baphel ba dang / mngon par shes pa lngas ye shes la rnam par che ba dang / thogs pa myed la ye shes kyis rdzu 'phrulan la rnam par 'tshal ste/ 'od zer srub byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag
308a7(mdo): dang ldan na/ myi skye ba'i chom la bzod pa yo lam 'byar ro// 'od zer srung gzhan yang/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldad na/ kyi skye ba la chos la bzod 'thol par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhen 'di la ce/ 
308a8(mdo): thum po rnams la byang chub chos yang phung po rnams la byang mum gyi rang bzhin du mos pa yang yin pa dang / khams rnams sa kyang chub chos yang khams rnams la byang chus kyi rab bzhin du shes pa ma med pa dang ni skye
308b1(mdo): mched rnams byang chub tshol yang khreg skyes ched rnams sa byang chub kyi rab bzhin cu gyi rtog pa dang / chos thams cad la byang chub chol la chos thams cad la byang chub kyi rapa bzhin tu mos pa ma yin te// 'od zer srupa byab
308b2(mdo): rgyas sems dpal tsham bzhi drung ldan mar gyi skye ma chis la ma ma la thos par 'gyur ro// 'od zer srung / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnam pazhi dang ldan na/ gyi skye ba'i chos la 'azod pa mam bar 'gyur te/ 
308b3(mdo): padam can nyid 'dres pa myed lam chos kyi dbyings su shes pa dang / tsas thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ris so pas/ rnam ma rab bzhin du ma med nyan pa se/ 'od zer sdung / byang chub sems sa
308b4(mdo): chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// gyi skye ba'i chos la 'chod 'thob par 'gyur ro// myi skye ba'i chos la 'azod pa yol 'a snyan dam 'di dag bshad pa nas/ byang chub sems dpal lnga stod/ 
308b5(mdo): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur da to// lha'i bu 'od ce ra srung ni/ rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyu rad to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma ra/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
308b6(mdo): kun dga' bo la bkal sa la ya/ kun dgal po khyed kyis/ kyi sa 'i rgyal ma rjond pas zhum pa/ nos sa phyin pas 'dus pa bstanan pa'i le 'u'i chos kyi nam grangs 'di bathung ngam/ kum dga' thom
308b7(mdo): so yod pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di sa med/ sangs rgyas kyi mthul nyid kyis bdag gis chos kyi nam grangs 'di bzungasags so// chom ldan 'das/ pasal la / jim du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zas
309a1(mdo): sornas pas nges pa dang na 'aza po dang / tshigs sa mas brgyand pa namams 'do na / ba ldan 'das rnas can bzungs 'di maldan 'das byam tshal bya rnam sa sus
309a2(mdo): bgapas mam mchis la/ so ma ldan 'das/ sngon bdag la chos snang bar byar da pa gang lags pa de yang / chos kyi nam grangs 'di la brten nas 'bum 'gyur ba skyes so// bcom ldan 'das 'dag 'di snyam su bdag ru
309a3(mdo): nye che ba'i 'chas pa dang bldan pa kro mu tshwa nyan thos kyisag pa'i skyod da ma mchis pa// 5cad la zhugs par gnas pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'dithos nas kyang / 'di sa chu'i chos kyi sdang ba 'di skyes par bya nga na/ byang chul
309a4(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tshad ma mchis pa'i snod du gyur dpang / blo rgya che zhing rgya mtshol dang ldan pa/ chos rin po / che thams cad yongs su 'dzind pa gsol lam btab par sems can tsam
309a5(mdo): da kyi dga' ba'i bzhes gnyen pagyid galags pa de dag gis chos kyinas grangs 'dithos nam chos kyi snang ba'i snyed kyis thob pa 'gyur la snya som kyang mi tsas snyam bgyid na// bcom ldan 'das kyis
309a6(mdo): bka' ma lad pa ga kun dga' bo/ ging gsum gyi gong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyi ma dang zla ba'i snang ba mi snyed pa de dag lams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i num gcin gi 'od kyis son mog zar 'gyur ro// kun dga'
309a7(mdo): po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sul bum sa khams cad nasa'od ji snyed pa de dag ni/ shes rab kyi 'od kyi brgya'i cher yang nye bar myi 'grol ste/ stong gi ma dang / song phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / kye 'khrag khrig brgya phrag
309a8(mdo): gong gi che dang / grangs dpa da Na dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe ba dang / rlung yang nye bar gyi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe sa/ 'di sa ste/ sngang ba khams cad ni shes rab kyi snga 'as sa 'byung ba'i phyir ro// kun dga' mo de bzhin gshegs/ 
309b1(mdo): shes rab kyi skad la de dang ldan nang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang / ma/ 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yo la rnams mkhyen
309b2(mdo): pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba de lta bu dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// kun dga' po gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyand pa dang / thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
309b3(mdo): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dgal ya rgya cher rab tu stond pa dang // chus bzhin dus sor rtog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de dag ni byang tshul gyi sems rjed ya dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba don du gnyer
309b4(mdo): ba dang / snying rje chen po'i go che bgos pa dang / byams pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgol bcom pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gzhol ba'i skyes bu dam pa rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
309b5(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'ang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag
309b6(mdo): yang rgya cher rab tu stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams ji snyed par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla pa/ kun dga' po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ snga de'i nus
309b7(mdo): kyi tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams thams cad 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang ba ste/ rgyund du zhugs pa dang / land cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong la dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs
309b8(mdo): rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs ya dgra bcom pa la bdag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sbyin pa byin pa dang / de bzhin su nyi ma'i gung dang / phye ma 'od kyi lus dang / nam cha stod dang / nam gyi gung dang / tho rangs dang / stong
310a1(mdo): gsum kyi stod chen po'i 'jig rten ni khams thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su ba kang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa mtshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi kha sa sbyis pa byin
310a2(mdo): babyin pa dam nam grangs 'di lha zung lo cag gamag lo ba rgya la ma lo stong ngam/ lo brgya phrag stong du sbyin pa byin na/ kun dga' bo de ji snyam chu sems/ rigs kyi zhu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gni 'des laso
310a3(mdo): nams mang chu bskyed dam/ kun dga' bos gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ste tshad ya mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa dpag cing tshad du ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs gcig pasaHla da pa'i bzod
310a4(mdo): rnams kyi phung po'ide yang tshad ma mchis na dmu lo brgya phrag stong du baphags pa la spos kyang mi 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal saHlad pa'/ kun dgal po khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyi
310a5(mdo): nga du gyun pa rgya'o// byang chu don tu gnyis pa dang / kyi 'tsham lo bskor 'dom su gnyid pa dang / sems can rab rad pa kyang don tu gnyi ba dang / sems can ra tha da par bya ladon
310a6(mdo): nyir bkang // chos kyin sa grangs 'ani myos nas mos sam/ 'ad tam 'chad dam/ na gas/ kun rgyam par byed na/ rigs kyi grob sa rigs kyi na sa bya sems dpa'i yin pa na/ de las bsod nams kyi
310a7(mdo): nga chu byedan/ gang de bzhin byung bas ma kya // rang nga nan/ can dgas pog rnan na sa'adzin
310a8(mdo): [।]/ pam num par byed dkya/ ga da yang rtsod dad/ 'ani byin pa zhes/ don da pams can mid kyim da sa kyi phyin pa 'di 'i sbyin panas kyi na// gdangs bya zhan/ 
310b1(mdo): 'di lta ste/ chos kyi phan 'dogs pa de ni phan 'dogs pa rnams kyi mchog go// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi gding ba de ni gdipa ba rnams kyi mchog go/ 'di lta ste/ chos yongs su 'dzind pa de ni yongs u 'dzind pa rnams
310b2(mdo): kyi mchog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na// kun dga' bo chos kyi sbyin la byin pas ni/ nyon mongs pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pa byin pas ni/ lus brtand par byas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ byang
310b3(mdo): chub sems dpa' nyon mongs ya 'bri bar byed 'dod pas / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba / chos kyi sbyin pa de sbyin par bya ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa des ni/ yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub seMs
310b4(mdo): dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ni/ yon tan gyi phan yon yang dag phul sum brtsam gnyis rab su 'dzind par 'gyur te/ sum bcul ma gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang // bla grom
310b5(mdo): dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba da / 'dod chags chung bar 'gyur ba dang / zhe sdang chung bar 'gyur la dang / gti mug chung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag dang gzhan gi nyon mongs pa
310b6(mdo): char gcod par 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mang po dgal bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i bsngags pa lha rnams kyis brjod par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang klul dang gnod sbyin dang dri zal rnams kyis srung bar 'gyur ba dang / las byas nas bsod
310b7(mdo): snyoms la bar 'gyur ba dang / chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal dngan pa'i gsos sund dang / yo byad rnyed par 'gyu pa dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang tshigs su pa/ da pa phyogs bcur grags papa 'gyur
310b8(mdo): dang / byi dadabyim yin pa rnams kyis thags nyed par gyi 'gyum ba dang / sangs rgyas col 'dra 'das rnams kyis brtsags par 'dzum pa dang / de bzhin nashegs pa'i rkyend kyis rlabs kyis byin gyis drangs pa// 
311a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// byang chub kyi lam la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rtond pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs pa des bdag mya ngan gyi zug rdul dang ldan zhing / bdag nyid
311a2(mdo): rnyings par 'gyur da pa snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag la phyag rkyang ba saHlad tu gsol // gar thos pas bdag mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i chos rnam grangs 'di lta bu yang myi gsung bar gsol
311a3(mdo): ka bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sam khad pa/ sdig can khyod dang mayum pa'i sems can chos zab mo 'di lta phul mos pa ni mang/ gang dag sos pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung kis/ mya ngan ma khyed sme sngags ma 'don dacig/ 
311a4(mdo): sdig can 'di lta ste dper na/ sa'i her nas rdul blangs pa rnyed kyi rnam grangs/ zab mo 'di lta bu la mos so// sa'i rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di lam mos te/ 
311a5(mdo): de dag thams cad ni khyod dang mthun no// sems kyi khams tshad myed ya khyod dang mthun gyis/ de bas na sdig can dka' bar gyis ci// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad yan/ sems can dpag tu myed pa ni
311a6(mdo): byang nga ba la ya ma dag pa mazhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' da ma nyi ga na gyi skye ba'i chos la 'amed pa la bar 'gyur to// thog chags 'argyal ba ni sgo na sa rnams la chos kyi dbyig tshul skyed cing dri ma dang bral ba ma
311a7(mdo): bar dag go// dgel slong brgyad stong ni nye bar lend pa myed par zag pa rnams nyas sems rnam par grol lo// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas sgra chen pos 'jig rten
311a8(mdo): gyi 'ams khyas par gyur da te// lu me tog gi ce rab phral sa/ sil stand brgyad lding dag ni la 'akrol bang dang 'tshal lo// 'a bye 'a khrag khrig brgyad song rnams ni steng gi 'ang ska pa las// kye bdag cag gser ga 'jam
311b1(mdo): bu'i gling cu chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor da pa 'di mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstand te bshad nas/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa gapa lags la 'di ni grong khyer ba lan e mchos kyi 'khor
311b2(mdo): lo bskord te de sems can yongs su sbyind par mdzad pa de khas mchog go// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzind ya dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher stond pa dang / tha na glegs 'am
311b3(mdo): la bris te 'chang kha'i sems can de dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bsko rnyed par 'gyur mo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams la dang / byang chub sems dpal lha'i cod phan dang // che dang
311b4(mdo): ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kyi bsi lags/ 'di mi ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka la saHsad pa/ rigs kyi bu de dag de'i phyir khyod
311b5(mdo): khyis chos kyi na ma gang sa 'di kyi 'am pa'i rgyam ldan pas shus pa pa 'o bdas byin pa rnam par nges pam bstand pa dang / dam mtshas mid pa che mi le'u zhes bya bar thung shig/ ma ldan 'das kyis
311b6(mdo): de skad ces pa ka lasaN lad nas/ byang chub sems dpal byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpal lnga'i cod pan dang / me dang ldan pa kun dkal po dang / lha dam kyi dang sa ma in dra drangs pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom
311b7(mdo): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lang mngon par bsod do// / 'phags pa gyi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljond pas zhum pa zhes bya 'theg pa chen po'i mdo// / rdzogs s+ho/ 
312a1(mdo): sa kyi byam sa rnas par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes kya na beg ma chen pa ma// pangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' las sams kyis/ dzin to// 'di zhan bdas kyi khas pa'i bum zhin/

312a3(mdo): la dang / la pa dang / gas ta dang/ pad ma garnams yang nga na par gang dang / dang pa dang / lus chung dang / ma khyu dang / #dang bram da / na dang / ribyinas dang / gang gang de dag
312a4(mdo): mngan ma rnags pa dang ldan pa/ lung sa mang pos gang sa gan nazug mi lnga ba dang ldan pa'i rnams cas can mamanan// dges mam te nang gi dge za gi dge' mun chen pa dang / mangs gas
312b1(mdo): tshul gcig pa'i spyod yus la gnas pa kho bo nyid kyi chos kyi tshul la bzhugs pa / nam mal la gnas myed pa 'i spyod yul pa/ kyi nye nang pa ma gnas pang/ nyon mongs la dang / sgris pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas lakris pa thams cad

312b3(mdo): cad mkhyen panyid la mes pa myi bzlog pa'i yid dang ldan pa// shes rab dang ye shes rnam par mthong ba'i dam pa 'i pha rol su phyind pa/ thabs kyi yul dang spyod lha nges par bsha sa gzhog/ dgel slong ma skyer gu'i bdag mo chen mo
312b4(mdo): dang / grags 'dzind las gtogs yang / dges slong ma lnga stong ya thabs gcig ste/ chos dkar zos shi na bu yongs su bsdus pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes dang nye bar mya da pa/ dang ma zo myed pa'i chos
312b5(mdo): kyi tshul shind du rtogs pa// mtshan nyid myed pa'i chas kyi tshul pa la rtog pa/ chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'as mtha' myed par shinang du mos pa/ sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par thard pa rjo na par/ gdul ba'i
312b6(mdo): 'gro la rdzi lta ba de bzhin du gzugs kund tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha/ stag rga// byang chub sems dpal sa la/ phrag brgyan dang // nye 'bum gyi byang chub sems dpa yi dgel 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig te/ 'dis te/ 
312b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpas sems dpa' chen po shugs chen dang / shugs can 'dzind la dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / rnam par 'phrul ba chen po'i rgyal po dang / bachon 'grus chen pos rnam par gnond pa dang
312b8(mdo): mkhyen dpa' bo dpa/ 'byings pa dang / chel bsgying sa gongs ldan dang / tshogs chen dpa' ba dang / rnam pa yin pa dang / chos kyi gam dang / rnam chen po dang / bras bzung po dang / yon tan sa
313a1(mdo): rin chen zlal pa dang / kun tu snang ba'i zlal dang / chos dri ma myed pa'i zlal ba dang / rnam par snang byed zlal ba dang / rnam par grags pa'i zlal ba dang / 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed pa'i zla ba dang // rgyas pa'i
313a2(mdo): cha rnal ba dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dpa'/ tshangs pa'i dbang po ltar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs dang / sa la nges par sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings nges par sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / bcud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad sbal 'bas pa'i
313a3(mdo): dbyangs dang / chos kyi rdul nges par sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / sa thams cad rtsu go bar byed pa 'i dbyangs dang / rnam par gyi rtog pas rnam par ma brtags pa'i dbyangs dang / sa steng nges par sgrog pa 'i dbyangs dang / dbyangs kyi yan la/ 
313a4(mdo): thams cad zild kyis non pa'i dbyangs dang / kun nas snying po dang / yon tan snying po dang / chos dri ma myed pa'i snying po dang/ rnam par da snang byed kyi snying po dang / rin chen snying po dang zla ba'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i
313a5(mdo): snying po dang / snang ba'i snying po dang / pad ma'i snying po dang / pad ma 'a dpal gyi snying po dang / bsod nams dpal gyi snying po dang / ye shes dpal gyi snying po dang / gro gros chen po dang / khyad par gle gros
313a6(mdo): dang / nas grags blo klom dang / brlabs chen bu gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / ris chen blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / mal las blo gros dang / rgyal chen blo gros dang / sangs rgyas bre gros dang / blo gros myi zad pa/

313a8(mdo): snang bar byed pa'i sgron ma dang / shine du snang ba'i smon ma dang / zla ba'i smon ma dang / nyi ma'i smon pa dang / ngan song sel ba dang / gu 'bam byed dang / chud cen 'bam byed dang / mngon par 'byung dkal ba dang / 
313b1(mdo): dgal ba dang / gtam dpag dka' ba dang / bro rtogs dka' ba dang / ngan 'gro phyims pa dang // mthul tshe mtho pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ma dpal zhan/ 
313b2(mdo): nur gyur da pa dang / de dag las la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sa la khrag brgyan dang / 'bum phrag gnyis dang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad skye ba gcig gis thogs pa// gzungs thob pa// ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ spongs pa ya
313b3(mdo): mas pa yob pa// zags pa byed pa 'a 'jigs pa lab pa// rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba'i dam pa'i la rol dang phyin pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthal yas par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pas rnam par the la/ lus dang sems rnam par

313b6(mdo): mazhugs pa/ nong pa nyid 'dzin pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sdigs pa las kyi rnam pathams cad mal bababs pa/ dun phyi nas thams cad bcom pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rtsod pa dang / rdzu 'gyulang/ 
313b7(mdo): thams canas pa yA/ rnam su chags pa dang / 'a lo babyed pa/ mye dang me dang rlung dang / sas bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa khams can kyis gsang ba'i gnas su chud pa / sems can thams cad
313b8(mdo): sasangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas nye bar gnas pang/ de bzhin gshegs la thams cad kyis mad 'grags sa nang par brjod brjod cing bkur nga/ ma'i mtha'i bskald par byin gyi rlabs kyis kyind kyis rlangs pa
314a1(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yang dag pam 'dzind pa/ chos rin po che'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ yon tan gi sngags pa thams cad mthar kyis byind pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rtend kyi dbang por 'gyur pa/

314a3(mdo): rgyadad kyi 'chad las de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod kyi pa ma gror byed pa la brtson pa/ phyin gyi klog pa'i go rdza bgom pa/ snying me chen po mngon tu gyu da pa/ rang bzhin gyis rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa// ne mjam dang bcom/

314a5(mdo): rten gyi'ams 'din/ l+h+wamam gyi'i dang po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam gan dbyin gyi dab rlo mas/ ma yin nas su ma min gyi dang so rnam pa'al lci ba sa nam mkhas ri kyi dbang po'am rgya

314b1(mdo): mnan nas lam me lhan ne lha ba de la/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa yang / lha dang myir bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zild kyis mnan cing lam me lhan ne lha bde'o// 'di lta te dper na

314b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi lad kyis mnam te/ mog mog bor mdzad nas lam me lha re lta re'o// 'di lta ste dper ma dag cing dri ma myed pa yi nam mkha' snyam

314b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ba dan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa ya da/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rtend skyed pa rnams kyi 'od/ zild kyis mnan te/ mog mog por byas sems lam me lhan na spang ngo/

314b7(mdo): dper na/ nor bu rin po che kye mya yan lag brgyad dang dram khring dri ma phyed 'od zer rang su 'gro ba ni lam me ldan ne ljang de'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kha dan ser ge li khri la 'azhugs shing phyogs bsrung thams cad

315a1(mdo): ga ldan 'das bdan seng ke'u til 'khrugs pas pa lam me sran ne lhung de'o// 'di lta ste dper na lha'i dbang po brgya byin thogs pa 'i chos bu rin po me sogs shing lnga'i mthum byam chos
315a2(mdo): bzangs na gnas pa ni lam me lhan lhang de'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga nam seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rtend zil da kyis ma na nad cang la ma me lham me lhan ne lha da de'o// 
315a3(mdo): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bas/ de lta bu'i 'khor chen po 'dus par yang rig cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul bsnyen par dka' ba de yang mthong nas 'di snyam ste/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gdan

316a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams/ za na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pam 'gyur ba dang / dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyang

316a7(mdo): rtogs pam dka' ba yin pas/ chos nyes pa 'am/ lta ba nyams pa 'am/ tshul khrims nyams pas yongs su shes pa'am/ rnam par shes par myi nus so// dman pa la mos pa rnams

317a1(mdo): dke'i bshes kanyen rnams kyi legs por yongs su bzung na/ dpa ba'i myig stegs par yongs su dag la/ mos pa'i spyod yul la nges par khyad pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i
317a2(mdo): bsam pa yongs su dag pa// rnam pa bzang po rtogs par 'gyur ba sha stag sa/ 'khor 'dus pa 'di ni de lha su lags las/ de dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di 'chal khar 'gyur zhing / rnam par 'tshal da par 'gyun na/
